Summary Heading: Exceptionally clean; Has everything you need
Summary: I quickly needed to grab a hotel room for a night while my sons were playing in a water polo tournament.  This hotel is PERFECT for a stay if you need to be anywhere in the area.  The hotel is INCREDIBLY clean.  EVERY staff member was pleasant and helpful.  The breakfast had great hours so we were able to make it back from the pool in time, or if you have an early start they were open at 6am.  There is a game room to enjoy.  The little 'store' had the perfect selection of snacks and travel needs, and prices were so reasonable. Our room was large, CLEAN, and had absolutely everything we could have needed.  The HVAC system worked great and wasn't loud.  I also appreciated having a ceiling fan.  I will definitely stay here again for all of our events in Orange County.  Also, Emilio
Room tip: Third floor away from elevators was PERFECT.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is the second time I‚Äôve stayed at this property. Rooms are very clean and well appointed. The staff are super helpful. On my first stay, I left an item behind and they sent it to me. During this stay, they kindly provided some anti-itch cream when it was too late for me to head out to a drugstore.  Breakfast was a buffet served by staff. Food choices were limited, but good (hot and cold items). I felt the set-up was convenient and hygienic and much nicer than the pre-packaged breakfast boxes you receive at other properties. Although this hotel is not close to where I need to be, I‚Äôm happy to drive a little farther and stay here. It‚Äôs super convenient if you need to be near John Wayne airport or the freeways. Parking is free, although a little bit limited. I‚Äôd absolutely
Manager Response: Greetings, Wow, thank you so much for your kind words and support, during these times. Our team thrive to provide a welcoming environment for our guest and i am glad to they have been able to provide that for you.  I am pleased  to also hear that you partake in some of our amenities such as our complimentary breakfast. We cannot wait to have the opportunity to host you again if you are ever in the  Irvine area.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This is an exceptional hotel. The staff were friendly and very helpful. The hotel was clean and the rooms spacious and well laid out. The breakfast was exceptional as well, much better than the typical free hotel breakfast. The hotel is very convenient to John Wayne Orange County Airport. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Dear James M,  Good afternoon, and thank you so very much for taking the time to leave us such a kind and thoughtful review! Our entire team is thrilled to hear that you stay with us was exceptional- We absolutely love to help our guests feel at home, while on the road! We hope that your time in Irvine was relaxing and productive, and we look forward to welcoming you back again. Until then, please take care, and have a great rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary Heading: Staff here were wonderful-Went down for breakfast kind of last minute and was pleasantly surprised!! Thank you
Summary: Got to breakfast kind of sat minute and was actually surprised that there was good food left and the breakfast crew ( Jessi, Veronica and Emilio)actually waited for us to get what we wanted‚Ä¶ made sure we got enough!!! But even more wonderful was Emilio went out of his way to teach my daughter how to make a Belgian waffle and  Veronica went out of her way to help me and was so nice, they were so kind and patient, not rushing us or anything‚Ä¶ what a wonderful group!! Thank you so much for starting out morning off great. We appreciate you and thank you .
Manager Response: Dear Brandy L,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team, we would like to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time out of  your day to leave us such a kind review. We are beyond thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and thank you for the kind compliments regarding our Breakfast Team- We strive to ensure our breakfast is always top-notch, and a great way to start the day. We will certainly pass along your kind words! We look forward to welcoming you back again, and until next time, please take care.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: This hotel was excellent in every way.  Great rate and amenities.  It was clean,  great service and a friendly staff.  The location is near every thing you need. We look forward to welcoming you back again! Until then, please take care, and have a great rest of your day.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: Great service and amenities! This place is great for families! We will stay here again! The breakfast was varied and delicious. The room was very spacious and clean. Overall it‚Äôs great location and you are treated with open arms.

We will make sure that the entire Breakfast Team sees your kind review, and we look forward to welcoming you back again!  Until then, please take care, and have a great rest of your week. Summary Heading: Comfy hotel, spacious rooms and friendly staff
Summary: Stayed here before. This time a one night stay. Came late for breakfast and staff had just cleared the food from blast counter. Jordan from breakfast staff was extra nice, went out of her way and brought us (4) some fruits and jam from the kitchen! Will be coming back for another longer stay in a few days'ti.e, and looking forward to be here again.
Manager Response: Dear kyh86,  Good afternoon! On behalf of our entire team here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine, we would like to send you a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time out of your day to leave us such a kind review. We will definitely make sure that Jordan receives your kind words as well; they do such a great job of helping out our guests. Thank you again for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back again, soon! Until then, take care, and have a safe and happy week! Summary: If you want a home away from home experience this is the place to be. I was overwhelmed, frustrated, exhausted & looked a mess due to flood in my home on 9/20/22. Yet 2 smiling faces greeted my 2 Pomeranians & I as we checked in on 9/21/22.  Little did I know this would be home until 2/17/23.  The amazing team at Homewood Suites turned this stressful situation into a blessing.  From Cherie & Carolyn/Management, Natalie & Namiahya/Front Desk, Alma & Maria/Housekeeping, Maintenance & Veronica, Jordan, Jesse, Valeria, Luxury/Hot Breakfast/Social Hour just to name a few of the professional, kind, friendly team that provided Excellent service during my stay.  Then there are the amenities from daily delicious hot breakfast/social hour on Wednesdays, gym, game room, basketball court,
Manager Response: Dear Alice D,  Good afternoon! What can be said of such a sweet and thoughtful guest... You became like family during your time with us. It seems like just yesterday that we bid you farewell, as your home was complete. We were so thankful for you to be able to go back home, but we have missed seeing your kind face and talking to you throughout the day. You made such a positive impact in the lives and heart of the property! The best blessing of being a part of the hospitality industry, is meeting all of the good and thoughtful people along the way that make a difference, and you are one of those people. From the bottom of our hearts, thank you for choosing to stay with us, for being so kind and understanding, and for always being a ray of sunshine. We are better for having known you! You are always home and welcome here, please know that you always have a place in Irvine, if you ever come back to visit- our hearts and our doors will be open!   All of our very best to one of our very favorite guests,  Cherie Brower and Team General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary Heading: Clean, Modern and great customer service!
Summary: This location is one of the nicest Homewood Suites I have visisted. Very clean, modern aesthetic and super comfy beds. Dining staff were friendly and helpful and the breakfast and Wed reception small bites were tasty. Will visit again!

We will certainly pass along your kind words! We look forward to welcoming you back again, and until next time, please take care.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: I usually don‚Äôt leave reviews but wow! This is one of my favorite places to be. Not only is this a beautiful hotel with great amenities but the staff is the best around. I want to specifically recognize Sergio who made the evening social feel like a 5 star dining experience. Namiahya and Natalie at the front desk who were so warm and hospitable. They are like a dynamic duo. And to top it off Hayley made sure to ask me how my stay was as I departed and made me feel welcome to return. I definitely WILL be back when I am in town.

We will also pass along your kind review to Namiahya, Natalie, and Hayley as well- We love to help our guests feel at home! We know that there are many options of property to stay at in Irvine, but we thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we hope that your time in Irvine was both productive and relaxing. Summary Heading: Friendly staff makes me feel welcome

I tried other hotels in the area but the hospitality and spacious accommodations brings me back to Homewood Suites.

We thank you for being a loyal guest, and we look forward to being of service to you, in the years to come. Thank you again, and we hope that you have a great rest of your day. Summary: We came on a trip from Texas for a water polo tournament. Haley was extremely helpful in helping us organize our trip. The hotel is in a great location, clean, and the staff is very attentive.

We wish your team many successful wins this season, and we can't wait to welcome you back, again! Until then, please take care, and have a great start to your week. Summary: One of the best service here is the breakfast. A balanced meal with carb. & protein even vitamins. Don't miss a waffle. It's real. Their service also kind. You can feel  family like service. #Veronica
Manager Response: Dear 593chank,  Good afternoon! On behalf of our entire team here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine, we would like to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a great review. We are all Team Veronica here as well and agree that she really goes above and beyond to help make our guests feel at home while they're getting a nutritious start to their day. Summary Heading: Month & a Half Adventure with a Puppy
Summary: I stayed here from October to mid November and the employees here are the nicest, everyone from the front desk, to the kitchen crew to the cleaning crew. I had to stay long term with my puppy, which was our first hotel stay. They are so helpful and thr place is always clean.  The kitchen crew (Jessie, Luxury, Jordan, Valerie & Veronic) they are so nice. They always ask how your doing, how my puppy is. I love that they change up the menu and always have two different types of eggs. In order to get breakfast in the morning and not leave a crying puppy, I have to tie her to the trashcan. The crew will keep an eye on her for me while I grab food and then we head to the room to eat. Also, happy hour, I don't know what they put in the salad but its always delicious but the best part
Manager Response: Dear 489sandrap,  Good day! Wow, thank you so, so very much for taking the time out of your day to leave us such a kind and heartfelt review- We are deeply moved and so very grateful! We absolutely loved having you and your puppy with us (let's face it, puppies are the best!) and it was such a joy to be of service to you, during your stay. We'll certainly pass along your kind words to our Breakfast team; it means so much to us to help people feel at home while they are with us. We'll also make sure to pass along your review to the rest of our team, and give kudos to Julieta- She is one of the kindest people on this Earth, and she is always so cheerful to help anyone she comes across during her day, whether it be guests or fellow team members. Thank you so very much, from the bottom of our hearts, Again it was our pleasure to be of service to you while you were with us. We can't wait to welcome you back! With as quick as this year is already flying by, it will be the Holiday Season again before we know it. Feel free to bring your puppy with you as well (though she won't be a puppy by then!)  Until then, thank you again, and have a great rest of your week.  Sunniest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: This place is amazing. Had to book a last minute stay and was glad they had a room open. The place was clean and organized. Did had some problem with my room but Sergio came in and fixed everything in a flash. He was amazing and my experience with this hotel so worth it because of him

We‚Äôd like to thank Brian Namiayha Zach Jay Issac and my person favorite Yazz! She sent two big mugs full of different teas and honey as I wasn‚Äôt feeling well. We live in Orange County but definitely will be back for another relaxing staycation. Thanks again everyone!

Summary: The staff here is Amazing. We came in on a 6am flight and just wanted to drop off our luggage before we did anything else. The front desk lady was so amazing. She let us check in early when we arrived around 9:30. She knew how tired we were and accommodated us. The front desk also gave my husband a list of food places. Less than 5 minutes away there are a bunch of food establishments. Anything we needed we got‚Ä¶   Free breakfast was awesome. Veronica and Jessie took amazing care of us. They kept the food coming as it ran out. They always had a smile on their face and was always pleasant. I wanted hot chocolate but there wasn‚Äôt any displayed so they went to the back to grab me a few. The food station was clean and everything was delicious. I wish I could give the staff here 100
Manager Response: Dear hannahfR2229XK,  Good day! We know exactly who you are talking about- That's Caroline, our Front Office Manager! We agree that she is amazing, and we will certainly make sure that she receives your kind words. We are thrilled that we were able to help you get some rest after a long flight, and we are so glad that we could help make your stay comfortable, easy, and hopefully filled with plenty of wonderful memories. We'll also make sure that your amazing review gets over to Veronica and Jessie in our Breakfast Team- they are absolutely wonderful ladies who really go above and beyond for our guests. Thank you so much again for taking the time out of your day to leave us such a wonderful review, and we look forward to welcoming you back again. Until then, please take care, and have a great rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: Many thanks to Veronica, Jessie, Jordan, Valeria, Luxury for the great food and wine service. Appreciate the fresh salads and fresh baguette as always.    Today we had fresh pastry! They are so delicious!!!!  Happy holidays!!!
Manager Response: Dear anewgene,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport, we would like to send you a very big, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a wonderful review. We look forward to welcoming you back again, soon. Until then, please take care, and have a great rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: This hotel is PET friendly, basketball court (brand new), shuttle, farmers boy next door, guest snack bar, full breakfast, pool (not heated)/spa, plenty of parking, RV parking (2 spaces only), Conveniently located off Red Hill in Irvine, price $$, 4 star hotel  ROOM/BEDS:  VERY comfortable and soft, clean no smoke smell, no old smell on carpets, the clean crew walks up and down the halls cleaning constantly, its so clean & quiet/friendly. Extra blankets always in room, couch folds out to a bed.  GAME ROOM has pool table, shuffle board, enlarged jenga & other games- great place to get out energy.  POOL/SPA, Basketball court (new and clean),   ***Everything from the check-in to check-out felt like HOME <3   The entire staff at Homewood Suites in Irvine are professional, personable
Manager Response: Dear N5709EFsamanthas,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine, we would like to send you a very warm and heartfelt, "Thank you!" for taking the time out of your day to leave us such a wonderful and KIND review. We are thrilled that we were able to make your stay clean, comfortable and restful (for your pets too!) and we hope that your time in Irvine was filled with many wonderful memories. We will certainly pass along your gracious words to Veronica and Jessie (they are amazing!) and we hope to be able to welcome you back again, soon. Until then, please take care, and have a safe and happy rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary Heading: Amazing place but an even better staff
Summary: I had to make a quick booking and good thing they had some open rooms. It was great that they provided the shuttle so that helped a lot. Did had some toilet problems while I was there but Sergio came in and saved the day real quick.  He was so polite and courteous.
Manager Response: Dear 686seral,  Good afternoon! On behalf of our entire team here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine, we would like to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time out of your day to leave us such a kind review. We look forward to welcome you back again! Until then, please take care, and have a great rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: Our stay was exceptional. Suites are a great size with everything you need. There are 2 bbqs at the pool area which are kept very clean. Breakfast was excellent with omelettes, sausage, breakfast potatoes and a waffle station along with fruit and various breads. The kitchen staff gets 2 thumbs up.   A man by the name of Sergio Javier came to assist me immediately when I was unable to start the bbq. He brought me utensils and prepared the grill for me. He was a stand up guy and extremely helpful. I wish my workplace had more employees like him as he takes pride in his job.   Gracias Sergio!!!!
Manager Response: Dear dantedante1107,  Good afternoon! We are beyond thrilled, honored, and everything in between to hear that you had an exceptional stay with us. We love helping our guests feel at home! We are so glad to hear that you were able to enjoy our BBQ area (it's a great time of the year to BBQ!) and we're not surprised at all that Sergio was right there to help- He's definitely the best Chief Engineer around! We thank you so very much again for your kind review, and we look forward to welcoming you back again. Until then, please take care, and have a great start to your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: I highly recommend staying at this Hilton Hotel. There are many reasons to enjoy what this hotel has to offer.  Some of their amenities include a quiet gym, nice pool, hot tub, and complimentary breakfast. The staff here are very friendly and helpful. Especially, the front desk and breakfast staff, Veronica and Jessie. thank you Hilton staff for making my stay special.
Manager Response: Dear Matlina2022,  Good afternoon! We are beyond thrilled to read your kind review, and we are so grateful for your recommendation! We absolutely love to help our guests feel at home while they are traveling, and we are honored to have been of service to you, during your stay. We'll certainly make sure that your kind words are passed along to Veronica and Jessie, and we look forward to welcoming you back! Until then, please take care, and have a great start to your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

This visit was even better when I received a lovely letter from my house keeper Alma. I came back to my room with a brand new Sprite because the one I had in the frig was half empty. Summary: I had a great stay at this hotel. The rooms were very clean. The breakfast was great. They held a social night on Wednesday and Hayley was great servicing us. Would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area.

Summary Heading: Great stay at Homewood Suites John Wayne Airport
Summary: Clean and comfortable. Great staff. Just an easy stay. Room was well appointed with a kitchen, desk area and couch. I can‚Äôt say enough about the staff. They keep everything clean and moving forward! Pool and hot tub was a bonus. Kid sized chess board was fun. There are many other activities like basketball and a gym!

The brunch was a hit! A great space for the wedding party to hang out and chat before the wedding the next day! My room was spacious and comfortable best nights sleep in a while! I'll be back! Weather you're traveling for business, recreation or both this is a great place to land! Thanks Hayley and Caroline and the whole team!

We'll definitely choose Homewood Irvine when we come back.

Summary Heading: Perfect 10 day Anniversary stay at the Homewood Suites John Wayne Airport thanks to Caroline and Eliza and all the staff
Summary: Homewood Suites are by far the best hotel my husband and I have ever had the pleasure to stay at. We were celebrating our anniversary and Caroline and Eliza went over and above to help me get our room decorated with silk rose petals, tea lights, Happy Anniversary banner and champagne with glasses. It was perfect!  Caroline was so hospitable! I sent  the decorations and champagne to her at the hotel and the morning of our stay Eliza set up all the decorations before we arrived. They even let us check in early.  Eliza did such a good job setting up the decorations it brought tears to my husband's eyes. The pictures don't do it justice. Our entire stay was awesome! From the free breakfast to the free parking you couldn't get a better deal for all the amenities they offer. The whole

Eliza and Caroline do such an amazing job, and they were thrilled to prep setup and decorate your suite- We will certainly make sure that they see your kind words. Until then, please take care, and have a wonderful start to the next 10 years!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: We have had an unforgettable stay. Our kids referred to it as our new home during our vacation.  The team has done everything to make our stay most enjoyable.  Special thanks to Caroline from the front desk and Hayley and her team with Eliza, Jordyn and Valeria.  The 2 room apartment has lots of space and has been very clean.  The breakfast buffet was varying every day. The end time, the team took gently care that nothing was empty or untidy. The game room, basketball court and pool are fantastic.  The social hour on Wednesday night is remarkable. We are recommending this place to our friends! Thank you very much  Chris and Alex with the kiddos

Summary: This is by far our favorite Homewood.  As diamond members, we have stayed at many properties.  This Homewood, however, is flawless. It is upscale by comparison to other Homewoods and Hilton properties.  It is a beautiful, elegant place...inside and out. The king two room suite we had was spotlessly clean and very well appointed.  Not a scuff on the furniture, not a chip in the paint, not a spot on the upholstery.  We actually stayed at another Homewood near the the airport in Ohio on the way home.  I was so let down....we were spoiled in Irvine!  You'd hardly know anyone else was there, except at breakfast.  We didn't hear a peep from the surrounding rooms or hallway.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  Everyone we met said hello....every question was met with a kind
Manager Response: Dear Welltraveled2008,  Good morning! On behalf of the entire team here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport, we would like to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a kind and thoughtful review. We love our Diamond guests (and all of our guests!) and it was truely an honor to be of service to you, during your stay in Irvine. Thank you so very much for your kind words regarding our clean and spotless suites, and we will certainly pass along the gracious kudos to our amazing Housekeeping Team. Our Engineering Team will also be so happy to hear that their hard work to upkeep our rooms was noticed! We love to go the extra mile for our guests, and reviews like yours reminds us how very much we love to help guests feel at home, while they are on the road. We can't wait to welcome you back to Irvine, soon! Until then, please take care, and have a wonderful rest of your week. Summary: My stay at this hotel exceeded what I expected. From start to finish, the service was extraordinary. From the moment I walked up to the front desk, Brian welcomed me with a smile. I told him I was checking in for my Dads 90th birthday celebration with my family. During my stay, Caroline, the front office manager, made sure that I had everything my family and I needed. Also, during the free breakfast the next morning, Kaysee, was outstanding with making sure everything was warm and there was plenty of breakfast items to choose from. She was attentive to her surroundings. During the short stay, all of the hotel staff was friendly. I was walking in the hallway looking for the pool and Emilio asked if I needed help. I told him I was looking for the pool and he actually took the time
Manager Response: Dear valerieK4446DP,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport, we would like to wish your dad a VERY big, "Happy Birthday!!" We wish him the very best year yet! We are so thrilled that we could be of service to you and your family while you were with us, and we hope that his birthday party was just wonderful- we know that it was! We love to help families celebrate special times together, and we were absolutely honored that we could help make your dad's birthday a success. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future! Until then, please take care, and have a wonderful start to your week.  Kindest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: Our experience here has been remarkable. We are a traveling hockey team and stay in many hotels, this is by far the best. 44 kids, plenty of activities, accommodating rooms & the breakfast staff is first class. Jordan graciously greets 44 teenage boys every morning of our stay. She replenishes the food and is a joy of a personality. Thank you Jordan!
Manager Response: Dear T9245HDmichellep,  Good morning! On behalf of Jordan and our entire team here at the Homewood Suites Irvine, we would like to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a kind review. We are so happy to have been of service to you during your stay, and we were so glad to have your team with us. Such a great group, and we were all rooting for them! We will certainly make sure that Jordan is given your kind words, and we can't wait to welcome you back again. Until then, take care, and have a great start to the week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: We had a very nice time. Service was great, especially the breakfast buffet servers and front desk. They were very positive and accommodating.  Very clean, well maintained facility. Only downside was the price increased significantly when we tried to extend. Otherwise great stay
Manager Response: Dear jimwhelchel,  Good morning, and thank you very much for taking the time out of your day to leave us such a kind review. We are thrilled and humbled at your kind works, and we are so glad that you chose to stay with us during your time in Irvine- We hope that you were able to take in all that Irvine has to offer while you were here. We do hope to welcome you back again, soon, and we do recommend booking in advance! Until then, take care, and have a wonderful start to your week.  Sincerest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: All the employees were very nice and extremely attentive.  The breakfast team Veronica, Jessie, Kaysee, Jordan and Valeria were a lot of fun to talk to and when I needed something they got it for me.  A very pleasant experience.
Manager Response: Dear 3genw,  Good morning, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a kind review! Our breakfast team will  be thrilled to hear of your kind words- They all work so very hard to make sure that our guests' breakfast time is a great start to their day. We will certainly pass along this review to them! We are so grateful that we could be of service to you during your stay, and we can't wait to welcome you back again! Until then, take care, and have a great start to your week!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary Heading: Homewood suites by Hilton red Hill, Irvine, California.
Summary: I would like to begin by saying I have stayed at the Homewood suites by Hilton in Irvine on red Hill on and off this year for approximately six months. In that time Tatiana, Caroline, Isaac,  Brian, Camilla and Tony have taken incredibly good care of me. I would like personally recognize this team. Tatiana, team leader, always greets me with a smile, and will go out of her way to converse and ask how things are going. I had a small issue with the laundry and she responded so quickly, and I was thankful for it. Caroline, who is amazing at her job. Always makes me feel like I'm the most important person in the room when she's talking to me.  She never disappoints. Tony, who stands in the lobby in the morning and says good morning hello and goodbye to everyone entering or leaving
Manager Response: Dear Sherpa24181506938,  Good morning! On behalf of Tatiana, Caroline, Isaac, Brian, Camila, Tony, and our entire team here at the Homewood Suites Irvine, we would like to say a very warm and heartfelt, "THANK YOU!" for taking the time to leave us such an extraordinary review. We are both humbled and thrilled that you are a part of our guest family, and we are so honored that we can be of service to you during your stays with us. We all genuinely love what we do- taking care of people- and it really shows in our team. We will definitely make sure that everyone mentioned here is given your warm and encouraging words, and we can't wait to welcome you back again soon.  Take care until then, and thank you again!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: After 20 years of traveling to conferences staying at many hotels, I cannot remember any hotel staff being considerate enough to listen to the dietary needs of guests.  Haley and  Jordan made  extra special efforts to ensure I had gluten free options.  Thank you for hiring such caring individuals to represent your Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear ElizaC629,  Good morning, and thank you so very much for taking time out of your day to leave us such a kind and heartfelt review. We are honored to be of service to you during your stay, and we are so happy to hear that Hayley and Jordan were able to make your stay that much more enjoyable. They both do so much to help our guests, and we are so lucky to have them on our team. We will certainly pass along your kind words to them, and we can't wait to welcome you back again. Until then, please take care, and have a wonderful rest of your week.  Sincerest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: Everything was perfect: Breakfast, parking, Facilities, Staff, room Room was spacious with a kitchenette and 2 queen beds Breakfast was awesome Staff were so friendly and accommodated our early check-in request Would definitely recommend for families
Manager Response: Dear Boto84,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport, we would like to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a kind review. We are thrilled to hear that you had an excellent stay with us, and we agree- our complimentary breakfast is a tasty way to start the day right! We are so glad that every aspect of our property exceeded your expectations.  We can't wait to welcome you back again! Until then, please take care, and have a wonderful rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary Heading: Great staff and Good hotel overall but needs a bit more attention for five star review
Summary: Jessie, Jordan, Kaysee, Veronica and Valerie were very kind and professional. We were greeted each time they saw us. Five star for them.  Had to give four star as the maintenance in my bathroom was not the highest quality. Shower tap was leaking if you did not really push hard to close it. Something wrong with it. One of the toilet seat fixing screw cap was missing giving an unwelcome first view with dirty, brownish rusty ?/ dirty ?apppearance.
Manager Response: Dear Omur, Thank you for taking the time to give your review for our property! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine John Wayne Airport and thank you for mentionning our Breakfast team member Jessie, Jordan, Kaysee, Veronica and Valeria! They are working hard every morning to provide the most yummy (and complimentary!) breakfast. We apologize for the inconvienience that your bathroom may have caused during your stay, we strive to give our guest the upmost quality in regards to the rooms. We hope to see you again in the future! Sincerely, Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary Heading: Thee best hotel we‚Äôve ever stayed at!
Summary: It started out with excellent service at check in to the super clean & spacious suite that had the most comfortable beds and pillows to the game room where we played pool and shuffleboard to the gym my son used and the delicious full breakfast with omelettes, potatoes, sausage, oatmeal, cereal and a waffle bar all with extra fixins. The only downside is that I wish we could‚Äôve stayed longer to use the pool and play ping pong outside. Next time! Thank you for a great weekend for me and my teenage kids! We had a great time!
Manager Response: Dear Heather M, Thank you for taking the time to write your glowing review about our property! We are overjoyed that you enjoyed your stay and our amenities such as: our spacious suites with comfortanle beds, game room, 24-hour gym and (complimentary) breakfast! We hope to see you again soon so that you can also enjoy our pool and ping pong table! Sincerely, Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary: Very clean hotel and staff is friendly and helpful. Sergio helped us with the television and corrected the issue immediately. I would recommend this hotel. This hotel is conveniently close to John Wayne airport
Manager Response: Mitchd595,  Good afternoon! On behalf of our entire team here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport, we would like to say a very warm, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a kind and thoughtful review. Sergio is truly a gem, and we love having him as our Chief Engineer, as well as a part of our hotel family. We are so glad that we were able to get the television issue fixed, and we are honored to be of service to you during your stay.  We certainly hope to welcome you back again! Until then, please take care, and enjoy the first days of Fall.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager  Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: Hayley is super friendly and provided a great service every day. I am so happy to felt welcome in a place away from home. Great, inviting and friendly people all around that made this experience amazing
Manager Response: Dear CeciliaM2830, Thank you for taking the time to give us a 5-star review for our property! We are so glad we were able to make you feel comfortable in your home away from home! Hayley, our sales manager, is such a caring and awesome person and we are glad she was able to hlep you! See you again soon! Sincerely, Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary: Zach from the front desk went above and beyond to return a lost item to me. The hotel in general, is clean comfortable and welcoming. For an extended stay, it definitely gives a home away from home feel!
Manager Response: Dear H8629FYkateo, Thank you for taking the time to write a review for our property! We are overjoyed that you enjoyed your stay here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine John Wayne Airport. Thank you for mentioning Zach's name in your review, he is such a caring and knowledgeable team member and we are so lucky to have him! We hope to see you again soon! Sincerely, Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary: Hayley the Sales Manager spent 45 minutes helping find a solution when I needed to work (on zoom) from the hotel. Great lighting and a good connection are important if you want your call to go well, she went above and beyond, snagging an extra lamp form the business center, calling Hilton's help Line and staying with the situation until it was resolved. Highly commend her happy to help - and keep looking for solutions attitude. You ofter don't see that kind of dedication! Thanks Hayley!!
Manager Response: Dear Roving422097,  Good afternoon, and thank you so very much for taking the time out of your day to leave us such a kind and heartfelt review! We 100% agree with you- Hayley is such a wonderful leader, manager, and all-around great person to have as a part of our hotel team family. Her customer service is second to none, and we are so glad to hear that she was able to help you with connectivity, and we are so happy that a solution was found! We will absolutely make sure that she sees your kind words- and thank you for them again. We hope that the rest of your week is relaxing, and we hope to be able to welcome you back again.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: Brian, Zach and Tony and all front desk staff were all amazing.  Whomever cleans the rooms did a fabulous job, it was immaculately clean and room so spacious.  Breakfast was great and location perfect.  Complimentary shuttle from the airport as well.  Only wish they had a good and drinks in the evening or a bar, but there is a full stocked mini market with most items in the lobby.  Wonderful service and well maintained accommodations will be back again and again
Manager Response: Dear LMINSH,  Good afternoon! On behalf of our entire team here at the Homewood Suites Irvine, we would like to say a very warm and heartfelt, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a kind review. We are thrilled to hear that our amazing Team was able to help you fell at home while you were with us, and we agree- Tony, Zach and Brian are all fantastic! We love our guests and certainly love what we do. We are so happy to hear that our Suite Shop was filled with your favorites, and we hope that you were able to get a good bite to eat at our Wednesday Manager's Reception. We can't wait to welcome you back! Until then, please take care, and have a wonderful rest of your week.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: We had an amazing experience at the Homewood last weekend.  My husband and I were doing a quick getaway to the OC. I called Camilia multiple times during the week to ask questions like early check in, pool hours, and multiple other questions about the property. She was soooo patient and professional throughout the conversations.  Also, I mentioned we will be celebrating an anniversary. When we arrived to the hotel, our room was amazing!  There were petals on the bed, gift bag, and balloons! We felt sooooooo welcomed. She went above and beyond. Tatiana was also on our welcome card so I would love to recognize her help as well. Very few hotels go out of their way to make a memory like this. I love to recognize their  hard work as well as Caroline and Brian for helping us out
Manager Response: Dear Noosheen, Thank you for your glowing and thorough review for our property as well for giving us a 5-star rating! We were overjoyed to host you at our property for your anniversary getaway; Camila and I had a blast decorating your room to start your stay with a bang! We hope that you enjoyed your goodies and we hope to see you again soon, keep us in mind for the next anniversary celebration? Sincerely, Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary Heading: June ‚Äò22 Update - Thumbs Way Back Up
Summary: I reviewed early last year and this review is a happy update. Every issue that I previously complained about has been addressed except for the noise, which I‚Äôve moderated with good noise cancelling earbuds. Mattresses better my last two stays, breakfast back on point (I can‚Äôt stress how convenient their free breakfast is for me - big ups. Homewood), Housekeeping always thorough, super nice and, now, more frequent if not every day.   Paul, if you‚Äôre still managing, thank you for your great team and property. You guys all deserve some recognition from corporate.
Manager Response: Dear espiranzal2021, Thank you for taking the time to write your review about out property! We are overjoyed that you decided to stay with us again and that your prior issues were resolved. We strive to make our guests' stay better with updating and/or changing things that are addressed in our guests' reviews. We hope to see you again soon! Sincerely, Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary Heading: Great location, staff and breakfast juice and coffee always available!
Summary: This hotel was perfect for a week long trip.  We stayed in the 2 bedroom 2 bath suite and it was the ideal size for 3 women.  The suite was so spacious we had so much room we didn‚Äôt get in each others way.  It was very clean and bright and cheery.  The staff was so helpful and friendly and always at the desk when you needed them.  They answered many questions and never seemed like I was bothering them.  Breakfast was different each morning which was a plus.  And they have the most delicious fruity juice which was to die for. Just ignore the calories because it is so good!  I would recommend this hotel because it is a convenient location to so many places and highways.  We found it was just as easy to avoid the highways if you have enough time so you can see things other than the
Manager Response: Dear rebeccaa952, Thank you for taking the time to give us such a through and glowing review for our property! We are overjoyed that you enjoyed your stay here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine John Wayne Airport! We are glad that you enjoyed our amenities such as the spacious room, our complementary breakfast and the location. Our front desk staff are some the nicest and caring people you will meet and many thanks for mentioning their helpfulness and friendliness! We hope to see you again soon to your home away from home and until next time! Sincerely, Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary: Very pleased with the hotel, everything was just perfect! The rooms were really nice and big almost felt like a mini apartment. Everything was clean and updated. The staff was great! Will definitely be booking here in the future!
Manager Response: Dear yendif2022, Thank you for taking the time to write a 5-star review for our property! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine John Wayne Airport very soon! Sincerely, Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary Heading: Sales? Sold. Front desk? Fantastic. Housekeeping? Heck yeah!
Summary: Our little underdog soccer team needed somewhere to lay their heads at night during a tournament‚Äî this little under dog soccer team manager/travel coordinator/keeper-of-the-snacks struck gold with this Diamond rated hotel.  Hayley Fulton sealed the deal, not that the property hadn‚Äôt already sealed it itself‚Äî but she absolutely sold me and helped me deliver the sell to my group (our group‚Äôs rate was higher than we typically aim for, but all the little extras really do add up in value; like $30 parking at the other places?!¬°) She provided me with an attractive group block agreement, digital collateral, a direct booking link and more.  She highlighted all of the amenities perfect for our families‚Äô experiences, made everything easy to book and was an absolutely lovely person to work
Manager Response: Dear Carluhhh-92, WOW, thank you so much for such a fantastic, thorough and positive review for our property! We are over the moon that you and your team enjoyed your stay here at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine John Wayne Airport! Hayley, our sales manager, is such a kind and caring person; she is always making sure that all of her groups feel like they are at home while they are away from home so a big thank you for shining a light on her hard work! Our front desk team are the epitome of great customer service and are proud to service our guests with their every need just like if they were hosting at their own home which makes for a warm and caring team. Thank you once again for your glowing review and we hope to see you and your team again very soon! Sincerely, Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel for families with a great location and super staff
Summary: This is the best hotel in the area. It‚Äôs close to everything like the malls, parks and the beach. The sales manager Hayley was extremely accommodating and helpful with our entire team. She‚Äôs very attentive to detail and easy to talk to. Her staff is top notch. Our room was taken care of by Luciana. She did an amazing job cleaning up after a bunch of athletes. The front desk‚Äôs star is Carolina. Her patience and positive demeanor with everyone was impressive. Brian was also amazing at the front desk. We stayed an entire week and these two pros made all of our requests seamless.  Booking now for our teem event next year.
Manager Response: Dear 123Cheesecup, Thank you so much for your awesome review for our property! We are overjoyed that you enjoyed your stay while being in Orange County for your team! Hayley, our kind and caring sales manager, is hard at work every day to make sure that our guests feel like they are at home away from home. I'll be sure to pass along your review to our amazing team members as they provide the best customer service for our property! We hope to see you whenever your team comes and plays here in California again! Sincerely, Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary Heading: Very accommodating and excellent service for two soccer teams
Summary: Hayley Fulton took amazing care of us! We had 19 rooms booked all together for our two soccer teams and she was so accommodating and went above and beyond. The staff at the hotel greeted us, warmly and kindly and took care of our every need. I would like to especially thank those who personally went above and beyond and that was Camila, Brian and Nino! Thank you for making our trip wonderful and we look forward to our next stay with you all.
Manager Response: Dear KLarson43, Thank you for taking the time to post such a great review about our property! We are overjoyed that you enjoyed your stay and that your two soccer teams did as well. Hayley is such a caring and kind person and she will go above and beyond to make our guests feel like they are staying in a home away from home! I will be sure to pass along your message to Camila, Brian and Nino who are part of our wonderful front desk team. We hope to see you and your teams back at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine John Wayne Airport very soon! Sincerely, Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary: Our family has very high standards when it comes to hotels. Our top criteria are cleanliness, decor, spaciousness, amenities, comfort, and staff.  The hotel was very clean from the room to the common space. Decor the hotel is very modern you can tell it was recently built or redone. Spaciousness the rooms were big enough to die 4 people very comfortably. There is a kitchen area with a large fudge and freezer and an area with a couch and tables. There were a lot of amenities - game room (pool table and shuffleboard), pool, fire pit, 2 barbecue grills, and a basketball court. Because of its spaciousness the rooms were very comfortable, the beds were great and the sitting area was a nice place to relax, instead of the beds. Caroline and the staff at this hotel were great. They were
Manager Response: Dear Jslo13,  Good morning! On behalf of our entire team at the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport, we would like to say a very warm and sincere, "Thank you!" for taking the time to leave us such a kind review. We are beyond thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay in our spacious suite, and we're so glad that you were able to take the time to enjoy some of the fun amenities that we have around property- we're all big fans of our game room, as well! We will certainly make sure that Caroline sees your kind review (we love having her here!) and we can't wait to welcome you back again. Until next time, have a great rest of your week, and thank you again.  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: 9 night stay here at the Homewood Suites and it was absolutely outstanding from the moment we walked into the door.  From the Manager, Haley, to Caroline front desk manager, to Veronica, Jordyn and Casey, the dining staff, they ALL are the most friendly, caring, accomodating staff I've ever encountered at a hotel. Whatever need we had, they were more then willing to help with a cheerful attitude.   This hotel looks brand new with bright and cheery decor, a beautiful pool area and a game room too boot.  The rooms are large and well equipped with  everything you need.  Hotel housekeeping did a wonderful job keeping our room clean and neat throughout our stay.  The hotel is close to John Wayne Airport, but you really do not hear the planes. They really did a great job sound
Manager Response: Dear Carolyn, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our property! We are so glad that enjoyed your stay and all of our amenities such as the pool, game room and large rooms that equipped with a kitchen with all your cooking needs, We pride ourselves to make sure that our guest feel at home when they are away from home and team members like Hayley, Caroline, Veronica, Jordan, Kaysey, our Housekeeping and Front Desk make it possible. I'll make sure to pass along your review to them. We hope to have you back at the Homewood Suites by Hilton John Wayne Airport very soon! Sincerely, Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary: People always attending all needs. Excellent breakfast with special attention from Jesse &  Veronica. The pool very clean and basketball court very nice. The hostest really interested that you enjoy the stay. The room very confortable and clean
Manager Response: Dear OnAir66420064860, Thank you for taking the time to review our property! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and our amenities. I'll be sure to communicate to Jessy and Veronica your message and they are going to be so excited, they are working hard everyday to provide our delicious (and complementary) breakfast every morning! We hope to see you soon on your next adventure when it brings you to sunny California again! Sincerely, Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary: Likely seriously this is my favorite Homewood Suites in the US. And I stay in a lot of hotels and at a lot of Homewoods. Just a really nice facility, well kept, quiet, but with a nice evening social area, decent snacks and drinks. Pretty good parking (unless you get there way late in the evening then it‚Äôs a bit limited). Nice rooms, good A/C and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear 645caseym, Thank you for taking the time to review our property! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and being your favorite Homewood Suites in the US in your heart melts ours with pride! We hope to see you very soon on your next adventure! Sincerely, Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary Heading: BEST stay EVER for a week!! Favorite hotel in Irvine!!
Summary: Homewood in Irvine is our favorite hotel when visiting our daughter at UC Irvine. We came for her graduation this week and WOW Brian  and Caroline (General Manager) really made it extra special with grad decorations in the room and a special gift for the grad!! HIGHLY recommend! Thank you for another awesome vacation. We will be back again soon!!! She‚Äôs going to grad school at UC Irvine. LOVE this place and staff! Everyone is super friendly and the entire hotel is clean! HIGHLY HIGHLY recommend! 110%!! Thanks Caroline, Brian and team!!!
Manager Response: Dear Happiness765787,  Good afternoon, and thank you so very much for taking the time to leave us such a kind review! We are both humbled and grateful, and we are so glad that we could help your daughter celebrate her graduation. We will certainly make sure to pass along your kind words to both Caroline and Brian, they were so excited to decorate your room! We hope that the graduation was filled with many wonderful memories, and we wish your daughter all the best in her career ahead. Please feel free to come back and visit us at any time, our doors and our hearts are open to welcome you and your family back. Until then take care, and congratulations again!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower General Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: Very satisfied with our stay! Location was very convienent. Rooms were clean. Plenty of amenities to keep the kids entertained. Overall, an amazing experience and we can‚Äôt wait to stay there again. Hayley in sales was patient and worked hard to fulfill our needs. She was a pleasure to work with!
Manager Response: Dear X1091Mamyf, Thank you for taking the time to review our property and for giving us a 5-star rating! Thank you for highlighting our location, rooms and amenities and we are so glad that you had an amazing experience! Our Sales Manager, Hayley, is such a great and caring person and we thank you for mentioning her hard work. We hope you come back to the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine John Wayne Airport very soon!  Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary: Homewood Suites by Hilton in Irvine/John Wayne airport was fabulous hotel for my 6 baseball teams. We came into a hotel that welcomed us with open arms. The kids and all adults had so much fun using all the amenities at the hotel. Everything was so clean everyone felt safe and at the hotel. All the staff were so friendly that we all can‚Äôt wait to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear P8907XKheidip, That is such great news that you and your teams had such an awesome time with us.  It was a pleasure to serve you guys.  Hopefully we will see you the same time next year!  I will be sure to share your comments with the team.  Sincere thanks,  Paul - General Manager

Summary: The service was excellent and everyone was so nice to us. They always helped us with everything we needed, specially Jessee and Veronica, they were so good to us, they are so polite and they really have willing to help
Manager Response: Dear Japa22cr, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our property! We appreciate your kind words about our service and for mentioning Jessy and Veronica. They are hard at work everyday to offer our yummy (and may I add, complimentary)  breakfast! We look forward to welcoming you back whenever your next adventure brings you to sunny California again! Tatiana -Guest Services

Summary: We decided to stay here after reading the reviews. Boy, am I glad we did! We stayed here for 7 days after a week at Disneyland because we wanted to check out the rest of LA and the towns around it. This was the best rate we could find outside of LA with a suite. Room was very nice and clean. Housekeeping only cleaned our room once during our stay but we were able to request new towels and garbage bags. We'd leave our towels and garbage outside our door and it'd be gone by the time we got back. There was breakfast in the mornings. Parking is free out in the lot. Treadmills were available in their exercise room, which was great because our daughter is Type 1 diabetic and it helped her get her blood sugar down after eating a great meal. LOL. There were lots of elevators available.
Manager Response: Dear hypermom,  First let me tell you what an awesome user name you have!  Just wanted to send out a quick shout out to you and your family.  I actually remember you guys walking through the lobby in the mornings.  It is so nice to hear that you had such a great time here with us.  I sure hope you also enjoyed all your tourist attractions while you were here.  We appreciate the feedback and hope to see you again maybe next year for another trip to Disney?  Sincerely,  Paul - General Manager

Summary Heading: Still the best Hilton in California!
Summary: Hayley strikes again! Literally the most incredible human you'll ever come across in the service industry.  We hadn't seen her or this property in over two years due to Covid and she gave us the biggest hug when she saw us! She remembered names and talked about our experience last time we were there in 2019.  Upon arrival, we were greeted by Jordyn and it makes sense why she is working with Haley. Her positivity and smile are contagious.  Her authentic and warm welcome was just what we needed and after a few minutes, we adored her just like we do Haley and the rest of the staff.  My children requested to stay here instead of a waterfront hotel due to the service and "we're vips" as my 13-year-old daughter put it.üòä They make everyone feel that special.  As usual, the property
Manager Response: Mr. Douglas.  I do not have words for what you said about my team.  Hayley has worked for me that last 4 years and Jordyn has been here since last year.  I have already shown them the review and they obviously remember you guys.  I cannot thank you enough for the kind words and loyalty towards our property. Although we have not met, next time please make an effort to come by the desk and ask for me.  I would be honored to meet you and your family.  Sincerely,  Paul - General Manager

Summary: When In Irvine I staying at Homewood suites is the best hotels to stay at. Jordyn at the front desk goes above and beyond to make your stay more comfortable. In the mourning breakfast is very delicious
Manager Response: Dear Zamora,  Just wanted to send a little "shout out" for taking the time to post a review of your experience with us.  Jordyn was so excited to see her name mentioned.  It goes a long way for team moral and they work so hard to make our guests happy.  We appreciate the feedback and hope to see you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Paul - General Manager

Summary: This is the most accommodating Homewood Suites we have ever stayed at! Complimentary breakfast and the Wednesday dinner reception was amazing and staff worked very hard to keep all of the food items stocked. Special thanks to Kaylee and Jordan for working so hard during the evening reception! Any request we made were attended to promptly by both front desk, housekeeping, and maintenance! Our room was very clean and fresh. Overall, the staff was amazing and so welcoming and polite. We have now stayed at about 6 different Hilton properties in the past few years and this one was the best because of the friendly staff and accommodations!
Manager Response: Dear aimeesatos, Many thanks for the really nice words not only about the hotel, but about my team.  Kaysee and Jordan will be thrilled they got mentioned in a guest review.  And to be names the best of the properties you have stayed at is truly an honor.  I will be sure to post this review for the staff to read because it motivates them even more to help people like yourselves.  We sure hope to see you again soon and thanks again for the kind words.  Paul - General Manager

Summary: Outstanding!  We are Hilton Honors members and love staying in the 1 Bedroom at Homewood Suites so that our teenage Daughter can have her own space/TV in the living room, while we are in the bedroom.   Also, they are dog friendly and we love to bring our 8 pound Shih Tzu, Zuko!  It has been hit or miss with these properties, some are great, others leave something to be desired.  I‚Äôm looking at you, Schaumburg, IL! This HWS was EXCEPTIONAL!  We called direct to make the reservation because we had a couple questions.  That was our first introduction to Employee, Jordyn!  She was so kind on the phone and very helpful!   The entire hotel was spotless, we enjoyed partaking in the Wednesday evening Social and delicious breakfast everyday!   All the employees were kind, we were so
Manager Response: Good morning, Thank you so much for team members mentioned by name. We appreciate any feedback guests can give us, but when people are named specifically, they must have really made your experience special. Thank you so much for staying with us and we cannot wait to host you and your family again this coming summer! Warm regards, The Homewood Suites Irvine

Summary: Homewood Suites is my first choice when traveling, so I've stayed at a lot of them. This location was the most elegant of any that I've stayed in. Some room design features are normally only found at higher-end hotels. Sam and Jose were at the front desk when I arrived and they provided excellent customer service. Caroline when I checked out was also very friendly. I didn't get a chance to try the breakfast. But I will definitely return to this hotel when in the area.
Manager Response: Greetings,  We appreciate how much you love staying at the Homewood's brand. Thank you for the team member shout outs, we love when our team makes an impression on our guest. Hopefully next time you visit you try out our complimentary breakfast! Until the next time, take care.  Kind regards, Homewood Suites Irvine/ John Wayne

Summary: Thank you Jordyn for making our experience fantastic!  The children really enjoyed the pool and game room! And the icing on top was the extra big balloons that had rubber bands attached. This made it easier for them to play with!  Thank you for organizing and leading the team with exceptional service and value!
Manager Response: Good morning,   Huge thanks to the 5 star review and the team member shout, we love when our guest get a good impression about our team members. We hope you will visit us again if you are ever in the Irvine area.   Kind regards, Homewood Suites Irvine

Summary: Thank you Caroline and Sam for a wonderful stay at your super quiet, spacious property. Staff were extremely friendly greeting us at every opportunity. They were very accommodating given our  last minute additional family arriving. Shops were a short drive away and Disneyland is 15minutes on most days we visited. Area was extreme safe and quiet as if we were out in the country.  We forgot to close the trunk door one night and got a courtesy call from the late night front desk lady. Our days would start with breakfast that is constantly warm and filling.  It is our first vacation that we truly enjoyed and were able to relax. Thank you and see you again soon.  Warmest regards, Sea Princess Arielle and family.
Manager Response: Good morning,  So pleased to hear that your family vacation went great. Thank you for our team shout outs, they appreciate that greatly. It gives us great pleasure to be able to provide a relaxing and safe space for our guest. I am glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well during your stay, that is definitely a good way to start off your day. We hope you will visit us again, hopefully for your next vacation, thank you once again.  Kind regards, The Homewood Suites Irvine/John Wayne

Summary: Elaina and Jordyn were so hospitable and polite at check in ! Rooms were clean, convenient, and the breakfast bar was great. Definitely would recommend to anyone thinking of staying in the area. Close to many attractions, but also slightly segregated so you have a quiet environment.
Manager Response: Greetings, Wow, thank you for the 5 star rating! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our amenities such as our complimentary breakfast. Also, thank you for shouting out some of our amazing team members, they will be so happy to hear about this shout out, they take great pride in there work. We thank you again for sharing your experience and cannot wait to host you again.  Warm regards, Homewood Suites Irvine

Summary: I arrived in the evening on 18 January and was greeted by Issac at the front desk who took incredibly good care of me and made me feel welcome. In the morning I meet Caroline, she's a firecracker, just what you need in the morning. Anything I asked her for was handled immediately. Whether it was about laundry, dry cleaning, room cleaning, she had answers. One evening  Jordyn (with a big smile) drove me to the airport to pick up my wife, who joined me for a few days.  She really enjoys what she does and was happy to share her story. She talked about her team and how wonderful everyone was. Brian and Sam were terrific, always with a hello or a goodbye, or a did you need something? I never walked by that front desk where I was not greeted. Elaina was the newest member to the team
Manager Response: Good morning, Huge thank you for the 5 star rating and the amazing review you have left us. Our team here at Homewood's always try to provide a Home away from home environment for our guest and we are glad to hear that our team has been able to provide that for you. We cannot wait for your return! Hope all is well.  Warm regards, The Homewood Suites Irvine/John Wayne

Summary: This is a  great property and what you expect from Hilton! As a Diamond member I stay in at least one Hilton a week of not more! The check in was great amazing service, room was clean, a huge gym parking lot is safe no worries in would stay here again!
Manager Response: Good morning, Thank you for the outstanding rating, we greatly appreciate it. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, we hope you will visit us again. Warm regards, Homewood Suites Irvine/John Wayne

Summary: Very friendly staff Elaina & Jordan at the front desk. Free spring waters, coffees and complimentary hot breakfast!  Many good restaurants nearby within 20 min walking   Will stay there for my future trips at Irvine!
Manager Response: Good morning, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review and to shout out some of our awesome team members. We hope you will visit us again if you are ever in the Irvine area, Warm regards, The Homewood Suites Irvine

Summary Heading: Excellent choice for recouping after surgery
Summary: This was a great choice for recouping after surgery. The rooms have all the amenities. Spacious for visitors. And amazing staff. I live in a small apt so It was important to be in a place where family and friends could come and go comfortably. The Homewood Suites provided the perfect place to recoup and enjoy the company of my friends and family. Thank you Tony, Caroline and team for making my stay so wonderful.
Manager Response: Good morning, We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate you calling out some of our amazing team members. We hope all is still going well with recouping. We hope you will visit us again in the near future. Warm regards, The Homewood Suites Irvine

Summary Heading: We only stay at this location
Summary: Thank you to Caroline, Tony, Sam, and another girl with short brown curly hair who also worked at the front desk. I wanted a menu from nearby Farmers Boys restaurant and Tony said he will get it for me. When I went to order my food at the restaurant, Tony watched my laptop since I was working at the lounge area. Such great customer service! We inky stay in this location when we‚Äôre in Orange County. Hilton please fix the Internet. It ran very slow and kept kicking us off. What happened to Premium Wifi? Other than that everything else was excellent! Thank you
Manager Response: Good morning, thank you for your review and for calling out our great team. We appreciate your feedback on the wifi and will be looking into it. We are pleased to hear that besides the wifi issues, you had a nice stay with us.  Warm regards, the Homewood Suites Irvine

Summary Heading: Perfect Stay- Wedding Party, Bride, Groom & Family
Summary: We booked Homewood Suites because it was just a 4 minute drive from our wedding venue. Hayley was beyond helpful from the start! She helped us find the perfect rooms for our groomsmen & bridal party to stay in and get ready in. The bridesmaids had plenty of room for hair and makeup and we were able to get rooms next to each other for the groomsmen & bridesmaids. As the bride & groom, we couldn‚Äôt be happier with our stay & it was truly the perfect place for our wedding weekend.   Thank you to the whole staff but especially to Veronica, Jessie, Brian, Elaina, Caroline & Jordyn for making sure every aspect of our stay was beyond perfect!  Could not recommend enough!!
Manager Response: Good morning,  We are so pleased to hear that our team was able to assist on making your families day memorable. Special thanks for shouting out some of our team members, they will be stoked to hear about this review. We hope you will visit us again, and it was a pleasure hosting you.  Warm regards, The Homewood Suites Irvine/John Wayne

Summary Heading: Great stay! (My favorite in Orange County)
Summary: I have stayed in many Hilton properties and this is my favorite when in Orange County. The property is very clean and welcoming the minute you walk in the door. Caroline at the front desk is wonderful-super helpful, friendly, and welcoming. Rooms are large and nice and clean. I don‚Äôt use the in-room kitchen, but it‚Äôs well equipped. Parking is complimentary which is nice. It‚Äôs also super close to John Wayne airport.   Other Hilton properties in Orange County pale compared to the Homewood.
Manager Response: Good morning, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a specular review. Your kind words about our property means so much to us, we try out best to give the best experience to our guest. Yes, we are one of the few properties in Irvine that gives complimentary parking and a lot of our guest appreciate that as well. Again, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and others,  Warm regards, The Homewood Suites Irvine/John Wayne

Summary: Really responsive to questions and AWESOME customer service.  Hotel room had great amenities.  Really felt like a home away from home.  Would be great for an extended stay.  Staff was super friendly and professional.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you for your kind words about our service and team. We always try to aim for a home away from away experience for our guest. Glad to hear you took advantage of our amenities. Hopefully you tried out our complimentary breakfast. Again, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.  Warm regards, Homewood Suites Irivine/John Wayne

Summary: Great place for an extended and short vacations , rooms are spacious and they are extremely isolated and Well insulated . The front desk team were so much friendly and much supportive. All what I have requested got it . Thank you homewood hilton
Manager Response: Rise and shinee, good morning, hope you are having a good weekend. I would like to begin with saying thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our team made you feel welcomed. We hope that you will visit us again if you are ever in town. Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: Everyone is super friendly and welcoming. Everything was clean and fresh. Shuttle services were excellent as well. Drivers were easy going and excellent customer service. I would most definitely be staying here again in the future!
Manager Response: Dear masonjars94,  I drive from time to time.... maybe it was me?  We really appreciate the kind words about the team.  We love when people use words like "home" and "welcoming" in their comments. Then we know we are doing our job.  Hope you had a safe trip home and we are going to hold you to that promise to come back!  Sincerely,  Paul

Summary Heading: A home a way from home
Summary: From the moment we were picked up by the shuttle from the airport to the moment we were dropped off to leave- it was amazing. To be there on business you never know what to expect. It was very clean and every employee I encountered was friendly and knowledgeable. The stay there was the best it could be for a business trip! Couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience!
Manager Response: Greetings, Awe, i am so pleased to hear that our team was able to provide a Home away from home experience for you. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and others, we greatly appreciate the support. Hope you will visit us again if you are ever in town. Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: This hotel is comfortable, clean, and has the best staff to welcome you and provide everything you need at a moment‚Äôs notice.  Great location and a great night sleep too!  Laundry on site.  Gorgeous pool, hot tub, and gym.  We‚Äôll be back‚Äô
Manager Response: Good morning, awe, thank you for leaving us review, so pleased to hear that your enjoyed your stay with us, and liked our team.  Hope you will visit us again if are you ever in the area. Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: Great location, close to everything. To all kinds of shopping and entertainment, to Disney, to the beaches north AND south, to the airport...  Excellent location. We used to live in Irvine so we know! It is in the flight path of the airport but that wasn't an issue at all surprisingly.  The place is clean!  So clean! Housekeeping works their tails off.  They are super nice and friendly.  Every staff member here is helpful and friendly.   I booked two rooms months in advance and simply requested to be close if at all possible, at the very least on the same floor.  They not only remembered and communicated that request to each other but they honored it and the two rooms were right next to each other!  No other property has even remembered requests like that.  We stayed here for 12
Manager Response: Good morning, I would like to start by saying Happy New Year, and thank you for choosing our hotel to stay at. I really enjoyed reading your review and def welcome the feedback on breakfast, we are always open to hearing on areas we can improve on. Thank you for communicating when there was a noise issue, our team always tries to make sure all of our guest are getting a good night sleep since we think that is just a common courtesy to everyone around. Thank you for acknowledging our team, they really do try to create a welcoming, home away from home environment for our guest.  We def cannot wait to host you again in the future. Take care.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Very happy with our stay over Christmas. Hotel is extremely clean, staff are amazingly friendly and helpful. The rooms are on the small side for a Homewood, smallest ones we‚Äôve been in, but still fantastic. There is a working vent fan in the bathroom!! I don‚Äôt know why more hotels don‚Äôt have them but it makes a huge difference! Parking was a breeze, never filled up and it‚Äôs FREE!! Breakfast was above average for the Hiltons we‚Äôve stayed at. The kitchen was well equipped and clean.   My only super minor complaint is that there is no full length mirror and only one vanity mirror in the bathroom. The full length mirror had some strange artistic marbling over it that made it impossible to see though. Otherwise fantastic stay!
Manager Response: Good morning, Happy New Year, hope all this well. First off, thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay. We always welcome feedback on where we can improve, so thank you for that. Hope you will visit us again in the future. Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: Since the minute we checked in and went into our room we made ourselves at home. My little nephew calls it our house in California. Home made hot breakfast, coffee and tea available the whole day and above all very friendly and welcoming staff.
Manager Response: Greetings, thank you so much for choosing our hotel to stay at during your visit to the orange county area. Haha, i am glad you guys felt at home here with us. We hope you will visit us again in the near future. From our family to yours, we wish you a great holiday season.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The hotel is a prime location for food and shops. Even the hotel staff recommended spas nearby. Everything worked out perfectly. My family and I will for sure be returning. This was a business trip but it‚Äôs always great having additional memories to go along.
Manager Response: Hello Brittaney,   Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely, Jordyn & Homewood Suites Family

Summary: The staff at this hotel are wonderful. In particular the women who work at the breakfast buffet are not only especially friendly but helpful and obliging to any and all special requests. I can't sing enough praises for Veronica, Jesse, Jordan and Kaysee. They brighten every morning!
Manager Response: Grettings! Thank you, Mrs. Jones for this lovely review, our breakfast team will be pleased to hear about this. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we wish you and your family a happy holiday season. Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Family

Summary: Cleaning effort is wonderful. Even though I‚Äôve got served once in a week, but perfect always. Every time I return to room I can see a freshed room, after finish work. It makes me happy. Thanks to Lucina
Manager Response: Greetings, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, and thank you for being understanding of our limited housekeeping services at the moment. Lucina, will be so happy to hear about this review!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and your support. Happy Holidays. Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: Was here for a softball tournament recently.  Rooms were very spacious and I appreciated the fitness center.   Best of all, the staff members were amazing and very helpful.
