Specifically, the front desk staff (Caroline, Jordyn, Sam, Brian, Issac and Elaina) were always available to answer questions, with a smile, and at all hours.
Manager Response: Greetings,  thank you for leaving us a review, so pleased to hear that our team made you feel welcomed. We wish you and your family a happy holiday season, we hope to have the opportunity to host you again in the future.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary Heading: Great hotel with super polite staff
Summary: My family and I rested in this hotel for a whole month ,excellent staff in particular a very attentive manager Samuel ,he met us ,walked around five rooms with us ,found the quietest one was very polite and attentive just a wonderful person. In the hotel you will find a nice swimming pool jacuzzi barbecue barbecue snooker and etc. If to add fresh vegetables for breakfast, then it would be possible to give seven stars to this hotel ,thank you again for the wonderful reception, I will definitely come to you again and recommend it to my friends!!!
Manager Response: Greetings! Awe, i am so pleased to hear that our team was able to provide attentive service to you. Sam is pretty great, i will make sure for him to hear about this amazing review. Thank you also for your suggestion as well for breakfast, we greatly appreciate feedback. Thank you for choosing our hotel to stay at. We hope to see you again, take care. Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: We had a suite with a kitchen, small living room, and a separate bedroom with two queens.  It was great to have a kitchen (full fridge, microwave, dishwasher, two burners, toaster, measuring cups, silverware, soap & sponge, but no oven).  Room was clean and looked new‚Ä¶ beds were very comfy, and furnishings were elegant.  My only complaint is that the bathroom is in the bedroom, so I kept everyone awake while washing up for bed in the bathroom.  Pool and hot tub are large and warm, and the grounds are well-kept.  From reading other reviews, I was expecting a wonderful breakfast, but was a bit disappointed.   Scrambled eggs and a meat side, plus oatmeal, yogurt, and bagels/toast.  No fresh cut fruit (just whole apples and bananas), pastries, or waffles/pancakes.  Wasteful
Manager Response: Good morning, First off thank you for your detailed review. We greatly appreciate your feedback on areas where we can improve. I am glad that for the most part you had a good stay with us, I know you had a lot of options so thank you for choosing us.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Happy with our short stay in this property. Clean and modern with ample free parking. Great hospitality from the front office team.  Highly recommended for stay in Irvine area.  Breakfast needs more variation.  Thank you for having us
Manager Response: Aww, good morning! Thank you for choosing us out of all the options in this area. I am glad you had a nice stay with us. I hope you will visit us again in the future.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: This is the first and only hotel I consider when I‚Äôm coming to Orange County because of its consistency; it‚Äôs always clean, always friendly, always comfortable, and staff (especially Sam) is always welcoming.
Manager Response: Good morning, thank you, Karen, for sharing your experience with us and the public. Haha, yes, Sam is pretty great ! I am glad our team was able to provide a home away from home environment, thank you for choosing us. Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Family

Summary: A very nice comfortable place to stay.  Large comfortable sitting area (think living room) with kitchen and dining area.  Nice comfortable bedroom.  Breakfast is nicely done with a nice variety.  Free airport pickup.  For the money you cannot beat it.
Manager Response: Many Thanks Worldcycle38,  We appreciate the kind feedback.  Also, thanks for taking the time to post a review about your experience with us.  The large suite here are the main reason people love Homewood Suites, but then they realize there is so much more and no added fees when it comes to the free breakfast, wifi and parking.  Many thanks and hope you had a safe trip back to Nevada.

Summary: Perfect for family - suite style - had 2 rooms plus living room which was ideal for the 5 of us. Convenient location as we visited Newport Beach and also went to Sofi on way out. Kids enjoyed basketball court and pool area.
Manager Response: Greetings! First off, thank you for choosing us to stay with! I am pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you will visit us again in the future. Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary Heading: Always great to wake up Too some delicious Breakfast!!!
Summary: Kaysee, Veronica, Jessie, Jordan Thank you!! Excellent Service Breakfast Was Great! Me and my family enjoyed Every moment! Great way to start our day! ‚ÄúHomewood suites‚Äùmore like‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚ÄùHome good sweets!!!‚Äù
Manager Response: Good morning, awe, i am so glad to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast buffet. Haha, we do have such a great team, thanks for shouting them out. Woot woo! Our team always tries to provide a "Home away from Home" environment for our guest, and it seems like they were able to provide that for ya, which makes us very happy. We hope all is going well and we cannot wait to have the opportunity to host you again! Once again, thank youuuu! Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: We will definitely stay there again next time we are in town. Very clean and beautiful. The hotel looked like it was brand new. We did not partake in breakfast but it was available. Great place with a great Brand.
Manager Response: Good morning, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and others online. We are glad you had a smooth stay, we cannot wait to have the opportunity to host you again if you are ever in the Irvine area.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: The hotel was inviting and clean upon entering the lobby.   The breakfast buffet was well managed and clean,  the room was clean and comfortable and stocked with towels to accommodate the lack of cleaning during the stay
Manager Response: Good morning, I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. We try to provide a home away from home environment for our guest, glad we were able to provide that for you. Hope you will visit us again in the near future. Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: Veronica, Jessie, Kaysee, and Jordan at the breakfast bar were great. They were the staff I saw everyday and they would always greet us and were always helpful while keeping the food plentiful. As for the room, I was in the studio, the kitchen was a useful size to make dinner for two. Enough space lounge around and it was nice the tv base can rotate so you can watch TV from the couch or the bed. Bed was a gentle softness without being too soft.
Manager Response: Good morning, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Haha, our breakfast team is def. the best, they have such a great sense of humor, i am glad they were able to provide excellent service. I am glad to hear that your extended stay went great, i am glad we were able to provide a home away from home experience for you. Thank you for your feedback, and hope you will visit us again in the near future.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary Heading: Housekeeper Lucina F. was absolutely over the top in service!!
Summary: We've been staying at this hotel for over 2 months now and have watched all the housekeepers clean our room.  Overall, we were pleased with the service we received and didn't expect very much after staying in numerous other hotels over the summer before coming here.  We will be telling the leadership here how impressed we were when we saw Lucina F. come in and clean our room.  She was so polite and so dedicated to doing a thorough job, moving furniture to vacuum, polishing the bathroom till it shined.  It's hard to find dedicated employees like her and it makes us want to return to this hotel in the future if we need a place to stay again.  The breakfast was really well run with a cheerful staff.  The front desk was attentive to all our needs including changing rooms 2 times
Manager Response: Hello, Awe, i am so pleased to read this review! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and others. Lucina has been a long time team member here with us, and we do agree she is great at what she does. I am glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and that our team took care of you. We appreciate your support.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: Everyone at the hotel provided excellent service, particularly Jessie & Veronica, who went out of their way to make our breakfast experience exceptional!!!! The hot breakfast has things like eggs, sausage and hash browns etc. Make sure to try the green salsa, it‚Äôs delicious. The room was super clean and this was the most comfortable bed I‚Äôve slept on in my life. Service like this will keep us coming back to this hotel when we‚Äôre in Orange County.
Manager Response: Good morning! Awe, i am so pleased to hear that your stay with us went great. Thank you for choosing us to stay with us while visiting the area. We cannot wait to have the opportunity to host you again in the near future. Until then, take care.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: My sister and I just came to California for a week long girl's trip and stayed at Homewood Suites in Irvine.  We LOVED Jordan, the Night Manager.  She continually went over and above for us and many other guests.  On our first night, we got to our room, unpacked and were going to watch little TV.  There was a problem with the TV and we called the front desk a little before 11pm, and Jordan came right away.  She said the maintenance people were gone for the day but she would try to fix it.  She was able to fix the TV which kept her more than half an hour past her end of shift.  We were so grateful and she was so gracious.  We saw her several times during our stay and she was amazingly friendly, and even remembered our names.  She gave us ideas of where to go and we loved
Manager Response: Good morning, Thank you so much for leaving us a review. YESSSS, Jordyn is amazing, very supportive team member to all. I'm glad she was able to assist you with your tv problem and make you feel welcome during your stay. She will be thrilled to hear about this outstanding review, thanks again for taking the time to share your experience.  We hope you will visit us again if you are ever in the Irvine area.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: Great hotel. Everything was clean & comfortable. Customer service was top notch. Delicious hot breakfast. Location wasn‚Äôt that great because I wanted to see the beach. Uber ride was $15-30 depending on time of day. Stayed at hotel for business trip which was 2 blocks from where my meetings were so that was convenient!
Manager Response: Good morning, I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We hope you will visit us again if you are ever in the Irvine area. Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: Great place to stay. Friendly and accommodating staff. The front desk staff extremely helpful. They were supper nice to my two year old who used his scooter throughout the hotel. The facility was extremely clean.
Manager Response: Greetings! Awe, i am so pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed their stay with us. Our team always aims to provide a welcoming Home Away from Home experience for our guest, glad our team was able to provide that for you. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we greatly appreciate the support, we hope you will visit us again in the near future. Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: Relatively new-looking furnishings.  Bathroom was clean, ample towels provided when you arrive. Not having to walk far to reach your parked car or deal with a parking structure is great. Parking is free, but you still need to put a paper permit on your dashboard.
Manager Response: Good Morning David,  I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Yes, having complementary parking is def a plus. I hope that during your stay you were able to enjoy our other amenities such as our complementary breakfast or used our 24 hour gym. Hope you will visit us again if you are ever in the Irvine area.   Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary Heading: A great hotel experience‚Ä¶ aside from sleeping.
Summary: The hotel staff, room presentation and amenities are all great. The rooms are quiet and the fully adjustable thermostat in the rooms are a nice touch. The location is also nice as it‚Äôs close to some really good restaurants. The only reason this review isn‚Äôt higher is due to the bed and pillow quality. The beds feel worn out and uncomfortable, and the pillows are so under filled that they might as well not provide them at all.
Manager Response: Dear Nitchaloss,  As mentioned in past reviews, we look at every review as a positive.  We appreciate honest critical feedback that will help us improve the hotel experience for our guests.  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay, but the feedback about the bed and the pillows is even more valuable.    I am so sorry you had a hard time sleeping.  Hopefully, you let a member of the team know so we were able to take special care of you.  This is valuable information I will use to purchase things we need for the hotel.  Your feedback is much appreciated and once again many thanks.  Sincerely,  Paul - General Manager

Summary: I was so amazed by the incredible customer! I arrived in an early flight and was exhausted from a long day of travel, so I called Hilton hoping for an early room. They didn‚Äôt have one at the time, but the front desk attendant, Elaine (excellent employee) said she would give my a call back if they had one available. Fortunately there was one available and we were able to check in early. Elaine was very welcoming and kind, and I hope to continue to come back for more excellent customer service!
Manager Response: Good morning! I am so pleased to hear that you had a great experience at our hotel and that our team member Elaine was able to take care of you! Here at the Homewood Suites we try our best to assist our guest. Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We can't wait to host you again!  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: This location is the best stay fir OC visit. It‚Äôs close to airport, clean and friendly for family visit. Stay in this suite always comfortable. It‚Äôs easy to find food and driving distance to any attraction in Irvine is awesome.
Manager Response: Good morning, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. So happy to hear that you enjoy staying at our property. We hope that we get the opportunity to host you again if you are ever in the Irvine area.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: Some hotel ads read: ‚ÄúA home from home.‚Äù But I have always taken the expressed motto with ‚Äúa grain of salt‚Äù and a ‚Äúhigh dose of incredulity‚Äù and treated it as a ‚Äúcatchy slogan‚Äù until I experience it myself. As prospective guests at the Homewood Suites located in Irvine, California near the John Wayne Airport, the names Jordyn, Sam, Veronica, Jessie, Caroline, and Isaac won‚Äôt mean much to you until you spend a few days at the hotel. Then, you will realize that you won‚Äôt be able to avoid Sam‚Äôs inviting smile and excuse his air of complicity as he describes in confidential tones the services offered by the hotel. Sam, in a confessional manner, will let you know how to get cold water in the middle night if you need it and how to enjoy the cardio room 24/7 in the time of COVID 19.
Manager Response: Dear emmanuele788,  First and foremost, can you be our marketing manager?  All joking aside, I have been working in the hospitality industry going on 30 years.  I am have been so blessed the last 5 years to work with this Homewood Team here in Irvine.  You just explained what I get to experience every day.  That is the reason, I never leave.  This family we have formed, for some reason loves to help people, we have a huge heart for what we do.  The last 18 months has truly tested our tolerance for the type of guests the industry is throwing our way, but because of all the things you mentioned above, we manage to rise above what this world has become. A huge tug of war of right and wrong.    Enough preaching.  A heart felt thank you from the team here.  It was an absolute pleasure having you stay with us for so long  and to be able to see you smile every day while dealing with such a stressful transition in your life makes it all worth it for us.  I will absolutely be sharing this with the team as we all know who you are ;).   May your travels be safe, we sure hope your new place is as joyful as you were during your stay with us and bless your family for all the good times you showed my team while you were with us.  Sincerely,  Paul

Summary: First time stay at this hotel and is my favorite place to stay !!! Friendly and helpful staff. Especially, Jordyn is amazing. She very helpful. Good location, close to airport, comfortable bed and love the kitchen.
Manager Response: Good evening! Woooo, i am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Haha, yes, Jordan is an outstanding team member! I hope you are still having a good summer, it has gone by so quickly! We cannot wait for your return one day. Until then, take care. Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Team

Summary: So this review is long overdue.  My wife and I stay here exclusively everytime we visit Southern California.  Why do we just stay here, you ask? Simple, the employees and management are the best!!!!!  Caroline, Sam, Hayley, Brian, Jesse, Veronica (and Paul!).  These are just some of the some of the great staff I can think of off of the top of my head.  I believe Paul, the manager, takes his time to pick the right employee. They truly want you to enjoy your stay and feel at home.  They are very professional, but yet friendly and engaging.  Quick to help for any of your needs.   The hotel itself is located close enough to John Wayne, but I never hear any planes when we are in our room!  The rooms are always clean and spacious.  My wife and I enjoy every stay when we are here.
Manager Response: Good morning,  Thank you so much for your honest review, i am so happy to hear that you enjoyed staying with us. Yes, Paul, is such a great manager, and does take his time picking out team members. I am glad that our team was able to provide a home away from home atmosphere for you and your wife. I am glad that you took advantage of all of our amenities. We also hope you will visit us again if you are ever in the Irvine area! Hope you are having a great summer!  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Team

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay during house sale
Summary: Large suite with ample room to spread out.  The staff was very friendly and welcoming.  We were served breakfast daily in the dining area by Veronica and Jessie, who were efficient and cordial.  I had a nice chat with Veronica who truly showed interest in the guest when she had a chance.
Manager Response: Dear 817bs,  Many thanks for mentioning our breakfast girls in your review.  They have been with us for a long time and work so hard.  I am so glad you enjoyed your stay and I will be sure to share this with them.  It means a lot when their names are mentioned and we appreciate you taking the time to write the review.  Deepest thanks.

Summary Heading: Customer service and cleanliness was Top Notch
Summary: Homewood Suites is the best place in Irvine to stay at. Rooms are clean and spacious. Breakfast was the best. Veronica and Jessie ( breakfast ladies) were very friendly, sweet and will make sure you get the breakfast of your Choice. Will highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: Dear 144shezt,  Much appreciation for giving my girls at breakfast a shout out.  They are really great.  As always mentioned, we appreciate specific comments on reviews, good or bad, so I can directly recognize team members for their efforts, or address issues directly and get them corrected.  Thanks so much for choosing us and travel safely!

Summary Heading: Week Long Stay with Great Service
Summary: I stayed here for one week while visiting family and was met with exceptional service! The staff here went above and beyond in making sure that my family and I were comfortable. I wanted to especially recognize the great service from Jordan, Veronica, and Jessie. Thank you, guys, for taking such great care of us. We will be back soon thanks to your warm hospitality!
Manager Response: Dear Kaeladang,  Wow, thank you so very much for the kind words about our property and especially our team.  We take so much pride in what we do and when I read a review like this, it makes it all worth all of our hard work.  I will be sure to sure to share this with the girls and the rest of the team.  This means so much!!!

Summary Heading: I felt safe and the hotel was very clean. Hand sanitizer and wipes at each entry .
Summary: I felt safe at this hotel it so clean sanitation at every entry . Rooms were great slept well on the beds. Quiet at night . Employees were polite and welcoming and if we needed anything it was promptly brought to our room.
Manager Response: Dear Iduke12,  First of all, thank you so much for choosing to stay with us.  We know how many options there are in the area and we appreciate the business so much.  Also wanted to thank you for the kind comments regarding the team, the fact that your felt safe and cleanliness.  To be honest, we are constantly in the middle of this "tug of war" with guests regarding the current pandemic situation. Some people have the strong opinion that we should all be protecting ourselves and other have the strong opinion that we should have already returned things back to normal.  We have made at this hotel to place items around the hotel to gave guests the option and make sure that they can protect themselves while we still engage and promote people to have a safe, clean and sanitized environment.    I am so glad you enjoyed your stay and thanks for the comments.  Hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel for short or long stays - Staff is Amazing!
Summary: Very clean hotel with excellent staff. Carolyn at the front desk always remembers us and goes out of her way to help with anything needed at all. The rooms are well laid out and tidy - for long term stays housekeeping will clean the room 2x per week but they are happy to add cleanings as requested. The kitchen is a huge plus especially the full size fridge. The breakfast crew, especially Veronica, Jessie, and Jordan are top notch. Amazing people that, like Carolyn, go above and beyond to make the stay enjoyable. Management does not hesitate to stop what they are doing to say hello and ask how everything is going. Overall highly recommended for short or long term stays.
Manager Response: Good morning, thank you so much for your kind words and support. Yes, Caroline is pretty awesome, she is a great Front desk manager, love working for her. Haha, our food and beverage team is outstanding as well, we all def try to take care of our guest. Thank you for your review and we cannot wait for you to visit us again in the near future.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: Wonderful, clean, modern, well kept and super helpful and friendly staff from check in to check out. Caroline was incredible to accommodate us for an extra night even when sold out. Far better value for the money compared to other hilton properties in the area. Free parking is huge!!
Manager Response: Good morning, Awe, i am so happy to hear that you had an great experience at our hotel. Yes. Caroline, is such a great front desk manager! Haha, yes, having free parking is def a plus in this area. Thank you for the outstanding review, hope you will visit us again!  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Clean, new, quiet and a great location
Summary: Solid hotel. Loved the free hot breakfast and the suite we had was spacious. They took COVID seriously with cleaning although many guests did not wear masks. Really happy there was no parking fee as I had paid for this at a nearby hotel during this same trip.   The room was clean and quiet. All of the workers were polite. We‚Äôd definitely stay again. Thank you!
Manager Response: Good morning, So pleased to hear that you had a good stay with us. Haha, yes having complementary parking is defiantly a plus here in this area. Thank you for your kind words about our team, they thrive to provide a home away from home environment for our guest. We hope you will visit us again.  Hope you have a great summer!  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: We had a family Disneyland trip and the 2 bedroom suite was a perfect fit for our family. Breakfast during Covid was a little disappointing but over all the hotel and staff were excellent. Convenient location
Manager Response: Good morning,  Thank you for leaving us an honest review.  I am glad to hear that for the most part you and your family had a good experience,  and want to thank you for being understanding regarding the breakfast situation.  Hope you will visit us again if you are ever in town.   Hope you and your family have a great summer!  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: People and rooms are top notch
Summary: The room here are fabulous. Large refrigerator and stove along with a dishwasher. The beds were comfortable and the rooms were clean. The staff was excellent. Friendly and very helpful. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Greetings!  Thank you for your recommendation! I am glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us this summer, hope you will visit us again if you are ever in the OC area.  Take care!  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: We stayed at this hotel last year during in late June/early July and we were so pleased, we stayed again this year for our vacation in beautiful Orange County.  The location is great--near all major roads yet quiet.  The property is kept very clean, and we have found both rooms we stayed in very clean as well.  The rooms are spacious and the shower in particular is really nice!  I can't say enough about the staff, they treated us like family and made us feel extremely welcome and at home.  In particular, we loved the ladies who served us breakfast each morning, Jessie and Veronica.  They did a difficult and stressful job with smiles and a sense of humor.  We looked forward to seeing them each morning, they started our day out right.  We will certainly return next summer.  Thank
Manager Response: Good morning,  First off huge thank you for your review! Hahaha, yes, Jessi & Veronica are something else, they are def. a pleasure to work with. I am glad to hear you enjoyed our amenities as well as the suites. We cannot wait to host you again next summer!  Until then, take care.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Hi.  This hotel is always a great place to stay.  Clean,  full kitchens,  definitely caters to families.  I highly recommend them.  This is the 2nd time we've stayed there.  They provide breakfast and the rooms are really comfy.  Great parking and great nights sleep.
Manager Response: Good morning, And thank you for coming back! I am so pleased to hear that you have enjoyed your stays with us. Thank you for sharing your experience with others, we appreciate the support. We cannot wait for you visit us again! Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I booked a 2 bedroom suite for my family as graduation gift for my daughter.  I booked based on others reviews concerning cleanliness. Cleanliness  is of major concern for me when staying away from home. The Irvine Homewood Suites did not disappoint as the room was extremely clean and  modern. It is also in a clean, safe and quiet area with close proximity to all highways. The staff we encountered were all extremely professional, helpful and friendly.  To top it off, they arranged a welcome and congratulations gift for my daughter.  I am extremely pleased!!! Thank you all‚Ä¶
Manager Response: Dear Curious282465,  Tell your daughter congratulations from the entire Homewood Family on her graduation!!!!  It was a pleasure being your host.  Thank you so much for the kind words about the staff and cleanliness of the property.  We really appreciate the feedback.  The 2 bedroom suite is my favorite room here, it is absolutely huge.  You have an incredible summer and maybe we will see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: A nice getaway before the holiday‚Ä¶
Summary: The staff was very nice and they were a nice change to the bad attitudes that we have experienced lately while out and about traveling. Everyone was helpful and courteous, we were even aloud to checkout late. The rooms were nice and clean, I recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the Irvine or LA area.
Manager Response: Greetings, Thank you for your kind words regarding our team, it means alot that we can care of our guest and make a good impression. I am glad that overall you enjoyed your stay with us, we cannot wait to host you again in the future.  Best regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I regret underestimating the quality. None of the rooms were very noisy from the jets and planes. Amazing service! Also a somewhat affordable price if your staying for a few days. The workers were kind to us. All the rooms are similar in my experience. üëç
Manager Response: Gooood morning! I am so pleased to read that your stay with us went well, and that you liked our team as well. Thank you for taking the time out of your day to share your experience and for your support, it means alot to us. Hope you will visit us again if you are ever in the OC area.   Hope you have an awesome summer!  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: We are in the middle of a renovation and needed a place to stay for a couple of months. Everyone employed by this hotel has been so very nice! From Carolyn at the front desk to Consuelo G. who takes care of our room and everyone in between , we are very impressed. We highly recommend this location for friendliness and cleanliness!
Manager Response: Greetings!  First off, thank you so much for leaving us a nice review. I am so pleased to hear that our team made you feel welcome and took care of you. Our guest support means a lot to our team, they will be happy to hear about this review. Thank you for choosing us, and we hope to host you again if ever needed.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: The Lovely Ladies who served us Breakfast.
Summary: Our stay at the hotel was amazing. But because of Covid unfortunately we didn‚Äôt see much of the staff. However , in the mornings when we went down stairs to get breakfast (which was great) we would be greeted by the lovely ladies; Veronica and Jessie who were serving the food. They provided great service and were willing to help in anyway possible. They made mornings at the hotel extra special.
Manager Response: Dear alejandranavarro6382,  I am so proud of my girls once again getting mentioned by a guest.  It really doesn't surprise me though.  They work so hard and are so amazing.  Thank you for saying such special things about them.  I will be sure to share your review with them.  Nice to hear that you had such a great stay and looking forward to seeing you in the future.  Travel Safe!

Summary Heading: Used To Be Fantastic - Then Covid
Summary: This property was a bit of a gem for business traveler in years past. Has great amenities and is not near Disneyland.  However, Covid has changed everything,  Housekeeping is now only once a week (think about that)! There‚Äôs no buffet any longer (cold eggs from steam line now), and now, during reopening, the families are road tripping again.  I don‚Äôt begrudge anyone their freedom to enjoy this great country, but have some courtesy for fellow guests. And Homewood management, you must assertively deal with parents who don‚Äôt want to supervise their kids. I‚Äôve been kept up a few nights by track meets in the hallways, waited a long time for elevators because they‚Äôre playing on them, etc.  Also weddings are starting up again and I was impacted by drunks late one night as well.
Manager Response: Dear Espiranzal2021,  Thank you for taking the time to post a review regarding your past stay with us.  We appreciate feedback whether it is positive or critical, because that is what makes us better.   I am so sorry you didn't have a great stay and I am embarrassed that you did not receive the great stay you are typically accustom to with us.    I would like to point out that we are currently offering full service cleaning to all of our guests 3 days a week and as soon as the state releases all of their restrictions and Hilton CleanStay standards are loosened, we will go right back to our 7 days option for cleaning.  The reduction to 3 days a week was a combination of over 50% of our guests refusing any cleaning because of wanting to keep anyone person from being in their room and Hilton wanting to minimize human interaction between employees and guests as much as possible while maintaining some sort of high cleanliness standard.  I am sorry you only had your room serviced once, but keep in mind when you come back, you have the option of getting it cleaned up to 3 days a week.  As for the breakfast, I am not sure what happen with the cold eggs as we have not changed how we make or how we keep the eggs and hot dishes warm.  We have the same staff and use the same equipment as we have in the past, so I will be sure to go to the kitchen today and be sure the equipment is working correctly.  Staying in Irvine in June and July is in the middle of what we call our peak season.  It is a busy mix of our usual business travelers and families traveling as schools start to get out.  I do sincerely apologize if there was noise issues.  Hopefully you let our staff know when there was noise so we could deal with is accordingly.  We have a zero tolerance policy and if we warn a guest once and they do not quiet down, we will ask them to leave.  We pride ourselves on making every guest's stay comfortable and obviously this time around, you didn't.  I am so so sorry.  Thank you so much for the comment regarding the mattresses.  I am in charge of the capital and upkeep of the property and as we get comments like this, it enable me to start budgeting for some replacements of furniture and soft goods for the coming year, so thank you for that.  Sincere apology and thanks!

Summary: We recently stayed here for a quick 4-day getaway.   Here's what we liked: 	‚Ä¢ Central location - Close to the airport, sightseeing, and near many restaurants and shopping. The hotel is nestled among office parks, but it seemed like any restaurant or shopping was always within about a 6-minute drive. The John Wayne Airport is about 3 miles away and only a 7-9 minute drive. 	‚Ä¢ Solid construction - Despite frequent airplanes passing overhead and a busy street outside, we barely heard any of it and didn't hear neighbors either. It was relaxing and quiet when we spent time in the room.  	‚Ä¢ Spacious 1-bedroom suite 	‚Ä¢ Easy access to parking - We stayed on the first floor (room 1101) that was super close to a side door that we used when coming and going so it was like having a private
Manager Response: Good morning, thank you for your honest feedback on your recent stay. This review will defiantly be helpful for other people wanting feedback from previous guest. I am glad that you enjoyed with us and took advantage of some of our amenities here at the hotel. We cannot wait for you to visit us again in the near future!  Best wishes from Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The Homewood Suites is immaculate.  Everything sparkling clean.  Great breakfast, served appropriately due to the current state of the Pandemic.  In particular, I would like to recognize the Front Desk Agent, Caroline, for her friendliness and enthusiasm. We had a room booked for 6 nights, but our flight came in very early on the first day.   Caroline went above and beyond to check for room availability for us.  We only expected to leave our luggage at the hotel until "check-in" time, but were pleasantly surprised to be allowed access to our room in advance.  We are Hilton Honors members, and have never been disappointed with our experiences.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you for your lovely review. Haha, yesss, Caroline is an amazing Front desk manager. I am glad we were able to get you into a room earlier than expected. I see you were able to enjoy some of our amenties such as our complimentary breakfast. I do hope you will visit us again in the near future if you are ever in the Irvine area. Again, thank you for the outstanding rating and kind words.   Warm regards,  Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This Homewood Suites is perfect. Lobby sparkling clean, room spotless and well appointed, pool / spa area lovely - even with barbecue area and basketball court.   The most impressive thing about this property, though, was the staff. Every single person we interacted with was delightful, professional, and doing their best to make our stay great. At the front desk, we were helped by Carolyn, Brian, and Sam. On the phone, Lindsey was wonderful. The ladies who served the breakfast were all terrific: Jordan, Veronica, Yesena, and Zee.  I also want to mention the housekeeping staff. I did not see them to get their names, but the making up of our room was really well done.   So, to the management of this Homewood Suites, your staff is representing you and your brand well. You property
Manager Response: Dear Gothmama,  I am short of words about how thankful I am for your kind words about my staff.  They are such an amazing group of people and I thank the stars every day that I work with such incredible people.  Your comments about that just confirms to people via social media what I have know about them my entire 5 years here.  It was so nice to see you had such a great experience with us.  please spread the word and we will always consider you as part of our Homewood Suites Irvine Family.  Paul

Summary: Our stay here has been very pleasant. One service we want to highlight is the free breakfast. We‚Äôve been lucky to get serviced by Veronica and Jessie for almost a week now. These ladies have an excellent customer service. They‚Äôre very personable, hard working and have a great attitude every morning. They are always willing to help and we‚Äôve enjoyed talking to them every morning. Thank you ladies for bringing your beautiful personality to work and for everything you do!   Ernesto and Carolina
Manager Response: Dear Ernesto and Carolina,  Thank you for recognizing Jessie and Veronica for their excellent service.  They have been with me since opening an they work so hard.  I will be sure to let them know about your comments.  They are a huge part of this hotels success and it is so nice to see a guest recognize their service.  Thanks for choosing to stay with us because we know there are so many other chooses out there.  Hope to see you again in the near future.  Paul

Summary: I am leaving very happy with my experience here at this hotel. It was our 22 year anniversary we were celebrating my husband and I. Away from home, I wanted a place a room really clean, welcoming staff..free breakfast and free parking. This place exceeded my expectations. 100 plus stars. We will be back.
Manager Response: Good morning!  Congratulations on 22 years, WOW, how amazing is that. Extremely pleased to hear that your stay with us went well, and even happier to know that you will be back one day. Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, we appreciate all the support especially during these times.   Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Tony was an awesome driver!! Thank you for your help with our luggage and the ice cold waters! Ten out of ten would recommend. Don‚Äôt know when I‚Äôll make it back to Irvine but I would recommend Tony instead of Uber and Lyft!
Manager Response: Good morning,  I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed our Sales Managers driving service, Tony is def. an amazing and supportive team member. I am sure he will be thrilled about this review! Thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback, and share your experience.   Warm regards,  Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Staying at this hotel was a pleasure. Everyone is nice and professional and made me feel very welcome. But what stood out the most to me was the cleanliness of this hotel. I‚Äôve stayed in a lot of hotels during the pandemic and saw a lot of signs how they were partnering with Lysol to keep things clean. But I can‚Äôt say I ever really noticed any difference. At this hotel every time I got in the elevator I could smell how clean it was, I could smell the Lysol. They are very very diligent about cleaning everything. The doors, the floor the parking lot, I saw them disassembling the grills and polishing them so that they look brand new. The housekeeping service here is top notch.
Manager Response: Good morning!  Huge appreciation for taking the time to leave us a review. We are so pleased to hear that your recent stay with us went well. We are glad we were made able to provide a clean, and safe  Home away from home for you! Hope we get the opportunity to host you again if you are ever in the Irvine area & thank you for the outstanding rating!  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: We travel here bi- annually to visit family, visit our friends and see our doctors.    Our visit is usually one to two weeks.  The facility is current in design and appointments.  Everything is spotless, never even see a small piece of paper on the floors.  Best of all, the staff is fabulous.  This includes Mr. Williams in sales, and Veronica and Jessie caring for the kitchen.  The front desk staff is very friendly and accommodating. We will be staying 3 months next fall while recovering from knee surgery.  We know we will be well cared for.  Try it, you will like it.
Manager Response: Dear Happy-Hilton Lodger A "mega" Thanks for the kind words about Tony, Veronica, Jessie and the team here at Homewood Suites Irvine.  It means so much to me when the team gets mentioned because they work so hard to make our guests feel as if they are stepping into our home.  Especially during these trying times.  I will be sure to share this review with them and I am sure they will remember you.  They have an uncanny way of remembering guests.  I guess we will see you next fall for your surgery. be sure to let us know if you need any special accommodations.  Have a great summer!  Sincerely,  Paul

Summary Heading: My stay at Homewood Suites Irvine
Summary: I‚Äôve traveled and stayed at many hotels throughout my lifetime and Homewood suites by far has the best service hands down! Every morning Veronica and Jessie would greet me with a smile for breakfast getting me whatever I needed along with helping me practice my Spanish. Then upon leaving the hotel for work and arriving back to the hotel to call it a day the front desk clerks would always greet and make sure we‚Äôre all taken care of. 10/10 would recommend your next stay here.
Manager Response: Hello!  I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and bonded with our staff! They are going to be thrilled to hear about this awesome review. Thank you for your support and for taking the time to share your experience as well. We can't wait to have the opportunity to host you again, whenever you are in the Irvine area.  Until then, take care.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Can‚Äôt say enough great things about this hotel.  It‚Äôs beautiful inside and out, but so are the amazing staff. Hayley helped me to book a small room block for my wedding during the middle of the pandemic.  Even though I was worried she reassured me that she would take care of things, and she did.  She even helped make a personal link for my guests to book their rooms.  She always responded promptly to her emails and called me when she said she would.  Her kindness and professionalism is unmatched.  All the front desk staff were great but Caroline was there all 3 days during my stay for my wedding.  She was so friendly and accommodating and even had a small welcome party for me when I checked in prior to my wedding day.    I thank all the wonderful people at Homewood Suites Irvine
Manager Response: Greetings!  Congratulations on the wedding, wishing you and husband the best. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and rest of the viewers on trip advisor. I will make sure Hayley hears about your lovely words; I know she will be so happy she was able to help with your special day. Caroline, as well, will hear about this! We hope you will visit us again in the near future, until then, take care!  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: First time at this hotel and was definitely pleased with our entire stay from start to finish.  Two stand-out employees were Caroline at the front desk who was so welcoming during check in and gracious enough to give us a late check out too! Also, kudos to Hayley, our sales ambassador, who assisted with the wedding block for my sister‚Äôs wedding. Hayley gave us great room rates and options and was also gracious enough to provide the discounted rate for an extra night for my own family. Caroline and Hayley definitely made a fan of Homewood Suites by Hilton out of me!  In fact we are already thinking of staying at this Irvine location for my family‚Äôs next trip to Orange County. :-)
Manager Response: Greetings, First off, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! I remember seeing some of the wedding guest returning and you all looked great! Congratulations on your sisters wedding! Also, thank you for shouting out some of our awesome team members, i am sure they will be thrilled to read this review. We cannot wait for you and your families return, and again thank you for your support!  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Extremely nice hotel. Lives up the reviews. Rooms are clean and great size. Parking easy and free. The farmer boys in the parking lot is a welcome touch for a quick bite. Special shout-out to Brian at the front desk, extremely nice and quick during checkin, and got us setup with a basketball so we could shoot some hoops.  Would definitely stay again if in area.
Manager Response: Greetings, Huge thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! I am glad you enjoyed your suite and liked our complimentary parking. I will make sure to pass along your shout out about Brian, i am sure he will be stoked to hear about it. We are glad that you will take us into consideration next time you are in the Irvine area, we would be glad to host you again! Until then, take care! Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: This location was very close to where we need to be. Room was MUCH bigger then expected. Pool was very clean and warm. The free breakfast was adequate and the timing was wonderful. Enjoyed having unlimited free water and coffee in the lobby too. Will always be staying here for our monthly trips to SoCal.
Manager Response: Dear Sakika3,  Many thanks from our team here at Homewood Irvine for the kind words regarding your stay with us.  I too am amazing at how big our rooms are and I have been here 5 years.  Some people make the mistake of thinking that this brand has "normal" size hotel rooms.  I will be sure to share your comments with the staff and hope to see you again in the near future.  Many thanks,  Paul General Manager

Summary Heading: Thanks for your great service and support.
Summary: Absolutely outstanding hotel good located. Helpful,kindly staff who go above and beyond to make sure you have the best time. It was family travel during our stay, which we had not mentioned, but they obviously saw that at the check in. There was a  suprise when they consider travelers very much! Also an excellent breakfast buffet although it is Corona-Pandemic situation. We will definetely come back with friends and I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Good morning,   First off, thank you for leaving us a review. We are pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us here at the Homewood of Irvine. We cannot wait for your return! Again, thank you and we appreciate  your support.   Take care,  until the next time!  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I admit to usually overlooking Homewood Suites because they seem like bland properties but this one gave me a new appreciation for their brand. Our room was spacious‚Äînice desk area and sofa, chair, and coffee table. Two adults and a teen had plenty of room to spread out even when we brought dinner back to the room.  The bathroom was spotless. I also appreciated the size and design of the shower.  We will definitely stay here again. (And the front desk staff and housekeeping were unfailingly pleasant.)
Manager Response: Greetings!  We are so pleased to know we have made a good impression and that you & your family enjoyed your stay here. We greatly appreciate  your feedback. Thank you for your support, we can't wait to have you visit us again, hopefully in the near future.  Until the next time,  take care!  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Nice property with excellent amenities for this stay purpose  Very clean and comfortable  Convenient location in OC Free parking was a plus because we had 2 cars  The kitchen area was nice  Good to see gyms open again
Manager Response: Dear pattyhjjent,  Wanted to express our sincere thanks for not only a great review of your experience with us but for choosing us when there are so many options for hotels out there.  I will say, having California move into a less restrictive tier has been amazing and we pray that keeps moving in the right direction.  We appreciate the mentioning of free parking which most hotels in this area do not have.  Stay safe out there and hope to see you again soon.  Paul

Summary Heading: Amazing stay at an amazing hotel!
Summary: This is hotel was beyond my expectations. The size of the room was very spacious as well as the kitchen area. The staff was really amazing, helpful and made sure to follow CDC social distancing guidelines. The location of the hotel is also perfect, it not too secluded and there‚Äôs malls/stores within a 10 min drive or less. Also the free parking was a big plus for me!
Manager Response: Dear alondramartinez2021,  Thank you so very much for the positive review of our hotel.  The team has worked so hard over the past year to not only keep guests safe but also maintain the service that we have always provided.  It really has not been easy.  Seeing comments like this makes it all worth it.  I will be sure to share this review with the team.  We know there are so many other options in Irvine, so a special thank you for choosing us.  Sincerely,  Paul

Summary: This is a wonderful and clean hotel with very helpful and nice staff. Specifically, Eliza was so sweet and kind. She upgraded our room to a special suite with no extra fee because of our honeymoon....
Manager Response: Dear 85asalb,  Wow and thank you so much for the wonderful comments about your stay with us.  Eliza is one of my best.  This will definitely be shared with her, but it doesn't surprise me about how she handled your celebration.  I am so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and hopefully we will see you again on your first anniversary!!

Summary Heading: Great Place to relax and feel like home.
Summary: Room is large and separate bedroom. Staff is great. Hats off to Caroline, Sam, Brian and the 2 special women Veronica and Yesenia for getting me started every morning with breakfast.  You feel at home and treated with have a good day to start and welcome every night you return.
Manager Response: Good morning!  Thank you for your kind words regarding our team, they will be so pleased to hear you what you wrote. I am you felt at home during your stay, we always aim to provide that feeling during our guest stay. We cannot wait for your return, hopefully in the near future.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewoods Team

Summary: This hotel has taken it upon themselves to go above and beyond the regular Hilton brand standard.  I have not encountered a single person on this hotel staff that hasn‚Äôt gone out of their way to make sure my needs were met. They are friendly and professional.  Traveling during COVID is weird, but this hotel is so clean, and there is always someone available/around re-cleaning, there are disinfectant wipes available, hand sanitizer, etc.  It‚Äôs just so clean here and organized.  Even the way they handle breakfast in the AM, which is a HOT meal breakfast (super rear to find in hotels since COVID) and hot coffee available 24/7. :) The bed is also super comfortable. Shavelle at the front desk at night is a gem! The ladies at breakfast, Ysenia and Veronica are fantastic, and Paul and
Manager Response: Hi Stephanie,  I want to reciprocate the compliment right back to you.  We deal with so many people on so many levels on a daily basis and wish more guests were just like you.  You seem like an amazing woman with  great head on your shoulders.  Good luck on your test this weekend.  Thank you so very much for the kind words.  I will be sure to share with the team.  As I have mentioned in so many of my reviews, I am so blessed to have the team I have.  They are all so nice and sincere.  It's not often that you can be a workplace that is as fun and genuine as Homewood Suites in Irvine.  Thank you for taking to time out of all your studying to write the review.    Sincrerely,  Paul

Summary: Some business' attract and manage their team extremely well and it is very apparent that this is the case for this location. I was blown away by the professionalism and outstanding service at this location.  Having to travel for work during these times can be stressful enough, so it was such a relief to be able to check in to an extremely clean room! (I am the type of person who will check corners of rooms just to see just how clean it really is.) I have stayed at "high end" hotels and I honestly have never been as impressed as how much I was impressed with my rooms cleanliness. It was a huge stress reliever to feel like I was staying in a clean environment. I also appreciated the extras such as the sanitizing wipes for the remote controls, which were already clean! Above all,
Manager Response: Greetings natashak675, We would first like to thank you for leaving such an amazing review! These are the reviews our team strives for! We are so thrilled to hear that everything met your standards and then some. Through these uncertain "COVID" times our team does their absolute best to make sure each and every one of our guests feel safe and comfortable. Hayley and Tony are just the best! They're our dynamic duo sales team!! We will pass on the kudos to them. We sure hope that you will join us again soon! We will be here to welcome you back to your home away from home! Till next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I have stayed at this particular location a few times already and I can say I have enjoyed my stay every time. Rooms are clean and love the "homey" feeling as suites are roomy and have awesome amenities. Front desk ladies were awesome and I felt very welcome, THANK YOU to Leilani and Eliza for taking care of all my needs and questions. HUGE thanks to Eliza for the super late check out as I had a later flight out of SNA. With covid going on I felt safer staying in my room a little longer than in the airport. Definitely will stay here frequently if I had the choice when I am in SNA area.
Manager Response: Good morning, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review and for returning as well, we greatly appreciate your business. I am so happy to hear that our team has made you feel welcome and have provided a "Home away from home" environment for you. I will pass along your kind words about Eliza & Leilani, this will definitely make them smile. We hope all is well, and cannot wait to have you visit us again in the near future.   Take care!  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I stayed here with my daughter and we had a great time. The room was very nice although an awkward set up with the bathroom and vanity area. We got the 1-bedroom with a kitchen and it worked out very well. Our focus was sitting outside and enjoying the pool and amenities. Nice outdoor grill set up. Loved having an outdoor fire pit but it is placed in a rather strange place near equipment but still very enjoyable. We went down to the pool early the following morning. I was a little disappointed as we watched them cleaning the pool and outdoor areas. Although we may have missed seeing them do any sort of disinfecting of patio chairs and area, we observed that that the pool cleaner did a rather half hearted job. The pool remained a bit murky. Since the pool opened early, I would
Manager Response: Greetings! First off, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, we greatly appreciate it. We do apologize for some of the hiccups you encountered during your stay. Thank you for the suggestion about the pool area, will definitely bring that up to management. We are glad that for the most part your trip was enjoyable. We look forward to having you again.  Until then, take care. Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I stayed here with friends on a Saturday night in Sept 2020 and was throughly impressed. I'm a diamond member and have stayed at many Hilton brands and multiple Homewood suites. This Homewood however was one of the nicest I've stayed at. The rooms are so clean and so modern, you can tell they didn't cut corners and spent a little extra money when building the hotel. Great bed, bathroom and kitchen with clean kitchenware. Staff was nice and personable, no complaints. The location is good if you want to hit Huntington Beach, but not pay an arm and a leg to stay down there. My only comment is the hallways on our floor were long and had carpet that made them feel like they never ended, not sure if the staff has ever felt that way; no problem, just something I couldn't stop thinking
Manager Response: Good morning!  Your review made me giggle a bit, yes, I have felt that the carpet makes it feel at times that the hallway doesn't end but then again they are pretty long, haha. Thank you for your lovely review, it definitely makes us feel good knowing we are providing a welcoming "home away from home," environment for our guest.  We can't wait to host you again. Thank you again for the awesome rating/review.   Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Just stayed for one night as flying out from John Wayne airport. Homewood Suites are always a good bet got a comfy stay with the full kitchen & living area. Bed was also comfy too! Staff were friendly and people masked up & followed social distancing protocols. Convenient free parking was a plus! Room was cleaned & sealed.
Manager Response: Greetings, We are happy to hear that your overall experience with us was a pleasant and safe one. Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, it helps us out tremendously. We hope you will visit us again whenever you are in the orange county area.   Til then, take care.  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: What an amazing stay! We booked with the hotel directly to celebrate our anniversary. Eliza was absolutely amazing; such a warm person. She helped to make our stay extra special. So grateful to her. Caroline is also wonderful. Very attentive. This hotel strives to help its guests feel like home, which we did. We visited during Covid and felt perfectly comfortable. The pool is open and they serve a hot breakfast. Coffee and tea are available 24/7. Parking is complimentary as is WIFI and breakfast. Great value and perks. Most importantly, super clean!  We will definitely be back. Thank you Eliza.
Manager Response: Greetings Nancy, WOW. Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this awesome review. I am absolutely thrilled that you both were able to enjoy your special day with a little stay-cation at the Homewood Suites Irvine. In the mist of COVID everyone has missed out on a lot of special days and i am just so happy to have been able to give you both a little piece of normality and bliss in all this craziness. We cant wait to welcome you back! Warm Regards, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The room was okay, the kitchen was great, the bathroom area was congested. The attached picts show the overlap of the doors between the bedroom and bathroom areas. I found myself opening and closing multiple doors every time I needed to use the bathroom or sink. The beds were extremely high off the ground. They were comfortable otherwise. The couch in the living room area was stained-not inviting for a sleeper sofa-see pict. There was limited room cleaning due to COVID. We put our trash can out to be emptied and it was returned without a liner-this was the kitchen can we used to discard food scraps. No amenities for being a Hilton member. The room was soundproof. We didn‚Äôt even hear the jets passing overhead. Used the game room, it was comfy, clean and enjoyable. Weight room
Manager Response: Greetings ilnan, We would like to thank you for taking the time to leave such a detailed review. Your feedback is greatly appreciated. We are very sorry to hear about all the inconveniences you experience during your stay. Here at the Homewood Suites Irvine YOUR comfort is our main priority. Please feel free to contact the hotel directly so we can take care of this for you. We will be reviewing your concerns and bringing them to our teams attention. Again we would like to thank you for bringing these issues to our attention. We sure hope that you will give us the opportunity to make this right. Hope to see you soon, Warm regards, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I happen to be a team member although not a team member at this particular hotel but this is the only place I'm aloud to leave a review.   Like all team members I use my benefits to travel and stay at the different hotels from the brand and I stay here often for many reasons like the outrageously comfortable beds, the peace and quiet and their yummy breakfast buffet which by the way is free with your stay and then you you add in efficient & always friendly staff, it really makes for a very pleasant stay. I understand now during COVID-19 its very difficult to trust that a hotel will thoroughly follow all CDC recommendations and guidelines for disinfecting. Well this hotel does. They dont allow team members to leave reviews for many reasons but Im sure one is that they probably
Manager Response: OK, so let me start by saying "WOW", thank you so much for your kind remarks.  We are truly humbled by another team member complimenting us in such an impactful way. Your words mean so much to my team.  With everything going on in the world today and the amount of stress everyone is under, we try so hard to still make a difference with our guests.  Your words re-assure us that we are doing a good job.  Not all businesses in this current climate can be on point 100% of the time with the ever changing guest expectations, but the ability to solve problems, exceed the guests expectations and create a relationship with them makes all the difference.  You have touched everyone here at the hotel with your review, so thank you so very much.  Stay safe out there and don't be a stranger ;)   Paul

Summary: Wow!!! What a great hotel!!! We visit California often and usually stay with family friends. We were unable to stay with them this trip and wanted a hotel that felt like home. We found it at Homewood Suites Irvine. Our room was spacious and very clean. The mattress on the queen sized bed was the best mattress I've ever slept on. We used the pool and even the basketball court. The front desk staff were extremely friendly and helpful. My husband and I have already said we will stay at this hotel on future visits. The location is perfect and close to restaurants and shopping. Breakfast is a grab-n-go bag with a piece of fruit and a bagel. Not too bad. Homewood Suites is truly a wonderful hotel. I can't wait for my next visit!!
Manager Response: Greetings!  We are so pleased to read this review, and happy to see that you and your family had a wonderful experience here on our property! So glad to see that you took advantage our the amenities, especially with this warm weather, the pool is definitely a nice way to cool down. Thank you for taking the time leave a review, we appreciate your feedback, and can't wait to host you again in the near future!  Til then, take care.   Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: My husband and I stayed here recently while visiting Orange County. General rule of thumb is that if you book Homewood Suites is a safe bet. This Homewood Suites exceeded any other Homewood location that I‚Äôve ever stayed in before. The room was very large, equipped, clean and modern. The bed was large and comfortable too. We were also very pleased with the front desk hospitality, and friendliness. I usually stay at Holiday Inn when in Irvine, but I think I‚Äôve found my new favorite! They also had breakfast to go bags!!
Manager Response: Greetings!  We are pleased to read that your stay with us went well and do hope you visit us again whenever you are in town. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with the rest of the world. Here at Homewood Suites in Irvine, we strive to provide a home away from home environment for our guest, so it makes us happy to see that our team provided that. We are wishing you the best, take care.   Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This is actually the first time I‚Äôve ever reviewed a hotel before but the amazing experience I‚Äôve had this particular stay made me want to review the heck out of this place! I‚Äôm going through a divorce and ended up being out of my home with my kid‚Äôs and my belongings all loaded onto a U-haul truck. I started off trying to save money by staying at SpringHill Suites by Marriott for a few days. It wasn‚Äôt the best experience and there were so many hidden charges, I wasn‚Äôt actually saving money at all. So I checked around and found that Homewood Suites by Hilton had actual kitchens instead of a minuscule fridge that barely held anything w/ a tiny microwave, they had clean rooms, and comfortable beds. And the nightly rate was less than the grand daily total of the Marriott. We were
Manager Response: Good evening,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review regarding your stay with us. It brings us such joy to be able to provide our guest a "home away from home" environment. We are happy to see that you enjoyed the amenities your suite came with as well. I will make sure to share this sweet review with our team and Sam! I am sure he will be very happy! We wish you the best at your new home, and hope you visit us again one day.   Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: This Hotel has the Best Staff Hands Down
Summary: We had a suite here for almost a month, we are a Design company, in town for a job, we have stayed quite at few hotels in OC and had as clients as well, but these wonderful people are the best, from the GM Mr.Frechette, to Caroline, Sam, and the night crew to our most hospitable housekeeper Alicia. We thank you for your generosity in helping a local business while times are tough and being so pleasant through the entire stay. You're the BEST! AND the property is very nice, clean, and secure. Hats OFF!
Manager Response: Greetings Paige, We are so thrilled that you enjoyed your extended time with us. Our team here does their very best during these uncertain times to keep you, our valued guests, safe. We will pass along the good remarks and we hope to see you again sometime soon. Warm Regards, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: The manager has a complete team from maintenance to front office that are the BEST I have seen in YEARS!!!
Summary: My husband & I are staying here for awhile along with my sister & her family. Let me tell you I have been beyond happy with this Hotel from the moment my sister & I came to check our families in. Eliza worked with both of us which did not go smoothly (on our end) bank thought our cc had been compromised so we had to get that taken care of.    Then the next day I was walking through the lobby & was greeted with the happiest of Good Mornings from Caroline which now is our puppers bestie.   The night auditor Chavelly is the most upbeat sweetest person I have EVER encountered that works the nightshift. (I work nights & I am no where near that level of sweet.  Myself & our Ms Gnocchi were walking out and Paul (manager) went out of his way to come over to meet with her and assure us
Manager Response: Good Morning JENNIFER H, WOW! Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know how your stay has been with us thus far. Your feedback is what drives us to do better. You and your  family have been so understanding through all of our COVID restrictions and It has truly been such a pleasure to host you all and little Ms Gnocchi! We hope during these difficult and uncertain times that you have found "your home away from home" here with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine.  Warmest Regards, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Really not good sound proofing between rooms/floors, as I am trying to sleep all I hear is the screaming and moaning and bed rattling of the people above me, could of really done without that. The rooms are very spacious which is nice and good size kitchenettes. Some items in room weren't cleaned as well as I would hope especially right now with covid concerns, had to clorox wipe the arms of the desk chair as they were sticky and had food stuck on them as well as there were crumbs on the mirrors shelf.
Manager Response: Greetings meghanj820, We would like to thank you for taking the time to tell us how your recent visit with us went. Here at The Homewood Suites Irvine, your comfort is our main priority. We would like to apologize for the noise that you had to endure during your stay. Our front desk agents are always available to assist with any noise complaints, or other issues you may have so please do not hesitate to call so we can make your stay as comfortable as possible. We sure hope you give us the opportunity to host you again sometime soon.   Warm Regards, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I've been staying at the HomeWood Suites for two weeks now. I just wanted to give a special shout out to Sam and Caroline. They are the best front desk receptionists. Super polite and helpful/accomodating.
Manager Response: Dear KauaiBuilt,  I cannot say enough for how much we appreciate you taking the time to review your experience with us.  I am so blessed to have people like Sam and Caroline working for me because they make my job easy.  I will be sure to recognize them for their efforts.  By the way, your user name makes me want to go back to Hawaii ASAP ;)   It was a pleasure having you stay with us for such a long time.  If you are ever in the "neighborhood" again, please consider us again.  Many thanks,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Great location as it is very close to John Wayne Airport and the highway system. Disney isn't very far either. Nice pool and hot tub, pool table and large work area with plenty of power outlets. Rooms are nice with a comfortable couch to make movie nite fun!
Manager Response: Greetings Keith H! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review from your recent stay. We are thrilled to hear your great feedback! Hopefully we can host many more movie nights for you in the future, (our sweet shop also has movie rentals available!) We hope to welcome you back real soon!  Till then, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: While on business in Orange County, California my husband sustained an injury resulting in five surgeries in six weeks. Not able to fly home we were fortunate to have stayed at Homewood Suites. Caroline Bice and Mayra Arias were outstanding in helping us every way possible every day our stay. An encouraging word, help with the wheelchair or insuring we were able to stay in the same room were greatly appreciated. Maid service was quick and efficient. Paula Alejo always had a smile to share and was able to do a great job even with all the medical equipment in her way. All that is left to say is THANK YOU ALL! You all deserve recognition for you efforts!
Manager Response: Greetings, Mermaid5364!  We are so pleased to see that so many of our staff contributed into you having a pleasant stay here with your husband.  Thank you for the taking the time to share your experience with the rest of the world! I will make sure Caroline, Mayra, Paula,  & the rest of the team see your review, we take pride in our customer service, & always try to provide a home away from home environment for our guest. Hope all is well, and hope you will visit us again in the future!  Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The hotel itself is very well kept and all the staff is wonderful and so accommodating. The breakfast is superb and they have social evenings with additional food and spirits. The rooms are large and very well maintained. Our room was a one bedroom suite with two TVs and ample space. The cleanliness that Kaikesh provided us was excellent and she should be recognized for her thoroughness. We appreciate the hard work and dedication that goes into making this one of our most memorable hotels. 4 star hotel and 10 star service.
Manager Response: Wow, thank you 533xc so very much for the wonderful comments regarding your stay with us.  Kailash has been with us since opening and her attention to detail is excellent.  She is one of our best.  I am going to share this review with the staff because we constantly tell them that Home Away From Home service takes over, even at the not so great hotels.  So, thanks for the 10 stars :)  We hope to see you again soon in the near future.  Next time stop by the desk and ask for me, I would love to get a chance to meet you.  Sincerely,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel great place to stay
Summary: I would recommend this hotel 100% to everyone I know. It is super clean, very well lit and very centrally located. As a single woman traveling for work I felt safe 100% of the time. The bedding was wonderful, the bed was so comfortable. The room was super clean and very accessible.
Manager Response: Greetings L3924EQmichelles, Thank you so much for you great feedback. We are absolutely thrilled that everything was to your liking!  We hope that you will choose us for your accommodations when you are in the Irvine area. We look forward to welcoming you back. Warmly, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We picked this hotel because it was close to the soccer fields we were playing on. The Hilton brand never disappoints! The room was big, clean and the beds were comfy. We enjoyed the pool area and the breakfast was great. There are many restaurants and stores near by.  We are a family of 6 and finding a single room to fit us is never easy. The Homewood Suites Hotel is wonderful.Two thumbs up!
Manager Response: Greetings, Zptashoe!  We are are pleased to hear that you recent stay with us went well! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, and sharing your experience! Glad to see that you got to enjoy our complimentary breakfast, always a good way to start off your morning.  We hope you visit us again when you are in town.   Best wishes, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This hotel is very clean, great amenities, comfortable rooms, good breakfast and friendly staff. The only downside on this stay was the television did not work. I called the front desk to report the problem and I was told that all I have to do was to tighten the cable connection on the wall. I did as I was told but I had to do this tightening of the connection several times during our stay. The person at the desk told me that if they send a maintenance person he would do the same thing.  Now, this is getting ridiculous! Why do I have to do this every time I have to turn the television on? This annoyance needs to be fixed permanently and the hotel guest does not need to make this tightening each time.  Upon checkout, I reported this problem to the desk person to have this problem
Manager Response: Dear Bellavita4653  We want to thank you for leaving a review on your recent stay; we are so sorry to hear that did not receive top quality care we are known for. We want to apologize for the way this issue was handled. Please feel free to reach out anytime, we would like to get the chance to speak with you, on how we can make things right.   Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Very Clean Facility and Great Customer Service
Summary: I would like to take this opportunity to thank the housekeeping staff for the cleanliness of this facility. Please give Lucrecia a huge thank you for her high level of customer service. She greeted me with a huge smile and asked questions on the level of service expected while I working on my computer in the room.  Also, we had a problem with iron leaking water. Panicking and running out of time for my business appointment, housekeeping promptly brought me a brand new iron!  Thank you!  We plan to visit again.
Manager Response: Greetings Salvador R!  Thank you for letting us know how your experience was, here with us. I will make sure Lucrecia knows how thankful you are for her help. We do apologize for the issue with the iron in your room. We are glad, you were taken care of quickly, hope you made it in time for your appointment. We look forward to hosting you again.  Best regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Would recommend to anyone staying in the area. It is even worth driving a little farther just to stay here. Full week here and enjoyed every amenity. The staff is very helpful and can accommodate most requests.
Manager Response: Good morning, Learyb5780  We want to thank you for taking the time to leave us a review on your experience at our hotel. It means a lot to us when our guest enjoys our service and amenities. We hope you will visit us again on your next trip!  Warmest regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team
