Summary: Seriously the best customer service ever! They went above and beyond for me and my family in making sure we were comfortable and taken care of. I was so impressed and will for sure stay there again when we are in the area.
Manager Response: Greetings, damam499!  We would love to thank you for taking the time to share your families & your experience staying with us. We are glad to hear our staff went above & beyond to make you feel at home, this is so important, and always strive to provide this to every guest. We hope all is well & hope we will see you again in the near future.   Warm regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Ants in bathroom and kitchen! Also they did not service the room even after we called 4 times and ended up having to go down to the front desk for suppiles, not good. We left early because of all the issues, sad it used to be a good property but they are not maintaing it. Not using a good pest service as we saw a lot outside as well as in our room!  And its not even the hot summer months yet!
Manager Response: Dear Vacationer367495  We want to thank you for taking the time to leave feedback regarding your recent visit; we are so extremely sorry to hear that you did not receive the top-notch service that we have come to be known for. We apologize for have failing your expectations. We do see that you were awarded a complimentary night for the troubles with housekeeping. In regards to the ants, we promptly had our maintenance team take care of the issue upon check out when you left early. Our goal is for all of our guest to have the most comfortable and enjoyable. Thank you for bringing the attention of the ants issue upon check out so we could make it right for our next guest.   Please feel free to reach out anytime. We take pride in being a repeat-hotel for many of our guests, including our loyal Gold and Diamond Hilton Honors members. We would love to hear if there is anything else we can do to make things right.   Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Excellent as we've come to expect
Summary: Room was large and comfortably furnished. Lighting was excellent for reading.  Bed was superb, kitchen functional and well equipped, lashings of hot water in sinks and in shower.  The rugs and floor were scrupulously clean.  And the maid service was very good at replacing every smallest service item as needed. Linen was fluffy and certainly new or new-ish.  Noise was entirely absent except on one occasion where a large and rowdy group of guests appeared to be taking wrecking equipment to the suite above ours. The din ceased after about 20 minutes so that I reported it only on our check-out.
Manager Response: Greetings David N, We would like to thank you for your glowing review. It is a great pleasure to know that you enjoyed your time with us. We sincerely apologize for the noise that you endured. Your comfort is always our first priority. If you indeed have this issue again, please call the front desk at the time of the incident so we may attend to as soon as possible. We do hope that you will join us again when you are in the Irvine area.  Warm Regards, Eliza &The Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Trip to Disneyland for Wife's B-Day
Summary: Check in was quick and easy, the front desk staff was great, young gal that checked us in recommended a restaurant in the same parking structure Farmer Boys and she gave us a 20% discount coupon. The recommendation was great, Thank you.  Our room on a daily basis was very clean and organized, Thank you Marilu for doing such a great job. Our trip was for Disneyland which was a 15 min. drive away and at the end of each day it was nice to come back and get rest. the bed was super comfortable beyond believe. My wife and I agreed that the bed was more comfortable then our own at home. You know there's nothing like sleeping at home in your own bed but here we found it. Great job Homewood Suites!
Manager Response: Good Morning ciprianoc421, A very very happy birthday to your wife. We are absolutely thrilled that everything went off without a hitch for her special day. Our housekeeping team are truly rock stars, we will extend your thanks to Marilu. Hope you both also enjoyed your time at the happiest place on earth! We sure hope you will give us the pleasure of hosting you again. Our comfy beds will be waiting for your return.  Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Stayed in an ADA room that was beautiful, so clean, and easy to move around in in a wheelchair. And the bed was so comfortable. (I was tempted to ask where they get their pillows from, but I didn't). Paul, the GM, and Gabby, Sam and Caroline at the front desk are very personable and so so helpful. Didn't get a chance to try out the pool, but were happy to see that it had a lift to be able to get into the pool from the wheelchair. Not far, at all, from John Wayne airport, South Coast Plaza, and the performing arts center. Planes fly near the hotel approaching the airport, but I only noticed this when we were outside. I never heard them in our room!
Manager Response: Good morning, togonongirl  It was such a pleasure reading your review regarding your recent stay with us. We are glad to see that you connected with our staff, i will make sure they to hear about your lovely compliments. We sure do hope you come visit us again, and maybe next time you give our pool a try, summer is right around the corner.   Best regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This hotel experience was excellent. The hotel was so clean, the staff is amazing. The service was awesome. We stayed there for a family wedding for 5 nights. We were first greeted by Caroline who was so accommodating. Everyday she was there for everything we needed. Always smiling and joking. She seriously made our stay the best. We were all impressed how on point she was with everything. Seriously she really was the best. When we got home I realized I had left my jewelry in the room when I unpacked 2 days later. When I contacted Myra (spelling??) she put my mind at ease and said she would contact me as soon as they located it. Which now brings me to house keeping and how wonderful it is to have the peace of mind that they brought it to the front desk. I would recommend this
Manager Response: Good morning, Dicuso10 Thank you for leaving us an amazing review, we are glad to see that our staff made a good impression. We are glad that your lost items were found. I will be sure to pass along to our staff of your kind words especially to Caroline and Mayra. We will be looking forward hosting you and your family again in the near future.  Best regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Great hospitality, welcoming attitude and service!  Rooms are quiet, breakfast and evening snacks are great.  Good location with interstate access near by.  Fitness center is clean with good options.  Pool and basketball court fun for the family.  My preferred hotel in the area.
Manager Response: Greetings, friend!  We want to thank you for becoming part of the Homewood Suites Family! It is wonderful to hear that you have been able to enjoy so many of the great amenities our location has to offer. There are so many reasons why Irvine makes for a great place to stay over and over again! We look forward to many more satisfactory visits from you in the future!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We stayed here to be closer to family for MLK weekend. The hotel is good... clean, easy freeway access, friendly staff. Our complimentary breakfasts were marginal though. The first day was really unsatisfying with an omelette that supposedly had ham, cheese and vegetables in it. They must have been pur√©ed because all that was inside of it was a glob of something unrecognizable! Along with that were unappetizing flattened French toast strips. The second day was a slight improvement.
Manager Response: Greetings, Mrs. K!  Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine during your recent family visit. We enjoy receiving all of our guests feedback and appreciate yours. We will certainly want to look into your experience; that certainly does not sound like our typical weekend breakfast eggs! Our hot items do change daily so our guests can enjoy something different every day of their stay with our complimentary breakfast.   We hope you and your family will come visit again for another comfortable and convenient visit to Orange County!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Love love love!! 10 STARS for staff, location, ambiance, complimentary breakfast everyday, and our Suite had all the amenities of home except for a oven. Which is fine and understood. Will definitely be back again.
Manager Response: Greetings, Ms. Vasquez! It was our pleasure to host you and your family during your recent visit to the area. We know many of our sports families must travel often and great distances to take their kids to their tournaments. We are thrilled that we were able to provide you with a comfortable stay and tasty breakfast each morning. Hopefully it was just what your player needed to fuel their day! We hope you will join us again, for fun or for your next big game. The Homewood Suites Irvine will be ready for you again next time!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Wonderful place to stay. Pool, game area, cozy beds.    Unfortunately the breakfast was underwhelming, to be polite. Fruit was whole dry oranges and mealy apples. Chaffing dishes of eggs with American "cheese" product.  The shredded breakfast potatoes were cooked in synthetic butter tasting shortening. Wheat bread wasn't whole grain. Coffee somehow tasted burnt and watery at the same time. I understand cutting corners but the breakfast was inedible, even for my 1 and 3yo and they're GREAT eaters.   This breakfast was more quality inn / motel 6 quality. Cheap processed food. Not something I'd expect from a quality hotel such as this.  Fortunately the suites had kitchens, so after the first attempt at eating what they had we went to the grocery store and picked up supplies.
Manager Response: Dear S1quin ,  First and foremost, thank you for your feedback on your recent stay here with us. We sincerely apologize for the experience you had with our breakfast. Would it be possible for us to get a hold of you, we definitely want to make things right. We will be taking this as an opportunity for us to learn and better ourselves.   Please let us know what is the best way to contact you.   Deepest apologies,  Chavelly + the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Stayed for two nights at this location.  Nothing was lacking and everything met my expectations.  I did not participate in the evening social, but the breakfast had everything that I wanted (yogurt, hard boiled eggs, and oatmeal).  I did notice eggs, a waffle station, and some sausages along with various juices and pastries.  Coffee wasn't bad either.  Only thing I would do differently if I were to stay here again is to choose a room that is away from the main road.  I forgot to check the orientation of the rooms before booking so I was woken up a couple times by the street noise.  But all in all, a great location and very clean facility.
Manager Response: Good evening, Christopher K  Thank you for sharing your experience with us while here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We are glad to see that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We do apologize for the main road noise. We do hope you give us another chance to host you again. Thank you again for your feedback, we greatly appreciate it.   Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I stayed for 11 days at this location breakfast was very bad and the bed is very uncomfortable and very high it is almost imposible to go to sleep on it. nevertheless the room was nice and large and well decorated but the water some kind of smell like chlorine
Manager Response: Dear Sightseer01126379737,  Thank you so much for your feedback about your stay here with us.  I am deeply concerned about your concerns as we always do our best to make every guest stay the best it can be.  I understand you addressed your concerns on other channels as well and we were in the process of contacting you for more information about the breakfast and the water issues.  It is so important that we get a hold of you to make this right.  Please accept my humble apology for the challenges you had during your stay.  I will be reaching out to you again this morning via email and phone to get this all resolved.    Deepest apologies,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Hi I wanted to leave a 5 star review for Eppi Diaz staff of homewood suites Irvine! She was so nice and helpful. She brought me blankets towels when I needed them and was so courteous! The hotel is amazing also
Manager Response: Greetings, 705violetd  Thank you so much for recognizing a prominent member of our Homewood Team; Ms. Epi is actually our housekeeping manager! She can be found walking the halls of the hotel helping her team and our guests to make their stay the most comfortable. We appreciate your time in leaving this review and helping us recognize her. We hope the rest of your stay is just as amazing. We are certainly here for you any time should you need anything! Just give us a call.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This hotel has everything you need for a family stay - full kitchen, fitness center and breakfast and dinner pool and jacuzzi.  Friendly staff that make you feel at home.   2nd stay here and look forward to coming again!
Manager Response: Good morning, Vinceandrada  Thank you for your review on your most recent stay. We are glad to see that you enjoyed our amenities here at the hotel. Our staff here always strives to provide a welcoming home environment. Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine, it makes us so happy to see you are a returning guest.   We hope all is well, and we can't wait for you to join us again.  Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This place is amazing! We stayed here for disneyland and the breakfast is sooo good! They also have social night and offer free food and alcohol! Also kaysee, itzy, and jazmin was really helpful and very sweet. They made our stay here very comfortable.
Manager Response: Good morning, Jesscuuhh  We are so thrilled to hear that your stay here with us was amazing. We are pleased to see that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast, plus our social hour with our wonderful Food & Beverage team members. We will be sure to pass along your sweet compliments to them. Our goal is to always make our guest feel comfortable, & give them a sense of home away from home feeling. We hope you join us again in the near future.   Best regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Worked well for a short trip
Summary: The suite was perfect for my needs but the room was chilled to 52F when I arrived - not very energy efficient and way too cold. Breakfast was decent. I didn't use the facilities but it seemed well kitted out.
Manager Response: Good morning, Brianmsi  First and foremost, we truly appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review and feedback on your stay. We apologize for the overuse of the air conditioner, we will take this as a learning opportunity for us as a whole to be more aware of our energy use around the hotel, especially the A/C units.   We are glad to hear that for the most part your stay with us went well, and we hope you return.   Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel with a feeling of home
Summary: Homewood suites properties are perfect for planning short or long stays. With the feature of a kitchen with a regular sized fridge in the room, your stay fellas like you are home. Farmer boys is next door for your convenience. The special events listed on the fridge are great for if you need ideas of what to do around the area. Or if the hotel is hosting a special evening treat. Love the location as well. Close to John Wayne airport. Caroline at the front desk was amazing during check in. Very friendly and welcoming.
Manager Response: Good evening robleseddie94,         We are happy to hear that we were able to provide a home away from home experience here at our Homewood Suites. We do hope that you did take part of our complimentary evening social that we have here as well which  Monday through Thursday.           Also, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. It is really appreciative when our guests want to share their experience with others. We do hope, though, that we get the opportunity to host you again, though, if you are ever in the area.   Best regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful, the breakfast was satisfying and had many options, parking was easy, and the room had all the comforts I needed. It was a quiet location which is good for relaxing. I will book again for a future visit if I am in the area.
Manager Response: Greetings, Bam 1019!  We are so thrilled to hear that your stay was just what you needed! I think we could all use a little relaxation after the holidays! Free parking and daily breakfast, not to mention our Evening Social during the week days, are a great option for guests who wish to stay in for the night.  Thank you for taking time to leave this feedback. It means so much that our guests want to share these wonderful experiences with the world! Please be sure to join us again the next time you are visiting Orange County for another great night's stay!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Two weeks of comfort and cleanliness.
Summary: The staff was amazing from the first day throughout two weeks.  Everyday we met with friendly, helpful and smiling staff who deserve to take pride in thier work.  Especially Gabby at the front desk who remembers your name and Hose in the lobby are very personable. The maintenance and cleaning people seem to maintain a top-notch level standard and deserve to take pride too.  The hotel has a nice assortment of breakfast items and serves buffet dinners too.  It was alway full during our holiday stay but everything seemed to be managed with such efficiency.  I look forward to more stays. They were very hospitable.
Manager Response: Mr. & Mrs. J!  It was an absolute pleasure to be your Home Away From Home while you two were visiting family over the holidays. We're so happy to hear that your stay was filled with warmth and comfort from the amenities offered and our lovely team members! One of the benefits of being an extended stay-style property is getting to know our guests and what brings them to visit. It was a treat to hear about your adventures through SoCal each day! Thank you for recognizing just a few of our team members who go above and beyond to make our guests feel welcome and at home; I know I really enjoyed getting to meet you both!  Hopefully we'll become your go-to hotel for years to come. You'll have to bring the grandbaby by!  Looking forward to your next visit, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: The perfect HOME AWAY from HOME
Summary: Flooding in our home led us to Homewood Suites Irvine John Wayne Airport on November 10th, 2019.  Having traveled around the world and staying in various hotels, we've never felt so comfortable and spoiled by the staff and service one receives at Homewood Suites Irvine John Wayne Airport.  Daily room service, buffet breakfast and early evening snacks is just the beginning.  Being here two months now, we have taken advantage of other amenities including the 24 hour fitness center, game room, business center and laundry room on the second floor.  In addition, Farmer Boys is located in the same parking lot and guests staying at the hotel receive 20% discount off any purchase.  :)  Paula Alejo provides five star quality cleaning in our room daily.  Bed sheets are changed twice a
Manager Response: Dear Mr. & Mrs. F!  We always try to look for the bright spots in tough situations; we are so happy that the Homewood Suites Irvine has become your 2nd home while you have been waiting. We hope this time being away from the responsibilities of keeping home have been a perk! Thank you for leaving this amazing and thorough review of all the ways that the Homewood Suites Irvine makes our guests feel At Home, no matter how long they are with us.   Thank you for recognizing Paula in housekeeping. Hopefully many more have made your extended stay a memorable one! Let's not think about when you two will eventually depart (but on happy terms!) and instead just enjoy the time you are still here with us! We're here for you if you need anything else during your stay.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Stayed here for a trip to Disneyland with the Family.  Yes, the location is an 18 min drive from Disney but worth it as the price point, cleanliness, FULL KITCHEN, FREE parking, and FREE breakfast was all very worth it.  Customer service was a 10 as well!   I will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Good evening, CaliCoco23  We are glad to see that you enjoyed your stay with us, and liked the location of our hotel. We are happy that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast, it is definitely a good way to start off your morning. Thank you, for leaving us a review, and we can't wait to have here you again!   Best regards, Chavelly & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Even in the busy Holiday season this hotel and staff did not disappoint. I booked this hotel due to the reviews on Priceline and glad I did. Our family of 5 enjoyed the pool, whirlpool, basketball courts, and daily breakfast. The hotel was clean and the staff was friendly and working hard. Thank you!
Manager Response: Good morning, Karm1210!  We appreciate your kind review and your great observation! We might have been quite busy this past holiday season but our team always has a smile! Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine for your recent visit. We are pleased to hear we stood up to the great reviews we have received from past guests. Our property has so many things to do and enjoy; it may be December but our hot tub and heated pool are always a treat!  We hope you and your family will join us again the next time you are visiting Irvine. Our Homewood Suites Irvine location is here as your Home Away From Home!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: And to all a good night!
Summary: Our stay could not have been better! Staff very friendly and COURTEOUS! A rare find these days. Room very clean and comfortable. Loves it so much we are all coming back next month. Mrs C and I are Homewood Suites fans for sure!üéÖü§∂üëç
Manager Response: Best Seasons Greetings to our favorite Mr. and Mrs. Clause!  Thank you so very much for leaving a review on your stay with us. We are thrilled that our hotel was just perfect for the whole family. We hope to be a part of your family's ongoing tradition when you visit Orange County. We are certainly looking forward to seeing you all again next time.   Our warmest regards from our family to yours, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: My FAVORITE place to Stay in Irvine.
Summary: This is my Favorite place to stay while we are down in Southern California. It‚Äôs always soooooo family friendly and clean. The people at the front desk are always so nice and inviting to us, especially to my toddler. I feel so comfortable staying here so It really feels like home away from home. I‚Äôm super critical about Hotels but this one surpasses all of my standards! I would definitely recommend anyone to stay here. Especially if you have little ones!
Manager Response: D3367EValexc,  We are so happy to hear you have become part of the Homewood Suites Irvine family! We love seeing our guests come back time and time again. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your love of our property with us all. We do our very best to maintain our facilities; we will be celebrating our 3rd anniversary this coming January. Keeping our property looking new and clean is a top priority. It is always nice to hear it shows! We look forward to welcoming you and the family back again next visit. The Homewood Suites Irvine is here as your Home Away From Home next time.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I felt that this hotel provided a very good quality experience for the price just under $200 in a high demand area. I am rarely happy with any hotel they all have something undesirable, but I had little to complain about. The beds were heavenly, the best I've experienced anywhere. Fairly quiet, well insulated walls and windows. The suite is above average in size and amenities. Would definitely pay the extra price again.
Manager Response: Good morning, Muchohucho!  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent experience with us! We aim to provide a great value for our guests by providing complimentary parking for all guests, daily breakfast, as well as an Evening Reception (Monday through Thursday). Perhaps you pay a little more but you certainly get a lot! Our special Hilton beds will give you the best night sleep and as a newer-built property, you can't even begin to hear the airplanes incoming to Santa Ana Airport over your head! Please be sure to join us again the next time your travels bring you to Orange County. We certainly look forward to seeing you again next visit!

Summary: Got checked in by James at the front desk and he was just awesome. He checked me in and informed of all the amenities so when he was done I had absolutely no questions. Very professional and friendly customer service. The room itself was immaculate.
Manager Response: Hello there, raygA2340ST!  We kindly thank you for taking the time to review your stay; and so quickly! We so pleased, but not surprised, that you received such great service from one of our fantastic Front Desk team members. We will certainly pass your kudos along to James. Besides friendly service, we want to ensure that all of our guests enjoy a comfortable stay in their suites or studios. Our goal is to make our guests feel like they are relaxing in their own home! We hope this lovely review means you will join us again the next time you find yourself in Irvine. We look forward to hosting you again next time!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Excellent place excellent service excellent environment  No problem at all reccomend for family or business beautiful service highly recommend and worth the money  I came with family and felt more comfortable then my own home and was relaxed the staff was just like family i really mean they were to polite and kind was unbelievable
Manager Response: Greetings, omarqazi!  Your review absolutely warms our hearts; thank you so much sharing this all with us! Our team here at the Homewood Suites Irvine is like family and we are always so excited to welcome more members in. Providing the Home Away From Home experience to all of our guests is our number one priority. Know that you are always at home while you are here with us. If there is anything we can do at all to make your stay that much better, please just let us know!  Warmest regards, from our family to yours, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Irvine Team

Summary: Been here since Sunday and today I had the pleasure of meeting Lucina. Lucina came by my room to provide cleaning service, and not only was she personable, but committed to providing great service. I appreciate her coming by the room, cleaning it and making sure we are fully stocked on everything we may need. So far, I have 0 complaints on our stay here.
Manager Response: Greetings, Ms. Perez  Thank you so much! It is an honor that you have taken to Trip Advisor while you are still here! We certainly appreciate your time and energy in sharing your experience with us all. We are so fortunate to have an all-around amazing team who are so dedicated to providing the best experience to our guests. We will be sure to give Lucina an extra kudos for her efforts.   Please let us know if you need anything more to make your stay the very best!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Convenient for SNA but just OK !
Summary: Noisy with basketball players until midnight. Is not good for family with kids. Very small bed room for 4 people very poor breakfast don‚Äôt expect too much for a Hilton hotel and look for a better one for your vacation
Manager Response: Greetings, MikeTours2017  Thank you for taking the time to leave some feedback regarding your recent stay. Each guest review provides us with  an opportunity to improve and do better for the next visit. We are sorry to hear that your stay was not on level with our standard experiences. We apologize for any disturbances that might have hindered you and your family from having a good night's rest in our comfy beds. Our Front Desk team is on stand-by any time to handle noise issues such as the ones you might have encountered.   We have a variety of room types throughout the property. We apologize that the standard, King Studio was the only availability we had on the busy weekend that you stayed with us. We love to offer complimentary upgrades if possible, especially to our loyal Hilton Honors members. We hope that you and your family will give us another chance so we may take better care of you for next time. We are not just convenient to Santa Ana Airport but for all kinds of fun things to do in Orange County!  We hope to see you again on your next visit, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Came back again and will always return when in Irvine!
Summary: Paul and his team always does an incredible job!  This stay we arrived after a long drive from Sacramento in the early hours of the day. The night audit was great and the team was ready for our late arrival with the beds made up for the kids.  Chavelly and James were amazing as well as everyone we came in to contact with.  Breakfast is great, the pool and basketball court are my kids favorite perk and the convenience to the beaches and Disney are perfect!
Manager Response: Greeting, Brent!  We wish to thank you for leaving such a great review in regards to your most recent visit. We pride ourselves on offering a great night's sleep and tasty breakfast in the morning, all served up with smiles and care for our fabulous team! Thank you for recognizing just a special few that made such a joyous impact in your stay. We will certainly pass the kudos along.  We cannot wait for the family to join us again. No matter the time of year, our outdoor area with pool and sports court are great places for families to come relax and unwind after a busy day. The Homewood Suites Irvine will always be here as your Home Away From Home!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This is our go-to hotel in Irvine when kids wants to go to Pretend City and Disney. We‚Äôve been here at least three times and each time it had been a wonderful experience. The front desk staffs especially are very welcoming and helpful! Our kids loves the spacious suites and we love the price point ;) As a side note, if you bring a totbloc playpen which is giant, it‚Äôll still fit between the two queen beds!
Manager Response: Greetings, marian53388  The Homewood Suites Irvine has something for everyone! We proudly offer complimentary parking, breakfast, wifi, and our renowned Evening Reception in all of our guest stays. Our younger guests love to be able to make their own waffles at our waffle bar in the morning and parents love not having to take them out to breakfast!  Thank you for recognizing our wonderful team who try their very best to make all of our guests feel welcome and at home. We look forward to sharing this review with them all! Please bring the family again the next time you are looking for a little fun. We can't wait to see you all again next visit.   Warmest regards, from our family to yours, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: The Best Hotel, especially for long term stays
Summary: We stayed at Homewood Suites for 3 weeks while my husband was working in Irvine. After a while it seemed like home because of the excellent staff who were friendly and accommodating, the wonderful breakfasts each morning and the evening social that included a substantial amount of food plus free flowing beer and wine.  We could eat mostly hotel food, adding an entree for dinner, and because of this it was very economical.  Hotel and surrounding area is very quiet, except for a little jet noise if you stay on the north side. The housekeeping staff keeps this place extremely clean.  Our room was spacious, comfortable and squeaky clean. As a former HR Director, hard for me not to notice the teamwork and general camaraderie among the staff.  Everybody seemed happy and so tuned in to
Manager Response: Ahoy, Sailorsal!  We really enjoyed reading your awesome review! It is great to hear that our team's synergy and cooperation shines through to make our guest's stays the very best!  Our Homewood Suites Irvine location provides a great value for all of our guests. With our complimentary breakfast and weeknight Evening Reception paired with free parking makes for a winning deal! That let's you save a little funds for the important things in life, like tacos and Disneyland!  Please think of us again the next time you and your family are visiting Orange County. Our friendly team will be here to welcome you all back again.  From our family to yours, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We checked in very late to the hotel because I-5 closed down and they understood and gave us a care package when we arrived. Extra water bottles, towels, and plenty of shampoo conditioner toothpaste.   The employees Itzy, Tania, and Jordan were Soo kind to us and greeted us every time we left and arrived to the hotel. That following morning, we were soo tired from the drive that we slept right through breakfast. They were kind enough to request the kitchen to make 6 plates of food for our family after breakfast hours, and brought it to the room in a cart.  We go here every time we visit our family in Southern California, and will continue coming in the near future. Thanks for making our vacation even more pleasant than it already is
Manager Response: Greetings and good evening, vincentn789327  We want to thank you from the bottom of our hearts for leaving this amazing review on your visit. What a wild weekend it was with the holiday and the weather! We are sorry to hear your family hit a few bumps along the road but we are so happy our team was able to be a shining ray of light! Thank you for recognizing a few of our dream team who made a special impact in your visit. We can't wait for your family to join us again so we can provide you with another memorable stay. Be sure to come back and stay with us again the next time you are visiting Orange County!  Warmest regards, from our family to yours Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Stayed here with 30 people - a high school hockey team from Canada. This place is impressive.  So very clean.  Spacious.  All staff are friendly and they clearly take pride in this hotel. The breakfast was top notch and the pool area, hot tub and basketball court was perfect for our team. I have stayed at many places in the United States and this is one of the cleanest, best kept and run facilities ever. Great place to stay.
Manager Response: Greetings, marsands2016  Thank you so much for selecting our Irvine location for your group's visit from up north! We are so excited that your stay left such a great impression on you and your team. Our lodge makes a great spot for groups to come together, strategize, and take on the competition! Should you all find yourself in Orange County again, please come back to visit! It would be our pleasure to host your group again and be your Home Away From Home next visit.  Don't be a stranger!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I‚Äôm a fairly new guest and already this feels like coming home. Every staff member I‚Äôve encountered has been professional and accommodating.  As a former Front Office Manager back in the day, I can say that they have been trained well!  They always use the guest‚Äôs name and it‚Äôs done in such a warm, genuine way‚Äînever robotic. My rooms have consistently been meticulously cleaned and well-appointed, and the beds are Hilton comfortable. When you‚Äôre working away from family and the comforts of home, you really appreciate finding a place that is the next best thing. Thanks, Homewood‚Äîsee you soon!
Manager Response: Good morning, 126karenn!  It was such a treat to read your review; thank you so much for sharing it with us. It's so lovely to hear that you feel welcomed and At Home with us, despite just beginning to stay here! It is a great honor to be considered as a Home Away From Home for many of our guests who travel so regularly with us.   We are so glad that you found the property itself to be to your total comfort. A good night's sleep and a yummy breakfast is just what you need to get your day going right.   We definitely look forward to seeing you again next time. Have a happy Thanksgiving and enjoy your well-earned time at home!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Above and beyond...  friendly and accommodating!
Summary: The staff at Homewood Suites in Irvine is amazing.  Everyone is friendly and happy.  The front desk crew are exceptional and I must say a special thank you to Kim, Mayra, Gabby and Caroline.  The rooms are spacious, clean and well serviced.  I would not hesitate to book this hotel again.
Manager Response: Good morning, living_soil  Thank you so much for your wonderful review regarding your visit. Our guest suites, complimentary amenities, and fabulous team make for a winning combination! We appreciate the special shout out for just a few members who make up the whole crew at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We can't wait for your next visit. Please know that we are always here if you need anything; we are so looking forward to seeing you again!  Our very best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We stayed here as a group for a skating competition that was nearby. Chase, the Sales Manager was a pleasure to work with, very helpful with setting up our room block and giving us a group rate. Our group stay was Fantastic! The rooms were spotless, breakfast and the mid week evening social excellent and the overall hotel is great. But what makes this hotel EXTRA SPECIAL is the BEST FRONT DESK TEAM.....Caroline, James, Eliza and Sam were phenomenal! They were always attentive, friendly and anything our group needed they were happy to help and with a smile. The overall service was more than EXCELLENT and we can't wait to stay here again next year. Best Team Ever!!!
Manager Response: Woop woop, Excursion437647!  We want to shout your review from the rooftop of our 4-story property! We were so happy to read this and about your experience with us. We are thrilled that you and your group were set up for a successful visit while staying here at the Homewood Suites Irvine.   Thank you so much for leaving this review and sharing your experience with us all. We genuinely appreciate (and enjoy) getting to hear back from our guests. Your opinions and insight help us to stay on top of our game.  We hope you all will join us again, no matter the reason. You are sure to have another great visit again the next time you are in Orange County. We look forward to seeing you all again!  Best, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We were in town for a combination of business and leisure and the Homewood Suites was an excellent place to stay.  I have had a number of business trips to Southern California and my wife's family lives in Orange County, so we have stayed in many places -- but I would stay this is one of the best values around.  It was not perfect, however -- in fact there were three issues: 1) ants in the bathroom -- having stayed in SoCal a lot, this is not uncommon, so nothing to freek out about, but still . . . 2) the toilet needed to be repaired (handle came off and I wasn't able to fix it myself) -- they came quickly to repair . . . 3) the air conditioner was oddly loud, with a low vibration -- my wife could not sleep with it running (fortunately not that hot, so we were ok and didn't
Manager Response: Greetings, TKB71!  We genuinely appreciate your time in leaving this review on your recent visit. Feedback is what keeps us staying on our A-game here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. That being said, we apologize that there were some low points in your visit. We are glad to hear that our team was able to resolve some of them for you and we are sorry for the things  we could not resolve. We will do our best next time to place you and your family in a more ideal suite for a good night's rest.  Thank you so very much for the feedback regarding our team. While we have a lovely, new(er) property here in Irvine, we feel it is our stellar team members that truly sets us apart. We are always here to make you feel welcome!  We hope you will give us the opportunity to give you an even better stay next time. We'll be here for you!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: My family of 4 stayed here for a lacrosse tournament and I was pleasantly surprised at the size and cleanliness of the rooms as well as the warmth and hospitality of the Homewood suites team members. We signed back up to stay the following weekend due to the positive experience!
Manager Response: Greetings, Mrs. Lowe!  We are so happy that you and the family had such a good visit this past weekend. We can't wait for you to check out the two bedroom suite on your next visit. That's going to be quite the treat for the family; you may not want to go back to a standard suite! Our Homewood Suites team is always here to assist you if you need anything. We are looking forward to seeing you next weekend.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Love this brand new and modern Homewood Suites in Irvine!  Staff was very nice, friendly and helpful!  The room is very spacious with nice kitchen area and walk in shower.  Location is very convenient to everywhere.  I highly recommend this hotel and will definitely come back here the next time I come visit CA.
Manager Response: Plant4AnhB, hello!  We cannot wait to see you again on your next visit! Thank you so much for taking the time to write this fabulous review and share it with us all. It means a great deal that our guests enjoyed their stay so much that they want to share it with the world! Our team looks forward to seeing you and your family again on your next trip!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Homewood Suites are typically middle-of-the-road hotels with consistently average service and amenities. Not this place. 'Helpful With a Smile' goes to whole different level here and the place is spotless and feels brand new. Breakfast is about what you'd expect at a property like this and the workout room is average but clean and well maintained. It's the immaculate facilities and freakishly helpful staff make cause me to highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: Good morning, Mr. Green!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review on your recent visit . We'll definitely take "freakish" as a compliment this time around. After all, giving guests the best experience possible is what we do! As a frequent Hilton traveler and valued Diamond member such as yourself, we imagine you visit many different properties. We are so happy we managed to stand out above others! Please think of us again the next time you are visiting Orange County, for work or for fun. You know that the Homewood Suites Irvine will be here for you next time!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Irvine Team

Summary: One of the best experiences in a hotel. Personnel made you feel like family all the time and accomodations were always clean and ready for guests. Would love to stay there again soon. Thanks for your treatment Homewoods!!!
Manager Response: Hello again, Mr. Zayas!  It was our pleasure to take care of you during your extended to visit to Irvine. We know how sometimes work plans can change in an instance and we are so pleased we were able to take care of you! We look forward to seeing you next visit to Irvine, hopefully for some fun as well! If there is ever anything that we can assist you with, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to being your Home Away from Home again next time!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: 2 bedroom suite was perfect size for family. Hot breakfast was good. Didn‚Äôt give excellent review due to check-in staff poor service attitude. Check-out staff smiles and good attitude. Dining staff good service.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, cherylr837  First and foremost, we sincerely appreciate your time in leaving this review on your visit. We are incredibly sorry to hear the check in process upon your arrival was not satisfactory nor the impression we want to set for your stay. We appreciate the feedback and will look in to the situation as a training opportunity. When you stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine, you are At Home! We want to ensure all of our guests feel comfortable and welcome from the beginning to the end of their visit.   We are pleased to hear the rest of your stay was pleasant and filled with smiles! We hope you will give us the opportunity to take care of you from start to finish another time. We look forward to seeing you another visit.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Beautiful hotel, very clean, with plenty of entertaining for the teenagers. game room was a big hit as well. rooms very very spacious and comfortable. We were here with a soccer team part of showcase, very convenient location to the soccer complex as well
Manager Response: Greetings, victoriaK2560!  Thank you kindly for sharing your experience with us while here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. There are so many aspects of our property that make for a great stay for families and teams! Our guest suites all have kitchenettes which allows for you to store lots of snacks for hungry athletes or cook some healthy meals to keep them fueled. Don't feel like cooking? No worries! We offer daily breakfast and a light dinner Monday through Thursday to save you some time and energy for what is really important.  We hope you and your family and even the whole team will join us again the next time you are visiting Irvine! You know the Homewood Suites will always be a winning combination for your needs!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Great place to stay for both work & leisure. Hotel staff were all friendly and helpful to ensure you have the best experience.  Special shoutout to Hayley from Frontdesk and Julieta from Housekeeping who always go the extra length in their own ways to make this truly my home away from home.  Free breakfast & happy food available, and a decent gym - with a water dispenser when you run out off the bottled ones. 5-10 mins drive will also bring you to many food options.
Manager Response: Greetings, MikamikaG  The Homewood Suites Irvine will always be here as your Home Away From Home! We truly appreciate your time in leaving this review regarding your visit with us. Thank you for recognizing some members of our fabulous team who do all they can to make each and every guest feel At Home. With so much to offer here, it's hard to want to leave sometimes! We are so glad our property fulfilled all your needs during your travels. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit, for work or for fun!  Sending our best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Family Friendly Facility. The spaciousness of the rooms and full kitchen facilities make this a wonderful place for families. The breakfast buffet is quite accommodating for children and hungry teenagers. Social hour is offered on Monday through Thursday only. Plan accordingly. This facility is just a nice place to be. The workout room offers more equipment than most.
Manager Response: Good morning, Healingflute  Thank you so much for the kind and thorough review on your recent visit with us. We are so pleased the whole family had a good time. Although we do not offer our Evening Reception during the weekends, there are plenty of fun and interesting dining locations around Irvine. Our front desk has lots of recommendations they would love to assist you with next time! We hope you and your family will join us again next time you find yourself in Irvine. It would be our pleasure and privilege to your Home Away From Home once more!

Summary: Not only did the room seem very homelike and enjoyable, but the fact that there was a living area with a small kitchen and full size refrigerator was a BONUS.  As a travel softball parent, this was overall the best Hotel ever stayed for out of town travel.    The hotel staff, everyone in the hotel, was very pleasant and helpful.  The mini snack store on site was so helpful to be able to purchase snacks for the room.   The complimentary breakfast was a bonus.
Manager Response: Woah, FastpitchMom209!  We cannot thank you enough for the fantastic review; we are blown away you and the family had such a great stay! We know the arduous schedule and commitment to travel that some of our team members have and we are so glad our humble Homewood Suites Irvine location could be a comfortable spot during your travels. In addition to our awesome daily breakfast, we also offer an Evening Social (Monday through Thursday) with a nightly-changing menu and drinks for both the grown-ups and kids! Hopefully the game schedule will fall on a week day some time so you can join us for that. We are looking forward to your next visit, whenever that may be!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I really can't fault this place. It was so good you start to look for faults and the best I came up with is the bedroom door overlaps the entrance to the bathroom a bit. That it... The rest is perfect. The staff are friendly and very helpful and the addition of the free breakfast and evening meal is amazing.  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear JohnXD1978  You never know what small things might make a bigger difference in the stay though! All kidding aside, we are thrilled you and your family had such a perfect stay with us. Our Homewood Suites Irvine location adds a lot of value with all we have to offer, including complimentary parking! This allows our guests to save and spend on what matters most; fun! We will look forward to your family's return the next time you are visiting Orange County. We can't wait to see you all again next visit!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Awesome Family Hotel! Fun Pool, Great Breakfast and Appetizers, Super Friendly Staff!!!
Summary: We love this place. My kiddos keep asking to come back. Whenever we need to go to an event anywhere near here, we stay here! So close to the beach, zoo, aquarium, parks, etc. But, often, we just want to stay here and play, swim, play in the game room and eat the yummy food that is included with the room stay! Did I mention the complimentary beer and wine served each evening? So great and the rooms fit our large family... and they have complete kitchens in them. Love this place.
Manager Response: Good morning, happygirl123  Happy family, happy life, right?! We are thrilled our Homewood Suites Irvine location is the best for you and your family's visits. There is so much to do in our local area and yet sometimes hanging out by the pool or relaxing in your suite is the best alternative for a good time! Whatever your plans are, you know you can wake up to a hot and tasty breakfast every day. Better yet, "wine" down with a beverage in the evening after a busy (or not so busy day) at our Reception during the week! No matter the reason for your visit, we'll be here to take the best care of you!  From our family to yours,  Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This hotel is beautiful, new however the breakfast was the worst I've had at any hotel even the lower budget La Quinta. I bypassed cheaper options and closer locations to be more comfortable but I was disappointed!
Manager Response: Good morning, Ms. Roberts  We sincerely apologize that our breakfast selection on Sunday morning fell short of your expectations and desires. Our daily breakfast creates such a great value for our guests and we are sorry to have disappointed you. We hope the compensation that our manager provided was suitable to grab breakfast with our friends and neighbor, Farmer Boys. It's always nice to have great neighbors to rely on!  We hope you will give us the opportunity to serve you better on your next visit.  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel, but located in more of a Corporate Area
Summary: We stayed here one night as we wanted to be somewhat close to LAX for an early morning flight.  This hotel appears to be brand new and was as fresh and clean as any hotel I've ever stayed.  We were warmly greeted by the front desk staff and this set the tone for an amazing stay. We even received a text the day before welcoming us. This is a nice touch!  Our room was fresh an clean and we loved the huge TVs, as well.  Breakfast was great and the seating area was very nice.  The only pause my wife and I discussed of whether we would return to this hotel was it's location.  Irvine is obviously a gorgeous city and there doesn't seem to be any bad areas anywhere close, but the property is surrounded by corporate buildings and even warehouse like structures.  Again, they were all
Manager Response: KershKomments,  Thank you for taking the time in leaving this review on your short (but sweet) stay with us. You would be correct; we do serve many local business clients thanks to the various industries around Irvine. However, due to our suite-style accommodations, we also make a great choice for families and those staying in the area long-term. Our location near the major 405 and 55 freeways give us easy access to many major attractions and beyond. Los Angeles and LAX are roughly 40 miles away. While perhaps not ideal for a one-night visit before catching a flight there, we are a great oasis of peace and quiet after spending a busy day in the bigger city of Los Angeles.  We hope you will get the chance to visit us again soon! We would love to be able to recommend all the great sites that Orange County has to offer! We're looking forward to you again next time!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, great staff, close to airprt
Summary: Loved the comfort of this clean, relatively new hotel with an attentive and helpful front desk staff. Mayra, Hayley, and Gabby were particularly helpful juggling our family multi-room needs. Close to John Wayne airport and main highways.  Perfect for us.
Manager Response: Greetings, Ralph!  It was a pleasure to host you and your family during your special weekend visit. We hope we could assist in making everything just a tad bit easier while you all enjoyed the festivities. We are pleased to hear the hotel was well-suited for your group and their needs. Much appreciation goes out to recognizing just a few of our team members who helped make the stay great! Please think of us again the next time you are all visiting Orange County. No matter the occasion, we'll be here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Bar none BEST EXPERIENCE EVER!!! I have been traveling for 25+ years for work and pleasure. While I have gotten a custom to the Hilton/Homewood Suites brand, this place stepped it up! The staff were not only friendly and professional but also super engaging. Regardless of the size of the hotel and it being full, my family appeared to be their number one priority from start to finish. Overall, making the vaca!!!   They have just become my go to spot for So Cal.
Manager Response: Protraveler1m,  What a honor! Being a seasoned traveler such as yourself, we are thrilled that we find ourselves among one of the best hotel experiences for you and your family. There are so many hotels to choose from between Irvine and Anaheim so we are thrilled to be included as one of the best. Our mission is to make each and every guest feel just as important as you described your family during your recent stay. We cannot wait to see you all again the next time you plans bring you to Orange County. While the Happiest Place on Earth is just up the freeway, you'll find the Happiest Hotel right here in Irvine! We look forward to seeing you all again soon.  Best regards, from our family to yours, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Excellent service from management to staffs... Front Desk team were phenomenal... kitchen staff were awesome. Overall service was more than excellent.. We saw nothing but smiles from everyone during ate stay.... Best crew ever!!!
Manager Response: Good morning, veloxaid!  Thank you so much for this fabulously touching review. We may offer lots of great perks like our daily breakfast, Evening Social, complimentary parking, sports court, game room, and more (!) but we certainly feel it is our amazing team members that make each stay truly exceptional. Our crew makes it their personal mission to leave each guest with a smile and a warm feeling whenever they see them. We are thrilled you got to experience this all during your recent visit. We truly appreciate your sharing it with us. We hope this means that you will stay with us again the next time you are in Irvine! We'd love to be your Home Away From Home next time.  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: My stay has been awesome. The rooms are spotless, the breakfast is excellent and the facility is well maintained. But what sets it apart is the service at the help desk. They were always attentive, cordial and nice. Anything I needed they were happy to help. They‚Äôre friendly hello each time entering the hotel made it feel like home. I want to give my special thanks to Mayra and Kim who both went above and beyond in they‚Äôre service. I will definitely come back!
Manager Response: Buenos noches, Mr. Casado!  We are so thrilled our team can make your travels a little more comfortable and homey! Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us and for recognizing some of our amazing team members. We are truly fortunate to have such folks who embody the Home Away From Home mentality to make all of our guests feel warm and welcome. You will always have a great place to stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We'll be looking forward to your next visit!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: My stay here has been great. The rooms are comfortable (the beds are the best), the food is good and most importantly the service by everyone, specially at the front desk, its something that makes me comeback every time. Kim and Mayra always make me feel as if I'm back home and treat me with a lot of courtesy and respect. They're always very attentive to my needs and try to help in any way they can. I will definitely keep coming back to the Homewood Suites at Irvine just for the great treatment I always receive.
Manager Response: Greetings, Mr. Gonzalez!  As always, it is our pleasure to host you while you travel for work. Being far from home, we understand how important it is to have help from our friendly and smiling team! We are always here should you need anything during your continued stay. Let us know if you need anything!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I would give a 5 star, however the pillows were too soft for my liking but the room was BEAUTIFUL! üòç the staff were so extremely kind and very helpful, I will definitely come back. Also great morning breakfast.
Manager Response: Good evening, Ms. Nikki!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review on your recent visit. We are so pleased that just about everything was good but we know it is important to get a great night sleep! Please let us know for next visit and we will try and find some more comfortable pillows for your night's sleep! We would love to have the opportunity to host you and your family again in your next visit to Irvine. We'll be here for you!  Our best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We only stayed a night and I wish I could have stayed longer! Awesome studio room with everything you need. Cool amenities like a basketball court, pool, and BBQ area. The staff's attentiveness was above and beyond. Breakfast could be a little better if you add a little bacon into the mix. But overall a great stay and I'm looking forward to my next stay!
Manager Response: Greetings, xxsay  We do agree with you that everything is better with bacon...We rotate our hot breakfast items daily to allow for more variety. We hope you get to stay another night and perhaps you will have a nice surprise in the morning! We are glad that your short night gave you a taste of the Suite life and look forward to being your Home Away From Home again next time!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites team

Summary: The main thing that stands out about this hotel to me is the Staff here. The are Superstars. We ended up here after our suite at the marriott was cancelled on us last minute with no phone call no notice nothing. This was on my best friends wedding day. When we arrived here at the homewood suites things instantly got better. The staff Mayra and Hayley were more then welcoming kind and caring. They listened to my concerns and took what I was telling them to heart. About 30 minutes after check in we received a call in our room just making sure everything was okay and we didn't need anything. Outstanding. They truly turned what was almost a disaster on My best friends most special day into a fantastic night. Thank you Hayley and Mayra for all that did and more. We you never really
Manager Response: Greetings, Ms. Henry!  Thank you so much for sharing this spectacular moment brought to you by kindness and hospitality on the part of our Front Desk Team. We are sorry to hear that your friend's special day was marred by the reservation mix up but we are so glad you all gave us the opportunity to rescue the night. Thank you for recognizing Hayley and Myra in particular; their great service will not go unnoticed! We hope we've cemented a place in all of our hearts and you and your friends will come visit us again. We would love the opportunity to take care of your night's stay once again!  Sending you our very best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The hotel is new . Rooms are comfortable and up to date.  Staff is great and very helpful and knowledgeable.  20% off farmer boys burgers next door. They believe in large portions enough for 2 and is all Fresh. The property is gorgeous and amenities are fantastic. Great place to stay
Manager Response: Hello, michaelbD6897VN!  Thank you so much for leaving this amazing review on your recent visit! Farmer Boys has become a great neighbor for us; I definitely like the breakfast burritos! We are approaching our three year anniversary in January and are doing our best to keep the hotel looking like new! We hope you will consider the Homewood Suites Irvine your Home Away From Home next time you are visiting Orange County. We'll be here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We had Very good experience at this hotel. good breakfast. Gym and pool were clean and not crowded . Nice staff. social evening with complimentary food. 5 star overall. 2 star for sofa bed (too soft and not able to use it)
Manager Response: Greetings, 408sanjose  Thank you so much for leaving the feedback regarding your recent trip with us. We are so happy you and your family got the real deal here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. October is a great time to visit us here in Orange County; the weather is still comfortable and the summer crowds have dissipated. We are sorry the sofa sleeper in your room was not up to our normal standard. On your next visit, should you encounter that again, please let us know! We would love the opportunity to make your stay as comfortable as possible. We look forward to your next visit!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The stay at Hilton was enjoyable. Room was very clean and well-maintained and the staffs were really friendly. The amenities provided were great too. I have enjoyed it and will definitely go back there again.
Manager Response: Greetings, Ms. Khin!  We are so pleased you enjoyed your recent work visit with us. We know how important it is to be comfortable while away from home. Please think of us as your Home Away From Home whenever you are visiting Irvine! We look forward to seeing you the next time your journeys bring you out California way.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: My room was not made up upon return around 9 pm after having been away from my room for 11 hours.  Nobody warned me ahead of time.  When I inquired at the Front Desk they didn't have an explanation and apologized.  I stopped at the Front Desk again the following morning, they said they had a very large party and were short staffed with only 3 persons to clean room.  I asked if this was bad planning on the part of the hotel....? Reception agreed.  Next day I received message of apology from manager that the reason my room was not cleaned was because a DND sign was on my door at 1:30 pm.  I reported to the Front Desk that was not true because I specifically remember removing that DND sign.  All in all, an apology is just not enough when I return to my room and my room is not
Manager Response: Greetings and hello, Ms. Hedy  We appreciate your time in leaving this review and providing your feedback regarding your stay this past weekend. Being one of the best hotels in Irvine is something that we strive for every, single day! Your input helps us to maintain that status.  In regards to the housekeeping situation, we apologize that your room did not get serviced on day two of your three-night stay. We do let guests know about the limited nature of our housekeeping services As our manager did inform you, housekeeping reported that the Do Not Disturb sign was on your door during their property walk at 7am on Sunday and again at 12:30pm. We appreciate your patronage to our Homewood Suites location as a Hilton Gold Member and awarded your Honors account with 5,000 points for the inconvenience.   If you have any additional questions or concerns, please feel free to reach out to the property directly so we may best assist you. We hope you will grant us the opportunity to wow you with a slightly more comfortable stay next time.   Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I've been at this hotel for almost two months now during training to start my first job. The people at this hotel make it feel like home. The front desk workers tell me good morning and ask me how my day at work went. They're there to wish me good luck and to greet me when I'm back. The housekeeping services leave sweet notes and are so accommodating of my sometimes quite messy room. This hotel is best case scenario for a long stay, or even a short weekend because of it's great location. But the people here have made California feel like home and welcomed me here so warmly. My time here truly would not have been the same without them!!
Manager Response: Dear Allie,  We are so touched by your kind words and are thrilled we have helped to make California feel a little more like home. We welcome so many different travels from all over the United States and the world! It is our mission to make everyone feel like the Homewood Suites Irvine is a place to call home.   We are glad to hear that so many members of the team have also made you feel at home, in whatever way they can. We really enjoy getting to know our guests, no matter how long they are visiting. We hope California will hold a special place in your memory, or just come back again and make some more! You will always have a home away from home with us.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I stayed for 6 weeks with coworkers and it was a great experience! The staff was welcoming and knew us by name quickly! Very accommodating and made us feel at home during our long stay. Nice facilities too! We frequently used the grills and fire to make dinner and s‚Äômores. There is also free wine and beer Mon-Thurs!  The pool was very clean. You have the option of everyday cleaning service if you‚Äôd like.  Good place for families and the location isn‚Äôt too far from Newport Beach and Laguna Beach. Would definitely recommend a rental car for your stay. Overall a great hotel, especially for business trips.
Manager Response: Hello, christina763518!  Business or fun, the Homewood Suites has you taken care of! It sounds like you made the most of some of our fun amenities during your stay like our outdoor fire pit and pool area with grills. What a lovely way to spend the last few weeks of summer then outside in the California sun! While we conveniently offer complimentary parking to our guests, we also have a free shuttle service that runs within three miles of the hotel. This can sometimes be a nice option for those staying and working close by. However, we are glad you and the group got some vehicles to venture out further and explore more of Southern California :D  We hope you will have the opportunity to visit us again another time. We would love the chance to be your Home Away From Home next visit!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The Homewood hotel looks and feels new but without going to the newer hotel refurbishments where they‚Äôve lost the original Chain idea.  Good location for business in this area. Social evening meal was very goo but even better were curtesy and attention from the staff (Itzy/Tania/Hailey).
Manager Response: Greetings, Guillermo!  Thank you for your kind words and for reviewing your recent experience. We are approaching our 3-year anniversary and are so pleased the property feels fresh and new still! Thank you for the shout out to some of the team members who have made your stay great so far. If there is anything else you should need during your visit, we are here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Where to start?! I stayed at Homewood Suites in Irvine for 7 weeks and I had quite a wonderful stay. The staff was incredibly accomodating and went above and BEYOND every single day! They made me feel like family and I cannot express how appreciative I am of their genuine care and attention.   The hotel is beautiful with a convenient location right next to John Wayne and a 15-20 minute drive from Newport Beach. The gym and pool were always clean and I can't tell you how many times I spent bumming poolside! Not to mention the wonderful happy hours and the newly renovated game room. Take advantage of these perks on your stay!  Always with smiles on their faces, the front desk staff, kitchen staff, and cleaning staff created a warm and comfortable environment for my entire stay. I
Manager Response: Hello, Kerry!  It was quite sad to see you and some of the others depart us last week; we are so glad you had such a great stay and hopefully some fond memories! Thank you for taking the time to share it all with us and with the Trip Advisor community. Despite being in Orange County for work, you all made the most out of your visit. It was so fun to hear the adventures you all went on during the weekends. There was definitely some fun had during your visit!  Thank you for recognizing just a few of the team members that impacted your stay. Our team works diligently to make each and every guest feel at home, no matter how long they are with us! We hope you will be able to come visit again and have another fabulous stay experience. It would be our pleasure to be your Home Away From Home again.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I came here with my wife for an extended stay of 2 months for work. The service and hospitality was OUTSTANDING. Every day I left with a "have a wonderful day" and returned with a "welcome home." This truly felt like a home away from home. The staff is incredible-- James, Caroline, Mayra, Hayley, and Gabby are an absolute dream team. Hayley was especially fantastic upon our arrival and throughout our stay, making sure my wife and I were settled in the just right room and always checking in. If you are in Orange County for business, vacation, or just a weekend away, there is honestly no better place to stay.
Manager Response: Greetings, Mr. Feeks!  Big thank yous to you and the Mrs. for leaving us such splendid feedback on your recent visit. We are thrilled we could make you both feel At Home while you have been away. We are so glad so many of our team members made a special impact in your experience. While there are plenty of nice hotels in Irvine, there's only one Homewood Suites with so many special team members! We hope you will have the opportunity to join us again next time you visit Orange County. We'll always be here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I stayed at the hotel for about 2 months while my husband was here for work and any time I visit from now on I plan on staying here! The staff is phenomenal, they're personable, helpful, and attentive, willing to go above and beyond to help their guests out no matter how small or great the request. The staff always greet guests by name and Hayley helped us out in an awesome way by helping us find a room that better suited our needs. The cleaning crew is very thorough and always friendly and extremely polite, whenever we meet in the hallways they always make sure to greet me! The breakfast and cocktail hour are always great and can make a great substitute for going out and spending or taking time to make your own dinner. The pool and game room are great places to relax, they even
Manager Response: Greetings, Mrs. Feeks!  It has been our pleasure to be yours and the whole group's Home Away From Home during your trip out to Irvine. We are so thrilled that we could make such a great lasting impression for you. We understand the importance of feeling comfortable and at home during a long visit like yours. Thank you for recognizing our hard-working staff who has helped enhance the whole experience. We certainly hope we will get the opportunity to see you both again for another visit to the Orange County area. We'll be here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the entire Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Great location easy access to freeways. Quiet even through it's close to the airport. Staff is friendly and helpful. Rooms are clean and spacious with a lot of enmities.  Breakfast is included, with fresh baked waffles!
Manager Response: Greetings, Janet!  Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience. We are thrilled you had such a great stay! While we may be near the flight path of incoming flights to Santa Ana Airport, you'd never know with our newer-built facilities! It can be quite fun to sit by the outdoor pool area and gaze up to see the planes swoop by. We hope you will join us again for another homey experience with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We'll be sure to have a waffle ready for you!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Had such an amazing stay at this hotel
Summary: Hayley and all the staff at the Homewood Suites were incredible host. I had an extended stay and they made me feel at home and very special. They really care about their guest and show it every way they can. The hotel was immaculate, the staff took pride maintaining the appearance and welcoming environment. Rooms were always serviced in exceptional timing, and the staff are always ready to serve. This by far is the best hotel in Irvine.
Manager Response: Good morning, Ms. Hall!  It was our pleasure to be your Home Away From Home during your recent stay for work. We are so glad our hard work and dedication to providing exceptional service in a clean and friendly environment continues to shine through! We appreciate your time in considering in sharing your experience with us all. We hope you will come visit us again next time you find yourself out in California. We'd love to see you again!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The best choice for an extended stay! The staff is friendly, attentive and always welcomes and sends you off with a smile. If they can do anything to make this hotel feel like home they will, I can‚Äôt express how phenomenal they all are!   There is free breakfast everyday, a complimentary happy hour Monday-Thursday and free coffee at all times! It is located right off the freeway which makes it quick and easy to get onto your daily adventure. Highly recommend staying here, whether it‚Äôs for business, personal, alone or with family!
Manager Response: Hello, dianacitlic!  I couldn't have said it better myself! Our studios and suites are set up all manner and lengths of stay; from extended stays to just a few nights, and you can always bring the family! Our Evening Social during the week days is a great way to unwind and relax with friends or mingle and make new ones! No matter, our superb team will be here to take care of you. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you'll think of us again the next time you are visiting Irvine!  Looking forward to your next stay, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This has easily been the best hotel stay I‚Äôve experienced. The entire staff is extremely friendly and have truly made this extended stay feel like home. They are always helpful and welcoming and greet me by name. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Greetings Sydney!  Well, you have definitely been At Home with us during your recent work trip. We certainly hope you and the gang have enjoyed your time out here in California and we were thrilled to be a part of it. We hope you will come visit us again soon for fun! Know that you'll always have a place here with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Irvine team

Summary: This Homewood Suites in Irvine,Ca it‚Äôs in a great location. Nearby Disneyland, beaches, malls, Knotts, LA County, Riverside County. Stay for the overnight, arrived late, the parking is spacious and well lighted. Great and friendly staff at check in, offered options about room location-you can tell she knows the hotel-sorry I forgot her name-. She told us about the hotel amenities like breakfast time and options,either at the hotel OR at Farmers Boys-discount coupon given! Free WiFi, pool hours, and offered to have any additional items(towels) sent to suite. The suite is spacious, very clean, comfortable bedding and sheets, the pullout sofa bed was comfortable, and each room-yes you can lock the door! has its own tv! The next morning the encounter with the housekeepers in the
Manager Response: Greetings, Odar17!  The Homewood Suites is set up for you to stay way more than just one night!
