While it was short, we are glad you enjoyed the Suite Life in your one-bedroom during your visit. Our location in Irvine is a great jumping off point to explore all parts of Orange County; there's so much to see! Please come visit us again the next time you and the family journey out our way. You know a great stay and warm hospitality will be waiting for you here!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The hotel is in an excellent location.  The staff is very friendly.  Breakfast was good plenty selection.  The rooms were clean and the beds were so comfortable.  The overall hotel was spotless and had a great atmosphere. I recommend hands down.
Manager Response: Greetings, Maria!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review on your recent stay. We are so happy you got the full Home Away From Home experience; a good night's sleep and tasty breakfast surrounded by family and your friends at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We hope to become your go-to spot whenever you are visiting Orange County. You know you'll always be in for a great stay with us! We are looking forward to seeing you and your family again next visit.  Wishing you the very best, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The service here was definitely exceptional! Mayra and Hayley were very good to my team and I. They gave us the warmest welcome and the most accommodating attitude. We felt very comfortable and welcome during our stay with the hospitable service. I will definitely be booking here again! :)
Manager Response: Greetings, Mattsalcedo!  One of the many mantras we live by here at the Homewood Suites Irvine is when you are here,  you are with family! We are so glad Myra and Hayley took care of you and your team just like they would their own. We hope you found everything else to your comfort and enjoyment during your visit with us. Please be sure to keep us in mind the next time you and your group are in Orange County. Our friendly team will be here waiting for you next trip!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Great property with Exceptional customer service!
Summary: A fabulous weekend getaway at this Homewood Suite...staff were all genuinely friendly, and Gabriella was exceptional - We requested fresh towels from her at the front and instead of just calling housekeeping for us, she brought us the towels herself & took away the soiled ones. I‚Äôm sure that was not part of her duty at the front desk but her attentiveness was greatly appreciated.  Definitely will recommend this property to our friends & family.
Manager Response: Greetings and hello, Sandi!  Thank you so much for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine location for your recent getaway. We are so glad you and your family could enjoy some time away with us! Here at Irvine, we are all family and sometimes being family means pitching in! Our housekeeping staff works incredibly hard daily and it's my (and the rest of our team's) pleasure to help them whenever possible. At the end of the day, it helps our guests get what they need faster and saves our housekeeping team a little time. However, we are so glad this small gesture made a big impact in your experience with us. We hope you and your family will stay with us again next time you are able to get away. We'll be here to take care of you!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Irvine Team

Summary: The hotel is very nice and comfortable. Good breakfast. Located very close to the airport. Thanks so much James, Debbie and Ed for your support and positive attitude while I was having car problems. You helped me beyond expectations. Will be happy to stay with you again!
Manager Response: Greetings, Mrs. Ofek!  It was our pleasure to be your Home Away From Home while you were working nearby. We are so glad the convenience and comfort of our hotel made your week-long stay that much better. We are sorry that the week did not end a little better with your car troubles. We are so happy we could do our part to try and alleviate the problem. We look forward to seeing you again next time, with a little less stress! You will know for the next visit that you have a great place to stay with friends here at the Homewood Suites Irvine.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: And its here at the Homewood Suites. The room is comfortable and the hotel clean and well run. But the staff out shine it all. Check in, social hour, breakfast and check out all staff have customer service down to a T! I want to especially thank Ms. Hayley for showing what top notch looks like. Hope I have the opportunity to stay here again.
Manager Response: Greetings and hello, JTW0557  What a powerful title! You are correct; hospitality is alive and well here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We are fortunate to have a team who truly embodies that warm and caring lifestyle. When you are staying here, you are staying at your Home Away From Home. Thank you for recognizing one of our special front desk agents who made such a great impact in your stay! We can't wait to see you and your family again on your next visit!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We were celebrating our daughters wedding.  The staff were fantastic.  The facility was clean and inviting.  The rooms were comfortable.  The location was perfect and close to venues.  The food was delicious and great variety.
Manager Response: Greetings, ash0aks!  It was our honor and pleasure to celebrate your daughter's wedding alongside your family. We had so much fun decorating and hopefully creating that special moment when they returned that evening. We hope that the Homewood Suites Irvine will hold a special place in their memories as the place they first stayed at as a married couple! Please bring the family back for the next happy occasion. We would love the opportunity to be your Home Away From Home for the next event.   Our warmest regards, from our family to yours, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Stayed here for an interview nearby. The staff was very personable and ensured that my stay was excellent. I came in on Thursday and they had a great dinner set out. Woke up the next morning and was able to get my jog on in the exercise room and eat a classic breakfast. Went out for the day and came back for a nice swim and a relaxing time in the hot tub. It was overall a great experience and I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Birdleydean,  Wow! What a perfectly relaxing and enjoyable stay you had with us! We are thrilled you had such a great visit with us and got some R&R in following your interview. We know how important it is to recharge before and after a long work day! Even better, it sounds like you landed the interview, which means we'll be seeing you again! The Homewood Suites Irvine location will be here to be your Home Away From Home again the next time you travel to the area. Looking forward to your next visit!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Loved the staff and the suite. Everything was so clean and beautiful. Gabby was always so helpful when I needed work accommodations or places to eat around town. The staff always greeted me by name and with a smile on their face. I will definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Greetings, Jennifer!  It was our treat to host you and get to know you over your week-long visit. Just as much as we are here for you, it is nice for us to get to know our guests! I am so glad that I could be of a little extra help to you during your stay. I do have an advantage of being a local and of course know all the great spots to visit near the hotel! :D We are so glad that our team made a difference in your stay, especially since you were away for work purposes. We are certainly looking forward to seeing you again, hopefully for fun! Bring the family so you can enjoy more of what Orange County has to offer.  Till next time...from our family to yours Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Great stay! Very helpful staff, especially James!
Summary: I stayed at this hotel during a business trip in Jan 2019. I was really impressed at the helpfulness of the staff. In particular, James from the front desk particularly helped me out ensuring that my trip was successful. I had an interview and had packed a full business suit but forgot to carry my belt. Without that all my meetings would have felt awkward. By the time I realized that I was missing a belt in my suitcase, it was too late to go out to shop for one. James solved my problem by offering to share his belt for my meetings in the morning. This is a great example of a hotel employee who went above and beyond in order to ensure that my trip was successful. I am happy to express my heartfelt gratitude to James and highly recommend this hotel to other travelers.
Manager Response: Greetings, rrajgarhia  Let us tell you, this is one of our favorite stories to tell because it is such a wonderful example of how our team embodies customer service and dedication. It may have been a while since your stay but we are so happy that this event still remains in your thoughts. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your story with us and the rest of the Trip Advisor community. We hope (and know) James and other members of our team will make the same kind of impression in another guest's stay; it's just what we do!  We hope you will visit us again the next time you are in Irvine. You have to tell us how your interview went!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We stayed for a week and our stay couldn‚Äôt have been better. Nice room and the housekeeper, Lucina, who cleaned our room was top notch. The front desk staff was wonderful. Haley greeted us with a smile and was very knowledgeable with any questions we had. Best front desk agent we‚Äôve ever experienced. Gabby was just wonderful as well. She always greeted us by name. We will definitely come back to this hotel when we are in the area.
Manager Response: Mr. Koeff,  It was a real pleasure to host you and your wife while you took a stroll down memory lane in California. We are thrilled our Homewood Suites location in Irvine was the perfect fit for your week-long stay. We want to thank you for taking the time to leave this review on your visit. We sincerely appreciate it and are thrilled our team left such a great impression. We hope to see you again the next time you are able to get away from work and spend some time in the sun. We'll certainly be here for you next time!  Sending our warmest regards, from our family to yours Gabby & the Homewood Suites team

Summary: Nice place, everything clean, nice happy hour. Employees are very generous and friendly. Thanks to Hayley & James.... Resuming Facilities are very clean , accessible to near shopping areas and major roads.
Manager Response: Greetings, Paradise282781!  Thank you so very much for taking the time to leave this wonderful review. We appreciate guests sharing their in-depth experiences so we can continue to grow and remain one of the best hotels in Orange County!  Thank you for recognizing two members of our fantastic Front Desk team who made a special impression during your stay. We will certainly pass your compliments (and then some) on to them!  We hope you will think of us again the next time you find yourself near MacArthur & Red Hill in Irvine! We look forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Been here for the past 5 months on business and have never experienced anything like this. From Caroline, Gabby, and Haley at the front desk, to Itzy, Kaysee, and Tania in the kitchen, and let's not forget my housekeeper Patricia. All perform above and beyond in all aspects of customer service. Friendly, Jovial, and outgoing are only a few words to describe them all. Great Place, Clean Rooms, Excellent Atmosphere... Highly recommend you stay here as you won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Greetings, BigR60  My, my, how the time flies. Thank you SO much for such a fabulous review. We are thrilled that so many of our team members made a special impact on your visit. Here at the Homewood Suites Irvine, we have a fabulous team who make it their personal mission to make guests feel at home during their stay. Thank you for recognizing so many of us.   We hope the winds of travel bring you our way again, for work or for play. We hope that we'll all be here to greet you with open arms and warm smiles.  Our very best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Simply the Best! Fantastic Caring Staff and Beautiful Rooms!
Summary: Where do I start with all the things they are doing right at this property. First off, they texted prior to arrival to see if I needed anything or had any special request so they could have anything ready if desired. The friendly front desk staff were top notch! The room was just fantastic. Comfortable beds, a sofa, full kitchen with everything you might need to cook. A full residential size refrigerator (not some mini bar frig) but just like at home. Work station with charging outlets for cell phone, and tablets. They thought of everything. The bathroom was modern, elegant and very nice. They also have a wonderful pool/spa area.  Some of the bonus features is PARKING is always FREE! There is plenty of space for everyone. Next up is the FREE BREAKFAST! I'm not talking about some
Manager Response: Vinny C!  Reading your review made us so happy! Thank you so much for leaving us such an amazingly detailed review. We definitely appreciate the positive reinforcement. There are so many great aspects of our location that you touched on; I don't even know where to begin.  Free parking is really a great perk that we are thrilled to be able to offer. That leaves a little bit of funds each day for something more fun than parking charges. Speaking of fun, we love our complimentary daily breakfast! Each day has a varying hot dishes. Certain days we offer yummy biscuits and gravy, customizable sandwiches, a make-your-own waffle bar and more! But seriously, the enchiladas are definitely my favorite. Not to mention, Monday through Thursday, we offer an Evening Reception with drinks that also features a rotating menu. All these little amenities go a long way in making our guests satisfied and helping them save a few dollars.   Thank you for enjoying our Home Away From Home experience and sharing it with us all. We supply the phenomenal guest experience but we depend on guests like yourself to spread the word. You and others are certainly the reason why we remain one of the top hotels in Orange County! We are certainly looking forward to your next visit.  Warmest regards, from our family to yours, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Excellent stay. Front desk staff was amazing. So friendly, accommodating, insightful and helpful. Hotel is in good condition and there was great thought put into the details. My only constructive feedback would be a sign on the game room letting you know the front desk needs to escort you (your key won‚Äôt open it). I used digital key and it looks like it has a digital key reader. digital key can be a bit tricky sometimes so I assumed my key as having issues, I stopped 3 times (in passing just trying to see if the room would be appropriate to show my kids) trying to get my key to work. It was much appreciated that the front desk also had some board games to borrow, as the game room turned out to be geared for a bit older kids than our 4, 6 and 8 year old. They had an amazing time
Manager Response: Greetings, dkrasemann  Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine for your family's end-of-summer getaway. We are so glad everything was just right for you and the kids. Whether it is spending time playing in the pool, shooting hoops in the basketball court, or relaxing in the lodge, there is an activity for everyone!  We appreciate your feedback regarding the game room door and would love to pass the suggestion on to our management. We are always searching for ways to improve our guest's experience and we think your idea is fantastic! We hope to have that implemented by the time you visit us again. Please join us again the next time you and the family are visiting the Orange County area. We'll be here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Hotel OK, External Services Sadly Lacking
Summary: Homewood Suites is a good night‚Äôs stay with kitchenettes‚Äîideal for coming into town for a short stay (like for a funeral).  Not close to much other than the airport.  WARNING: if you need a ride to the airport before 0600, make your own arraignments.  The shuttle does not run before 0600 so we asked the front desk to schedule a ride.  They took the room number and time and all, but in the morning the desk attendant just then started trying to line up an Uber.  After 10 minutes of futzing about, we broke out our own phone and called an Uber which took a full 15 minutes to arrive.  The extra 25 minutes added to the anxiety of catching an early flight.  The front desk clerk in the morning had NO CLUE how to call a taxi nor how to do anything other than suggest we call an Uber.
Manager Response: Greetings, BorregoSailor  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review on your recent experience with us. We take each guest review as a chance to better our facilities and guest services. We are pleased to hear that you had a mostly enjoyable stay and are sorry to hear that it was a somber reason that brought you to our location.  Due to our location a little further out from the airport and the hours of operation of John Wayne Airport, we do not offer 24-hour shuttle service. We begin services at 6am when our morning team comes on. We are pleased to offer complimentary Uber rides to the airport when the occasional need arrives. We apologize that the morning you required an Uber ride we were experiencing issues with our internet services, interfering with our desk agents ability to order you an Uber on the hotel's account. We do try and refrain from recommending taxi rides because from our past experiences, they are less reliable and take longer to arrive compared to the ubiquitous Uber drivers. Again, we are sorry that this situation marred an otherwise pleasant experience with us. We will certainly take this situation as a learning opportunity to better set up our night audit staff for future situations like these.  We hope you will join us again the next time you find yourself in Irvine (under better circumstances) so we can provide you with a better experience. We take guest satisfaction to heart at the Homewood Suites Irvine location. Thank you again for your time in sharing your experience with us.  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites team

Summary: Today is Sat, Aug 31, 2019. I don't check out until Mon, Sep 2, 2019, but this experience requires a review now.  This is my third stay (of many more to come) at this property.  Quick breakdown:  Free breakfast, incredibly clean property from the rooms to all the facilities. Location is awesome with Costco, Walmart and SEVERAL shopping plazas nearby. Only a short drive to Newport Beach or Huntington Beach.  They also have a basketball court, nice pool and grills. We took full advantage of the grill and they provided some utensils for grilling.   I have literally never had a better experience at any property, brand or anywhere in the service industry, period.  The entire staff is phenomenal and that is probably an understatement.   Specifically three people:  Mayra is brand new
Manager Response: Mr. Douglas,  Words cannot adequately express our gratitude that you took time out of your relaxation and visiting with family to compose this review. We are not always privy to the impact that we make on our guest's experiences and this is review is certainly above and beyond!  Our Homewood Suites Irvine location is grateful to have an entire team of individuals where going above and beyond is simply part of their nature. It is safe to say that those who you mentioned are just a few of the individuals here who make guest satisfaction their personal mission; although Hayley, myself, and Myra definitely appreciate the person shout-out :D.  We hope you have enjoyed the rest of your stay with us here in Orange County and it's pretty safe to say that we look forward to being your Home Away From Home next year when you all come to visit again.   Warmest regards, from our family to yours Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: excellent location, very accessible prices.  rooms cleaning is excellence.  there is great attitude from the personnel of the hotel, they are very friendly. Location is perfect for business since is close to the major medical device companies in the Irvine area.
Manager Response: Greetings, bedalinlugo  We so very much appreciate your time in leaving this guest review. Your review helps us remain as one of the best hotels in the Irvine and Orange County area! We couldn't do it without guests like yourself. There are a great many businesses here in Irvine that we are within close proximity too but ELS has to be the closest! Any time you visit Irvine, you know you will have a warm and comfy Home Away From Home to visit! We look forward to being here for you next time.  Our very best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Irvine Team

Summary: I stayed here on business with my colleagues visiting a nearby supplier. The location to the airport was great and accommodations at the hotel were excellent. My room was spacious and comfortable. I would definitely recommend staying here for any length of time.
Manager Response: Greetings, Plinnehan!  We greatly appreciate your time in leaving this review regarding your recent visit. You can rest-assure that the next time you visit Irvine, you will have a comfortable and cozy place to stay. The thought is made even sweeter when you  know there is tasty dinner and drinks waiting for you at our Evening Reception (Monday through Thursday)! Our studios and suites are good for any length of stay; complete with full-sized fridges, electric cook-tops, and all kinds of utensils to cook up a feast. Here at the Homewood Suites Irvine, we do our very best to make you feel At Home during your stay, no matter how long!  We are looking forward to your next visit!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: On of the best Hilton properties I've stayed at. First time at a Homewood Suites and won't be my last. My hotel of choice for Hilton properties. Spacious rooms and a full kitchen with a beautiful bathroom!
Manager Response: Good morning, JLG3rd!  What a fantastic review! We are so pleased we could make you a believer of the Homewood Suites Irvine. With free breakfast daily, light dinner and drinks (Monday through Thursday), a cool game room, and a beautiful outdoor area with pool, hot tub, fire pit, and a sports court, what is that not to love?! We've have it all for our guests here at the Homewood Suites Irvine! Thank you for giving us the chance to w-o-w you during your visit.   Please join us again as your go-to property here in Orange County. You know a great stay will be waiting for you! We look forward to your next visit!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I stumbled in the door after midnight and I'm so happy I did. Unlike another hotel in the area which was the model for inefficiency, this was a very large two room suite WITH A BEDROOM DOOR. Everything was very well thought out and a great buy for the money.
Manager Response: Greetings, stillreport!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review on your recent stay with us. We really appreciate your sharing your experience with us. Stay longer next time so you can really enjoy your stay with us! It's a bummer to only have a single, late night in our humongous bedroom suites. Bring friends or the family next time! No matter how late your night is, we have you covered with a hot breakfast in the morning.  We hope you will join us again whenever you find yourself in Irvine. We look forward to hosting you next visit!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Great hotel but with a small flaw
Summary: I'm not sure why this hotel has such a high rating.  Don't get me wrong the hotel is great and it's very clean and the staff is very friendly but there are somethings that need some addressing.  The breakfast experience needs some improvement.  The breakfast area is very chaotic.  The area to get your food is small and during the peak times it's quite busy with people coming and going.  The waffle griddles were having some issues with under-cooking and sticking to the griddles.  The staff saw the issue but no one came in to take a look or to offer any help.  The line ended up being very long and I almost missed out on breakfast due to being in the line for such a long time.  When my family went down on Saturday it was so crowded they were running out of things, muffins, cream
Manager Response: Greetings, jingoro31  Thank you for selecting the Homewood Suites Irvine during your family's recent staycation. We are glad to hear that your family enjoyed your stay and found the hotel to be quite comfortable. We are sorry to hear your experiences with our complimentary breakfast were not up to par. We love that we can offer our guests a hot and delicious breakfast every single day of your stay. If there are discrepancies between what is advertised as available and what we have on property, we would like to know how and where so we could can look in to correcting that. Feel free to contact myself or our Front Office Manager, Caroline, to provide us with that information. We are in the final throws of summer and weekends may still be a little busy. The breakfast area can still be a little packed, especially during the later morning hours. Thankfully we do offer slightly later hours on the weekend so you can get a little more shut eye  We hope you and your family will join us again next time you visit Irvine, as we start to quiet down. We would enjoy the opportunity to give you a 5 out of 5 stay!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We absolutely loved our stay at this wonderful hotel on a vacation to the beach and Disneyland! We got our times mixed up one morning for breakfast and went down as they were cleaning up. Lesenia and Veronica, the ladies working in the breakfast area, were amazing! They went out of their way to bring out plates of food for my kids and I and were  so patient to wait for us to eat so they could finish cleaning up. I highly recommend this hotel as their staff is so helpful and friendly! Thanks Lesenia and Veronica!
Manager Response: Hello Mamaedes!  Thank you so much for sharing this very touching review with us! All of our team members certainly go the lengths to ensure our guests are happy and taken care of. We appreciate hearing how two of our special crew made a special impact in your visit. We'll be sure to pass your sentiments along to Veronica and Llesenia. These are stories that let us all know that when guests stay at the Homewood Suites Irvine, they are truly At Home! We certainly hope you and your family will join us again on your next visit to Orange County. We'll be here waiting for you with tasty, hot breakfast and lots of smiles!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: People at the Homewood suites are great- helpful front desk folks including  Hayley and Chavelly. Others like the man that works the day shift do not know enough about important customer service items like if housekeeping cleans daily (they do not). The food is better than typical Hilton brand food with M-Th snacks and drinks (not good but effective). Overall this is a nice place with nice rooms and a fun pool and hot tub area.
Manager Response: Greetings, Lee  Thank you for selecting the Homewood Suites Irvine location during your recent visit. We appreciate your feedback and the opportunity to continue growing and expanding our team's ability to make every guest stay the best! We will be following up with our team to ensure proper information is being given at all times. We're so glad you were able to enjoy many of the great amenities that our property has to offer. Hopefully you got a round of pool (the game) in at our game room during the evening.  Please be sure to join us again the next time you travel to Southern California. We'd love the chance to be your Home Away From Home again next visit.  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: At an easy to reach location we used one of the suites The suite had a fully equipped kitchen, large fridge and seoerate bedroom with two queen  beds The bathroom is a little outaged but very clean Housekeeping very friendly and helpfull The breakfast is not overdone but sufficient and fresh fruit is acaikable Nice place to be
Manager Response: Greetings, FellowTraveler687937!  We appreciate your review of your stay with us here at the Homewood Suites Irvine location. Here we have several different types of rooms to best fit your family's needs. We are glad our bedroom suite, with separated living room space, was the right fit for yours! You definitely can't beat having two t.v.s in your room. We hope you and your family will choose us again the next time you visit Southern California. Hopefully the Los Angeles Dodgers will do a bit better next time! Or maybe you can check out a new sport? There's nothing like catching a hockey game at the Honda Center in Anaheim!  We look forward to hosting you and your family again next trip, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: It is my first time at this hotel and definitely will go back on my next visit... The hotel is in a nice place and is super clean. The staff from housekeeping and restaurant are amazing and very helpful... Special thanks to Caroline at the front desk for her wonderful support during our stay.. i really recommend this nice and super clean hotel Thank you guys for making our stay super comfortable
Manager Response: Greetings, Rami460!  Thank you so much for writing this amazing review regarding your recent visit with us. We are so pleased you and the family had such a great stay. Caroline would be so happy to hear that herself and her team made a difference in your experience; we will be sure to let her know! Our whole team works very hard to ensure our guests enjoy their stays in our clean and comfortable guest suites. We take pride in being one of the newer hotels in the area and want to keep it looking that way!  We hope you and your family will join us again the next time you visit Irvine! Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: When we traveled to Southern California recently, our hotel choice during our visit there, without any hesitation, was once again Homewood Suites in Irvine!!!  Upon arriving there, we were warmly, affectionately and enthusiastically greeted by Gabby and Joe, and a short time later by Hayley and Carolyn.  We fondly remembered them, and they most fondly remembered us from our previous stay last September.... they all made us feel most welcome!!  They are a great staff!! Once again, our accommodations were just wonderful....a very clean room (thank you so much Patricia M.) that was spacious and quiet with a large shower and a most comfortable bed.  Our room on the fourth floor overlooked the pool and barbecue area.  The well tended, full breakfast offered along with the evening
Manager Response: Mr. & Mrs. McCall,  It is with great pleasure and joy that we got to welcome you both back to the Homewood Suites Irvine. We are so glad everything was just as good the second time around! We are so glad some of the same familiar and smiling faces were able to welcome you back, despite the fact that your visit was another solemn event. We really truly hope you two will join us for a little well-deserved "R&R"!  Thank you for the lovely review of the property in addition to the wonderful team members here. We work hard to keep everything as new as the day we opened in 2017. We know there are a lot of choices for hotels in Irvine and we strive to be the best. Your return testament is an example of how our guest rooms, amenities, and warm service are the best combination for a perfect hotel stay.   Please, please join us again for some fun in the sun here in Orange County. We really look forward to seeing you both the next time!  Warmest regards (and hugs), Gabby & the entire Homewood Suites Team

Summary: My husband travels for work so we have primarily stayed in Hilton hotels for about 15 years. When we travel as a family we prefer Homewood Suites since it gives us a full fridge and free breakfast. This Homewood Suites was just a little better though. It was the little things. There are always 4 of us, yet routinely hotels leave us 3 towels even if we've asked for more. However this time our exceptional  housekeeper, Alicia Alba, made sure we had plenty of towels without asking. The room was always clean after we returned from our day. The breakfast offered plain eggs every morning. Many locations will add bacon, ham, cheese or whatever to BOTH sets. This location offered one plain option and one other option for eggs. The food was warm, which hasn't always been the case in
Manager Response: Dear tiggerfan1,  Woohoo! Thank you for such a great review on your family's recent with us here in Irvine! As seasoned Hilton travelers, we are so glad we could stand out from the pack. We are a newer property in the area and so our facilities are still fresh and new. What shows more is our teams committed to providing excellent service to all of our guests. Thank you so much for recognizing Alicia who went above and beyond to anticipate your family's needs. We will be sure to give her a big shout out, and then some!  We are certainly a great option for those traveling to the Happiest Place on Earth. We are only roughly 11 miles from the park area but certainly quieter! If you want to take a break from the hustle and bustle of Disneyland, we are just a short jump on the freeway to several our beautiful local beaches. No matter what you want to do, our Irvine location is close to the action! We hope you will join us again the next time you and the family are in Orange County. We'll be here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: My husband and I traveled to California for vacation.  As we were flying into John Wayne after 10 pm, we decided to spend our first night at an airport hotel.  We chose this hotel based on its close proximity to the airport and excellent reviews on TripAdvisor.  The following are highlights from our stay:  Positives: - New hotel; a clean, modern property - Location:  A quick 5 minute drive from the airport - Our studio suite was large and offered an open floor plan including a fully equipped kitchen (with a refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher and stove), a living area and a work space - Very comfortable bed - Complimentary Wi-Fi - Complimentary hot breakfast - Complimentary parking - Fitness center - Outdoor pool and hot tub - Outdoor basketball court - Onsite snack shop
Manager Response: Greetings, CherryTravels17  Thank you so much for the sweet review! We appreciate you sharing your experience with us here at the property and with the TripAdvisor community. We strive to be one of the best hotels in Orange County and your review helps solidify it! It sounds like you just about covered all the great amenities and features that the Homewood Suites Irvine has to offer.  Maybe the only feature that is missing is our awesome game room! With a pool table, shuffle board, tv, and table top games, it is a great way to spend a relaxing evening in!  We certainly hope to see you again the next time you find yourself in Irvine. Be sure to stop by during the week from 5pm to 7pm so you can finally experience our Evening Reception!  Looking forward to your next visit Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Clean, great staff, room no good
Summary: The staff was excellent (friendly & prompt), room clean, but pullout sofa was painful; Queen beds sunk; and AC no lower then 70/69 and kept cycling on/off all night. was told this how it's supposed to be. Breakfast was fine but no labels.  we ended eating something we're not supposed to because of no labels. Not planning on coming back to this hotel.
Manager Response: Greetings, Wael!  Thank you for taking the time to leave feedback regarding your stay with us.We appreciate your efforts in leaving it and giving us the knowledge to move forward and create a better environment for the next guest. We are sincerely sorry that you did not have an exceptional stay that we have become known for in the area. We take guest comfort very seriously and apologize that we fell short for you during this visit.  We would like to invite you to contact us directly to discuss the incident you had with our breakfast. Our breakfast crew would normally be happy to answer any questions or concerns regarding food allergies. In moving forward, we will be beginning a project to refit some of our sleeper sofas to increase the comfort of our pull-out beds. As loyal Hilton members, we hope you may give us another chance to provide you with a much better guest stay. Please feel free to reach out to us directly so we may help you to book a room that better fits your family's comfort.  We appreciate your feedback and future consideration for another visit Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Clean, modern, fresh & comfortable choice on a side road near the airport.  Worth every penny thanks to their genuine hospitality & generous offerings.  Full breakfast was good, kids loved the waffle makers.  Pool & hot tub were great.  1 bedroom suite with kitchen was perfect.  Love the free parking.  Only wish would be the happy hour being available 7 days a week as we were there for the weekend only & missed it.  We have always been Embassy Suites fans but now we have a new favorite.
Manager Response: Greetings, Mr. W!  We cannot thank enough for the amazing review you have left! We are so grateful to have such satisfied guests who share what great experiences they have had. Your words go far beyond what we could say about our stupendous Homewood Suites Irvine location; you've lived that Suite life after all! It sounds like your family got the real Home Away From Home experience.   We appreciate your feedback regarding the Evening Social schedule. I know we would love to be able to make our guests that happy every night! Irvine and the surrounding area have such a rich, culinary culture that we would hate to take those opportunities to explore away from you! Next time you visit, please be sure to stop by the front desk as our team loves to give out local recommendations. We also want to hear if you found a hidden eatery gem yourself!  We are looking forward to your next visit and wish you the best, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Everything we needed for our meeting
Summary: We had classroom-style seating for 50 people as well as a patio that was perfect for group breakouts. Good breakfast and A/V support. Thank you Alyssa and Homewood Suites staff for seeing that everything went smoothly!
Manager Response: RMfornow, greetings and hello!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review after your meeting at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We are so pleased we could create a great learning environment for our group. Our meeting space is customizable and great for groups to around 80 people. Our sales coordinator, Alyssa, is a pro at setting up a space that works great for any group needs. We hope you will join us again the next time you are hosting in Irvine. Next time, stay the night with us so you can experience our beautiful guest suites!  Looking forward to your next visit, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, but a little disappointing
Summary: Requested upper floor, got a room on ground floor facing public sidewalk and busy roadway, no privacy. On two days we did not receive any maid service and had to complain to front desk. Otherwise, it is a good location and room was nice.
Manager Response: Good morning, Mr. Finkleberg  We want to thank you for your feedback and review on your recent stay with us here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Your input is invaluable as we strive to maintain our status as one of the best hotels in Irvine and in Orange County! We apologize that we were unable to accommodate your room preferences from your reservation and Hilton Honors status. We always try to take these requests in to consideration for our guests however we may not always be able to  accommodate all requests based on occupancy. We are sure you with your week-long stay you witnessed the mass transition from one sports team departing to another arriving during you visit!   Our housekeeping staff works quite hard, especially during this very busy time of year. Due to the extended stay nature of our property, we offer light touches and a full-cleaning every 5 days. We are sorry that the housekeeping times may not have coincided with your schedule during your travels. We value your continued patronage through all of our Hilton properties and have thus awarded your Hilton Honors account points. Please allow about 72 hours for those to become available in your account.  We hope you will join us again on another visit to Irvine so we may "wow" you a little bit more! That is what we are all about at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Please feel free to reach out directly to us if you have any additional questions or concerns.  Wishing you the very best, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Jessy and Veronica are hotel staff here and have been incredibly nice to my family our entire stay. They definitely made it feel like home. Would definitely stay here again. Hotel is very closed to all attractions.
Manager Response: Good morning, Stay801931!  We wish to thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine for your family's recent visit to the area. We are so glad our warm and welcoming staff could be here to welcome you all and make you feel at home. We appreciate the special recognition for some of our staff who gave you that something a little extra. We certainly hope you all will think of us next time you are visiting not just Orange County but all of Southern California. As you mentioned, Irvine is in a great location close to the local beaches and Disneyland but is also a great jumping off point to explore San Diego to the south and Los Angeles to the north.  Please join us again next time for a little bit of home here in Irvine! Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: nice hotel and close to airport
Summary: nice and clean hotel. good breakfast, fitness studio and pool. very nice employees. sufficient and free parking. very helpful and friendly staff. we would stay here again. Our last stay was for five days.
Manager Response: Greetings, dylejo13  Thank you for joining us at the Homewood Suites Irvine while you were waiting for your home to be ready to move in to. We are so glad to hear that our fabulous team made you and your family feel At Home while you were there with us. Please think of us again the next time you want a little "staycation". If you are ever in need of a tasty breakfast (or night time treat) and a comfy bed to fall asleep in, the Homewood Suites Irvine will be here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Helicopter Broke Down in San Diego
Summary: Cant say enough about the excellent staff and accommodations. All were friendly, professional and as for the property it well maintained and the room super clean.  Thanks for the excellent experience while under some business stress.
Manager Response: Mr. Bredenbeck!  We want to thank you for leaving this TripAdvisor review; it means a great deal to us that you took the time to do so. We know you weren't here necessarily by choice, but you did keep rebooking with us each night! We are so glad our Homewood Suites location was here for you each night while you were waiting to go home. Should the same situation EVER happen again, please do not hesitate to reach out to the front desk to leave your bags or try and work around your unpredictable schedule. We'd love the opportunity to make your day a little bit easier.  Join us for fun next time! We'll be here for you, for work or for play. Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: One of the best in the area
Summary: I've stayed multiple times at the Westin, the Hilton and the anaheim doubletree property in the past when I've visited the area. At long last I think I've found my go-to hotel location. This is the ONLY hotel I've come across in southern california with free parking, saving me at least $26/night. That alone gets my business. The fact that the building is brand new, clean and modern only gives me all the reason I need to make this the constant hotel of choice.  The staff were friendly, parking was plenty, and I couldn't hear any airplane noise whatsoever. We were placed on the 2nd floor end unit and the group above us were having a party well into 1am on friday night, which we could hear, but definitely couldn't hear as loudly as I've heard neighbors in hotels in the past. I was
Manager Response: Astoria3  Welcme to the Homewood Suites Irvine family! We apologize it took us so long to find each other but better late than never, right?? We look forward to many more happy stays together. As an avid traveler, we appreciate your feedback regarding some of the experiences you had with us. We apologize that some aspects of your stay fell a little short but we hope to perhaps make it up for future visits.   Next time you stay, please do not hesitate to reach out to us so we might make your stay a little more comfortable. The thermostats in the rooms can be lowered a tad bit to make you a little more comfortable. Our friendly maintenance staff would love to be able to assist you next time should the need arise.  We look forward to seeing you next time, and the next time, and the next time!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We are more than pleased with the service this hotel has provided in the past 3 years for our non-profit foundation's meetings and trainings. In addition to having our meeting room set up perfectly each time, their staff is professional and accommodating. They go above and beyond. The location is conveniently located, super clean, and free parking! They also offer free breakfast for their guests daily and it's a full breakfast buffet.
Manager Response: TheJoyfulChild,  It is our pleasure and honor to help you and your team host training sessions over the last several years. We appreciate you placing your trust in our team to execute your goals each meeting. We hope to be here for you and your group for many more years to come since we have been such a good fit so far!  We appreciate your review and leaving some feedback regarding your experiences with us. Should you ever need anything, our team is here to assist you.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Homewood Suites is a new hotel, and the guest rooms are big. It has a small kitchen. Includes a fridge, microwave oven, dishwasher, dishes and utensils. Also great room service. What I love the most were the soft pillows and mattresses. I feel like I‚Äôm at home when I stay at Homewood Suites.
Manager Response: Greetings, Vivian!  Thank you so much for selecting the Homewood Suites Irvine as your Home Away From Home. We are so glad you received a 5-star stay with us. The best news is is that ALL of our guest suites feature those lovely kitchens as you described so that means for no matter your length of stay, you are sure to be comfortable! Did you know that our heavenly Hilton beds are actually available to purchase and have at your own home? Maybe we shouldn't have told you that so you join us again for another restful night's sleep ‚ù£‚óï ‚Äø ‚óï‚ù£. We hope you will join us again next visit!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I really want to say thank you to front desk staff and specially to the house keeper Paula Alejo her attention and service was amazing during the two weeks I stayed there. Thanks you so much for your kindness and simpaty.
Manager Response: Greetings, Ade0912!  We wish to thank you for spending the time to leave this review on your stay. We enjoy reading feedback and experiences from all our guests but are especially happy to hear when they had such an enjoyable time.  Thank you for the extra special shout out to one of our special housekeepers, Paul. We are fortunate to have such a hard-working team who do all they can for our guest's comfort and enjoyment. We will be sure to pass along your compliments to her.   Please join us again for another visit to Irvine. You know you will have a good night's sleep, tasty breakfast in the morning, and smiling faces to welcome you back again!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Homewood suites at Red Hill ROCKS!
Summary: The Manager , she‚Äôs an amazing person to the extend of calling the room and making sure we are well taken care and the staff , breakfast and social hours is totally fabulous. Well worth the price and ambiance
Manager Response: Greetings, Travel61510981350  Thank you so much for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine not once, but twice! It was a pleasure to host you and your mother for your work/fun trip. We are so glad we could provide you both with an exceptional stay. Thank you for the shout out to our fabulous team members who made your stay feel just a little more like home. We hope you will think of us again the next time you are visiting Orange County. We'd enjoy the opportunity to be your Home Away From Home again the next time you here!  We look forward to seeing you again. Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: On the front and back of our family reunion, we stayed at Homewood. Gabby was the front end advisor and we LOVED her. She was kind. Helpful, and genuine. Half the group had to fly out early Sunday morning and Gabby wanted to personally drive them in the airport shuttle, coming in before her scheduled shift to do so. She is an exceptional human. Homewood is lucky to have her. On another note, the hotel was clean, quiet, and reasonably priced with a game room to boot.
Manager Response: Choromanski crew,  It is an absolute honor to have a Trip Advisor named after me! Thank you so much for giving our Homewood Suites Irvine location a try during your family's reunion. We appreciate the opportunity to take care of you all from start to finish of your adventure. I am so glad I could assist in your stay from your first phone call days before your arrival and bring your stay full circle. While I was fortunate enough to receive your call, I know you would have received the same excellent service from any of our amazing Front Desk agents. We are so lucky to have such a well-rounded team who are all so dedicated to providing fabulous care to all of our guests.   We hope that you all will choose Orange County for next year's family reunion; even though you made Disney World sound awfully appealing! We would love to be your Home Away From Home again.  Give our best to the family! We look forward to seeing you all again next time. Warmest regards, Gabby & the entire Homewood Suites team

Summary: Great Place to stay with family! Great Location, Courteous Staff, Brilliant Service, Great Facilities and Breakfast. Loved our stay. Would highly recommend for families on holiday in the Irvine or Orange County area.
Manager Response: Greetings, lutful1966  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave your feedback with us. We are flattered you have selected the Homewood Suites Irvine several times during your extended adventure to California. Irvine is a great launching off point for exploring Orange County and all of Southern California. Our Homewood Suites Irvine location is in close proximity to Santa Ana Airport and near many local freeways to get you on the road and where you need to be! Despite all this, our hotel is nestled in a more incorporated area of Irvine and so you can always head back to your Home Away From Home and unwind after an exciting day of sightseeing.  We look forward to welcoming your family back here in August for the last part of your holiday. Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Great friendly service. Very clean, we will stay at this hotel again. Staff was attentive and professional. The location is nice and central to local beaches... The basketball court was a big hit amongst the hockey players. Free breakfast was a bonus.
Manager Response: Good morning, Anri!  We very much appreciate your time in leaving feedback on your recent trip to Southern California. Our summer season is filled with many families traveling for a myriad of sporting events and we were so happy to welcome your inline hockey team. Thank you for selecting the Homewood Suites Irvine as your home base during the tournament. Our outdoor pool and sports court is a great spot for young athletes to get some energy out or warm up before game time. You can always come have a bite to eat and refuel at our Evening Social (Monday through Thursday).  Please join us again, for fun or for another tournament. We would love to host you and your family again next visit!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Newer, nice place in Irvine close to John Wayne airport (but not too close!)
Summary: Great staff, well run hotel. Rooms are well-appointed, nice layout, insulated from much of the surrounding area noise. Would recommend this hotel if you need to be in Irvine, but not right by the airport. Great breakfast options and hosted lite dinner M-F. Can support meetings up to 50-60 people in conference space.
Manager Response: shellybwright  Thank you so much for leaving this review! We really appreciate your time and most importantly, are thrilled you had such a good stay! Being a newer-built property, we enjoy the benefits of having a very well-insulated building. You'd never be able to tell you are right underneath arrivals from Santa Ana airport all day long!  We do have a beautiful meeting space center that can accommodate any meetings up to around 75 people. In addition, our large meeting space can be broken down in to 3 smaller rooms for more intimate gatherings. Please feel free to reach out to our amazing sales team to help plan your next event with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We look forward to seeing you again next time!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We came with our Inline hockey team.  Everyone was really nice and helpful.  The amenities were awesome!  From the pool to the basketball hoop...the bbq's on the deck for the team to enjoy.  I used the gym everyday which overlooks the pool.  Just a great experience overall!
Manager Response: iainandliz2019  Thank you so much for this awesome review regarding your recent stay with us. We are so glad that our property was a great fit for your family and for the team. The sports court and the pool are a great place for the kids to hang out while the outdoor fire pit is definitely nice for the adults to relax and enjoy! We are glad you guys got to enjoy some California sunshine while you visited from the Great White North.  We hope you all will visit us again next time, no matter what brings you down our way! Our Homewood Suites Irvine location would love to be your Home Away From Home again next visit. We hope to see you again.  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We recently stayed at Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine John Wayne for 14 days, it was absolutely fantastic! Our team entered the Champions Cup softball tournament and the hotel was in a convenient location to the parks. We enjoyed the complimentary breakfast, evening social and complimentary parking which are big savings during our long stay. Also, having the laundry room on property is a huge help, as I washed uniforms daily! The staff in all departments are extremely friendly and helpful. A huge thank you to the front desk staff for putting up with us! We plan to stay here next summer too!
Manager Response: Greetings, Mrs. Texeira!  It was a real treat to see you all again this year; thank you for holding down the fort and being the first to arrive and one of the last to depart! We really do enjoy having your team with us hopefully as much as you all like staying with us (no "putting up with" necessary). We know some of the team members were doing lots and lots of traveling for other tournaments and we are just so happy that you all could make yourself at home here for a spell. We admire the hard work and dedication that your girls put in and you parents aid them along the way. We hope you all have plenty more reasons to travel to Irvine in the coming years to visit us. We hope to be the home of the Kamikaze Softball Team for years to come!  We look forward to your visit next year. Much mahalo to you and your family and teammates.  Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Hotel was great! Loved the complimentary parking, the fitness center that looked out to the pool, the basketball/tennis court and complimentary breakfast! Would stay again! Friendly staff, hotel was clean and welcoming.
Manager Response: aktexeira,  Thank you so much for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine yet again while the team played here in Southern California. It was our treat to host you all once more. We appreciate your glowing review of our property and all the great things we have to offer our guests. We are so glad that the girls could start the morning off right with a hearty breakfast before their games.   We hope we will see you all next year, or sooner! We look forward to being your Home Away From Home once again.  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: My son and I attended a nationals sporting event closeby and my travel agent wife booked us in to this hotel for our 5 night stay.  The hotels shuttle picked us up promptly from John Wayne airport and once checked in we went to our spacious and very comfortable room.  The room was very clean and the bed so good I slept in later than I expected to the next morning.The pool,patio and small court were perfect for our boys occupy themselves and the parents to socialize.  I highly recommend the hotel but I want to mention some of the staff specifically for customer service above and beyond what I have experienced at most places I have stayed.  Hayley Leilani and Gabrielle were incredibly helpful and turned our stay from really good to great.  If we ever come back to Los Angeles we
Manager Response: Greetings, jamielS7453ST!  Hats off to your wife in selecting us for your recent visit for the inline hockey tournament! It sounds like our location, with our complimentary shuttle service within 3 miles of the hotel location, was a great fit for your stay. While it may be nice to have  a car to cruise around the area, we don't mind taking the wheel and showing you the local sites.   We are so glad that our hotel was a great fit for the team and everyone, including the adults, got to enjoy some quality bonding time between the games. Thank you for the special recognition to just a few of the team members who made your stay extra special. We hope to see you all again the next time around or for your next visit. Please bring your wife and show her in person that she has excellent taste when selecting hotels!!  Until next time, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: All of the staff were amazing; especially Hayley! She handled a behavioural issue with a group of kids like a pro and helped turn the situation into a great learning lesson for our kids. Thank you very much!!
Manager Response: Maui944,  "Best Service Ever" are some pretty tall orders; especially for a group that travels for tournaments all the time! We are so happy and proud we could live up to those words. Thank you so much for the kind review and for the special recognition for Hayley. It's a busy time of year for our team with families and all sorts of groups staying within the hotel. Our goal is to ensure the peace (and safety) for all our guests while still having fun! We hope to see you all again next year, or any time you are looking for some fun on the mainland. Homewood Suites Irvine will be here for you all!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Recently stayed 14 days and everything was awesome. Really enjoyed the free daily breakfast and weekday social hours. Location is a big plus, throw that in with free parking, it is a no-brainer to stay here.
Manager Response: Kamikaze808,  Hopefully you are speaking on behalf of the team but we would definitely love to hear from them as well! It was our pleasure to host the KamiKaze softball group for a third straight summer. We really look forward to your visits each year and hope to see you all many more times.  We know many of the families within the tournament group have been away from home for several weeks, playing throughout the United States. We hope we were able to provide a little bit of home on this journey for you all. We really hope to see you all again next year!  Mahalo and good luck! Gabby & the Homewood Suites Irvine

Summary Heading: Awesome Stay hands down the best!!!
Summary: Awesome place! Staff are very helpful and nice. They made sure we were always happy!! Free parking was a hit for our group stay!!  Kids had a blast with the pool, the court and game room. Breakfast always fresh and ready, social hour was awesome
Manager Response: Greetings, LaRessa G!  Thank you for selecting the Homewood Suites Irvine for your group's recent visit to the area. Our property offers so many great spots for families and groups of all sizes to hang out, relax, and enjoy some time together! Our daily breakfast and Evening Social are also great when trying to fill up lots of bellies and still leave some funds for the fun stuff! We appreciate your time in leaving this review and hope you all will join us again the next time you are in Orange County. We'll be here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This is the second time our girls softball team stayed here. Great hotel and staff!!!! Gabby and Kim and everyone else are so helpful! I‚Äôll be back. The staff is punctual and accommodating. Thanks for being patient with us!
Manager Response: Mr. Matsumoto,  We greatly appreciate your time in leaving this review for us. We love seeing the team each year and are very grateful that you have chosen the Homewood Suites Irvine as your place to stay during the summer tournament. We so very much appreciate all the warmth and hospitality you all give right back to us. We hope we can keep you all coming back each year! Thank you so much for the personal shout out to some of our team. We hope everyone you came into contact with was just as helpful and warm.  Much mahalo to you all. We certainly look forward to seeing you all again next year Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Overall, my family and I would rate this Homewood Suites an 8 out of 10. We have a 13 yr old boy and 3 girls...ages 10, 8 and 6. Breakfast was acceptable as well as the evening reception‚Äîthe staff did an exceptional job keeping the dining/serving area clean and were very prudent in keeping empty/used dishes cleaned off of the tables. Rooms were acceptable too‚Äîclean and well maintained.  Corridor carpets were pretty dirty, especially the first floor, the staff is aware of this as they cleaned the carpets once while we were there (6 night stay).  Kids enjoyed the pool, game room, putting green and basketball court.
Manager Response: Greetings, Jeremy T.!  Thank you so much for bringing the family to visit us at the Homewood Suites Irvine during your recent trip. We appreciate your feedback and review regarding the property. It is a busy time of year for us with many families and teams staying with us and our staff works very diligently to keep the hotel looking good. If you have any additional suggestions of how we could make your next visit better. We certainly want to hear from you. We expect nothing but the best from ourselves!  We hope you will visit us again so we could provide you with a 10 out of 10 stay next time.  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Stayed here during a softball tournament.  Was very happy our team chose this hotel.  Would definitely stay here again.  Service was great! We enjoyed the pool, courts, game room.  Took advantage of the laundry room, grill, complimentary dining & parking.
Manager Response: Good morning, 808dsb  What an awesome review; I don't think we could have said it better ourselves. We are so glad you and the group were able to take full advantage of all the great amenities our hotel has to offer. Our outdoor pool area is especially great for large groups or families wanting to hang out in the summer sun and just have fun! We always enjoy having our friends from Hawaii come visit each year so we hope you will take part in the tournament again next year. We'll be dreaming of the team's delicious bbq you all so kindly share with us until then!  Sending our very best to you and your family, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The waffles we were able to make was really good. The people working at the front desk are super friendly and are able to assist you whenever you need it. The front desk supplies you with basketballs, tennis gear or volleyball gear incase you want to play on the court. The only bad thing about this place is the walls are super thin so you have to keep the noise down or else you‚Äôll get a lot of noise complaints.
Manager Response: Greetings, Mrs. Oshiro!  We very much appreciate your time in leaving this review on your recent stay. We are so glad the family enjoyed themselves during your visit. The pool and sports court is a great area for families to chill out and spend some quality time after a busy day. As we are a newer property, we benefit from quality construction throughout the hotel. Even though we are in the flight path of arrivals over at Santa Ana Airport, you'd never know from the noise!  We hope you and your family will think of us again the next time you are visiting Orange County. We'd love to share a tasty breakfast with you once more!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: It‚Äôs a very convenient place for my teammates and I to stay for our games. The service is great and the meals are amazing. The room service is so spot on and the hospitality feels like home. I would definitely recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Good Morning Jayla M, Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your stay was! We appreciate the feedback. We're thrilled that you and your teammates enjoyed your time with us. We sure hope that you guys will keep us in mind the next time you are in the Irvine area!  Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: First time at Homewood Suites Irvine.  By far the best hotel in Orange County.  The hotel staff are the best.  Proactive when working my issues that I missed.  Outstanding property, pool, room and staff.  If you are visiting Disney or SoCal, this is the place to be.  Thanks Homewood.
Manager Response: Greetings, Mr. Head!  We want to thank you from the bottom of our collective hearts for choosing to stay with us during your visit with us. There are lots of options for hotels, especially around the Happiest Place on Earth. Only being roughly 13 miles from the park, we are a good choice for families who are looking for a little peace and quiet after a full day at the House of Mouse.  It was our pleasure to handle the small hiccup in your reservation. we understand, you were just not ready to leave our comfy beds and yummy breakfast! We are so glad we could be of help and make your stay a little smoother.  We hope you will join us again the next time you are visiting Orange County! Our friendly team will be here waiting for you!  Best regards, Gabby &  the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: great stay near Disneyland and Huntington Beach
Summary: chose this hotel due to easy proximity to Disneyland, the beaches and airport.  Fairly new hotel.  Best gym I have experienced in an extended stay hotel.  Great customer service all around.  Good selection at breakfast buffet.  Only complaint is breakfast stops at 9 am on the dot...for those of us on vacation staying out late, that was tough on some mornings.
Manager Response: Greetings, Andersong229!  Thank you so very much for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine during your recent visit to Orange County. Travelers to the area are very spoiled in that there are so many places to chose from during their visit! We are so glad you chose us. Irvine is certainly a great central location to many major attractions and is a gateway to San Diego in the south or Los Angeles up north. There's limitless possibility for activities!  Thank you for your feedback regarding our breakfast hours. You are correct; we do have many business travelers stay with us and our hours reflect that. We are very grateful that Farmer Boy's opened up about one year ago, where they serve breakfast all day long! In addition, they offer discounts for our guests. Isn't teamwork great?!  Please think of us again the next time you are visiting Southern California. We would love to be your Home Away From Home again next visit!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Been coming to this hotel since it first opened 3 years ago and it is the BEST!  The hotel is first rate and the staff is phenomenal!  It‚Äôs my home away from home since my son moved away to attend UC Irvine.
Manager Response: Good Morning LuckyLeo22! We would like to thank you for your continued loyalty to the Homewood Suites Irvine! We are absolutely thrilled that you have chosen us as your home away from home, Its valued guests like you that keep us going!  We can not wait to see you again! Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Upon arrival I was really impressed the place its right next to the main road leading to John Wayne int'l. The place is spacey and a there is a Farmer Johns across the parking lot! They have great shuttle service to and from the airport and a professional staff! Particularly Gabby who was very kind and patient with me, she is a local of the area so that help me get an idea of my surroundings. Now the good stuff! They have a recreation room, a gym and a pool but I was very impressed BECAUSE THEY HAVE SHUFFLEBOARD!!!!! It really is the small things and it made my trip how short it was an easy 5 star overall experience!
Manager Response: Good morning, RestlessAdventures!  We are so glad your journey took you to the Homewood Suites Irvine! We truly appreciate you sharing your experience with us all. It looks like you got the full Homewood Experience; our game room especially is a great spot for families to hang out and get a little of those competitive feelings out!  Thank you for recognizing a member of our amazing team. Many of us live local to the Irvine area so you can get a different recommendation from any of our staff to really enjoy the area.  We hope your path will bring you our way the next time you are visiting Orange County. We would certainly love to be your Home Away From Home again!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I have eaten breakfast at the Homewood Suites for the past couple of mornings and the experience has exceeded my expectations. The Homewood Suites staff were super nice and friendly.   The staff made my stay rewarding and pleasant. Veronica has been very attentive and helpful at breakfast and I‚Äôve been greeted with a smile every morning. I will highly recommend this place in the future!!!
Manager Response: Good morning, SmoothCriminal05!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review. At Homewood Suites Irvine, we feel breakfast is the most important meal of the day (or night!). We appreciate the recognition of some of our fabulous team members who are always ready and happy to assist!  We hope you continued to enjoy your stay in our spacious guest suites. With their stocked kitchenettes and full-fized fridge, you can make your own breakfast! However, we find our customizable waffle bar to be way more fun!  Looking forward to hosting you again during your next visit Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Beyond pleased with this hotel!!! The breakfast they offer is always hot and ready. Staff is very attentive, the area is kept clean and they make sure you feel welcomed.   The past couple of mornings I would receive a friendly hello from Llesnia and Veronica. I highly suggest if you are in town and looking for a comfortable extended stay hotel, Homewood Suites is the place to be. You have easy access to John Wayne airport, various eateries and entertainment.
Manager Response: Good morning, HendrixP28  We couldn't have said it any better ourselves! Thank you so much for writing this outstanding review on your recent stay. We are glad you got the full, Homewood Suites Irvine experience! Our location is convenient to many local, Orange County attractions including the local beach communities and Disneyland. Looking to stay a little closer to home? We have the District shopping center nearby as well as the world-famous South Coast Plaza for premiere shopping and dining.  Please join us again the next time you are visiting Orange County; no matter the length of stay! We'd love to be your Home Away From Home again next time.  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: The Best Kept Secret In Irvine!
Summary: Leilani, Hayday, Gabi, & the entire staff do such an outstaning job with all customers. This hotel exceeded our expectations.  Great prices Great staff Great location Great amenities  Great spacious rooms!  I would rather stay here instead of one of the "so called" luxury hotels. This hotel has more bang for the buck!  We will be back!!
Manager Response: Greetings, Mr. Haskell!  Thank you so very much for taking the time to write this review on your recent stay. Your feedback means a great deal to us as we continue to aim for that perfect guest experience! At the Homewood Suites Irvine, we feel we are the perfect amount of value; complimentary breakfast, Evening Social (Monday through Thursday), complimentary parking, spacious suites with kitchenettes, outdoor pool with BBQs. We're just giving it all for our guests!  We hope you will join us again on your next staycation. All of us would love to see you again!  Looking forward to your next visit, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: From check in to check out, staff was extremely professional and very down to earth.  Hotel is well maintained and clean.  Shout out to the maintenance and cleaning staff!  We recommend staying here for families, couples or even by yourself.
Manager Response: Good morning, Ms. Santiago  It was a pleasure hosting you and your family this past weekend while you toured Orange County schools. Hopefully your son found the right fit near Irvine so you have plenty more excuses to come visit us again! We appreciate you leaving this review on your stay with us. We are so pleased our hotel was just right and you felt at home. Please join us again the next time you are visiting Southern California. We'll be here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I love the fact that they had something for everyone in our family to do in the hotel. From mom, dad, and little ones with family board games. Hot/cold buffet breakfast with something new each morning. DEFINITELY will be back and recommend it to all my friends and family. Best part of all was the amazing friendly staff that was ALWAYS ready to help make your stay even better. Thank you for everything that made our stay a great way to finish our family vacation.
Manager Response: Greetings, YessicaG64!  Thank you so very, very much for your amazing review of your stay! Your review means a great deal to us; we love when guest's share their experiences with the world. Thank you for the shout out to our fantastic team who take guest satisfaction very, very seriously. We firmly believe that they are what make for the total Homewood Suites (Irvine) experience.  Please join us again for another Home Away From Home experience. Our staff would love to take care of you and your family next visit!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Excellent Wheelchair accessible room, great staff.
Summary: We had to vacate our home with no notice and have a daughter in a wheelchair.  We were lucky to get a wheelchair accessible room with a roll in shower and two queen beds. We've stayed at many hotels and this was by far the most accessible room we have ever had which was important since we were there over 6 weeks.  The room was overall nice, roomy and very clean.  The hotel offers many extras including breakfast and light food and beverages Monday to Thursday evenings.  The entire staff was friendly and helpful from the management/front desk staff through housekeeping and maintenance staff.   The pool and jacuzzi both have wheelchair lifts.  The one time that weather permitted us to use them, Ed was very helpful in explaining their operation and helping with the process,.
Manager Response: Good morning, Mr. and Mrs. McGhee  It is with our great pleasure that we were able to aid your family during this difficult and sudden time. We understand the stress that many families face in situations like these; from fires to flooding, to home damage. In times like these, we know you are not here for vacation and fun like other guests but our goal is to make you feel comfortable, at home, and throw a little bit of joy in there!  Our Homewood Suites Irvine is certainly equipped for extended stays like yours with kitchen facilities in each and every room. Daily breakfast and our Evening Social during the week take a little bit of the stress off you and allow us to treat you to a delicious meal. We appreciate your feedback regarding the bed height in our accessible suite and will certainly pass the idea along to our management.   Thank you for the shout out to our team and we couldn't be happier that you were touched by some special individuals during your stay. We hope you all came to feel like family during your stay; we certainly felt like you three were!  If you are ever looking for a getaway, not too far from home, the Homewood Suites Irvine will be here waiting for you with open arms. We are grateful for the opportunity to serve you during your stay.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Homewood is my favourite hotel in Irvine. The room is relatively new and clean. It always make me feels at home. The stay comes with co.complimentary breakfast and happy hour from 5-7pm. The staff are friendly and helpful. This is definitely the place to stay if you are far away from home.
Manager Response: Greetings, Lanyyc  Thank you so much for the review and for your kind words. Our team takes guest comfort and satisfaction very seriously! When you stay at the Homewood Suites Irvine, you are family.
