Nothing brings people together like sharing a delicious breakfast in the morning or chatting over drinks at our Evening Social Monday through Thursday. Whatever the reason for your travels, we want you to feel at home while you are here.   Please think of us again the next time you visit Orange County. We'll be here waiting for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We loved this hotel. It was very clean, which is my number one priority in a hotel. It was also fairly close to The Disneyland resort and beaches. The beds were very comfortable and the rooms were spacious. We also really enjoyed the pool and spa. I have been looking for a new spot to stay when we come to Disneyland and this is it. It was a wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Greetings, watermelon44044  We know how important it is to get a good night's rest before tackling all the excitement and fun that Southern California has to offer! We hope you also enjoyed breakfast every day before hitting the parks; it's the most important meal of the day after all! Our property is located near the 55 and 405 freeway which are your gateway to many different attractions including our beautiful beaches. We look forward to being your Home Away From Home next time you visit the Happiest Place on Earth in a Galaxy Far, Far Away!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: If you come to Irvine for business, looking for a great place to stay, providing great value for money, providing a great location - close to all the corporate offices ... this hotel is a MUST use for you! Friendly staff, great setup, tidy rooms, close to everything nearby.
Manager Response: Good Morning Cruiser27142570347, Our team at the Homewood Suites Irvine would like to thank you for taking the time to tell us how your stay was. We appreciate the feedback! We are thrilled that our property was able to provide you easy access to all your business needs.  We hope you will join us again, maybe for some fun in the sun! Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Great location, friendly staff and clean large rooms
Summary: We stayed as a family in two rooms when visiting for my daughter's college graduation from Chapman U.  It was only a 15 min drive to campus.  The front desk staff was outstanding.  The breakfast was very good and rotated types of eggs and meats daily.  The pool and hot tub were well maintained and large.  Plenty of seating.  The rooms were large!  One room had 5 people in it and there would have easily fit 6 comfortably.  The kitchenette had all the items you would need for an extended stay.  Never made it to the manager's reception.  But on the days there is no manager's reception they offer 20% off with your room key at the restaurant across the parking lot.  I think it's called Farmboys or something like that.  The food there is absolutely outstanding!  And you can get
Manager Response: Hello, croppingfool  We got a two-fer with your outstanding review; one for us and one for our good neighbors at Farmer Boys! We really appreciate your in-depth review and couldn't be happier with how much you enjoyed your stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Both our breakfast and Evening Social have rotating menu items so even guests who are here for a few days get to experience something different each day. Even though we are about two years old, we like to keep things fun and fresh here!  It is safe to say we are not going anywhere any time soon so no matter the next occasion, we have you and your family. We hope your first time experience has locked you in as Homewood for Lifers. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit.  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: My room was very nice well laid out. Very comfortable bed. The property was nice & clean, staff was attentive. Breakfast was great, many items to select from and fresh made not reheated from frozen. Will look to stay here again.
Manager Response: Greetings Hooknladdr, We would like to personally thank you for your time in making this review. Our team at the Homewood Suites Irvine is dedicated to making your stay as comfortable as possible! We are happy to hear that our team members were able to make your time with us enjoyable. Isn't our breakfast great? My favorite has got to be our DIY waffle bar! MMM YUMMY!!  We cant wait for you to join us again! Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Staff are very accommodating and the hotel is very clean. I like that you can do laundry inside the hotel, free breakfast. And it feels like home. Next business or leisure trip will definitely use Hilton Suites or hotel.
Manager Response: Good Morning Sunshine07493895739, Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know how your stay was. We appreciate the feedback! Here at the Homewood Suites Irvine our main priority is to make you feel as if you are at your Home Away From Home! We are thrilled we could accomplish that. Awesome to hear that you enjoyed so many of our great amenities! I for one love the fact that you can do laundry just steps away from the comfort of your room!  We cant wait to welcome you back! Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Very nice place, ever though it is located under the landing flight path of John Wayne Airport, you can‚Äôt hear the jets inside the hotel.  The staff was very helpful.  Breakfast was good with large variety of chooses.
Manager Response: Hey, Jack A.!  Thank you so much for taking your time and leaving this review on your recent stay. We really appreciate your feedback and hearing about your experience. We strive to be the very best for our guests and your review helps us stay the course! Please think of us again the next time you are traveling to Irvine. Not only do we offer a great (and different) breakfast menu each day, you can join us for our Evening Social Monday through Thursday for a different meal every night! We feel sometimes changes are good things.  We look forward to seeing you next time. Best, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We had two stays at this Homewood on our recent baseball trip.  We stayed two nights the first time and then 1 night 3 days later when we came back to the area.  All the rooms that we had were very clean and new looking. The front desk staff were awesome.  The pool and hot tub were very nice and clean.  The airport is very close and you can see the planes coming in to land but could not hear them in any of the rooms that we had. The breakfast was good.
Manager Response: Greetings, dnrdavies!  Thank you for staying with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine not once but twice! We are so happy that our property had everything your family needed to enjoy your baseball trip to Orange County. The outdoor hot tub and pool area are great ways to wind down and relax after a busy day of playing America's favorite past time. Wouldn't a baseball diamond be an amazing addition to our sports court?! Thankfully, our more newly constructed allows guests to enjoy the landing of John Wayne Airport aircrafts with all the "awe" but none of the rumble.  We hope you and your family will join us again for another visit; for sports or for relaxation. No matter the reason, our Homewood Suites will be here to take care of you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites team

Summary: Everything was great!  My family enjoyed staying this hotel, and will return for next time. Rooms were clean and big, and the beds were comfortable. Kitchen was great too.  It is definitely more than we expected.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Sherpa35264931146,  Just wanted to leave you a quick note and let you know how much we appreciate you taking the time to leave a review of your experience with us here at Homewood Suites Irvine.  Also, we love the fact that is was more than your expected.  Our team here works so hard to try and make every guest's stay perfect, so it was nice to hear that you had a great time.  Maybe next year we will see you again???    Much Gratitude,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: My little family came here to stay for 1 night. Before are reservation I received a text asking if I needed anything. I asked for extra towels, blankets and sheets. When I arrived front desk told me they were in my room already. When we arrived in our room it was spot on. All the extras I asked for to a beautiful clean room. Thank you to the housekeeping and doing all that you do it is a tough job. The next morning as we went to breakfast my 2 year old daughter started to cough so hard that she threw up, right there In the Buffett area. I started to clean it up and the breakfast staff told me  they‚Äôd take care of it. They quickly went into action and told me not to worry and that it happens. Shout out to the breakfast team for your help and making me feel like a guest. This is a
Manager Response: Good Morning Teena, Isnt that text feature nifty? We love to be able to fill all your pre arrival requests when we are able. Our breakfast team is just the best! I am so glad that they were able to help you in such a timely fashion and make you feel comfortable! We're so happy that you enjoyed our property. We opened in January 2017 so we try our best to keep everything looking top notch!  We hope you will keep The Homewood Suites Irvine in mind the next time you are in the Orange County area. Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: My gratitude for Ms.Caroline and Ms.Hayley are infinite. They went above and beyond to make my disastrous weekend vacation a pleasant and most comfortable stay. The entire staff is hands down, top notch. Homewood Suites far exceeded my expectations in more ways than one. It has everything to offer. I am looking forward to attending next year's Jazz Festival in Newport Beach again, and have no doubt Homewood Suites will be my choice of stay. Thank you again for an experience I shall never forget!
Manager Response: Greetings  NBJazzfestival2020, Wow! Thank you so much for leaving such a phenomenal review! We are so happy that we were able to turn your trip around for the better. Here at the Homewood Suites Irvine we do everything in our power to make sure that you have a 5 star experience from beginning to end. We can not wait to welcome you back next year! Best Regards, Eliza & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: One week stay while daughter had surgery.  Incredible friendliest and accommodating staff in beautiful contemporary surroundings.  Front desk personnel‚ÄîCaroline, Joe, Hayley‚Äîare just top-notch and an asset to the Hilton chain. Anita and Itzy did a great job with complementary breakfasts and evening socials keeping area stocked well.  Stayed in the two queen bed studio; so spacious and kitchen had everything we needed.  All the comforts of home-away-from-home!  If I‚Äôm in the area again, this is the only hotel for me!
Manager Response: Good Morning 669suer,  We are absolutely trilled that we were able to make your family (and daughter) as comfortable as possible throughout your visit. Our team members are always striving to make our guests stays memorable, we will certainly pass on your praise! Here at the Homewood Suites Irvine our guests have a couple options when it comes to food. You can most certainly join us for our complimentary hot breakfast each morning and help yourself to my personal favorite, our waffle bar! YUMM! And Mon-Thurs you can wind down at our social hour from 5-7 with a nice glass of wine and a light dinner. But of course you always have the option of cooking in your full kitchen in your room. Happy to hear that the studio suite was to your liking and everyone was comfortable  We would love to host you and your family again,and wish your daughter a speedy recovery! Dont be strangers now. Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with fantastic customer service
Summary: Great location ! Housekeeping was attentive to our needs and hotel staff provide friendly, courteous and great customer service to our party who was all departing at different times with either hotel shuttle service and/or Uber, at no cost to us !!!
Manager Response: Good Morning hbos65! Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your experience with us was. We appreciate the feedback! Here at the Homewood Suites Irvine our team members strive to make sure that you have a 5 star experience time and time again! Thrilled to hear that we were able to accommodate all your parties transportation needs.  It was truly a pleasure to host you. We hope to see you again soon! Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This was a family trip. The staff was always smiling and very accommodating to our needs. Great amenities even a basketball court. The suite and kitchen was clean. Only disappointment was the comlmplimentry internet, it was slow and kept dropping signal.Otherwise stay was excellent!!
Manager Response: Good Morning! Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine for your family get away! We are thrilled that our team was able to deliver a 5 star experience throughout your stay. We do apologize about the poor internet connection,we will make sure to look into this issue further.  We hope that you will keep us in mind the next time you are in the Irvine area! Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Staff was so helpful, place was clean and had everything you need.  Pool, basketball court, evening meal, pool table, kitchenette.  Its like a mini resort. Wish we could have stayed longer! Breakfast was delicious with many healthy options.
Manager Response: Greetings JoAnn, We would like to thank you for taking the time to let us know how your visit was. Here at the Homewood Suites Irvine our guests are our TOP priority! All of our team members want to ensure that you feel like you are at your, "home away from home". Very happy that you got to enjoy all of our wonderful amenities! My favorite is definitely our complementary HOT breakfast, cant beat that all you can eat waffle bar! YUMM!  We hope that you will join us again soon! Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: No complaints. We stayed in a suite w/ a kitchen because we have a newborn and yes, it served that purpose, but it also exceeded expectations. Very nice room and amenities. Breakfast was good.   Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Good Morning  Meander517569, Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your stay was, we appreciate the feedback! Happy to hear that everything was to your liking during your visit with us. Our breakfast is my fav! We have options for almost everyone, thrilled that you enjoyed it as well.  We hope you will come back soon! Best Regards, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Amazing staff makes this hotel very special
Summary: We stayed for a month and could not have had a better experience. Hotel was clean, spacious and a home away from home. Perfect location, close to everything. Staff there was beyond phenomenal.Gabby, Joe, Hayley and James, among many others made our stay extra special. Even Jose with maintenance went above and beyond.  Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Greetings W4677NWdanielr! We are absolutely thrilled that we were able to be your "Home Away From Home"!! It always brings a smile to our faces to hear that our extended stay guests expectations were exceeded! Our team members do their very best to do whatever they can to make everyone feel at home.  We sure hope that you will keep us in mind the next time you are in the Orange County area! Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Our second stay here, and have already booked for our next stay. The spacious suites and friendly staff keep bringing us back. Free parking is a definite plus. Didn't get much use out of the complimentary evening meals (simple but sufficient) Monday through Thursdays, but it is nice to know that we have the option.  The bed in the suite was slightly on the soft side for the husband, but that was easily fixed after we had a wooden board placed underneath the mattress. This property has become a favorite!
Manager Response: Greetings again, awesomerabbit!  Thank you once more for taking the time to leave feedback regarding your stay. We truly appreciate your continued visits and would be honored to become your permanent go-to property while traveling in Orange County. With so many choices for hotels in the area, it's a great pleasure that so many of our guests choose to stay with us time and time again.   If there is anything we can do to ensure the rest of your stay goes just as well as last time, please let us know. Guest comfort and satisfaction is our top priority!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Newer hotel, so everything was in working order. Room was clean and decorated nicely. Couches are not the most comfortable but the bed for the most part was. There is coined laundry on-site so that was  a plus for my extended stay.
Manager Response: Camper13027096974,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to leave this review after your extended stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We appreciate your sharing you experience with us and with the Trip Advisor community. We enjoy the benefits of being a newer property and do our very best to keep it looking that way! We have many facilities and amenities that great for any length of stay; extended stay or just one night!  We hope you will join us again the next time you visit Orange County; no matter the length! It would be our pleasure to be your Home Away From Home once again!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Great Property in Irvine/Orange County Airport Area
Summary: Homewood Suites Irvine John Wayne airport was the choice for a couple of nights stay after landing at the Orange County John Wayne  Airport.    My first contact with the hotel after making the reservation was receiving a text from the hotel letting e know if I needed anything prior to arrival, just let them know.  Since I had not stayed at the hotel before, I reached out through text to find out about room selection when I was using the e-check in the day before arrival.  I had several email exchanges with Joe who got us fixed up with a room with a view of the front of the property and the pool.   Upon our arrival at the airport, we called the hotel and Gabby picked up with the airport shuttle provided by the hotel.  She got us back to the hotel and checked us in.  She
Manager Response: Welcome to the Homewood Suites Irvine family, Mr. TravelGuy! Your review is more in-depth and detailed then we could begin to provide! Thanks to your experience with us, you have been able to highlight just about every great feature of the hotel. We have plenty to offer depending on what your interests and your energy levels for the day.   Feeling a little pumped up? Shoot some hoops around the basketball court or do a few laps in the pool. Feeling a little competitive? Why not challenge your friends and family to a game of pool or shuffle board in the game room (which I see you might not have enjoyed!). Want to kick back and catch up on the news? Our lodge is welcome to our guests any time. Whatever you are in the mood for, the Homewood Suites Irvine has you covered.  We certainly want to thank you, Mr. Novack, for taking the time to write so many (great) things about your stay. Most importantly, we are so glad that our amazing and considerate team made such a great impact in your experience. Every one of our team members does their part and go out of their way to ensure that all of our guests feel welcomed and At Home. It gives us great joy to know that we accomplished this with your visit.  We have a pretty strong feeling we will see you again, Mr. Novack. So....until next time! Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I really appreciate the fast friendly clean atmosphere of this hotel.  Great rooms, free hot breakfast, game room, pool and basketball court.   Rooms are spacious, exceptionally clean and comfortable.   This is the second time I've stayed here and they did not disappoint.  Check in was fast and easy, check out smooth and trouble free.  Hot breakfast did not disappoint, great selection and fresh fruit.
Manager Response: Greetings, fprandy!  Thank you for selecting the Homewood Suites Irvine during your return visit to the area. Your continued patronage means a lot to us! We certainly appreciate your time in sharing your experience with us all. If you think our hot and tasty breakfast is great, hopefully you can join us during the week days next time to join us for our Evening Social. The menu rotates nightly so there is always something new to try!  Let's make it a three-peat. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Orange County. We'll be here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Everyone and everything was great!! Kim, Gabby and Jose were extremely polite, very helpful and friendly! They made my family and I feel very comfortable and welcomed. We will definitely be staying here again and look forward to seeing our favorite people soon(:
Manager Response: Greetings, vanessa29c  Amazing is some high praises! We aim for the best here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We are so happy you received our top-notch service during your visit. When you stay with us, your family becomes our family. Thank you so much for recognizing just a few members of our team that make customer service a personal mission. We certainly hope you will stay with us again so you can add a few more of our team to your favorites list; our staff is only around 50 or so :p.  Thank you again for selecting our Homewood Suites location. We certainly look forward to seeing you and your family again the next time you visit Orange County.  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Great Location and Outstanding Customer Service
Summary: Visiting family from Bold North Minnesota and could not be happier to be in medium like weather ! The concierge Joe was super friendly and very pleasant to work with at time of check in. Every associate I encounter was the same and the location was perfect. The outdoor hot tub was warm and the amenities offered outside where exceptional. We took a spur of the moment trip to LA to watch the LA Dodgers and it was a drive definitely worth taking even in LA traffic. We had two large rooms with pool views and the location of the hotel is quiet not traffic noise. We appreciate your hotels hospitality and will be back in the not to distant future !
Manager Response: Good morning, Vergamartin  Thank you for making the trek to visit us in Southern California. We mild weather all year round, we are certainly a popular destination any time. Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine; we are so glad you had such an enjoyable stay it compelled you to leave this great review! We look forward to seeing you and your family the next time you visit the area. We'll be here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: A Gem in Southern Los Angeles
Summary: I was thoroughly surprised and pleased to find this Homewood Suites. It is top notch in my opinion. I travel more than 200 nights per year and I am very particular about where I stay. This is definitely one if not the best Homewood Suites I have stayed in.  I have stayed in similar hotels in the area but none beat this one.
Manager Response: Greetings,Guide46681085737  We want to thank you for such a glowing review. As someone who travels a great deal and must be very loyal to the Hilton brand, we are thrilled we have made your top places to stay. We strive to offer the best service, stay, and comfort to all of our guests. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to provide this to you. We look forward to be your Home Away From Home the next time you visit Irvine!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This place was amazing.  Clean, comfortable, quiet, great activities my kids enjoyed the stay which is great in my books.  This place was my home away from home which was very convenient and comforting for us.
Manager Response: Roving12694612659,  Thank you so very much for leaving this great review on your recent stay with us. We appreciate your time in sharing your experience; we love to hear from happy (and not-so-happy) guests! We try to appeal to even the most discerning tastes with all we have to offer.   Homewood Suites, kid-tested, family-approved!  We hope you and the gang will join us again during your next spectacular journey to Irvine. We'll be here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: The reason we returned to this property is twofold: Gabby and Carolyn!
Summary: Actually, it was Paul the hotel mgr who gave us the rooms we requested, at a fair price, when we returned after Christmas 2018. So we do thank him! But it was the duo at the front desk, Gabby and Carolyn, who drew us back to this property for such an extended stay - now in month four, planning on staying for five! As a welcoming committee, they have outdone themselves to make us feel welcome - and less sad after the loss we sustained in the northern California fires. No one could represent HIlton / Homewood better than they do - they deserve heartfelt thanks from us and high praise from hotel management. They are the BEST!
Manager Response: J.D.,  We/I cannot thank you enough for the heart-felt message you have left us and how you continue to recognize the staff here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We don't always get to hear nor realize how the little gestures we do here make such a huge impact on our guests. Thank you for being a reminder that we do here can be important and meaningful. I am just pleased I was there the first time you and R. checked in and I was able to make you both feel a little more at home considering all that happened to you both.   Thank you for making such an EFFORT! to share this moment with not just us, but the entire TripAdvisor community. Perhaps it can aid another family going through the same situation in making their decision on where to call Home for a time.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The suite was large and clean.  Bed was comfy.  Pool was small but nice.  Gym was small but nice.   Staff was very friendly.  We will stay here again.  We had other plans and did not indulge in the complimentary breakfast, but it smelled delicious.
Manager Response: Good morning, wsh68  We firmly believe that breakfast is the most important meal of the day! We hope you will join us next time for a tasty meal, or perhaps come in the evening to experience our Social Hour (Monday through Thursday). With a regularly varying menu, there's always new reasons to come back to visit.   Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine. We sincerely hope you and your family stay again for a cozy and comfy night. We would be honored to host you again!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: First the Outstanding: Front desk, housekeepers, breakfast staff ‚Äì all very friendly and helpful Hotel and rooms clean, tasteful, welcoming d√©cor Typical Homewood Suite benies ‚Äì larger rooms (altho these rooms not as big as other HWS,) kitchen, free breakfast, happy hour food and drinks Decent workout room, but in need of more than one mat and a remote for the big screen TV on the wall (was there in the beginning of the week but not at the end) Excellent comforters, sheets and pillows   Where the hotel needs work: Housekeeping: my first four days I returned to an uncleaned room at 3 or 4.  I had to leave the room when they showed up. My sixth day I returned to the room at 11pm and it hadn‚Äôt been cleaned at all.  But when they clean, they clean well.   I received nothing upon
Manager Response: Dear SuitcaseCarolyn  As a frequent traveler and loyal Hilton Honors member, we wish to thank you for selecting the Homewood Suites Irvine during your recent trip to SoCal. We appreciate your unique insight in to our property. We're glad to hear that overall, your week-long stay with us was enjoyable As a property who specializes in extended stays, we hope to provide all the comforts as your Home Away From Home.  We appreciate your feedback regarding the housekeeping schedule and apologize for variances in cleaning times. Our housekeeping team works diligently through the afternoon until the early evening to accommodate all requests. Please feel free to coordinate with the desk on your next visit should you prefer a specific time for housekeeping.   We hope you will come join us again and give us the chance to leave a better impression on your next visit.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: My husband works for Hilton so we visit so many each year. This one is one of my ultimate favorites. It is so clean and feels newly renovated. I have three kids who love going to the pool and the pool at this location is awesome! They also have a game room with a pool table and other games. So fun for us! And there is a Farmer Boys right next to the hotel. But you know what was the cherry on top? The people that work there were so fantastic. I can't remember who checked us in but he was so kind. Helped get our pull out beds set up right away. Dustin maybe.  And these two very sweet ladies, Veronica and Llesenia offer to make our kids Hot Chocolate with warm milk from the back. Just so thoughtful and kind. Wonderful woman.  And you are so close to the airport but you don't hear a
Manager Response: Greetings, Saberlove123  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this AWESOME review on your visit with us last weekend. Did you know that we recently celebrated our 2 year anniversary this past January; so not only are we renovated but we are new! We have plenty to offer our guests from complimentary breakfast and Evening Social, our beautiful heated pool and sports court, the game room, and so much more. The greatest amenity we have to offer however is our fabulous team, from Front Desk to Food & Beverage to Housekeeping; our entire team is committed to making each guest feel welcome and at home.  We hope you and your family will join us again during your next visit to Irvine! We look forward to hosting you all once more.  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: 1) Alicia -- who makes up the room = excellent 2) Itsy - helps with dinner prep = sweet, smart, courteous, helpful 3) Barbara - responsible for dinner = highly efficient, pleasant 4) Jose - maintenance = always ready to lend a hand, strong, ever willing 5) Jenny - helps with dinner prep = welcoming, warm, smiling, great presence 6) Carlos - maintenance engineer = smart, patient, kind, super-helpful, always ready
Manager Response: Greetings to our favorite duo, Detour88!  Thank you so much for recognizing some of our fabulous team members who have made your stay feel more at home. We certainly appreciate your time in sharing this with us all. We genuinely believe our staff is what turns guest stays in to Home Away From Home experiences. We look forward to seeing who impacts your stay next ;) !  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Quality üëç very clean and comfortable  Spaceüëçüè°  plenty so you feel like home/free üõèüò¥üëèüëè very comfortable, can sleep like a baby! Breakfast ü•ûüëçüòã, decent breakfast, you can choose what you wish  Great experience, thank you very much!!  üëèüëèüëèüëèüëèüëè
Manager Response: Good Morning Cesar! We appreciate you taking the time to let us know how your stay was. We are thrilled that everything was to your liking! We hope that you will keep us in mind the next time you are in the Orange County area! Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Clean, convenient, reception worth enjoying in the evening, and comfortable beds will have you not wanting to leave.  Just wish they had a grab and go breakfast in the morning for those leaving before breakfast is served.
Manager Response: Greetings, Dream25817515608  We very much appreciate your time and effort in sending over this great review! We certainly appreciate your feedback; our continuous goal is to be the very best hotel choice for our guests! Our Hilton beds are some of the comfiest around.With complimentary breakfast daily, free parking, Evening Social during the week, why would you ever want to leave?!  We appreciate your feedback regarding the "gran-n-go" breakfast idea (we are sorry that you have to be up that early!). We will certainly pass the suggestion along to management and our F&B crew to see if we can come up with something.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit! Best, Gabby & the Homewood Suites

Summary: I really like it! Nice rooms, excellent warm breakfast, very friendly employees! And great location, close to Laguna Beach, Costa Mesa, Misi√≥n and Newport Beach... pet friendly, I highly recommend these hotel!
Manager Response: Good morning, Apaol!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review and your feedback on your recent stay. We are so glad you and your family had such an enjoyable experience! Our tasty breakfast, cozy beds, and smiling team members will make you never want to leave! We hope you will join us again on your next visit to explore even more of Orange County. We'll be here waiting for you!  **We would like to clarify however that we are no longer a pet friendly hotel. We have since corrected any discrepancies found on the internet**  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Our trip to Disneyland couldn't have been any better.  The Homewood Suites staff was awesome.  I can't say enough about everyone we came in contact with.  The stay was stress free and our family had a wonderful stay.  The breakfast was great as well as the breakfast staff.  Rooms were very quiet.  Being so close to the airport you can't even hear the planes.  Thank you for a great stay!!!
Manager Response: Greetings, Navigator17057998836  Thank you so much for this glowing review! We are so pleased we made sure you had a little slice of relaxation during your whirlwind Disneyland adventure. With the many complimentary amenities we have to offer including parking, daily breakfast, and our tasty Evening Social (Monday through Thursday), we try and take some of the hard work out of your visit! At the very least, it's always nice to wake up to hot and tasty breakfast cooked just for you!   Orange County has much to offer and Irvine is a great jumping off point for many other major attractions in the local area. We hope you will visit us again the next time you and the family explore Southern California. We'll be here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites team

Summary: I have a wonderful experience during my stay at this HomeWood Suites location. Received a text of my upcoming trip and kept me updated about my room requested. was able to check-in early in if of our rooms. Also, being a Diamond has helped with the extra services such as adjoining corner rooms with a great view. Morning breakfast is always a perk üòÉ. Thank you for making our weekend stay a great one. My son and his family enjoyed their stay and decided to stay here when they visit Disney. BTW, his hotel has lots of upgrades from the previous 2 locations U stayed in. Smell new, nice flooring, cabinets, cooking facilities, deep sink, nice bathroom fixtures and lighting, bedroom reading lights are a plus, extra pop-out receptacles with USB chargers. Bathroom is roomy. Check out the
Manager Response: RobertMichaelT...hello!  We cannot thank you enough for this wonderful review, Mr. T. We truly appreciate your time and energy in sharing your experience with us all. As a Hilton Honors Diamond guest, we really appreciate your unique insight. We know there are plenty of options to stay when traveling to Irvine and Orange County and you must be familiar with our other Hilton partners!  We do have the benefit of being one of the newer properties on the block (we celebrated our two year anniversary in January) but what really sets us apart is our friendly and helpful team members who make guest services a top priority! We are so happy our team made a difference in your experience. We are certainly looking forward to seeing you and your family again on your next visit to Southern California.  Our best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I don‚Äôt usually spend time to leave reviews but I think this hotel deserve all the five stars reviews they could get. Suites are huge, breakfast is delicious and evening events (free of charge ladies and gentlemen) are amazing. Parking is easy and hotel is conveniently located near many attractions. But the best feature of this hotel is its staff. Every hotel should learn from their level of service, thy ALL are one level above the rest ! They are nice, kind, ready to help and they make you feel at home. Would I return ? For sure !  Only negative point? The shower in the suite does have curtain instead of glass door. But that‚Äôs only one tiny tiny con! Well done!!
Manager Response: Greetings, SweetPak!  We know you don't do reviews often but we truly appreciate the time you have taken to leave us one! As one of the top-rated hotels in the Irvine area, we NEED to hear from you! We truly appreciate your time ad effort in doing so. We have so many great things to offer our guests as you mentioned from complimentary parking, to daily breakfast, our Evening Social (Monday through Thursday), our great game room, and more! We certainly hope to become your go-to hotel the next time you travel to Irvine. We would love to host you again!  Sending our best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Excellent rooms, amazing quality of sleep. Breakfast was up to par, with a good selection to fit any taste.  I particularly liked that the rooms were spacious, didn't have a stale smell like most hotels, everything was clean and modern. Also a big selling point for me was that it is in a great location near my office.
Manager Response: Good Morning Martin S! We would like to thank you for taking the time to tell us how your stay was! We appreciate the feedback! Fun Fact: our property opened in January 2017! So we are just a little over 2 years old! So we try our best to keep everything looking and smelling just like new! Well we sure hope that you will give us the pleasure of making us your choice for all you business and leisure needs! Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights in early April. It was a very nice property and the staff were great. We had a 2 queen 1 Bedroom suite which was quite roomy. The breakfast was adequate(same as most Homewood). The pool and hot tub were great and the basketball court was a nice plus that my 9-year old loved. The staff were always accommodating and pleasant. The property also seemed quite clean. The only drawback is that is not really walking distance from anything exciting. Not really too big of an issue if you have a car, but should be noted for those not driving. It is super close to the airport, but airplane noise did not seem to be an issue inside of the building.
Manager Response: Greetings, Jdmaer  We appreciate you and your whole extended family joining us recently. We are glad you and the kids were comfortable in your bedroom suite; we have several varying suite configurations to fit your traveling needs. We are located in the more incorporate portion of Irvine so you can enjoy a quiet and restful stay. There is local shopping only about 1.5 miles from the hotel location over at the District in Tustin. While you might find it easier to get around with a vehicle, we do have guests who make the walk over! As the days get warmer and longer, you can't beat being outside and enjoying that California sunshine!  We look forward to hosting you and your family again the next time you visit California. Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Our stay was great, clean room, friendly staff, breakfast hot and ready! I have to say that Homewood Suites never disappoints me. I am thankful for being part of such a great membership that puts effort into making our stay comfortable, keeping the grounds on point!
Manager Response: Greetings, Judy1226!  We wish to thank you for taking the time to leave this great review on your recent trip (back) with us! We are glad that we have maintained your expectations and have continued to keep your family happy with each visit. Thank you for being a Hilton Honors member and for staying with during your visits to Orange County. We look forward to seeing you and your family again next time!  The very best, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The room was clean and remained that way everyday!! The housekeeping, AV engineer, front desk, food services, management - just made my stay amazing and a home away from home. Great breakfasts - complimentary of course.  They even had dinner - and always had a salad option. The shuttlers ran me all over town as they could.  I was in walking destination from Pacific Dental Services where I was training at the time.  It was a 5 minute walk and the hotel is in the center of all the business buzz.   Hayley, Joe,James and Gabby all made my stay especially pleasant and treated me like a friend.  I am forever grateful that those two weeks felt like home.   I hope I get to go back sometime and see them all again!!
Manager Response: Hi there Tracy! We are thrilled that we were able to make you feel at home! We sincerely appreciate all your great feedback! Our property is truly a hidden gem. Centrally located near almost everything! Only walking distance to a lot of our corporate guests businesses and just a short shuttle ride to local malls, restaurants and even the airport! Very happy that you were able to take advantage of our great breakfast, because whats better then free breakfast? Oh wait! Free  dinner with beer and wine during our evening social! We hope that you will keep us in mind for all your business and leisure needs! Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The rooms on the first floor adjacent to the pool patio and basketball court have no privacy when the shades are open. They only have black out blinds on the windows so you feel like you are in a cold cave instead of sunny CA. One night during my stay the hotel staff forgot to turn off the pool patio music sound system and the music didn‚Äôt stop until 5am keeping us awake all night. In the morning they were apologetic but did not adjust our billing to reflect their error and our bad night sleep.
Manager Response: Greetings, We are very sorry to hear about the issues you had during your stay with us. We do apologize that we did not catch the billing error, we would love to correct that for you! Please feel free to contact the hotel directly and we would be happy to get everything squared away. We sure hope you will give us another opportunity to make things right! Warm Regards, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The room it is very clean and I love it, I have to congrats Patricia Mendez for her great job, people with the enthusiasm to greet you and work makes me come back soon. The location it is very convenient
Manager Response: Good Morning Miriam! We appreciate you taking the time to let us know how your stay was. We are very pleased to hear that everything was to your liking. We hope to welcome you back again soon. Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Amazing Staff who get to know their guests!
Summary: We have been to this property twice in the past few months and I can not say enough about the team!  From check in (Very late at night) throughout the stay and goodbye after a nice breakfast three days later...everyone was amazing.  Swam and played basketball with my kids, relaxed with my wife as we had ample room for a family of 4.  Gabby, Caroline, Carlos in Engineering, Alyson and Eliza were all incredible.  They remembered my name and took the time to talk with us and to get to know us.  I would not stay anywhere else when in the area.  We also escaped to Disneyland one day during our first stay and it was super convenient from the hotel.  Rooms are clean, comp breakfast is nice and who won't love a free beer during the evening snack!
Manager Response: Good morning, Brent!  We are just thrilled you and the family had such an enjoyable stay, and one so nice that you came back to visit again!   Our bedroom suites are especially nice for families, allowing everyone to have a little peace and quiet! As the days grow longer and warmer, our pool area and outdoor sports court are great to relax or let out a little bit of energy. We are centrally located near the 405 and 55 freeways which allows you to access the beach, Disneyland, and gateways to Los Angeles county or head south towards San Diego. There's plenty to do in or near Irvine!  We can't wait to see you and your family again! Looking forward to your return visit.  Sending our very best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This hotel is new and clean! The staff was excellent, it was my daughter's birthday and they had a gift and signed card by all the employees waiting in the room when we arrived! We also were able to check in early! I received a text the day before check asking if there was anything they could do which I thought was excellent customer service!
Manager Response: Good morning, Ms. Downing!  Thank you so much for celebrating your daughter's birthday with us here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. It was a pleasure and a treat for us to rally our team to celebrate and make the day special for her. Making magical moments are something that we love to do here so we appreciate the opportunity. Thank you for taking the time to share this experience with us all. We hope to be your Home Away From Home again next time; whatever the reason for the visit! We would love to see you all again next time.  Sending you and your family our very best, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay near Airport and South Coast Plaza
Summary: Not much parking in front, but lots of parking on side, a bit of a walk.    Very clean and quiet room(s).  King bed with lots of pillows.  Closet located in bathroom next to sink. Seperate shower and toilet.  Nice sitting room with kitchenette.  Tv's in both rooms.  Pretty quiet considering closeness to airport.    will stay here again if in area.
Manager Response: Gonnahavefun4eva, we hope you had fun with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine! That's what we're all about!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review; we are certainly thrilled you enjoyed your stay. It sounds like your king bedroom suite was just right for your stay. It's amazing how close we are to Santa Ana airport and yet you may never know thanks to our newer built property.   Please be sure to join us again the next time you are visiting Orange County. We hope we get the opportunity to really wow you on your next visit!  Our best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Irvine

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful. The shuttle got me to my distance on time. They even help me when I got sick and checked on me. My room was very clean at all times. The breakfast and social dinner was delicious and the serving area very clean. The kitchen staff were very nice. They kept the dinning area very clean. The over lay of the dinning area is just so spacious. When you work in the staff greats you with a smile and warm greeting.
Manager Response: Good Morning, Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine as your home away from home. Very happy that your stay was enjoyable. Sorry to hear that you fell sick but we're glad that we were able to make you feel a bit more comfortable. Our food and beverage team are rockstars! We will be sure to send them your kudos. We hope that you will keep us in mind the next time you are in the Irvine area! Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: 2 bedrm suite is perfect for families and grandparents or large groups!
Summary: A group of us came here for a weekend getaway for the girls and it was perfect!  Friendly staff, really clean rooms, a kitchen that has practically everything, and a living room space, too.  I initially thought about an airbnb, but this place didn't have the cleaning fee and complimentary breakfast for our short stay.  Plus luxury accommodations, a pool, a jacuzzi AND a very new half basketball court! The building is only 2 years old, so everything is new.  If any complaints, the pull out bed in the living area is not as comfy as the awesome beds in the two rooms, but not as terrible as I thought they'd be considering they were those coil spring beds.  The other thing was, only if there are large crowds, but the breakfast was very good, just not hot(we came on the later part of
Manager Response: Greeting Kungfuwife! We would like to thank you for taking the time to leave us such a detailed review. We appreciate all the feedback! Thrilled that we were able to make your weekend getaway one to remember! So sorry to hear that breakfast wasn't hot! We will definitely get together with our food and beverage team to see how we can make sure that what we are serving is fresh and hot for everyone to enjoy. Weekends do tend to be on the busier side for breakfast so our team does try their best to serve all our guests to the best of their abilities.  Isn't the waffle bar great? So many options to choose from! My favorite is strawberries and whip cream! YUMM! We sure hope that you will keep us in mind for your next getaway!  Best, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Patricia Mendez, llesenia, Veronica, y Emilio. Have done a great job with us. They have treated us as if we are in their own home and have made us feel at home. Thanks to them I don‚Äôt want to leave. Thank you
Manager Response: Greetings, Jose!  They say the quickest way to the heart is through the stomach, right?! Sometimes a warm meal and friendly company is what you truly need to feel at home. What can we say about our amazing housekeeping team? We know Patricia and the entire department take pride in keeping our hotel in tip top shape. We are so glad you have formed such a bond with so many members of our team. Thank you for your recognition and review of your stay so far; we look forward to sharing your thoughtful words with them. In the meantime, we won't think of the time in which you all must finally return to your "other" home...  Wishing you and your family the very best, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I travel very often. This hotel was wonderful. Very clean and modern. Great front desk personnel also. Very much recommended. The beds were exceptionally comfortable and the showers wee great also.  Everett
Manager Response: Dear travellin__man049,  We are sure you've visited a lot of hotels to be considered a traveling man! Thank you for selecting the Homewood Suites Irvine during your recent visit. We think you definitely made a good choice! We recently finished a renovation project to better our guest suite showers and we are so pleased you noticed the difference! Providing the very best experience for our guests is what we aim for every single day.  We hope you will Be Our Guest again the next time you visit Orange County. You will always get a good night's sleep and friendly service with the Homewood Suites!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites

Summary: I was in the hotel for 2 months and I just felt like in home, this definitely bcs all the staff was wonderful with me. In special thanks to Jorge from maintenance and for the amazing Hayley, she made my days great and she helped me always. Appreciate the human resource.
Manager Response: Greetings, Jorge!  Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback on your extended stay with us. We can only hope you felt like family after spending that length of stay here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Thank you for recognizing some of the team members turned friends you made along the way. We hope you will join us again, for work or for play. Your California family will be waiting for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: My stay at Homewood was just amazing. The staff made me feel so at home during my 12 days stay there. James was always so nice and pleasant and always there when we needed him. Haleigh is always bubbly and is always around to put a smile on your face on down days. Joe is very hardworking and is always on time when we needed to be dropped off. Overall the staff worked as a team and that made our experience a very pleasant one.
Manager Response: Hello, Samiej2019!  We appreciate you leaving this review and sharing your experience from your recent stay. Our team members, from F&B to housekeeping to front desk, are the keys to really making your visit feel like you are home. We are so pleased you get to know some of our Front Desk team who made you feel welcomed. We will be sure to pass along your kudos! We hope you will stay with us again the next time you visit Orange County. We'll be waiting for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Room was spacious and very nice.  Clean quiet and comfortable.  Good location parking is free.  Pool and recreation week laid out.  Staff was very friendly and helpful. Hayley at the front desk was fantastic.
Manager Response: Good morning, William!  We wish to thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback regarding your stay. We are so pleased you had such a great time with us! In a world full of paid parking, we enjoy that we can extend complimentary parking to our Homewood Suites Irvine guests. Hopefully you got to use that extra money to splurge on a tasty treat or an outing. One of our goals is to provide an incredible value to our guests. Thank you for recognizing a member of our team who made a special impact in your stay.   We hope you will join us again on your next visit to Orange County. Looking forward to seeing you again! Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I was disappointed in my experience during the last two stays at the SNA Hilton, so I decided to try out the Homewood Suites. What a joy! A prompt pickup from the airport resulting in the surprise of a brand new room with all the latest upgrades! I especially like the shower design. There was a 20% discount coupon to a local hamburger chain included but I decided the included ‚Äúlight‚Äù dinner was more than sufficient and satisfying. Their shuttle only starts at 6am and so I was prepared to have to pay for a taxi to the airport at 5am the next morning. But no - the hotel actually booked me a complementary Uber that arrived on time. Such a welcome surprise! Thank you! I‚Äôm looking forward to returning!
Manager Response: Mr. Beckley,  It was a real treat to have you stay with us the other night. Thank you so much for taking the chance and giving our Homewood Suites property a shot. We thrilled you had such a delightful experience and want to thank you for sharing it with us all through this review. We know as a loyal Diamond guest with Hilton you have lots of choices where to stay. We hope to be your Home Away From Home when you come to Irvine again; it does sound like it's a safe bet!!  We are looking forward to seeing you next time. Hope it's soon!  Best regards, Gabby (your shuttle driver) and the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Great location. Beds were the most comfortable hotel bed ever slept in! Large rooms. Very quiet. Very clean. Breakfast fueled us, but not our favorite. Staff was kind and helpful. Facility was entertaining for our young children.
Manager Response: Jennifer!  It is so great to receive your feedback from your stay with us this past weekend. We hope the whole gang had a good vacation! We have plenty of ways to entertain (and exhaust) our younger guests with our game room, sports court, and pool. Did you know we also have board games you can check out at the front desk and enjoy in your room?? We would love to hear any ways you think we could improve upon our breakfast items. We certainly love changes ourselves! Please bring the family back (and whoever else wants to join) on your next visit to Orange County. We'll be here waiting for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Beautiful hotel near the highway and airport. Never heard planes in the room, a small amount of road noise in the morning. Breakfast was pretty good with a large seating area. Pool was nice, we didn‚Äôt use but saw many people enjoying it even in March. The only off thing is when you stood by bathroom sink, it was difficult to get in and out of shower/toilet area.  The person at sink had to move over.  But, with a full fridge, microwave, two stove burners, and dishes it was well worth that bit of discomfort.  Beds super comfortable.
Manager Response: Greetings, Simon!  We want to thank you for taking the time to leave feedback on your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and are so glad you had an enjoyable stay! As a newer built property, we can certainly enjoy the fact that we are well-insulated! We are very near John Wayne Airport but you'd never know! Our suites, with well-equipped kitchenettes, are great for any length of stay! We hope you will join us again for another visit the next time you are traveling to Irvine. It would surely be our pleasure to be your Home Away From Home next visit!  Our best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites

Summary: I want to thank Hilton for working so hard to make this the cleanest and most relaxing hotel I've stayed at in probably a decade.  The room was lovely and filled with attention to detail (wine opener, glasses, reading lights, movable furniture, ceiling fan, comfy bed, titanium white linens, etc. etc.).  The walk-in shower, albeit a bit low in pressure, was fine.  The breakfast was delightful-- not the usual phone-it-in breakfast offered by other chains.  The all-day coffee and water bar was VERY welcome.  The spa fantastic (the tension in my lower back was temporarily eliminated!).  No-fee parking was nice too.  We had a VERY tired brother who took an overnight flight- didn't sleep a wink- who was tired and haggard and overwhelmed when he landed.  We booked your hotel to help
Manager Response: Greetings and hello, D K! Thank you so much for this exciting and wonderful review you have left for us; it was a real treat to read your insights in to your experience. We are so happy that everything was just perfect for your entire family. It means a great to us that you took the time and energy to leave this review for us. Your word and opinions echos far more than anything information we can provide to prospective guests. We will certainly be thanking the staff on your behalf so they can be reminded that their hard-work and care has made the difference for our guests.  We certainly hope you will join us again; it sounds like you now have plenty of reasons to visit Irvine. We would love for you to be a part of our Homewood Suites family more often.  Sending our very best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I frequently stay here ... almost live here lol great rooms, modern , great tv .. the only gripe I have ( and with all Marriotts, Hilton‚Äôs, etc) the tv setting that sims down on its own and looks dark!! Every hotel I go to does that fml . I‚Äôm seriously going to buy a 100$ control so that I can adjust that on tvs ... but never the less, great hotel
Manager Response: Good Morning Petr702! First and foremost we appreciate your continued loyalty to our property! We are honored that you chose us to be your home away from home! We will certainly get with our maintenance team and see what we can do about the TV. Please feel free to reach out to any one of our front desk team members the next time you are with us. We will look forward to seeing you again soon! Best Regards, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Stayed here for a family trip to California Adventure, Universal Studios and a trip to the beach off of Balboa Island. The hotel is in a great location, just off the 55 freeway and a short drive to Disney and Newport/ Balboa beach. We had previously stayed at this hotel with our daughter's volleyball team for a tournament in March 2017. We came back because of the cleanliness and great service. Check in was a breeze, the rooms were clean , the beds were comfortable, including the pull out sofa. We had six in our party, and there was plenty of room for us. Having a stocked kitchen is definitely a bonus, and the breakfast provided was satisfactory. The kids loved making there own waffles and the oatmeal was creamy and delicious. Definitely would return to this location again.
Manager Response: Greetings Juan! We were absolutely thrilled to welcome you back to your home away from home! Our location is a hidden gem tucked away from traffic but close to most local attractions! We hope you and the family enjoyed your time with mickey and friends! I am with the kiddos, the waffle station is my FAVORITE!! We sure hope we see you guys again soon!  Best Wishes, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Hotel was very clean, quiet, and comfortable! Breakfast was appreciated. Not the best we‚Äôve experienced, but we were fueled to start our day. The facilities were new, and very clean. Friendly staff. Location was fantastic.
Manager Response: Greetings! We would like to thank you for taking the time to leave a review! We appreciate the feedback. We're thrilled that we were able to host you during your visit to Orange County. We hope that you will keep us in mind the next time you are in the area! We would love to earn that last star from you ;) Best Regards, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Nobody follows up with attempting to extend your stay.. I understand if it cant be done but please follow up and show me you guys care about your customers, Overall hotel is great but customer service is far from perfect
Manager Response: Dear Vacation36346641708,  We want to sincerely apologize for falling short in the service department. We would like to hear more about your experience in-depth so we do not make the same mistake for you, or any other guest, for your next visit. Please feel free to reach out to the property directly either by phone or email so we may speak at greater lengths about your experience. We understand that guest's travel plans may change suddenly and we certainly do our best to accommodate, and respond back, to guests in a timely manner. We are very sorry that you did not receive the customer service that we generally known for here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We hope to make things right for you on your next visit.  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Irvine

Summary: I am a handicap person and the moment I checked in the front desk representative ( can‚Äôt remember her name but worked Sunday at 5pm on the 10th of March ) she was very helpful and made sure I had an accessible room, Lucrecia the room attendant was very helpful, and since I  have a challenge with my mobility she always asked me if I needed anything else ! the same way was Emilio in the breakfast area he was a great help while I stayed at the hotel the general manager helped me out the day I didn‚Äôt see Emilio. I witnessed the GM going on the floor asking the housekeeping how everything was going and telling them about the day! Within minutes he was at the breakfast area helping out ! Thank you for a great experience
Manager Response: Good morning, Jcane22016!   Thank you so very much for sharing your lovely experience with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Here, kindness and caring are the topic of the day, every day! We are so glad you had such great interactions with so many members of our team and they made a difference in your experience. Our main goal is for all of our guests to have pleasant and comfortable stays under our roof. It all starts from the top and we have wonderful leadership who embody that philosophy and share it with the team.  We hope you will join us again the next time you travel to Orange County. It would be our pleasure to host you on another visit.  Our very best, Gabby & the entire Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Nice newer hotel, comfortable and spacious rooms.   They have a nice lobby area and you can tell it is well kept. did not try the exercise room, the pool, hottub or the basketball court.  Although if it had been warmer that would be a possibility
Manager Response: Good morning, Curious41358494062!  Happy 2nd anniversary to us! Our property was built and opened in January 2017 so we are awfully pleased that we still have that "new hotel smell" to our hallways. While it might be a little cooler here in California (we have to experience winter sometime!), our pool is heated year-round to a comfortable 80 degrees F.! Hopefully you will be able to enjoy all of our outdoor amenities. If the weather outside is a little frightful, you can always enjoy our game room with a pool table, shuffle board, and plenty of board game options to enjoy!  We hope you and your family will join us again next time you journey out to Southern California. We'd love the chance to host you all once more.  Sending our best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Great place in Irvine for family!
Summary: Very good, friendly and caring people. Very  clean , new facility with warm outdoor pool and hot tub, good gym,  many elevators. Good place for business meetings too. We Will come again when in the area.
Manager Response: Greetings Hamid, We are so pleased to hear that your visit was enjoyable. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review, we appreciate the feedback! We hope that you will give us the pleasure of hosting you again soon. Best Regards, Eliza  The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We recently had an extended stay at Homewood Suites in Irvine, and it was a wonderful experience.  Our accommodations were superb, but what made our stay so joy-full were the extraordinary staff that became like family to us.  I specifically want to point out: Gabby, Caroline,Joe, and others on the reception desk.  They never failed to wish us a good day by name, and responded to any requests we made immediately and with professional skill. Emilio, Barbara, Jennifer, Jazmin, Itsy, and others that were like family to us. We literally came to cherish each one of them!  We intend to return periodically just to say hello and give them each a hug! Alicia who took care of our room.  She was always cheerful, and went beyond the call of duty to do an exemplary job each day. I commend
Manager Response: Greetings, Explore487745!  Mr. & Mrs, Hoffman, it was a bittersweet day when you two left our Homewood Suites Irvine but we are so happy it was to return home! It was our pleasure and privilege to be there for you when you needed it. Thank you for recognizing our team and the special staff members who made an impact in your stay. We will certainly be sharing your review with the rest of the staff. Guest satisfaction is one of our top priority and your detailed review reaffirms we are fulfilling our goals.   Please come visit us again and know that you are always welcome home here with us. We would love to see you both, even just for a quick visit!  Sending our very best to you, Gabby & the entire Homewood Suites team

Summary: I've been staying at this hotel for the last 2 years. The rooms are very comfortable and the staff are excellent. A special call out to Jenny, Itzy and Barbara for their fantastic customer service. I look forward to staying here on my next visit
Manager Response: Good morning, Gurushankar!  Thank you so much for sharing your experiences here at the Homewood Suites Irvine with us all. We greatly value your decision to make us your Home Away From Home and we are so glad we have made you feel like family. It means a lot to us all to see familiar faces grace our lobby! We are looking forward to many more visits from you.  We are here for you if you need anything anytime!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Super impressed with everything about this hotel and staff
Summary: 5 night stay with our family (3 kids ages 7, 4, and 2). Very family-friendly (staff actually acted like they wanted us there and were so kind to our kids), all areas of the hotel were very clean (they didn't even let much time pass before drying up drips from swimmers returning to their rooms), breakfast and evening social snack was awesome and the menu changed everyday, the pool was clean and had nice amenities (fire pit and nice bathroom), we are still talking about how kind the staff was! Anyone looking for a hotel for a family trip, even to Disney, should strongly consider this place. Parking and internet are free and it's only a few minutes from Disney. I researched a bunch of hotels near Disney and this one was a much better value. Plus it was a nice central spot for
Manager Response: Greetings, Margetts family!  From the bottom of our hearts, thank you so much for such an amazing review on your stay with us. It means so much to us that you had such a pleasant stay and received the Home Away From Home treatment!! It was a treat for us to get to know your family and hear about your adventures during your visit.   Our hotel is certainly a good jumping off point to many locations within Orange County including, but certainly not limited to, the Happiest Place on Earth. There are plenty of great beaches twenty minutes or less from the hotel. I hope the kids got to check out the tide pools at Crystal Cove! We are glad the hotel provided a warm and comfortable environment for everyone to come back and relax after your busy and exciting days. We hope your family will stay with us again the next time you visit Southern California. We'll be waiting to greet you all with open arms and big smiles once again!  Our very best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for families
Summary: Staff very friendly and helpful. Hotel was new, clean with nice amenities‚Äîbigger pool and workout room. Kids enjoyed the basketball court and we all liked the game room. We were 3 families in town for a memorial service/long weekend so appreciated having stuff to do at the hotel for the kids. Would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Greetings! We would like to thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine to be your home away from home. We appreciate you taking the time to leave a rating and review from you recent visit. We're so happy that we were able to  keep the kiddos busy during your stay. We hope to welcome you back sometime soon, maybe when its a bit hotter so the family can get full use of our great pool! Until next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This hotel is a great option in this area. Staff very friendly and helpful. The suite has a full kitchen with large freezer what was great with kids! Close to John Wayne airport and 405 freeway easy to go around!
Manager Response: Greetings, Costa family!  It is so great to have you all here with us once again! We truly appreciate you choosing our location for your extended stay in the Irvine area. Perhaps you feel At Home with us now? Our suites with the kitchenettes and a variety of configurations are great for all travelers; families, groups, teams, solo guests, you name it!  Please let us know if there is anything else we can do to ensure your family's comfort during the rest of your visit!  Our very best, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Excellent service at the evening social!
Summary: I asked if I get a serving of meat without the bun.  Absolutely!  And delivered with  a smile!  Even received a freshly baked cookie ...great way to end a work day!  Thank you to a great group of ladies...Itzy, Barbara, and Jenny!
Manager Response: Hello and good morning to you, 14519!  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about the great experience you had during your visit with us. Our team members are what truly make each guest interaction the very best. Excellent attention and service are what keep the Homewood Suites Irvine one of the best in town!  We hope you will be our guest once again the next time you are in Orange County. Rest assured you are at home when you stay the night with us!  Sending our very best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Our family has been to this hotel every few months since they opened.  This is by far my favorite in all our travels.  They are very polite and helpful. The rooms are immaculate and the breakfast and dinner crew are always spot on and go the extra mile.  We have 5 kids from 4 to 18 and they have something for everyone.  From the game room to the pool ( and a little wine or beer for Mom and dad) I would highly recommend staying here.  A few great employees this stay are Patricia Mewnez, itzy, Barbara, and Jenny.  The front desk Is always great and a very nice gentleman who is always so helpful with my kids at breakfast (sorry I forgot your name). This is mostly a place for professionals like my husband but a great place for the family to hang out while he is working.
Manager Response: Greetings, Mycorrhizaefamily  You are correct; we do cater to many business clients working in the greater Irvine area. You may be surprised how hotel transfers over the weekends and in the summer holiday season! Our suites, with the kitchenette, living, and bedroom options, are great for families and corporate travelers alike! We are so glad that we were just right for you and your family's visits.  Thank you so much for recognizing our stellar team members who have gone above and beyond to make your stays extra special. We look forward to seeing you all again next time!  Our very best regards, Gabby & the entire Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Always a cosy and safe place to stay
Summary: Staying this place for the 2nd time for business trip.   Recent stay is mid Feb this year for about 8 days.  Love the bed! The bed is so comfortable and overall cleanliness of the place is good.  Staff there are very friendly, helpful and professional.  Only dislike is the "standard variety of breakfast" offered; if one stay beyond 3 days may get "bored" with the choices offered.
Manager Response: Greetings and hello, Sabloy!  Thank you for staying with us again at the Homewood Suites Irvine during your travels to Orange County. Can't beat the walk to work from the hotel, can you?! We are so pleased that our facilities were just right for your extended stay for work.   Thank you for your feedback regarding breakfast. We do offer the same staples daily such as hot cereal, cold cereal, baked goods, yogurt, and more but our hot dishes rotate daily. We are even exploring more tasty options to serve like enchiladas on Friday and offer egg whites for a healthy alternative.  We hope you will join us for another stay to get even more variety in your stay. We look forward to hosting you on your next visit, for work or for fun!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Great location, centrally located in the Southern California region. We had a problem with the guest above us (heavy feet, banging around at 5:00 am), so we requested a higher floor and was accommodated as requested. Water pressure in the shower could have been better, but we managed. Overall, a good hotel with free morning breakfast!
Manager Response: Greetings, BKDohana!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave your feedback on your recent experience with us! Your review means a great deal to spreading the good word of our Homewood Suites Irvine property! Or maybe we are best kept as a secret ;).   We apologize for the noise disturbance on your first night and are so pleased you gave us the opportunity to make it better for the family. We are currently in the process of reworking our shower heads in the room so hopefully your next visit will be a bit better in that regards. We hope you all will join us again the next time you travel down south to Orange County. We would love to be your Home Away From Home again next time!  Our very best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Beautiful hotel and nice people. I am in town for work. just checked in! Should be a great time. Beds are comfy. Can‚Äôt wait to try the food! The spa looks great as well. The pool inviting. Should be a good time
Manager Response: Greetings, We're thrilled to be given the chance to host you. Please do not hesitate to reach out with any questions or concerns you may have. We hope that you are able to call the Homewood Suites Irvine your "home away from home" during all your business travel needs. If there is anything you may need during your stay feel free to ask any one of our wonderful team members, they would love to help! Best, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Greatly enjoyed my stay at this hotel, my second time. Rooms were nice and spacious, clean and well-organized. Breakfast offered many great options, both healthy and indulgent. Staff were very friendly. Location was excellent. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Good Morning Nicholas Zientarski! Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us how your stay was. We were thrilled to have welcomed you back for a second time. We hope that you will continue to have us host you every time you are in the Irvine area! Warm Regards, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I had the best Birthday Party here, Thanks a lot for the Wine and the "Awesome" card!! I have to thank Emilio, Barbara, Gabby, Kim, Hayley, Joe, James, Caroline Alyssa,Patricia Mender, Jenny,Carlos,David, Zee, Veronica,  Chavelly,Jazmine,!! You guys are amazing!!
Manager Response: Vijay,  Come on! Do we need to say more? You are part of the Homewood Suites family! It is our pleasure to help celebrate your special day even though you are away from home. Same time next year then?  Lots of hugs and well wishes for your special day!

Summary: I was with the hotel for an extended stay and loved the whole experience.  Staff was exceptional, rooms were clean and comfortable, housekeeping was very good and everything was so convenient for my stay.
Manager Response: Greetings, Mrs. Cook!  We are pleased and hope this response finds you well at home. Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback regarding your experience. We know your stay was different and you weren't staying in Irvine for "the fun of it". We are glad we were able to provide you with all the comforts of home during your recuperation. We hope you will be able to join us another visit for some R&R! We are always here for you if you need anything and look forward to your return stay.  Sending our very best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites team

Summary: Excellent hotel for business or family. Super clean. The room are like small apartments with all kitchen appliances. Nice snack store at the lobby. Great breakfast every morning included in the price. 25 minutes from Disney parks at Anaheim. Highly recommended, super friendly staff. Definitely I will stay again!
Manager Response: Greetings, 781zuleikac  Thank you so much for your time in leaving us this lovely review! We really appreciate your feedback on your recent stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine.
