Our spacious guest suites and myriad of complimentary amenities make us a great choice for any length of stay. We are so pleased you enjoyed all the comforts of home while visiting. We hope you will be our guest again the next time you are in the Orange County area. We'd love to host you again!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites team

Summary: Stayed one night on business before flying out next am. Very new and clean hotel. Front desk and shuttle staff service was outstanding. Great evening social hour and breakfast. I stay in Hilton properties all the time and this one was most excellent. Hats off to the staff and management at this one!
Manager Response: Good morning, 51randalls  As a loyal Hilton Honors member, we thank you for choosing our Homewood Suites Irvine location during your recent business trip. There are lots of Hilton options in our vicinity near John Wayne Airport to choose from. We offer a great value to our guests by including our daily breakfast, Evening Social during the week days, complimentary parking, and even a shuttle service for those who may opt not to use a car during their visit.   We are so pleased that our team members made such a positive impact in your stay. Each individual goes out of their way to make sure that each and every guest feels welcomed and At Home during their visit. We hope next time you are in the area, you will stay with us again! We're here for you if you need anything.  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This was our first experience with Homewood Suites by Hilton and will now be one of our preferred hotels.  Our King bed suite was large, clean and complete with all the amenities for a comfortable four day stay.  We chose this hotel due to its having free parking and included breakfast, since we were attending a four day event at the Honda Center, nearby in Anaheim.  Morning breakfast buffet had sufficient choices and varied some of the main items each day.  The hotel staff members were all pleasant and helpful.  This would be a particularly good place for a family, since it had a full kitchen with appliances and all the cookware and tableware to prepare meals.
Manager Response: Greetings, Mr. Moak!  Thank you for joining us while you attended the Four Continents competition in Anaheim. It is amazing how many diverse sporting events our part of Orange County can host throughout the year. We know you might have had many choices that were closer to the Honda Center so we thoroughly appreciate being your hotel of choice. We are pleased that our daily breakfast added some variety to your stay and helped fuel you for the day's events. We hope you were also able to partake in some of our Evening Social during the week. What a nice way to wind down with a tasty plate and a glass of wine after a long day!  We hope you two will join us again, no matter the reason for your visit. It would be our treat to be your Home Away From Home next time you visit Orange County.  Best wishes, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for business or pleasure
Summary: My husband was here for work so I came along with him for R&R and some warm weather,  We both are very impressed with the hotel,  It has a beautiful pool area, with a heated pool, nice hot tub and a fire. The rooms of course are clean and updated,  The staff is exceptionally kind helpful, Monday - Thursday they have a nice happy hour from 5-7 in the lobby area (which is quit spacious) that includes two different beers on tap and Red and White Wine. It also included a light but filling snack of soup and salad and cold cuts and crackers. We got a extra treat arriving on a Sunday, they were having a special party for the Grammy's, with fun game and great food and drink.  Both Zee and David took care of us and other guest. They treated us like we were friends visiting them for a
Manager Response: Good Morning Amy, First and foremost, thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy that you and your husband continue to have good experiences here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Our Grammy party seems to have been quite a hit, so happy that you were able to enjoy it! Our property is truly Irvine's hidden gem, centrally located and easy access to shops, entertainment and business. We look forward to hosting you and your husband in the future! Warm Regards,  Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Every employee seems to go above and beyond to make everything pretty great. I casually mentioned during 1 of the Mon-Thu light dinner receptions that I had a craving for chocolate chip cookies, and 15 minutes later out they came, still warm with yummy melted chips.  Barbara and Jenny are the best! I couldn't get the hot tub jets to turn on and maintenance came out quickly to show me that you had to hold the button for literally 13 seconds. The front desk people always say "have a good day" and "welcome back" whenever you come and go if they're not busy with another guest. Lots of good positives. Light traffic around the hotel. Easy on and off Hwy 55. Comfortable beds. I gave them 4 stars and not 5 due to a few slight negatives. It is super close to the John Wayne airport and
Manager Response: Greetings, haysfamily6a  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this thorough review regarding your stay. As an extended stay guest, we appreciate your unique insight; by being here longer, you can really get in depth! We are so pleased that everything so far with your stay has been pretty excellent, especially how warm and "home-y" our staff has made your visit. Our common goal throughout our team is to make you feel welcomed, and maybe you'll never want to leave!  Unfortunately, we cannot be eyes and ears in every single location of the hotel. If you have any additional information regarding the individual mentioned in your review, we would appreciate further details so we may look in to it. In addition to fabulous service, we want to ensure all of our guests feel safe and comfortable during their visit.   If there is anything else we may do to ensure you have a pleasant stay with us, we want to know! We're here for you 24/7!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: My family and I were in town for the State Cup soccer tournament.  We are a family of 5 and need a lot of space.  Homewood Suites is a wonderful hotel.  The suites are very spacious and clean.  The free breakfast was delicious with a variety of choices.  We would definitely recommend this hotel.  Excellent experience!
Manager Response: Greetings, Ms. L!  Thank you so very much for selecting our Homewood Suites Irvine location for your family's recent visit to the area. Hopefully some of the other teammates were able to join you and keep everyone company. Teams that play together, stay together, right?? Please join us again for another visit, no matter the reason. We are sure your family would have another great time. Maybe a dip in the pool, a round of shuffleboard in the game room, or just spend some quality time in our lodge!  We are looking forward to seeing you all again soon. Sending our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The hotel is really good. its place is good to reach other cities in OC. You can reach anywhere at max 20 mins. Air conditioner was a bit noisy but not too much to disturb you.  I stayed there for 30 days in row  and it was really comfortable. It has a parking lot for free and you can always find a space. Hotel serves dinner from 5pm to 7pm / 8pm from monday to thursday (4 days)  there is always salad and soup.
Manager Response: Good Morning Muge T, We appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback on your extended stay. We are so happy that you were comfortable. Here at the Homewood Suites Irvine we want our guest to feel as if they are at their "Home away from home" We hope you will keep us in mind the next time you are in the area!  Warm Regards,  Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Great experience at the Homewood Suites
Summary: I selected this hotel for considering the distance from the company that I visited, of course it worked out perfectly. However, one more thing that I didn't really expect, that is 'this hotel is damm good!!!'  It is so clean, quiet and cozy. It has an own kitchen, so you can cook. It provides complimentary breakfast which is so nice. Most of all, it provides complimentary dinner social, which provides light salad and snack and free BEER and WINE!! I have never experience this types of service before. I very appreciated their service, especially Barbara and Jenny, you were awesome. Great experience!!
Manager Response: Greetings, Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your stay was. We're thrilled that you were able to enjoy our wonderful amenities. Our suites are extra special because we do offer a full kitchen so you can always have a home cooked meal or join us for a light bite and drink. Our F&B team is wonderful and are always there to aid with anything you may need. We sure hope you will keep us in mind the next time you are in the Irvine area.  Till next time, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Very accommodating hotel and friendly staff
Summary: From the time we arrived, it has been extremely pleasant. We were able to check in early and get all of our stuff set. It is very quiet and I couldn‚Äôt hear our neighbors or anyone above us. The staff are accommodating and very friendly. We are always greeted with a smile and a warm hello. The breakfast has many options to choose from for any diet. The rooms are spacious and don‚Äôt feel at all crammed. Very clean and I always see someone cleaning. The beds are comfortable and that includes the couch pull out bed. The 24 hour fitness center is nice and clean as well. It smells nice for a hotel.  We stayed her during Grammy‚Äôs weekend and they hosted a wonderful Grammy Party with beer, wine, and other delicious appetizers. Some of our favorite staff were Zee and David, who were great
Manager Response: Hello Kristine! We are thrilled that we were able to accommodate your early check in and it set the tone for a great visit here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your stay was. Glad that you were able to take advantage of our great fitness center and the room was to your liking.  So happy that you got to be apart of our little shindig and you had a great time! We sure hope that you keep us in mind the next time you are in the Orange County area.  Till next time, Eliza & the Homewood Suites Tea,

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel amenities, but Room poorly designed
Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed the convenient location of the hotel, and the enormous included breakfast and ample evening snack, as well as the fitness facility, pool (nice and warm) and jacuzzi.  Being retired, we had ample time to enjoy the facilities after attending a play the night before.  Since we slept in later (compared to business travelers), we were more sensitive to the noise from the airplanes and cars, despite insulated windows.  Also, the curtains were not blackout-worthy, with significant light coming in quite early in the morning.  Otherwise, the refrigerator and other homey touches in the unit were very good.  Do not get a room on the Red Hill side of the hotel (noisy)....try for one overlooking the parking lot.
Manager Response: Greetings, Mr. Simonson!  Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine on your recent visit to Orange County. We know there are many choices for places to stay, including by the Segerstrom Performing Arts Center, but we very much appreciate your selecting us! We are glad you had an enjoyable stay-cation with us and got to partake in some of the great amenities our property has to offer.   Thank you for your feedback regarding your in-room experience. We apologize that aspects of the room were not quite as satisfactory. We would love to get you situated in a room more to your preferences for your next visit so please give us a call! Our friendly front desk are available 24 hours to assist you as best as possible. We certainly hope you will join us the next time a good play comes to the Performing Arts Center! We are looking forward to your next visit.  Our best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Joe, Carolyn, and Hayley are there for your every need. Truly amazing. Great breakfast and an evening social with food Monday thru Thursday. If you are looking for a place to stay look no further. Most of the quest were here for business, but I have two young children and fit right in. Comfortable beds with a nice kitchen in your room. Nice place and the costumer service will not be beat. Found our new spot for family vacations. Wont find a better place for the money. Thank you to everyone at the hotel.
Manager Response: Hello there, Billy B!  Thank YOU for selecting the Homewood Suites Irvine as your hotel during your recent travels. Yes, we do cater predominantly to our local business travelers on the week days but you'd be awfully surprised how that dynamic may change on the weekends! Either way, our large suites with kitchenettes and all the amenities we have to offer may us a great choice for just about anyone. Unless you don't like saving money and having an amazing visit.   We are so pleased to hear that you will be joining u again the next time you visit. It means a great deal to us when we see familiar faces walk through our doors. You always have a home with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Looking forward to your next visit!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We did a family vacation to Disneyland and stayed here since it was the as close as a hotel for the nicest hotel in our pricerange. It was awesome! I totally recommend it. The drive to Disney wasn't bad at all. There's also a really neat shopping center in Tustin 5 minutes away that we visited several times. It was also aboutthe the same distance to the beach in the other direction that Disneyland was, which was nice. And its literally less than 5 minutes from John Wayne airport (but don't worry... you can'take hear the planes from your room)So...the staff was super awesome. Everyone from the front desk, to housekeeping, to the kitchen, to maintainence were amazing. The breakfast was great! They have a little different main dish option every day. Loved the biscuits and gravy the
Manager Response: Dearest Daydream21504641597  We just cannot thank you enough for such a delightful review of your recent stay. We don't want to throw out the word, "perfection" but it certainly sounds like we came pretty close!! It's super important to get a good night's rest and head to the Disneyland parks with a full belly to ensure a successful visit. Being so close to several major freeways, we are a great alternative option to those with plans outside of Irvine but also don't want to stay in the more crowded areas.   While there are so many great aspects to our property that you mentioned, we believe our amazing team members are the ones who make the greatest impact in each guest's experience. We are so happy that so many of our different employees stood out and made your stay the best! We would love to share your review with them so they know how much they are appreciated by our guests.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Orange County, whatever the reason may be! We're here for you and your family.  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Excellent hotel for the price. Great eveving social mon- thurs. Outdoor pool and small jacuzzi. Pleasant restaurant in the parking lot with good food that was reasonably priced. Make sure you try one of their shakes!
Manager Response: Greetings, Q5857JAcindyk!  Great value (and great service) are the name of the game around the Homewood Suites Irvine! Being a big away from the hubbub of John Wayne Airport, we are thrilled to be able to provide free parking and other great amenities to really help our guests on their travels. We are so happy you got to enjoy some of our other perks like our Evening Social. Did you know that we also post a monthly calendar in each guest room so you can actually plan your night out?? Hopefully your next visit falls on slider night; yum yum!  Farmer Boys has also become a great addition to our location and certainly helps change things up for our guests who visit often. I heard their cookies and creams are the best!  Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine during your recent travels. We certainly hope to see you in our lobby (or over at Farmer Boys) again!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: You can NOT go wrong staying here
Summary: The hotel itself is VERY well looked after - rooms in excellent condition, facilities plentiful and in great shape. What sets this hotel apart though is their staff - everyone here really enjoys excelling in making sure your stay is enjoyable, and it shows. We stayed here for trips to Disneyland and other places around LA, the location is perfect, and not being in Anaheim is marginally cheaper than much worse hotels (we know, we've stayed in them too...) so represents fantastic value for money.
Manager Response: Greetings from the U.S., Mr. K!  We hope this message means that your family has returned safely home after your holiday. Thank you so very much for taking the time to leave this review on our Homewood Suites Irvine property. We are certain we visited many locations throughout your vacation and we are thrilled to be one of the ones to have stood out.  Irvine is indeed a great jumping off point in Orange County. We're around 16 miles to the Magic Kingdom, about 11 miles from the Pacific Ocean, and close to the major freeways to bring you to Los Angeles County. Convenient but not in the thick of it, eh?  We understand traveling with a big family can get costly after some time. That is why we love to provide our daily breakfast, Evening Social through the week, free parking, and other complimentary amenities throughout the hotel. We hope you and the family got to enjoy some sunny pool time outside visiting the park.  Please think of us the next time you choose to visit the West Coast. It's a big world to travel out there but rest assured you will always have a home with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine!  Our very best regards, Gabby & the entire Homewood Suites team

Summary: The hotel is very nice and up to date. The staff are so nice and helpful. Especially Barbara and Jenny!!! They were so helpful and nice to talk to. There are so many amenities here like the indoor gym , gas grill, hot tub, heated pool, basketball court, etc !!!
Manager Response: Hello there, Nghiavo187  Thank you so very much for your review following your stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We appreciate you sharing your experience with the entire community. We have loads of fun outdoor activities to enjoy like the ones you had mentioned as well as a fire pit. However, when the weather has been a bit frightful like with all our rain recently, you can hang out inside at our lodge or shoot pool in the game room. Rain or shine, there are plenty of ways to spend your time!  We hope you will be our guest again the next time you visit Irvine. We will be waiting for you with warm smiles and another comfortable stay!  Our best regards, Gabby & Homewood Suites Irvine

Summary Heading: Super comfy suite with great bed!
Summary: Really great room layout. One of the  most comfortable beds I have had on travel yet. Complementary happy hour and breakfast were also a hit.  Hotels like this help round out the Hilton Honors lineup - from the higher end Hiltons to these super comfy Homewood suites
Manager Response: Greetings Relax15582208274.  We hope you didn't oversleep your alarm in our big comfy beds! Did you know that Hilton has a website where you can actually purchase items used in our various hotels? You can get a great night's sleep any time! Or maybe we want to make sure you come back and visit us ;). Either way, we are so happy you had an enjoyable experience with us and we hope you will choose the Homewood Suites Irvine again next time. With all of our no-cost amenities such as daily breakfast, Evening Social, complimentary on-site parking, and more, we are a great value for guests traveling to us.  Please let us know if there is anything else we can do to ensure your visit with us is just as perfect. We look forward to seeing you next time!  Sending our very best, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This Hotel is a well maintained place compared to other Hotels in this Area.   Front Desk Staff have been very helpful.   The Room Service members are also very responsive particularly, Alicia Alba. She is very prompt in her work and made us feel comfortable during our stay.  We highly recommend this place!
Manager Response: Good morning, Bharty!  We thank you very much for taking the time to respond and leave your feedback. Your review means a great deal as we continue our goal to be one of the best (but really THE best) hotels in the Orange County area.We are so happy you had a great stay and more importantly, memorable interactions with our team. While we pride ourselves on our comfy guest suites and valuable amenities, we feel our amazing staff is what truly sets us above the rest. Thank you for recognizing Alicia for her extra efforts. We will certainly pass your kudos along to her.  We hope you will think of the Homewood Suites Irvine again the next time you are looking for a good night's rest! It would be our pleasure to host you once again.  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Very clean, spacious rooms and comfortable beds.   The staff was also very efficient.  My biggest complaint was the breakfast - eggs were cold - not a lot of healthy options.  Even the complimentary social hour - while a nice idea - just had hot dogs and some salad - a bit disappointing.
Manager Response: Greetings!  Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your visit went. We highly appreciate the feedback and will communicate to our team about your issues. We do apologize that the food choice was not to your liking. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to redeem ourselves the next time you are in the area!  Warm Regards, Eliza & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Checked into a clean, modern and well maintained hotel with long term stay facilities. The staffs are good and friendly. I enjoyed the stay at Homewood Suite and will be back again! One of the best hotel in Irvine.
Manager Response: Greetings Jarrelong! We appreciate you taking the time to let us know how your stay was. Here at the Homewood Suites Irvine  we strive to make each guest experience one to remember! We sure hope that you keep us in mind the next time you are in the Irvine area! Warm Regards, Eliza & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This was a great place to stay with a pool/hot tub, free breakfast and a beautiful lobby for us to meet after the games and hang out together! Most hotels don‚Äôt like teams staying there, this hotel was very accommodating and we greatly appreciated it! Wonderful food, great staff, loved the pool and basketball area. We had a great time!
Manager Response: Greetings, Inspire24486784100  Thank you so very much for selecting the Homewood Suites Irvine for the MLK Tournament. We truly appreciate your feedback We are so pleased that our hotel suited the team's needs and everyone had a great time! Our outdoor area with the sports court, grill, and pool area are spaces to hang out and unwind after a tense series of games. With our proximity to several sports facilities in the local area, we make for an excellent choice for many teams and individuals with teams. We hope you will join us for the next round of games in the future.   Our best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team P.S., Let's go Red Wings!

Summary Heading: Not sure what all the hype is about
Summary: With all the good reviews for this place, we had high expectations, and the hotel didn't live up to them.  My husband and our two boys spent NINE nights in the 1 King Premium 1 BR Suite over Christmas and New Year's.  We've had better experiences at many other places.  Our stay wasn't that great due to the following: 1) Location of our room: Our room was located on the first floor (not good) and on the busy street side of Red Hill Ave (not good).  Maybe they don't have suites like this in other areas of the hotel, but you'd think they'd put a guest staying for so many nights in a better location of the hotel.  Being so close to the airport, we were concerned about plane noise (which was a bit loud), but in reality, the road noise on Red Hill Ave was far worse, since our room was
Manager Response: Greetings, mtnhappy,  We want to thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us. We value each individual feedback as your unique experience helps provide insigtht to us. We want to apologize for the lapses in service you experienced during your visit. We are certainly sorry that we fell short of your expectations.   We were running at nearly full occupancy during the busy holiday season which may have played in to some of the issues such as limited room location choices. In addition, we were hosting many families so as you can imagine, breakfast would get extremely packed. Our hard-working crew did their best to ensure breakfast service went smoothly for everyone.   We hope you and your family will give us another try again. We would love to be able to show you the real value of the Homewood Suites and the hospitality that our Irvine location has to offer. Please feel free to reach out to us directly so we can best assist you with an adequate room set-up and location to best meet your family's needs. It would be our pleasure to give you a proper, 5-star stay the next time around. We hope to hear from you for your next visit.  Our very warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Sorry about the late review. Stayed here 3 nights during the Thanksgiving holiday. The staff was especially polite and helpful after driving 750 miles from Oregon. Rooms are clean. Free breakfast is quite good. WiFi in my spacious room was perfect. Having a full kitchen and refrigerator really helped. I brought my bike in an attempt to work off some of the Thanksgiving meal. Rooms were quite large to accommodate my bike, and the riding was nice right out of the hotel.  This review is mostly to give a thanks to Gabby and Hayley. Had an issue using some hotel debit cards that were suppose to be accepted at all hotels. When I booked the room, I chose the "pay at the hotel" method of payment. Unfortunately the site said I pre-paid which meant I could not use my soon to expire debit
Manager Response: Dear ColnagoKevin,  We know how hectic things become over the holiday season; the end of the year just seems to totally snowball! Thank you so very much for taking the time to write this review after all these weeks. We hope you were able to enjoy the remaining winter holidays, and some tasty meals!  We apologize for any miscommunication that might have taken place between your reservation, the 3rd party, and our hotel. We are so pleased that our staff was able to make the difference and help you out. Every day is important, especially during that time of year! Hopefully next time you can find a great deal directly with us and also enjoy eliminating the need for any middle agent. Your review tells us that you quite enjoyed your stay so we certainly hope you will join us for another visit! There are some really great places to bike around Orange County when the weather warms up.  Thank you for your time, ColnagoKevin, and for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine. We look forward to hosting you again!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Stayed here several times for my business trips.   The staff are friendly and remembers you by your name.   The rooms are spacious and housekeeping (this time my housekeep is Alicia Alba) are always keeping the room neat and clean.   It helps with the nice kitchenette. Great place to stay for business and leisure.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello, Mr. Tay!  It has been our pleasure to be your Home Away From Home during your travels out to California. We are so pleased that our property has been comfortable and most convenient for you. We hope to remain your hotel of choice in the months and years to come.  We really appreciate your special shout out of Alicia, and all our staff, who work very hard to meet our guests' needs.   We look forward to seeing you next time you come out for work! Warm regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Barbara was great. She taught me how to pour my own beer, and even brought me one when they ran out. Very friendly person. Hotel is really nice as well. Big rooms, big tv, and well priced. The evening social is a good way to save money on dinner.
Manager Response: Greetings, Freedom682864  Thank you for leaving this review on your recent stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We love all the great amenities we have to offer such as a daily breakfast, our Evening Social, and much more. All these combined with our spacious suites help to create a real value for our guests. Thanks for the special shout out to Barbara, we will be sure to pass along the kudos. What is the old saying? Teach a man to pour his own beer and he'll.....? You tell us next time you visit!   Looking forward to hosting you once more, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Clean, Family friendly hotel with good friendly service
Summary: Just minutes by car from John Wayne Airport, yet rooms with good double glazed windows kept out any air plane noise.  Reception service was faultless (special mention for Gabby Champion and Joe Mendez, both of whom were always helpful for our needs - we stayed on 3 different sets of dates in Dec 2018 and Jan 2019). We had the king-bedroom suite with very comfortable beds on all the 3 separate stays with total of 18 nights. This was nice as there is a separate lounge (with small kitchenette) and comfortable sofa and large flat screen tv (also in the main bedroom).  A small table for either dining or working on the computer is convenient, with multiple power points and an USB charging port. Complimentary tea and coffee (with a drip coffee maker) and little milk pods topped daily,
Manager Response: Greetings and hello, kyh86!  It was with our great pleasure that we hosted both you and your family, and your family's family, during your extended trip through the U.S. It means a great deal that you would choose us as well as recommend it to those traveling with you.   Thank you so very much for the wonderfully detailed review of your stay and of our property overall. I don't think we could have said it much better ourselves!  We look forward to your family's next visit with us, whenever that may be. We want to wish you a prosperous and healthy Year of the Pig. Happy New Year!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This is the 2nd time that we have spent over 30 days at this hotel for business and our thanks to an amazing staff.  Kudos and thank you to our housekeeper Lucina Fryagoso who maintained our room in tip-top, 100%, A+ shape that included extra towels, shampoo, etc. and always completed before 2:00 pm as we requested.  Thanks to the numerous kitchen staff including Emilio, Barbara, Javier, Veronica, Jenni, James and others that provided delicious food on time, always with smile and a "can I help you".  I often watched as staff helped people with the waffle maker and offered to make items that people who were on special diets could eat - all with a smile.  Thanks also to staff that responded immediately to additional toilet paper, paper towels, etc; fix the TV in the workout room;
Manager Response: Mr. Kopp,  Thank you so much for once again choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine as your Home Away while you travel for work. We know as a loyal Diamond Member with Hilton you have plenty of options to choose from but we truly appreciate being the ONE!  We are so pleased you have found all the comforts of home with our daily breakfast and weekday Evening Social. Thank you for recognizing our hard-working crew who helped yourself and others during those times. Thank you as well for recognizing Lucina, your amazing housekeeper, during your visit. We do our very best to accommodate all of our guest's daily needs and we are so happy Lucina was able to do during your stay!   We certainly hope we will see you again next year. Maybe a warm summer visit will be in order for you! Although the hot tub probably feels MUCH better on these brisk winter days. Your friendly Homewood Suites team will be waiting for you next time!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Really nice people! Gabby/James actually remembered my name when I walked thru the lobby. Very clean also. Parking had a little walk around the building but all said, very worth it.  Hotel is 2 yeas old and looks brand new. Spoke to a maintenance guy at 7PM who was still working. He was painting door jams and inspecting them with a flashlight. More than I would do.  Diamond Member for sure
Manager Response: Dear. Mr. Hyland,  I believe you win the award for fastest turn around from departing the hotel to leaving a review! Thank you so much for taking the time to do so. We value all of our guest's opinions as to their stay, especially our Diamond Members who travel far and wide and often! You have probably experienced many Hiltons and we are so happy ours is one to have stood out.   We are just about to hit our two year anniversary on the 13th of January and our departments work diligently to make sure the hotel stays looking sharp! We hope you will join us again next year (or definitely sooner!) and let us know how we are doing! It would be our pleasure to have you again on your next stop out to Orange County.  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This is my go to hotel in OC.  I have stayed here several times in the past year for work.  The staff is always friendlly and even recognized me when I checked in on my last trip.  Rooms as great and always clean.  They have a great breakfast selection that is complimentary and M-Thur they have a happy hour 5-7 with small plate type appetizers.  Tonight, Barbara brought out some cracker jacks to a table by my table.  I went up to look for some and she said they just had a few left over from the night before and thought the kids at the other table would like them.  I sat back down and a few minutes later she brought some out from my group.  She was awesome and thought it was great she went above and beyond.  I highly recommend this hotel for your stay.
Manager Response: Dear, Traveler1973pv!  Thank you so much for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine as your Home Away From Home! It means a great deal to us that you have chosen to stay with us time and time again! When you stay with us, you are a part of the family. We are so pleased Barbara (and the rest of the staff) have made such great impressions throughout your visits. We would you will spend many more trips with us here in Orange County. You will always have a place to stay whenever you are in need a tasty meal, good company, and a pleasant night's sleep!  Our warmest regards, Your friendly Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Spent a month in this hotel and it just felt like home to me. I wish I could name all the staff members I would like to thank here, it would mean calling the whole staff. My special thanks will go to Gaby (front desk) though.....keep up the good work.
Manager Response: Dear, Passenger55360481392  It was a pleasure having you through December and getting to know you. Our goal is for all of our guests to get that Home Away feeling. It's hard to be in a different place during the holiday season and we hope you felt like you were amongst friends with us here. Thank you so much for recognizing our entire team who assisted you with your stay in all their unique ways. Speaking for myself, I appreciate the special recognition. I am sorry we couldn't brainstorm on something to do to enjoy your last weekend in Irvine! Hopefully you can visit again and I'll think of something fun and new for you to do while you are here.  Thank you so much for taking the time to write this review and share it with us all. It means a great deal to us. We hope you will think of us again if you are ever back in Orange County. It would be our pleasure to be your Home once more.  √Ä la prochaine! Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We had a wonderful experience from check in to check out. The breakfast was wonderful as well as the evening social. The housekeepers were amazing. My children were so happy to find the pool heated! On my next trip I will definitely stay there.
Manager Response: Good morning, Cheri10001  It's always fun for us to see who is traveling from out of state because they are the ones in the pool in the middle of winter! While our pool is situated outdoors, it's always set to a comfortable 80(ish) degrees. If the pool isn't quite warm enough, the hot tub is ready and waiting for you. We hope the kids also got to enjoy the game room or pick from our selection of board games during your visit. We know how important is it to make the even the youngest of guests happy!  We hope you and your family will think of us again the next time you find yourself traveling to the Orange County area. We'd love the chance to be your Home Away From Home on another visit.  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We just spent December 26th through December 31st at this wonderful hotel with 20 of my family members and we were nothing but pleased.  The General Manager Paul was so attentive and friendly and the front desk staff (ie. Joe, Hayley and Gabriela) were awesome and taking such good care of all of us.  Everyone working in the kitchen area during the mad breakfast rush (Emilio) went above and beyond to make sure that people were well fed and happy.  The hotel was in a great location that was centrally located to all of the venues that we visited and the free parking was a godsend.  We took advantage of the kitchen and bbq for feeding our motley crew and it was great.  We loved having the full size refrigerator in our room and the ability to cook up the meals desired.  The
Manager Response: Good morning, Carolbearle!  It was our greatest pleasure to host you and your whole merry band. One of the best parts of our line of work is getting to know our guests and what brings them to us. It is quite special to be included in what you all are up to and enjoying during your visit. Thank you for recognizing our staff members who left that extra special impression on your stay.   We know how important it is to save during your travels. That is why we are so thrilled you can offer so many complimentary amenities such as our free parking, daily breakfast, our Evening Social (Monday through Thursday), and plenty of ways to use the comforts of our guest suites to your advantage!  We certainly hope your family will join us again for another stay in Irvine. We would love the chance to be a part of your adventures once more. Looking forward to your next visit!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Very please to stay at Homewood Suites Irvine, very clean, well maintained Hotel, good food, spacious Rooms, clean and safe area, great location, near John Wayne Airport (Orange County), Free Parking, Staff is quite responsive. Front Desk employees very professional and friendly. one of the employees Jose R. very helpful and friendly make you feel at home. in general everyone great employees.
Manager Response: Greetings, Mr. V!  We certainly hope you enjoyed your stay with us last week over the holiday weekend. We are thrilled you found everything to your comfort and liking.  Our location in the business center of Irvine is safe and quiet while still being conveniently located to shops, dining, and the major freeways to take you just about anywhere in Southern California!  There are many places to stay in Irvine as well as the greater area. Thank you so much for selecting our Homewood Suites location. While our clean and new(er) facilities are of great appeal, we firmly believe it is our amazing staff, such as Jose, are what make each guest experience the best around. Thank you so much for recognizing all of us, especially Jose. We will certainly be sure to pass along your kudos and a little something extra!  We hope you will stay with us again the next time you travel to the area. We would certainly love to host you with another fabulous experience.  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The hotel is in a great location.  It is very clean and the staff is quite responsive.  Both Caroline and Gabby at the front desk were very helpful during our stay.  The kitchenette with the full size refrigerator was great for us as we stayed 10 days.
Manager Response: Dearest, Dreamer17368697021  Thank you so much for leaving this guest review; we appreciate your time and effort in writing this.   We are so pleased that our spacious guest suites with their fully-equipped kitchens helped you make it through your ten day stay with us with comfort and ease. Whether your stay is for a single night or a more or more, we have what you need to make it through! There's a lot of great restaurants near us so that full-sized fridge sometimes comes mighty handy when storing leftovers.  We hope all of staff that you encountered during your stay was friendly and helpful. We are so pleased you found a few who had an extra meaningful impact. We will be sure to pass along your sentiments to them.  Please think of us again the next time you are visiting Orange County, no matter the length of stay! It would be our pleasure to host you and your family once again.  Warmest regards, the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We are staying here since August 2018, almost 5 months now. Management gave special discounted rate for extended stay. The rooms are clean and well maintained. Specially, the kitchen is euiqiped with necessary utensils. My room's housekeeper Julieta is very helpful.   The staff is friendly, specially front desk staff members - Joe, Gabby, Hayley, James, Mathew, Alysa. They take us around nearby places in 3 mile range by hotel shuttle and pick-up also. Their suggestions and feedback are very useful.  The morning breakfast has a lot of food choices. Evening social is fantastic. Barbara is expert in taking care. The cafe team (Emilio, Jazmin, Yesenia, Veronica, Jose) works for best guest-satisfaction and if you want anything specific they will get you for sure.   We often use gym
Manager Response: Dear Sameer & Kaylani  Thank you so much for leaving a review and feedback on your stay. The best part is it's not even over yet! We really enjoy getting to know our extended stay guests such as you both. It is fun to hear about your adventures as you explore the Orange County area and far beyond; thank you for sharing it all with us.  We are so happy that everything with the room and the hotel in general has made you two comfortable for your long stay. It can be quite nice to have an apartment-like suite without the fuss of having to clean up or cook sometimes! We know that work has been unpredictable so it is great you have found a suitable Home Away From Home while you are in Irvine  We really appreciate all the name mentions and are so happy that all of these individual team members have made such an impact in your stay. You've gotten to know a lot of the team so far! Thankfully there is still plenty of time to know the others. If you ever need anything at all, you know where to find us!  Warmest regards and Happy New Year! We're looking forward to spending 2019 together with you both! The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I wanted to give props to these 2 workers today 12/29/18. Went down for breakfast and the dining room was busy. Saw an older gentleman spilled his drink. Told one of the workers about the accident and she smiled and thanked me and immediately cleaned up the spill. Noticed these two ladies just busting their butts to keep the dining area  cleaned and food/drinks stocked.  Very pleased with their professionalism and attentiveness. Thank you Jasmine and Llisenia for your hard work and commitment
Manager Response: Dear Mason,  We cannot thank you enough; it means a great deal that you wrote this review the very same day. We are so glad you were so impressed with our crew as they have been working very hard the last week over this busy holiday season. While we may be fully booked with families and those visiting, the whole hotel has been working diligently to ensure that our guests aren't affected by such high occupancy.  Thank you so much for mentioning Jasmine and Llisenia specifically. Their diligence and dedication to providing amazing customer service does not go unnoticed. We will be sure to reward the additional efforts that you wrote about here.  We want to wish you and your family a very joyous holiday season. Please be our guest once again in 2019! We'd enjoy the opportunity to host you all once more.  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: My mother, brother and I don't have a central place to gather on the holidays. So it's always a tough situation making sure we're able to make time for each other around this time of year. We looked long and hard for a room that would accommodate our needs for the season. Homewood Suites was a diamond in the rough for us. The kitchen and living room area were definitely more like home than any restaurant or regular motel we could have used as a gathering place. The room was clean, the kitchen was well equipped to prepare a full meal, the beds were comfortable and the bathrooms were well equipped. Most notable of all we experienced though, was the staff. Joseph at the front counter was on staff both nights of our stay and provided a consistently pleasant interaction. Any
Manager Response: Greetings, Peter!  We want to wish you the very best holiday season and a prosperous New Year. It's a special time of year and we want to thank you for selecting our Homewood Suites Irvine location to be your Home Away From Home during your travels. Our suites are perfect for one night, solo travels or for staying several days with the whole family! We are so glad you found your guest suite comfortable and accommodating, just like you were at home!  We have to agree with you that our staff are what truly make our guests' experiences great ones. We are pleased Joe was there each night to provide you exceptional service with a smile each night. We will be sure to pass along your kudos (and then some!).   Please join us again the next time your family comes together to celebrate, or just because. No special occasion is necessary to have a wonderful night stay with us. We would look forward to the opportunity to host you and yours once again.  Our very warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This hotel was more like an apartment. Two seperare bedrooms with connecting private bathrooms, a sleeper sofa that was extremely comfortable, and a full kitchen that included a dishwasher with all the amenities such as soap for waking the dishes. The pool and hot tub area was also very relaxing and beautiful.
Manager Response: Good morning, Lacie G.!  That's our motto right there; our goal is to make every guest experience a Home Away From Home experience. We are so thrilled you found our fully-stocked, fully-loaded guest suites to your comfort and liking! It sounds like you got our extra special 2 bedroom suite. It's like having two separate rooms in one! Perfect for families, groups, bridal parties, you name it.   We hope you will visit us again on your next adventure to the Orange County area. We would love to be host you and your family once more.   Our warmest regards and happiest of holidays! Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Enjoyed my stay at Homewood Suites during our 3 nights there [Family leisure trip].A swanky new hotel. Good insulation. Can't hear any plane landing despite its locationGood breakfast with varieties. A surprise evening treat.Thumb up
Manager Response: Good morning, Trail202416!  Top notch is some pretty big shoes to fill! We are so happy you found us so; there are so many choices within our pocket of Irvine. Swanky isn't necessarily a word we would use to describe us (although we really appreciate that adjective!). We just want to be your Home Away From Home while you stay in Orange County. Since we are a newer hotel, we have all the perks of new building methods. That means that guests get to enjoy the thrill of watching airplanes descend into Orange County without any of the noise! Our Evening Social is certainly a treat with a menu that changes daily, great selections, and complimentary (adult) beverages.  Want to know who has two thumbs and really appreciates your review? This hotel! We really hope you will join us again for your next visit. We would certainly enjoy the opportunity to impress you once again!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Hotel is close to a lot of activities especially for kids. The social hour at the hotel is a perfect finish to the day. Special callout to Barbara for a friendly and efficient service. Customer service personified!
Manager Response: Hello there, Chintash123!  We appreciate your time in leaving this review on your recent stay with us. We greatly appreciate your feedback! We hope you also got to enjoy our hot breakfast in the AM as well. Tasty eggs, the waffle bar, and so much more are a great way to START your day! Thank you for the kudos to Barbara in the Evening Social; we will be sure to pass along your praise with a little extra something.   Please be sure to join us again for breakfast, dinner, or a snack in between. We would love the opportunity to have you once more!  Our best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Irvine

Summary: This hotel was comfortable and the staff was great. Breakfast and Happy Hour were fantastic.   Barbara was wonderfully helpful.   She read kind and energetic.   She was a doll to help me with my beer.   Martha
Manager Response: Good morning, Martha B!  We wish to thank you for posting this review on your recent experience; we value and appreciate your insight on your stay! We are pleased you found everything to your liking at our Homewood Suites Irvine property. When you stay with us, you are with friends; we are so pleased your team made a special impact during your stay. We will be sure to pass the kudos (and then some) to Barbara!   Please think of us again the time you visit Orange County. We would love the chance to host you once again.  Our best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Great hotel and exceptional customer service!
Summary: I was in Irvine for work and, due to an unexpectedly scheduling change, had the opportunity to leave early. When I arrived back at the hotel, I told Joe and James that I was trying to rush to the airport to make a flight and get home to my kids before bedtime. While I was upstairs packing, they checked me out and got the shuttle ready to go so we didn't waste a moment. I made my flight and my kids were thrilled to see me! I really appreciate the extra effort and over-the-top customer service they provided!
Manager Response: Good morning and hello, Austin!  First of all, thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review on your recent experience with us here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. When you stay with us, you are with family so with that being said, we understand how important it is to be with family when the opportunity arises! We are so thrilled Joe and James were there for you to get you back quickly and efficiently to them. We appreciate your recognition of them and will be sure to do something extra special!  We hope you, and your family, will join us again for another visit to to Orange County. With so much to do in the area, we are certain the family would have a great time (even if you might have to work during the day ;)).   We appreciate your stay, Austin, and look forward to welcoming you again the next time you find yourself in Irvine!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This hotel property is upgraded and the staff is amazing!  I do like the Homewood Suites properties in general since I am usually multiple days in an area when traveling for business. This is one of my favorite properties with newer furnishings and the staff can't be beat!  They are very warm, welcoming and are go out of their way to help out. Every time I come to the area I try to stay at this location. It's also conveniently located to the John Wayne/Orange County airport, which is ideal.
Manager Response: Greetings and hello, WhiteOakFarms  We cannot thank you enough for this lovely review on your stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. There's plenty of places to stay in Irvine and as a frequent traveler such as yourself, we are sure you aware of them all. We love that we are your Home Away From Home when you travel to Orange County. Our friendly team members are here for you, whatever you may need. Please feel free to reach out next time you are in the area so we can take care of you!  We look forward to seeing you next time.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites team

Summary: Awesome hotel, staff was great and amazing. Hotel was very nice and rooms. The breakfast was great. Great location not too far from Disneyland. The evening social was not to bad and there customer service was awesome.
Manager Response: Greetings, Patrick P!  It looks like from your thumbnail that you may travel quite often so we want to think you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine during your visit to Orange County. There are a plethora of lodging choices in the local area and it means a lot that you stayed with us. While we are located in a quiet, business area of Irvine, we are just a hop, skip, and a jump away from major attractions like Disneyland, the beaches at Newport and Huntington, and premiere shopping like South Coast Plaza and Fashion Island. That sounds like fun for the whole family!  We hope you and your family will join us again for another visit to Orange County. We would love to host you once again!  Looking forward to your next visit... Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Excellent facility overall.  Pool and Spa were awesome.  Everything in very clean and well kept.  My room's housekeeping was excellent, every day I had more than enough towels and amenities.  Thanks to Barbara, Javier, Alba Maria, Lucina, and Jose R. for my great stay!!
Manager Response: Greetings and hello, Venture18528775187  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this AMAZING review of your recent stay with us. No matter the reason for your visit, we want you to feel at home with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We are so pleased you found everything comfortable and to your liking. Plus, it looks like you made some friends with our staff! Thank you so much for recognizing their efforts to make your stay the best. We will be sure to recognize them for it.   Please think of us the next time you are in Orange County, for work or for fun. We would love to be your Home Away From Home again next time.  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: second time here. Barbara and Javier in the restaurant were fantastic. Joe at reception couldn't do enough to help me.  They haven't got a bar but the restaurant area is a great replacement and you WILL be looked after.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Earle,  Thank you so much for joining us again for another visit. We truly appreciate you choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine as your choice hotel during your visits to Orange County. We likely have some new faces join the crew since you last stayed with us. Thank you recognizing some of them, including Barbara and Javier! We will be sure to to award their efforts as well as Joe!   Please join us again whenever you are in need of a comfy place to stay and amazing service. When you stay at Homewood Suites Irvine, you are truly family!  Looking forward to your next visit Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The Homewood Suites in Irvine is a beautiful hotel with a wonderful manager‚Äôs reception! Barbara and Javier were very welcoming and helpful! The rooms are spotless, large and comfortable. The staff at the the front desk was very friendly and went out of their way to make our visit outstanding!
Manager Response: Greetings, V505XYchristinec.  Thank you so much for leaving a review on your recent experience with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We certainly appreciate you choosing us as your hotel during your trip to Orange County. We are overjoyed that you found everything in the hotel to our liking. We love our new(er) facilities and all that we have to offer our guests in terms of amenities. Our greatest asset is truly our fabulous team members; thank you so much for recognizing a special few that personally touched your stay. We will be sure to pass the kudos on to Barbara and Javier ( and something more!).   Please think of us again the next time you travel to Southern California. We would certainly enjoy the opportunity to host you and your family once again.   Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We were in a 2bed suite, got in the room around 7pm, noticed footsteps and maybe some furniture being moved directly above us.  This noise went on til 3am, and finally, we had to go down to the front desk to let them know since none of us had got any sleep due to the noise.  Front desk just said that they have been getting complaints.  The noise continued past 3am, We checked out of fatigued due to lack of sleep with a long drive ahead of us so definitely NOT happy with this experience.
Manager Response: Greetings, Ms. Nerissa  We thank you very much for relating your experience during your recent stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We sincerely apologize for the noise disturbance you experienced on that Saturday night and our failure to contain the situation.  While we have a lot of regular business travelers during the week but we do get a fair amount of leisure travelers during the weekend as well. We are sorry that you were below some more rambunctious group of leisure travelers during this stay.   We have reached out to you personally because we would like the opportunity to make the situation right. We value your continued patronage of our property and we certainly wish to have you stay with us again. A stay on the fourth floor sounds best for next time!  We are certainly looking forward to your response and further communicating with you. Please feel free to reach out personally for your next visit so we can ensure your utmost comfort for your stay.  Our best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Everything about this hotel was perfect for our trip. The location was within a mile of our event conference, and we needed a suite with a kitchen. From the moment we checked in, we were treated with a friendly, and accommodating front desk staff. The lobby is beautiful and open, with lots of places to sit and meet and chat. The breakfast had a lot of food choices, and was delicious. Our room was sparkling clean, and very spacious. The pull out sofa was extremely comfortable and well padded. The lighting in the room was great as well. We were able to store all of our food in the full size fridge, and the stove worked perfectly. The room came with plenty of new cookware, and nice dishes, and glasses, etc.. The staff here are all very very kind, and went out of their way to
Manager Response: Greetings, dear Lea J  We cannot thank you enough for your positively glowing review! The whole thing made us smile while reading it. We are thrilled that you found just everything in the hotel to your liking and satisfaction. It sounds like you got awfully comfy in your guest suite; why did you even leave us?!   Please, please join us again for another fabulous stay at the Homewood Suites Irvine. It would be our honor to host you and your family once again for another visit. We're looking forward to seeing you again!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Absolutely wonderful hotel .. this is paradise !
Summary: My stay in homewood suites Irvine was wonderful and made it so amazing. The staff is so friendly especially Javier & Barbara awesome. When you are with this people you will not miss you home and family. @barbara : no words you are simply superb. Once again thankQ homewoods suites Irvine :)
Manager Response: Greetings and good morning, Stay67008543205!  We are beyond thrilled that you had a truly Home Away From Home experience with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Even more so, we are so happy some of our team members made such an impact on your stay. We will be sure to pass your regards on to Barbara and Javier with our Evening Social crew. We are here for you whenever you are in need of a good meal, a comfy bed, and even better company!  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We hope to see you again very soon!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites

Summary: It was a very nice place to stay. It was clean and roomy. The complimentary breakfast was also very good - a nice variety of food. There were slightly different offerings each day. The strawberry waffles were yummy.
Manager Response: Greetings, San Q!  Thank you so much for taking the time leaving this review on your stay with us. We are so pleased that you found everything with your stay just perfect! We pride ourselves on being one of the newer kids on the block in Irvine and want to keep the hotel shiny and looking good for our guests. We are so glad you had an enjoyable stay with us and were able to check out with a tasty breakfast. We are trying out different waffle recipes that include strawberry and blueberry batters. Yum! Now you can get really creative with your breakfast options. We hope you will join us again the next time you find yourself in Irvine. We'd love to share a tasty treat with you once more!  We are looking forward to your next stay, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Another business trip at this hotel.  Early check-in was not available on Thanksgiving Day.  Clerk stated that they didn't have any clean rooms? During my stay,  the water pressure in my shower was very low.  Upon checking out,  the clerk stated that they knew about the problem and I was told to comment on the survey.  Well,  here it is.
Manager Response: Greetings, Sunshine46528298256!  Thank you so much for joining us over this past holiday weekend. As we are approaching our second full year of operation, we are not quite the hidden gem that we once were sadly. We apologize that we were not able to accommodate you for an earlier check in when you first arrived but are so pleased we were able to get you in at around 230pm, before our regular 3pm! As for the water pressure, we will look in to the issue. Thank you for letting us know so we can be sure to bring it to the attention of management.  We do hope you'll join us again for your next visit. We would love a second chance to wow you and provide you with a 5-star stay.  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The place is excellent value for the amount you spend on your stay. The hotel is very clean, staff very friendly and great quiet location.The breakfast was decent and good wine and snacks for the evening social. The kitchen was well equipped. Overall a fantastic experience.
Manager Response: Greetings, SunilR55!  We know how important it is to get the best bang for your buck when staying in a hotel these days. We love all the goodies our Homewood Suites Irvine has to offer; from daily breakfast, Evening Social (Monday through Thursday), complimentary parking, shuttle service, WiFi, pool and outdoor area, and so much more!! We even threw in the kitchen sink, in your guest room that is. So whether you want to cook a hearty meal in your guest suite or let us serve you breakfast or dinner, we have you covered.  We hope you will join us again the next time you find yourself in Orange County. We would love to host you for another enjoyable stay. Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us and submitting a review of your first time.  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Second time staying here, picked it again for a week long stay visiting family over Thanksgiving. Again, very pleasant and convenient for our visit.The front desk was very helpful.  Kim helped me find an excellent bakery when I needed a cake.  Another young make desk clerk facilitated the return of items that we unfortunately forgot in the room.  All of the staff was a look ways willing to help in what was several days when totally full and extremely busy.  The breakfast and evening staff ensured food was available in an exceptionally efficient and service oriented manner
Manager Response: Greetings, 346jacquelynm  Thank you so much for selecting the Homewood Suites Irvine again for your holiday visit. It means a great deal to us that chose us once more for your stay. This Thanksgiving was pretty busy, so we did our best to mitigate the rush and make all of our guests comfortable. We are glad you noticed the extra touches. Thank you so much for the special recognition for Kim; we are so pleased she was able to take that extra step to assist you and make your day. We will be sure to recognize her efforts with a special treat for her! Please join us for a third, fourth, and many more visits! We hope you think of us as your Home Away From Home here in Orange County.  Looking forward to your next visit... Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We were here over the Thanksgiving week. The room was nice & clean, the Staffs were very helpful, nice hotel, We felt right at home. We also enjoyed the free breakfast everyday we were there. We will definitely be back again.
Manager Response: Hello, mysterious Trip24052870607  We are glad you made it through the holidays to write us this great review on your recent stay with us. Thank you for the special recognition of our team members who worked extra hard this weekend to ensure our guest's comforts. Please join us again next time, no matter the reason for the stay. We would certainly enjoy hosting you and your family once more on your next visit to Irvine. Our Home Away From Home will be here for you!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Room was very clean.  Staff was very helpful, from front desk, to maintenance and housekeeping.  We thought the breakfast had a great assortment.  I noticed how proactive the staff is at this hotel. When the breakfast tables were filled up, they took the initiative to get out more tables.
Manager Response: Greetings and hello, 7Rudy!  As we are approaching our 2 year anniversary this upcoming January, we are trying to learn from holidays past! But we always appreciate the attaboy...! Thank you so much for leaving your review on your stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We really appreciate the feedback and sharing your experience with the whole world! Be sure to join us again on your next visit to Orange County. Did you know that we also serve a light dinner at our Evening Social (Monday through Thursday)? Breakfast or dinner, we would enjoy hosting you again!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Just stayed 2 nights with my son's & it couldn't have gone more smoothly!! The rooms are so nice with the most comfy beds!! The staff are so nice!! They also have a really clean pool an awesome basketball court!! My kids loved that!!Also breakfast is really good!! Will be back soon!!
Manager Response: Good morning, Shay!  Thank you so, so much for taking the time to leave your review on your stay with us this past weekend. It was a great weekend for families and we enjoyed having all the activity; it's amazing you can still utilize the pool and outdoor area this late in to November! #thanksCalifornia. We hope your family will join us again on your next visit to the Orange County area. We'd love to be your family's Home Away From Home here in Irvine. Don't worry, we've got plenty of band aids ;).  Looking forward to your next visit, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This is my first time at a Homewood Suites and we had a wonderful stay.  The hotel is one of the cleanest hotels that I have stayed at.  Caoline, Gabby and Hayley were so helpful and pleasant.  They were always happy to help with a smile on their face.  The rest of the staff from dining room to housekeeping were all great.  I can tell that everyone takes pride in making sure that the guests feel welcomed and that feels great.  I think this hotel is one of the best kept secrets and this will now be my ‚Äúgo to‚Äù hotel every time I come to Irvine.  Thanks for making my stay away from home feel so relaxing.  The breakfast was great and the evening social is a nice surprise.
Manager Response: Good morning, Pickleballmom!  Thank you for joining us for your very first stay with the Homewood Suites family. We are so glad we could make a believer out of you! We know it can be difficult being away from home during the holidays but we, and our friendly team, are here for you! We are happy you got to enjoy all aspects of the hotel, from our weekday Evening Social to our extended breakfast hours on the weekend (so you can catch a little more sleep).   We are looking forward to your next stay whenever you join us again in Irvine. Maybe next time we can go out for a game of Pickleball!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood SuitesTeam

Summary Heading: Okay if you get a good price
Summary: Shower in room 3316 is lukewarm and that‚Äôs after wasting 5 minutes of our precious water for it to warm up to that level. Breakfast quality is bad, toughest and most chewy sliced, smoked sausages I ever had. Stayed for 4 nights and not one day of bacon but had those awful sliced sausages served twice during my stay. Hampton Inn has better breakfast than this joint.
Manager Response: Good morning, Tripnoi  Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay with us; we appreciate knowing where we have fallen short with your experience. We will be sure to check out the water temperature for that room to avoid further incident. Our management company (DKN Hotels) has deep roots in Southern California and we as a whole take water conservation very seriously.   We apologize breakfast was not as satisfactory as others. We rotate our menu daily for breakfast with various items so guests can enjoy something different every day. We are in the process of revamping our breakfast menu and trying out new dishes to give our guests the most enjoyable experience possible.  We're sorry that you did not enjoy your stay as much as we were hoping. Please know that we take feedback and guest comments very seriously and will look in to ways we can improve. We hope you will join us again another visit so we can offer you the true Home Away From Home experience.   Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: After a 19 hour drive, our family stayed one night at this wonderful hotel. The staff are all so incredibly amazing!! We felt very welcome and they were even kind enough to provide a special surprise for my son and daughter-in-law who just got married. The rooms were comfortable, clean, well stocked and had everything we needed for a good nights sleep. I can‚Äôt say it enough how grateful I was to have found this hotel and that every staff member we encountered were so pleasant and courteous. We will definitely be back and I highly recommend staying here. THANK YOU so much to the two gentlemen working the night we arrived that made our welcome and arrival so special and quick. My son and daughter-in-law were so surprised and thankful and all my younger kids appreciated the fast
Manager Response: Greetings, GiselleZ7  We love to share in the special moments that bring our guests to us. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to celebrate with your son and daughter-in-law on their magical day. These are the moments that we live for at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We are so pleased that your stay with us was just what you needed after an arduous day of travel. It's always a treat to wake up to a tasty, hot breakfast after a good night's sleep. Please think of us again the next time you find yourself in Orange County. We would quite enjoy the opportunity to celebrate and host your family once again.  Until your next visit... Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Nice and clean updated rooms. Breakfast is complimentary and free parking. The breakfast had make your own waffles, bagels, toast, pastries, cereal, oatmeal, sausages, hash browns, and eggs. It's not embassy suites breakfast but it's not bad.
Manager Response: Greetings and hello, starletperalta!  We thank you for your review and for joining us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Guests are always curious about what kind of delectables we have to offer at our complimentary, daily breakfast so thank you for sharing! We are currently experimenting with additional and different menu items so please be sure to join us again to try out our homemade enchiladas! Be sure to check out the Evening Social as well. That menu rotates every night so you're sure to try something new! We would love to host you once again on your next visit to Orange County.  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Brand new built, great location, and not too far to everything
Summary: This is great location for travelers who look for newly built and home feel hotel. The room is like a small studio, it comes with kitchen, microwave, refrigerator, and stove. So, if you don't feel like to go out wine and dine, you can drive to close by supermarket to do the groceries shopping or to buy full prepared food and enjoy in your own room (they do have a great all restaurants strip mall, 10 min away; just do google search "Meet Fresh Irvine" you will see all restaurants are available at your choice). You room already stock with plates and utensils. Awesome right! I think so. Again, this is not 4 or 5 stars resort-style hotel; but this place will make you feel like home. They do have gym, pool, and basketball court. A great place for stay. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Greetings, Alex L!  Thank you so very much for your recent stay and for leaving feedback on your experience. We truly value your insight and I think the rest of the guests would appreciate your tip on local places to dine in our local neighborhoods! Sure, our bedroom suites or studio suites have all the makings for a relaxing night in but Irvine has much to offer in the ways of unique dining experiences. Our friendly staff would love to help you plan a night out next time you visit! We hope you will visit us again the next time you visit Orange County. We would certainly enjoy hosting you once more!  Until next time.. Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Great customer service with a smile
Summary: I have been a regular guest at Irvine Homewood Suites and have always received the best customer service.  The staff is polite, friendly and always helpful.  I would like to especially recognize Joe Mendez, James McGuire and Hayley for just always greeting me with a smile always helpful and accommodating to whatever my needs are.   Great Staff makes me want to always look forward to coming back because I know my stay will be a great one....
Manager Response: Hi, friend!  We really appreciate your continued visits to us here at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Our goal is certainly make you feel at home and with friends while you stay here with us; especially for the frequency and the length that you are here! Please know that we are all here to assist you and make each stay as comfortable as possible. We will be sure to pass your kudos along to Hayley, Joe, and James for taking extra special care of you. You are definitely a part of our Homewood family now, Ms. H.!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Hotel was OK parking was long walk. Not many ice machines and the one on the first floor was broken. Breakfast was ok on day they had real link sausage which we love but the rest of the time dry sausage. Eggs were dry and not a great selection of fruit could have had more variety not just oranges- apples. Fruit appeared dated. Remotes didn‚Äôt work most of the time and watching tv was annoying internet was good.
Manager Response: Good morning, leeml813FI!  We appreciate your time in writing this review and leaving your feedback. We are forever striving to provide the best possible experience for our guests. We will certainly pass your thoughts along regarding the breakfast selections to ensure we are providing the best quality meal. Please know that our handy maintenance staff is on-site most hours of the day to provide you with technical assistance should you need it on your next visit.  We hope you will think of us again the next time your travels bring you to the Orange County area. We would enjoy the opportunity to host you and your family once more at the Homewood Suites Irvine.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Homewood Suites Irvine was perfect for a recent business trip. I was very impressed with everything, from the customer service, to the free parking, fast wifi, clean pool & hot tub, free breakfast, and even the little details like recycling. I definitely recommend this hotel for business or leisure. I felt comfortable, at home, and welcome while there.
Manager Response: Hello, Maria!  We so appreciate your review and for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine as your recent Home Away From Home while in Orange County. It pleases us that you found everything to your liking, from our comfortable guestrooms, great complimentary amenities, and our helpful team members in every department. Our common goal here is to make a huge impact on every guest's experience while making a minor impact on the environment. Thank you for your appreciative for some of our earth-friendly features.  Please think of us at the Homewood Suites Irvine next time you are looking for a place to rest your head.  Looking forward to seeing you next time! Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Clean, quiet and friendly. A home away from home.
Summary: Our first stay at the Homewood Brand. Pleasantly surprised at the quality of the suite, compared to the Embassy Suites (which are more spacious). This Homewood is fairly new and very clean. Free parking was a convenient bonus. Housekeeping was efficient and the reception staff friendly. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Good morning, Ms. Awesomerabbit  We thank you so much for taking the time and leaving us this lovely review. Thank you for giving our new Homewood Suites Irvine a try during your recent visit to southern California. We are glad we could make a believer out of you! We also would personally like to thank you for your understanding in regards to shipping out your lost and found item.
