We apologize for the delay but please rest assure we always work quite diligently to reunite our guests with their forgotten items. We know you will be rocking out to your favorite tunes again soon enough!  We certainly are looking forward to your next visit with us in the future!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The staff went out of there way to help - both on the phone and when I got to the actual hotel.  I had to find a hotel last minute and they were very accommodating.  They checked in with me to make sure I was comfortable and made sure I was aware of the services and accommodations that were available.
Manager Response: Greetings, Trip48392095622  Not to brag but great service is just what we do! We sincerely appreciate your time in leaving this review and feedback of your experience. Our amazing team is always here to assist you for your next planned, or unplanned, trip to Orange County. Think of the Homewood Suites Irvine for your next stay!  Looking forward to seeing you another time, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Being from OC myself, location is everything. This hotel is right off the 55 and the 405 and is minutes from the 5 freeway giving access to all of Orange County. This was our water polo club‚Äôs 4th stay at Homewood Suits in Irvine and it is our go to when traveling to SoCal with our teams. The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful, always. They are also understanding that we are traveling with anywhere from 25-50, 12u-18u athletes and make sure the coaches and athletes are well taken care of. The breakfast is outstanding and accommodations are exactly what you‚Äôd expect from the Hilton brand, well above average. Thank you as always, and we‚Äôll see you in December!
Manager Response: Good Morning Brandon! Thank you for your detailed review. We truly appreciate the feedback! We are trilled that you have made us your go to property when in the area. Our team here, at The Homewood Suites Irvine, is dedicated to give you that 5 star experience time and time again. Even though you are traveling we strive to make you all feel as if you are at your home away from home. We cant wait to host you again next month! Warm Regards, Eliza & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Drove out 4hrs for another hotel and was told our room was given away. At 4am and a car full of kids i called Hilton and they took care of us in mintues. All we did was drive another 30mins to Homewood and theywere waiting for us. Very friendly and welcoming staff after a very long day i couldnt be happier.
Manager Response: Greetings Ka y! It is very unfortunate when these kind of things happen, but we're very happy that we were able to accommodate you and your family! We sure hope that you will give us the opportunity to host you the next time you are in the Orange County area. Warm Regards, Eliza & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I came to Irvine a few months ago for work and a local colleague recommended this hotel. I second guessed myself and ended up staying at the Embassy Suites nearby. It was nice, but on this trip I decided to try the Homewood Suites. Nice surprise. The hotel seemed brand new. Staff was extremely helpful and made me feel very welcome. King studio room was very spacious and comfortable. Breakfast was better than most similar hotels. Based on this experience I will stay at Homewood Suites more often.
Manager Response: Greetings John S! We're so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with us. Fun fact! The Homewood Suites Irvine opened its doors January 2017. Being that we are still new we do try our best to keep that "new hotel" smell. We cant wait to welcome you back the next time you're in town! Warm Regards, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Saturday morning breakfast was awesome!  The sausage was fresh and didn't have the processed food taste.  Three waffle machines are available for use, so no long wait there!  Two friendly staffs in the breakfast are super nice.    Front desk staff is friendly and efficient.  One tiny complaint is on the low pressure shower head.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, Philipda M!  Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We could jump for joy that your family had such a great stay! Our custom waffle bar is surely the cherry on top of our daily hot breakfast sundae. Our friendly and warm staff would welcome the chance to host your family once more on your next visit to the Irvine area. Please be sure to join us again, whether you are craving breakfast or Evening Social dinner (Monday through Thursday)!  Looking forward to seeing you again, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We selected the Homewood Suites because we were in town for a swim meet and the full kitchen appealed to us. (I typically stay at the Hilton Garden Inn by the airport.) The hotel lobby is very inviting. The staff always greet you with a smile and say hello or bye depending if you are coming or going.  We had a 1 bedroom Suite with 2 beds. My Hilton Profile says away from the Elevator. (I am a Diamond member.) Our room was directly across from the elevator. There were lots of sports teams at the hotel and the elevator was constantly busy. While there are 2 elevators (one at each end of the hotel), there was always a long wait for the elevator. The bedroom is not very well layed out. The sink is close to the beds. When the light is turned on for the sink area, the light shines
Manager Response: Dear CORedTraveler,  I am so sorry to here about your stay with us.  Even though you gave us a 3 ranking, that is not good enough for us.  We strive to make every guest happen and the fact that any guest (Diamond or not) was not happy, doesn't sit well with us.  I am going to find out who blocked your room and who handled your check in to be sure they know how to look up your preferences as a Hilton Honor Member.  We should have caught that, I sincerely apologize.  As for the layout of the room, even though there is nothing we really can do about that, our owner reads all our TA comments from guests as he is building other hotels and really takes into account your feedback, so thank you for that.  When it comes to the restaurant, Farmer Boys in our parking lot has been opening since August and is absolutely delicious and anytime a guest wants something to eat close by, just stop by the desk and we can give you directions for a 5 minutes drive to many great eateries.    We really appreciate the feedback and take every word to heart.  Thank you so much for your business and hope you will be willing to try us out again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: If you need to book a meeting room...this is the place to go!
Summary: I needed a meeting room for my team for a day and fast. I reached out to the Homewood Suites by Hilton in Irvine and had the pleasure of working with Chase and Zulema Sanchez. WHAT. A.TEAM. Chase was friendly, courteous, and helpful with the logistics and room choice as well as letting me know about F&B choices since they do not have a restaurant on sight. Zulema was very punctual in keeping me to deadline for the meals that needed to be pre-ordered. On the day of, they kept me informed of any questions or concerns that the onsite team may have. With Chase and Zulema being on their "A" game it helped with our team sticking to the task at hand. A HUGE thank you to Chase and Zulema and if you ever need a place to hold a meeting, Homewood Suites is the place to be and make sure you
Manager Response: Good afternoon, Kerina!  Thank you so much for selecting the Homewood Suites Irvine for your recent business meeting. We are thrilled our fantastic Sales Team was able to fully assist you, on the fly! We will be sure to recognize their efforts for making your meeting go off without a hitch. Please be sure to join us again, whether you are looking to host and event or stay the night! We would enjoy the pleasure of having you once more.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Friendly staff; safe; clean.  Large guest rooms and generous amenities. With Hilton Honors, contacted by text for special assistance with prompt replies. Chose Homewood Suites by Hilton for our home when visiting our Son at College.
Manager Response: Hello there, Thank you for your rating and review from your recent stay with us. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know how your visit went. We are so happy that everything was enjoyable for you. We hope you will keep us in mind every time you come visit your son.  Warm Regards, Eliza & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The Homewood Suites in Irvine CA is fabulous. It is really pretty and super clean - the staff is continuously cleaning the floors, the pool area, and the common spaces. Breakfast and dinner we're great, and there was good variety. The staff is very friendly and a accommodating. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Greetings! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us and we appreciate you taking the time to let us know how your stay was. Our team members main goal is to make you feel like you are at your home away from home. We look forward to hosting you the next time you're in the Irvine area! Warm Regards, Eliza & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The hotel and rooms were nice and comfortable.  The included breakfast was good and the breakfast area clean and tidy.  Best of all the people working there were great! The ladies at the front desk were always friendly and helpful! Emilio and Anita in the breakfast area did a wonderful job servicing  guests with a caring smile.   Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Greetings, rooonana!  Thank you for joining us during your daughter's recent tournament; we are glad the rain didn't put a damper on the activities! Hopefully the accommodations were spacious and comfortable enough for the whole family to join in. Our property is newer than other surrounding properties, having happened in January 2017. We offer a variety of amenities to make our guests feel at home and also experience a great value for their stay. What truly sets the Homewood Suites Irvine apart from other hotels is our unbelievable team members who strive to make each and every guest feel welcome and as comfortable as if they were at home. We appreciate your recognition of Emilio and Anita specifically; we will be sure to treat them for their additional efforts!  Whether it is for another tournament or just pure fun, please be sure to join the Homewood Suites Irvine again on your family's next trip down to Southern California. We would love to host you once again!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Very nice place. Felt like home. Asked for late check out and got it with no problems. Staff were helpful and breakfast was great. Close to everything. Quiet and comfortable   Will definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Greetings Hesham! We appreciate you taking the time to leave a rating and review of your recent stay with us. All of us here at the Homewood Suites, Irvine try our very best to make all our guests feel as if they are at their "home away from home". We're thrilled that you enjoyed your visit and hope we have the pleasure of hosting you again in the future. Warm Regards, Eliza & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: New Facilities, Awesome Staff, GREAT Value
Summary: This property is a very pleasant surprise. It is new: opened in January 2017. The room is clean and comfortable, with a kitchenette, sofa, and desk. It is as comfortable as pleasant as any of the "luxury" brands. There is a swimming pool, a jacuzzi, and a small basketball court. Breakfast is included, as well as "snacks" in the evening that can easily serve as dinner. There is complimentary shuttle that takes you anywhere with 3 miles of the hotel (though not always available since there is only one shuttle). Most amazing is the staff, from the front desk to the cleaning staff: they are helpful and friendly, and you feel like they truly welcome you. This is perhaps the best value weighing what you pay and what you get. I would definitely come back again if I come to the area.
Manager Response: Good morning, Travelhui!  We know you have plenty of options on where to stay Irvine so we thank you for choosing our dear Homewood Suites location. Above providing a comfortable sleep with lots of added goodies like breakfast and our evening social, we want you to feel like you are at home with us! Providing the best customer service and experience to all our guests is surely our guiding principle here.   We are looking forward to seeing you on your next visit to Irvine; we are counting on it!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: For the second time we use the hotel Homewood suite ,2017 Aliso Viejo and 2018 Irvine, Well located, very good service, friendly staff and listening to customers. Very nice room spacious.  We'll be back soon.
Manager Response: Good morning, TiborS327  So we guess you could say you are a Homewood aficionado?? We won't ask you to name your favorite of the two; we are just grateful for your review! Thank you choosing our location for your 2018 Orange County visit. We are thrilled you found everything to your liking and was provided with fabulous service. Just the way things should be around here!  Please think of us again in 2019. We'll be here for you!  Warmest regards,  Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This newer, well-managed Homewood Suites was perfectly located for our family's Disneyland and beach adventures. Very clean, excellent breakfast options, comfortable bedding, solid customer service. Would not hesitate to stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Paul T,  Thank you so much for your glowing review! We appreciate your time and effort leaving it, so all the traveling world can see what a great time you had with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine! While we are approaching our second full year of operation, we pride ourselves on our newer facilities and keeping everything clean and up-to-date. Thank you for choosing us as your Home Away From Home during your Disneyland adventure. Being only about 16 miles away (15 to 30 minutes depending on traffic), we are a great alternative property for those seeking a little quiet time away from the hustle and bustle of the Anaheim area. We hope you will think of us again the next time you visit the Happiest Place on Earth. We are your "Homiest Place on Earth!".  We are looking forward to your next stay! Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Great place to stay. We had a suite for the 3 of us and there was plenty of space. It was nicely stocked and everything seemed very new. Breakfast was nice with many options and the seating area was really big.
Manager Response: Dear nicolecooling,  Not only do we seem new, we are new! The Homewood Suites Irvine is still one of the newer additions to the community, having been built and opened January of 2017. We certainly do our best to keep that "new hotel smell" in the air. Whether you want to cook breakfast for the family in your equipped kitchen or let us do the cooking for you at our complimentary, daily breakfast, we have you covered.  We hope the family will join us on the next visit to Southern California. You'll be at home once again!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We stayed at the Homewood Suites for two nights after flying into SNA/John Wayne.  It was close to the airport.  The suite was very comfortable and the bed soft.  There is a bit too much furniture in the living room area - when you pull out the couch you can hardly move around the room after displacing all the furniture.  So much so, with all the furniture and suitcases, my son ended up tripping and giving himself a black eye on the end of the pullout bed as soon as we arrived. :(  Nonetheless, the hotel was quiet, clean, comfortable, and the breakfast was yummy.  Staff is friendly, too.  We'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Good morning Sheri H!  I am terribly sorry to hear about your sons fall, but thank you so much for bringing it to our attention so we can avoid an incident like this from occurring again in the future. We will definitely see what we can do about eliminating some unnecessary furniture. We're pleased to hear that the rest of your time with us was enjoyable. We look forward to hosting you and your family again soon!  Best, Eliza & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This place is truly amazing. The complimentary breakfast menu gives a jump start to the day. The Hotel is kept clean and crisp. Sheets and towels are replaced without any fail. Special care is given to make sure the guests find the room to ready to be occupied at any time of the day. Amenities at the hotel makes sure that you have little more than just to sleep during your stay. The hotel is located very close to the airport. Its calm and quiet, away from the busy life outside.  I would not do justice to this review if i do not mention the people who make the stay so special thanks a lot for all the staff special thanks to the following staff  Paul, GM   Sales- Chase, David, Zee   Front Desk- Caroline, Gabby, Alyssa, Joe, James, Hayley, Eliza, Chavelly, Matthew, and Kim  Food &
Manager Response: Hi Vijay!  So happy to hear from you; your presence is already missed from the hotel. Thank you for your kind words regarding the property itself; we are so glad you were able to come home every night to a clean and peaceful environment. Not only did we get to see you frequently enjoy the Evening Social during the week days but were thrilled that you made so many friends during your trips as well! We at the desk really enjoyed getting to know you and hearing all of your stories about your adventures in Southern California. We felt honored to be apart of the overall journey.  You will ALWAYS have a home with us at the Homewood Suites if ever you find yourself out here. Not just a place to stay but friends to welcome you back!!  We wish you nothing but the best and hope you will cross our collective paths again.  Warmest regards, Gabby, the entire Front Desk, and the whole Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The entire staff st this hotel is the best I have seen. There is just know wat I could single out just one person.If I have to go back to that area for business I will definitely stay at this hotel again, and that is because of the staff.
Manager Response: Greetings Eric F, We would like to thank you for your review and rating from your recent stay with us. We highly appreciate your recognition. Our team members are passionate about making sure all of our guests receive the 5 star treatment from the moment they check in to when they depart. We are thrilled that you were pleased with the service. We hope to see you again soon! Warmest Regards, Eliza & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I have been a loyal Hilton H Honors member for over a decade and I can say this hotel was one of the best I've stayed at. However, no matter what hotel I stay at, or in what state or country, the HHonors promise is always upheld. They had great staff, a sparkling hotel and wonderful amenities. We are looking forward to staying here again when we return to Orange County in late winter.
Manager Response: Dear Nicolas Z, First and foremost thank you for your continued loyalty to the Hilton brand and thank you so much for such a huge compliment. Here at the Homewood Suites Irvine we strive to put our best foot forward in everything we do. We are so pleased that everything was to your liking throughout your stay. We cant wait to host you the next time you're in the area! Warmest Regards, Eliza & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Short family get away. Disneyland and Universal Studios
Summary: Overall this hotel is very good. Free breakfast is the type you would get at any other hotel offering free breakfast, but had a hit more to choose from for waffle toppings and eggs. We had a room with a full kitchen which was nice so we could make our own food. The hotel is located in a great spot close to many grocary stores etc. Disney is not a long drive from this place so that was great. If you plan to go to universal be prepared for a 2 hour drive both ways pretty much anytime of the week and day and time. The roads are always crazy busy heading that way. Staff at hotel was very friendly. The King bed was very comfortable and all the pillows are great. The pull out sofa was horrible. You can feel the springs thru the mattress. Even our son who is only 9 was complaining it
Manager Response: Greetings and good morning, Mom-Mags!  We appreciate your feedback in a very thorough review! As we are still a newer property, we are always on the look-out for ways we may improve the overall guest experience. Your review definitely assists in our efforts and we can look into taking some of your advice into consideration!  We apologize for the mix-up with the premium suite add-on. Please feel free to get in touch with us at your soonest convenience so we may take care of any mistakes that occurred with that part of your reservations.   There is plenty that Orange County has to offer for family activities from the beach to museums to parks. Please be sure to join us again for another visit to Southern California for fun in the sun!  Warmest regards and best wishes, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel with some really EXCELLENT Staff members
Summary: So many other reviews have mentioned all the really great things about this hotel, so I will just mention my favorite part - the staff members. From the helpful front desk people to the staff in the food area who offered to bring me a bag of nuts after I reached the hotel too late for the early evening snack they offer. I'm sorry I didn't write down everyone's name who was helpful to me, but I do remember Gabby - who was so effervescent (a word you don't get to use all the time ;) - I truly felt that she should be the Brand Embassador for this property. She picked me up in the courtesy van from the airport, and drove me to the office I was working at the next day - and her and her male night time co-worker were so delightful to talk with after a long day at work, when I came
Manager Response: Good morning, Tammy!  Let me first off say how lovely it was to meet you and get to chat with you. Many of us are here for the love of getting to know people and it is a special moment when we can really connect and bond with our guests. I really enjoyed our chats and also the adventure of trying to find your work building! I will certainly be sure to pass the sentiments along to Joe as well! Our goal here at the Homewood Suites Irvine is to stand out above the rest and the best way to do so is to provide exceptional, personal service in addition to the spacious guest suite and great add-on amenities that our hotel has to offer!  We'll definitely be sure to pass your suggestions on to management regarding the magnifying mirrors. As a predominantly business-style property, we know how important it is for our guests to put their best face forward in the morning before work! We appreciate the feedback.  Please join us the next time you travel out to the West Coast for work, or fun! You'll always have friends here at the Homewood Suites Irvine!  Until next time, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Clean and roomy with a friendly staff!
Summary: Dropping off our daughter to UC Irvine was made a little easier because of the nice clean room and a super helpful and friendly staff.  Good location close to freeways, food, and UC Irvine will make this our home away from home in the next 4 years!  Price was reasonable and overall a good value. We also cancelled our last night and they allowed us to do so. No hassles!
Manager Response: Greetings, Akamao!  Yay! There is nothing better to hear than we have a new member to the Homewood Suites Irvine family! We were happy and so glad to be there for your family as you made such a big transition in sending your daughter off to school. Thank you for enjoying all that our property has to offer. There are plenty of reasons to come to Irvine so please be sure to join us on your next visit to the area. Let us help you all get accustomed to Orange County!  Looking forward to your return visit, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Outstanding and Caring Staff, Wonderful Hotel !!
Summary: While driving down to Southern California to attend a family funeral, the air conditioning compressor in our SUV failed as we climbed up and over the Grapevine in temperatures of 106 to 108 degrees.  After navigating the heavy LA traffic, we finally made it to our hotel soaked to the skin, hot, and thoroughly exasperated !!! This hotel and it's staff could not have been a more welcoming and comforting oasis for us that afternoon !!!  With a friendly greeting as we walked in the door, Carolyn, Matthew and Joe could not have been more sympathetic and compassionate of our plight, or more caring, attentive, helpful and proactive in responding to our situation. While Matthew checked us in to our wonderfully clean and quiet room, Carolyn was searching the internet for a nearby
Manager Response: Dearest HappyTravelers2013,  Words cannot fully express our sincerest gratitude; from seeing your smiling faces pass through the lobby each day to your kind words written here for all the world to see. We know the initial reason for your visit was not under the best terms, further exacerbated by your car troubles en route to Orange County but your kind spirits made us want to help you even further. I believe I speak for the entire team when I say we all have a passion to make a difference and it is with great pleasure that we were able to be there for you both in your time of need. Thank you for recognizing those extra special team members who went above and beyond to help.  Of course we cannot forget about the tangibles! We are glad that the guest room was clean, spacious, and just want you needed after your long drive down from Northern California. We hope that some of the additional amenities like breakfast and the Evening Social eased the troubles of having to find places to go out to eat, allowing you more time to spend at the beach :). We hope we will see you both again on a return trip to Irvine. We will be here to welcome you with open arms and warm smiles!  With our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Irvine Team

Summary: Stayed at this property multiple times.  Excellent facility and tremendously helpful staff.  Location is great and the hotel is new.  so rooms and common areas are superb.  Plenty of amenities.  The staff is the best I've every known.  Price is not cheap, but you definitely get what you pay for.
Manager Response: Greetings, Mr. Stevens  We have greatly enjoyed your company over the last few months. As a repeat (and extended) guest, we really appreciate your feedback and time in leaving this review. Hopefully you've gotten to know the ins and outs of the hotel during your visits! We really appreciate your comment regarding our staff; they are what truly make our hotel stand out! We hope you will join us again for a leisure trip to enjoy some fun in the California sun!  Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine as your Home Away From Home!  Warmest Regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Joe really took care of us for the weekend with great restaurant recommendations in the area. He was very accommodating and definitely helped improve our weekend 5/5.  The location and amenities were also a big plus. 15 minutes to the beach was a great convenience. The gym was very clean and the breakfasts were a big improvement over the usual continental fare.
Manager Response: Hello and good morning, azudans!  We can't thank you enough for your awesome review and for spending the weekend with us here at the Homewood Suites Irvine! We are glad to hear Joe added an extra touch to your stay with his help and we will certainly be sure to recognize him! Hopefully you also got a few laps in the pool in as well. September is such a great time to visit and spend time outside or at the beach. It's hard to believe that other parts of the country are changing in to fall while we are still enjoying 80+ degree days here! Be sure to visit us any time, rain or shine, when you visit Irvine again next. We would look forward to having you again!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Very nice & clean but wont stay again
Summary: The hotel was great , very new and Clean, but wont stay again due to the terrible showers ....the water flow is so low that it feels like u can count the water drops as they hit you . Called the front desk and they said that this is every person's complaint that stays there and they blamed the city of Irvine.  It's a shame because it's a nice hotel....but I cant go to work meetings unshowered because its impossible to take a shower.
Manager Response: Good morning, Crystal  We truly appreciate your feedback and sincerely apologize that our property did not live up to your expectations. While it is a known issue regarding our water pressure, (sadly you can see it on many comments across the board) we still want to ensure that guests are getting the best experience possible. We certainly hope you will give us another shot. When you do, please allow one of our friendly maintenance staff to assist and make sure you are getting the most water pressure possible. We hope you will give us the opportunity to make things right for you.  We look forward to your next visit Gabby & the Homewood Suites

Summary: The front desk ladies were so helpful and welcoming.  The room was prefect size and had everything you would need for a long stay.  I found the place very clean plus it had a great bed.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Good morning, Grandini2!  We appreciate your review and great rating for your recent stay. We are so pleased your experience was such a positive one! Hopefully you enjoyed  all the fabulous amenities  that our brand new property has to offer. Fun fact: HiltontoHome.com sells our comfy mattresses direct to you so you can get a 5 star sleep, every night! Please be sure to join us again on your next visit to the Irvine area. We would look forward to seeing you again!  Warmest Regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Very nice property, centrally located to the airport, freeways and shopping/dining. Everything worked great, althought the water pressure in the shower was a little low. I also liked that they don't charge a fee for parking.
Manager Response: Greetings, Chipster27!  Thank you for your recent visit and for leaving us a very generous review! We hope you found everything inside the property as well as out to your liking. We appreciate your feedback regarding the water pressure; we searching for ways to ensure both water conservation as well as guest satisfaction. We enjoy that we do not have to charge for parking either! We understand that every guest is looking for the best value when they travel to the Irvine area and the Homewood Suites Irvine is able to offer so much....for free! Please be sure to think of us again the next time you are visiting Orange County. We would love to host you again!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: That's from my kids - but we agree! Righr from being greeted to check in, o the amazing hot complimentary breakfast to check out. Everything about our stay was impressive, easy and homey feeling. Highly recommend for families headed to Disney who want somewhere with a kitchen (saves $) and only a quick drive to parking!
Manager Response: Good morning, Tinabambina(bobina)30  Thank you so much for making the Homewood Suites Irvine your Home Away From Home while visiting the Happiest Place on Earth! We hope we were the Comfiest Place on Earth during your trip. Being roughly only 16 miles away from Disneyland makes us a great option for those looking for a quieter option; close enough but away from the hustle and bustle. Hopefully you and the family also took advantage of our complimentary breakfast and Evening Social during the week to help you save some additional $$$. Please be sure to join us again the next time you are visiting the Orange County area, no matter the reason!  Looking forward to your next stay Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Convenient hotel near the John Wayne Airport
Summary: The hotel is clean, contemporary has a free breakfast and easy to get in and out of. The staff were very nice. Good night stay. This is more of a business trip hotel versus a family vacation hotel as the location is more in an urban office area.
Manager Response: Good morning, Corey!  Thank you so much for your recent review and for staying with us! We appreciate your feedback as we edge closer to our two year anniversary; we know there are always ways to improve! Hopefully you and the family enjoyed our heated pool, fire pit, sports court, and game room! While our surrounding neighborhood is quiet, we are just a short hop and a jump on several major freeways to location attractions like Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, and the beach! Please be sure to join us again on your next visit to Irvine, not matter the reason!  We are looking forward to your next visit!  Best Regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: First vacation for a 3 1/2 year old and it was wonderful. The 2 bedroom suite was just right with 3 adults. Staff was very accommodating, rooms were spacious and clean and travel times (about 15 min.) to both Disney & Knotts Berry were an easy drive. Breakfast was lacking compared to other Homewoods but okay. Free parking a bonus.
Manager Response: Good morning, Charles!  We certainly appreciate your (extra) efforts in writing this wonderful review on your family's recent visit. Our two bedroom suite is certainly the most luxurious with its two separate bedrooms  and even better, TWO BATHROOMS! It is a great set-up for any party but especially families. By being conveniently located near both the 55 and the 405 Freeway, we are just a hop, skip, and a jump from many of Orange County's premier attractions. We appreciate your feedback regarding our breakfast; we would love to hear any ways we can improve upon it. You have our number. We hope you will join us again the next time you are in the Irvine area!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We had a queen suite bedroom which was perfect for the three of us. My son said he felt like he had his own apartment with the door closed and is on TV with kitchen etc. Love the fact that there was a kitchen with everything that we needed including a decent size refrigerator. The only thing that I would improve on are the mattresses in the sofa bed it we had a queen suite bedroom which was perfect for the three of us. My son said he felt like he had his own apartment with the door closed and is on TV with kitchen etc. Love the fact that there was a kitchen with everything that we needed including a decent size refrigerator. The only thing that I would improve on are the mattresses in the sofa beds. Very uncomfortable but the king size bed was super comfortable.
Manager Response: Good evening, Michellezena!  Thank you kindly for your review of your recent stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine! As we continuously strive to provide the best experience possibe, we appreciate your insight. We are looking forward to sharing ideas for how to improve the sofa sleepers in our guest suites. Our suites, particularly the bedroom suites, are great for a number of different traveling parties. It's like having your own private apartment but better because we cook your breakfast!!  Please join us again the next time you find yourself in Orange County! We would love to host you and your family once more.  Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We selected this property as we had a group of youth coming for a local soccer tournament and someone "in charge" on our end made the decision this would be our chosen location. I don't know that I would have originally picked this hotel, but we had a good stay.  The price point was a little high compared to other similar properties with breakfast included, but the newness, cleanliness and friendliness of most staff made it reasonably well worth it. As well as the added benefits of the kitchenette.  The staff was always very friendly and accommodating. We were greeted right away and quickly provided with everything we needed to get into our rooms. It was interesting that, upon arrival, there were apparently some youth being a little rowdy at the pool. The gentleman that was
Manager Response: Greetings, NedGrimley!  I believe it is safe to say that you are the winner of the longest and most descriptive review to date. Thank you so much for all your insight and feedback; as a still relatively new hotel, we appreciate all the information regarding the guest experience that we can get! While you might have some specific tastes and preferences, you never know who might share them! While we might not have been your first choice of stay, we hope the positive experience made you a believer of the Homewood Suites Irvine. We would love to host you and your family again, whenever you travel to the Orange County area. We would certainly enjoy having you all again!  Don't be a stranger! Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Staying at this hotel met our expectations, very clean, friendly staff, best bang for the buck, -did not give us any push back for extra towel request or anything - will definitely be coming back preferred when we are in the area!
Manager Response: Hello, Kyoichi_Family!  Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us and more importantly, thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine! We are pleased to have been your Home Away From Home for your family during your travels. Our property offers a variety of suite set ups; perfect for any travel arrangement. Please be sure to bring the family back when you return to the Orange County area; we would certainly enjoy the company!  Our warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: There's a reason I keep coming back (not just the local grandchild!)
Summary: My son's family recently moved to Irvine and, not wanting to impose on them and the baby, we sought nearby accomodation.  Our priorities: cleanliness and value.  At this hotel, you'll get both.  My most recent stay: 8/21-8/28/18.  I don't know when the hotel was built, but it looks and is kept in new condition.  From the parking lots to the pool deck to the check-in and lounge and vast dining room, everything is bright, clean and ship-shape.  Hallways and room care are spot on.  When you first arrive, you may note the nearby SNA airport's air traffic passing nearby to the north.  But fear not!  Local ordinance prohibits the airport's operation from 11:00pm to 7:00am, so you'll sleep well!  (The hotel itself is located in a very very quiet area, not far from the intersection of
Manager Response: Greetings and hello, Harry!  Fun fact: the hotel was built and opened in January 2017. We certainly hope we are still giving off that "new hotel smell". Thank you so much for your thoroughly splendid review of your recent stay. While we have much to offer in the way of amenities such as our complimentary breakfast and Evening Social, our fabulous pool and sports court, to our welcoming lodge and business center, we firmly believe it is our staff that sets us apart. It is our continuous goal to make every guest feel as if they are "Home Away From Home" by providing 5 star service and attention to every guest. We are so pleased you experienced, particularly with our fabulous guest service agents, Joe and Hayley. We will be sure to recognize their efforts for the accolades you have left them. Please join us again the next time you are in Irvine. You can certainly bring the whole family to our Social Hour!  We are looking forward to your next visit, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Technical Advisor - FieldCore a GE Company
Summary: I‚Äôve been here in your hotel since March of this year. It was suggested to me to stay here by my colleagues. My stay here has been the best. The staff here has been great, Joe and Hayley have been excellent for anything I need they are friendly and courteous to me and all the guess that I‚Äôve seen them interact with. I also want to mention the house keeper that makes up my room, JULIETA  she goes out her way too, to do a great job, I appreciate her hard work very much. All and all everybody that I met here from your breakfast crew and evening dinner crew, maintenance people desk staff are all so friendly and courteous.  You guys have a great bunch of employees here.
Manager Response: Hey, Mr. B!  We have been enjoying your stay immensely thus far and are so glad we still have some time left to go with your extended stay. We definitely appreciate the update and thank you so much for sharing your experience with us, and the whole world! Our number one goal is to make you, and all of our guests, feel at home, no matter how long they are here with us. We are here, night and day, if you need anything. Here is to a great rest of your stay!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Great stay and good hotel location
Summary: I stayed at the Homewood Suites in Irvine for two days for business. The hotel is very central to the freeways and also being able to get to any location within 5-10 miles relatively easily. The breakfast was OK with a great deal of healthy food options. The juice is watered down and the tea choices could be updated and refreshed in the morning regularly. The food service staff seem to disappear during the breakfast service. The room was good except that I do not like to find hair from the previous occupant in my shower. The front desk staff were pleasant and attentive.
Manager Response: Good morning and hello, reynoldbryan!  Thank you for selecting the Homewood Suites Irvine during your recent travels. We appreciate your insight and review in to your recent experience. We sincerely apologize that your guest suite wasn't in the perfect condition for your arrival; hopefully you gave us the opportunity to make things right for you. Summer is winding down and everyone is enjoying the last bit of fun in the sun. This keeps all of our staff on their toes, particularly our amazing Food & Beverage Team. They certainly work hard to feed our hungry guests during breakfast and Evening Social. We hope you will stay with us again the next time you find yourself in Irvine, no matter the cause!  Looking forward to your next visit, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Just like home, with an amazing gameroom and nice pool. Awesome staff! Only ding: Terrible sofa bed. Love the digital keys, which actually work! Breakfast had lots of options. Would stay there again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Brian,  Thanks so much for your feedback and joining us at the Homewood Suites Irvine for your recent travel. As a newer property, built and opened in January 2017, we pride ourselves on our fresh facility and unmarred furniture. That being said, we appreciate your insight in to the sofa beds. Perhaps next visit we can set you up in a two queen room; there's no substitute for our heavenly beds! Please join us again for your next trip. We would look forward to host you again for breakfast and good times!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The price was great for the location.  The complimentary free breakfasts were amazing!  The room was very comfortable.  The staff were all very friendly to me.  The pool was not the biggest pool but when there weren't a lot of people there it was just right.
Manager Response: Good evening, Chad!  We very much appreciate your stay with us and your feedback on your visit! We greatly value your opinion so we can maintain our number one ranking in Orange County! We hope you were also to join us for our Evening Social for some tasty dinner snacks! Hopefully this wonderful first impression means we will join you for your next trip to Irvine! We would certainly enjoy the opportunity to host you once more.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I strongly recommend this hotel. The staff is absolutelly commited to give you everything you need and more. Facilities and amenities are excellent and make you feel very confortable. The overall cleanliness of the rooms and the hotel in general is well taken care. Complimentary services included in the price helps a lot. Definitively I'm hoping to come back. P. D. Kasey at front desk YOU ROCK GIRL!!!
Manager Response: Well hello, marymeha1982!  We couldn't be more excited by your recent review; and it sounds like you couldn't be more excited about your stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine! We so pleased you found our whole facility just perfect for your travel needs. We are proud of all the superb amenities we get to offer to guests including, but not limited to (!), complimentary daily breakfast, our week night evening social, free parking, internet, and more! Even more than the cool services we get to offer, we are so proud of each and every one of our team members who strive to make each guest experience outstanding and memorable. We are so pleased that they did that for you during your stay. If you ever looking for a comfortable bed and incredible service again, think of us! We would love the opportunity to host you again.  Don't be a stranger! Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Good, but front desk needs training
Summary: The front desk was kind and friendly, but charged our personal cards 100$ for incidentals, when we were clearly using a corporate card. Once we complained to our travel agency the issue was worked out and the charge reversed from our accounts.
Manager Response: Greetings, Timothymcnutt  We apologize for any confusion you and your colleagues experienced while traveling for business with us. Thank you for the opportunity to correct the charges to your personal cards right away. We certainly hope the rest of your visit went off without a hitch. We do hope you all will stay with us again the next time you are to visit the Orange County area. We would enjoy the chance to host you once again.   Please think of us on your next travels! Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: From the get go we were happy we chose Homewood Suites.  The staff is excellent!  The rooms are clean, comfy and spacious.  It's located is an industrial area close to the 55 freeway.  We enjoyed the included breakfast which was well supplied with an ample eating area.   We are already looking for a reason to stay here again!
Manager Response: Ooooh, Mamachili!  First and foremost, thank you so much for your very kind review on  your recent stay with us. We are truly proud of our Homewood Suites Irvine property and appreciate when guests sing our praise! We are so glad you and your family found everything about our hotel to your liking and needs. Next time, be sure to join us during the week days (Monday through Thursday) so we can treat you to dinner and drinks at our Evening Social as well! We would quite enjoy the opportunity so don't be a stranger!  We are looking forward to your next visit! Until then take care, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This is a fairly new hotel finished to a very high standard. It doesn't have a Bar! However they do serve free drinks between 5 and 7 pm Mon to Thursday. there is also no restaurant only a buffet breakfast area where again you get decent buffet food 4 nights a week 5 - 7 pm free. Rooms are fully equipped with a kitchen and dishwasher. Beds are really comfortable. the staff are fantastic. Ajay, Javier,Joseph,James and Gabby. they cannot be more helpful.
Manager Response: Greetings, James E.!  Here at the Homewood Suites, we like to go against the normal standards. As opposed to a traditional restaurant, our property offers complimentary breakfast daily and our Evening Social Monday through Thursday. With a menu that changes nightly and free-flowing (adult) beverages, what more could one want!? Of course there is always the option to cook "at home" in your guest suite. Whether you dine with us or enjoy a meal in the privacy of your room, the Homewood Suites has options for everyone. We genuinely appreciate your comments regarding our team who has assisted you during your visit. Without them, we wouldn't have near as much to brag about! We appreciate your time in leaving this review and sharing your experience with us. We hope you will join us once more when you visit Orange County!  Looking forward to your next visit, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This is the best hotel I have stayed at for quite some time. Hilton has outdone themselves once again. Thank you Hilton for keeping your standards high! Also thanks for having employees that live their jobs. This hotel should be the standard for all hotels to follow.
Manager Response: Greetings, Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay with us, your feedback is highly appreciated. As a Hilton property we have high expectations to meet; and we wouldn't be able to without our wonderful hardworking staff. Here at the Homewood Suites Irvine we all have only one goal in sight, and that is to make sure every guest feels they are at their home away from home. We sure hope to welcome you back the next time you are in the Irvine area! Warmest Regards, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Honestly, this place was so perfect in every way. The first thing that made it perfect and what remained consistent was the great service by the staff! Every last staff member we came across was super sweet and helpful so they are appreciated.   The room was awesome and spacious! We even ended up getting a second room and the staff was nice enough to put it as close as possible to our original one.   HIGHLY recommend if you need to stay in the area.
Manager Response: Good Morning Khempstead92, Wow! Thank you so much for your rating and review from your recent stay with us. We appreciate your feedback! Our staff is what genuinely sets us apart from the rest of the hotels in the area, they all work so hard and make it a point to say hello to every guest that comes their way. We're so happy that we were able to accommodate all of your families needs throughout your stay, we try our best to do what we can! We sure hope to welcome you back the next time you're in the Orange County area! Warm Regards Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: I can‚Äôt say enough about this hotel.  It is very modern and super clean (room, breakfast area, workout room) The room was very spacious and big. Close by to food places. This was our second time staying here for a week. I love this hotel and I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Greetings, Lori L!  I must say, we love having you visit us again! Thank you for returning to our Homewood Suites Irvine location during your recent trip. We are pleased you found our property and amenities just as great the second time around. While we have many return business guests who visit us regularly, it speaks volume that you selected us again for your vacation to the Orange County area. We know there are many options in our local area so we genuinely appreciate your repeat visit. Let's definitely make it a 3-peat!  Looking forward to your next stay, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Stayed here while attending a swim meet.    Staff were very good and suites were very clean.    Laundry room was on second floor and also very clean.   Shuttle from airport was good.   Only drawback not too many eating establishments within walking distance
Manager Response: Greetings, AnnC942!  Thank you so much for your time in writing this room. We certainly value your feedback and insight as to your experience with us. Built and opened in January 2017, we are definitely still enjoying that "new, clean hotel" smell! We are so glad you were able to enjoy many aspects of the hotel. Nothing like coming back to enjoy dinner at our Evening Social and a cold beverage after spending all day at the pool deck! Please come and join us again during your next visit to Orange County area. We are all definitely looking forward to the opening of our neighbor restaurant, Farmer Boys, slated for a September opening. Yum!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Too dark to read, too light too sleep
Summary: There is no overhead lighting in the living/sleeping area so it is difficult to read.  The windows have shades that are hung away from the window causing outside lights to shine brightly into the room.  If you are someone who cannot sleep in bright light, stay away from this hotel !!!!   Also the hotel is very noisy.  Despite being a Hilton Honors member, I was placed on the second floor right by the elevator and heard slamming doors and crying kids all night.
Manager Response: Dear leo1232018,  I just had a chance to review your comments regarding your stay with us.  I am so sorry to here that it did not go so well.  As you can see in all of our reviews good or bad, we do our best to ensure every guest is happy when they leave the hotel and are completely satisfied with their stay.   We are aware of the lack of reading lights in the bedroom and that is why we installed a reading light on the headboard of every bed in the hotel.  I am so sorry it was not enough.  We will be doing some research on how to better light the rooms because of your comments.  We do have some rooms with manual black out shades, so if you ever decide to stay with us again please request a room that has those.  The electric shades are cool but I do agree with you that they do not totally black out the room.  Lastly, I am sincerely sorry about the noise issues during your stay.  Unfortunately, we right in the middle of the summer season and although our hotel is primarily corporate, this is the time of year we have huge sports tournaments at the Great Park In Irvine, so the hotels are full for about 3 weeks with sports teams and families.  We do our best to mitigate the noise and control the kids.  Please reach out to me as I am eager to get you taken care of and at least satisfied with the outcome of your stay. Know that your comments are heard and we are looking into other ways to fix the things mentioned in your review.  A sincere thanks for sharing with us.  Sincere apologies,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Amazing facilities with a new modern twist and great service!     We (4 adults) spent 14 fantastic days here! Nice and safe location! Our suite at the 3rd floor with the panoramic windows was very comfortable, spacious and quite. Loved the kitchenettes so much! It had all the cooking necessities for a small living space. Seriously nothing I could think of was missing, Brilliant! Comfy beds with plenty of sheets and bedding. The fun part was watching the hotel guests using the amenities from our suite. People were barbequing and watching their kids enjoying the pool while others were playing basketball. Everyone seemed like they enjoy themselves just like home.     The complimentary hot breakfast was pretty good, many options every day with a cool variety of fresh ingredients.
Manager Response: Hello, Lindaf737  From the bottom of our collective hearts, thank you so much for your generous and very detailed review! Your feedback not only helps us here on property stay on our A-game but also informs other future guests of how amazing our Homewood Suites Irvine location is! Our guestrooms are clean and well-equipped, we offer all kinds of great complimentary amenities (I didn't notice parking in your list!), and the hotel still has that "new room smell" about it but what brings it all together is our amazing team members. From food and beverage preparing all those tasty bites, to our housekeeping team keeping the hotel immaculate, and our front desk staff greetings our guests with a smile, we could not be where we are today without them. We will be sure to pass along your sentiments to them all.   Please come visit us again whenever you find yourself in Irvine and looking to be treated to a 5-star stay! We would love the opportunity to host you again.  Until next time, Gabby & the entire Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The wife an I stayed for the night while moving our son into college.  We loved the layout of the king bed room that we stayed in.  It included a kitchen, combo dining/living room with separate bedroom and bathroom. The room was clean and up to date!  Looking forward to staying in the future.  These rooms would be perfect for extended stay.  The only thing this hotel needs is a lounge.  They also offered a government/State employee discount.
Manager Response: Greetings, 751eliasm!  Thank you for your generous review and choosing our Homewood Suites Irvine location to be a part of your family milestone. We are sure that the bedroom suite with the pull-out sofa was a great option for your son before heading off to school. While our evening social Monday through Thursday does offer complimentary beer and wine, there are plenty of great dining options nearby in the local Irvine/Tustin area. Let our front desk staff offer you recommendations that would be great for you and your wife or the whole family! Even though we are just in the swing of August, winter break will be right around the corner! We look forward to your next visit when you come to Orange County again. We'll be waiting!  Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: The beds were very comfy, the room was clean, the breakfast was great, the staff worked to accomodate our requests, and the evening receptions were a nice touch. The location is easy to get to and close to the airport for those who fly in.
Manager Response: Well hellooooo, MamaRiggs!  It was a pleasure hosting your family and many others participating in the PGF Nationals. We understand the importance of a hotel that doubles as a second home when you are on the road as often as the team is. Our Homewood Suites property offers many of the conveniences of home except you don't have to pick up after yourself! I am sure our laundry facilities saw a lot of action with everyone having to wash their uniforms often. We sincerely appreciate you and the team for selecting us for a second year in a row. We would love to make it a third! Whatever the reason you find yourself in Orange County again, know that you have a heavenly bed and hot breakfast waiting for you here!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This a clean, modern hotel thats just a few years old.  I was very pleased with the clean rooms and great breakfast!  It‚Äôs also in a great location!  The parking is free.  There is a lot of comfortable seating in the dining area, and several places to just sit and talk.
Manager Response: Greetings, Jamie C.!  The Homewood Suites Irvine was proudly built and opened in January 2017. The new hotel smell hasn't worn off yet! We appreciate your review on your recent stay and for joining us on your visit to Orange County. We greatly value your feedback in our efforts to continue being the number one hotel in the area! Whether it be the pool area, the game room, or the first floor foyer, there are plenty of places to relax during your stay. We are glad you were able to enjoy many locations throughout the hotel! Please join us again the next time you find yourself nearby. It would be a pleasure to host you once again!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Booked for a Disneyland vacation. Rooms were spotless. Facilities were excellent. Breakfast had something for everyone, and staff promptly refilled whatever ran out. They even made a special order of vegetarian eggs just for us. Laundry facilities were much appreciated, as I have a large family with young children!   After we had left, I discovered that I had left an expensive handbag with cash in it. When I called about it, the kind lady at the front desk went up personally to retrieve it, and mailed it to me. I received it the next day in the mail!  Highly recommended this hotel. Staff went above and beyond to make sure we here happy.
Manager Response: Well greetings, SquirrelyShirley!  We are glad that you chose the Homewood Suites Irvine to be your "nest" during your adventure to Orange County! Complimentary, daily breakfast can go a long way when feeding a hungry family, who has places to be! We hope you also got to experience our evening social during the week days. An ever-changing nightly menu with adult beverages is just the trick after a long day at the parks. We welcome the opportunity to host your family once again the next time you visit the greater Irvine area. Come visit us again!  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Quiet location, business Park area little to no traffic noise. Kitchen with dishware and full size refrigerator are a big plus for families. Game room with pool table is yet another big plus for this brand of hotel.
Manager Response: Good morning, Chevy8403!  We thank you for your glowing review of your recent stay. Our property has loads to offer for all types of travelers; from our daily breakfast, pool and fitness facility, and varying guest suites with conveniently stocked kitchenettes. We are pleased that you found everything to your liking during your visit to Orange County. Perhaps you have found your new Home Away From Home for your next visit? Lewis the Duck is always up for an exciting game of pool!   We look forward to your next visit, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We had stayed in a Homewood Suites near our home city and were delighted with the accommodations. There was a bedroom, living room and kitchen, with a nice bathroom. At this location, the bedroom was slightly elongated with a sofa at the end of it and a nice sized kitchen. There was no separation of the sleeping and living area which to me would define a suite.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, Jerome.  Did you know that we have several different type of guest rooms? It sounds like you were in our Junior Suite, a studio variation of our one bedroom suites. We find that some guests enjoy the studio suite for the sense of openness it provides while other  guests appreciate the privacy of a separate bedroom and living room. We would love the opportunity to assist you in reserving the best suite set up for your needs on your next visit to the Homewood Suites Irvine. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you again on your next visit to the area.   Warmest regards, Gabby and the Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: One of Our BEST Stays Ever!
Summary: Location is great! Close to Disneyland, California Adventure, Angel Stadium and many beaches.  My family and I really enjoyed the Homewood Suites.  We took advantage of the hot breakfast every morning.  They had 3 waffle stations, which helped with the wait time.  The staff, Emilio and another gentlemen (sorry didn't caught his name) were diligent when refilling the food, cleaning up the tables, picking up the trash.  We also took advantage of the light dinner.  Which really was a full meal to me.  They had barbeque sliders, macaroni, salad and drinks.  Dinner was very tasty.  We went for a swim in the pool.  My son shot some hoops in the basketball court.  Pool and court were well kept facilities.  Our room felt like home.  Beds were comfortable.  Room was clean and welcoming.
Manager Response: Good Morning, We are so pleased to hear about all your great experiences on your recent stay with us! We are so lucky to have such a hard working F&B team, that waffle station can get crazy sometimes. MMMM YUM!! The sliders are my fav! Glad to hear that the pool and sports courts were able to keep you guys busy with the great weather we were having during your stay. Its always nice to for mom and dad to get some quiet time, we're glad the suite was able to give you that time.We hope to welcome you back soon! Best, Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We wanted a weekend away at the beach, but $300+ for one night was a bit out of budget. We chose to stay at the Homewood Suites as it was 25-30 minutes from Laguna Beach and Dana Point. We decided to catch an Angels game and the stadium was a quick 20 minute drive! One night we chose to eat at Downtown Disney (during rush hour) and it only took 25-30 minutes to get there. This hotel was in the middle of it all! The room was extremely clean and breakfast was superb. We enjoyed the pool and basketball court and the gym looked well equipped. We always stay at Hilton hotels, but have never stayed at a Homewood Suites. We will most definitely return and continue staying in Homewood Suites!
Manager Response: Good Morning Stephanie, Thank you for your review on your recent stay with us, we appreciate your feedback! Our property is definitely a hidden gem that is close to just about everything! We are just thrilled that you found so much to do during your stay. Hopefully the Halos brought home the W just for you guys! We hope we can welcome you home on your next weekend getaway!  Warm Regards Eliza & The Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Family friendly and a real treat for everyone
Summary: Highly recommend this place. Everything from rooms to amenities like the pool and fitness room were fantastic. Breakfast was a real treat and there was also happy hour from Monday to Thursday with a light supper provided. Staff were wonderful, hotel was very inviting and clean and the place was an easy drive to Huntington and Newport Beach. We will definitely come back to this place next time we‚Äôre in town. Thank you for a great stay!
Manager Response: Good morning! Thank you so very much for your lovely review on your recent stay. We value your opinion and are thrilled you had such a wonderful experience with us. Irvine is a great jumping off point to many local attractions in the Orange County area including all beach locations, world class shopping, and DISNEYLAND! We hope your family will join us again next visit for a dip in the pool and some fun in the sun! Don't be a stranger!

Summary Heading: 5 stars all the way!!...(A family vacation review)
Summary: Sure, we could have stayed somewhere way more pretentious in the LA area.  Sure, we could have been on the the beach with fancy cars and shops around us, but that would have been the wrong decision.  I‚Äôm traveling for leisure with kiddos and we needed a clean and convenient place to stay that had superb service.  Which is why we chose Homewood suites in Irvine, ca.  Our very first family vacation in the Orange County area and we couldn‚Äôt have been more excited.  Mainly because my wife and I have stayed in one of these back home and was really impressed by the service and value.  We did our research and knew that we weren‚Äôt going to be beachfront or in the center of anything walkable, but that was fine with us especially traveling with kids.  One thing to note for first time OC
Manager Response: Dear Shane, First of all, WOW!! We appreciate you taking the time to tell us all the little details from your stay. Its reviews like this that truly bring a smile to our faces! We are honored to have been chosen for such a special vacation/birthday. Very happy to hear that our hot breakfast was to your liking, the waffles are my favorite too ;) You definitely came during a classic Southern California heatwave so we're delighted that our pool was able to keep the family nice and cool! Here, at the Homewood Suites, we try our very best to make sure that even when you are away that you feel that you are indeed home. Thank you so much for all of your kind words! We hope to welcome you back the next time you are in the Irvine area!  Best, Eliza & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: When it comes to a hotel, people can get a bed anywhere. But this place is a must stay for all who travel to Irvine.  The staff there are just incredible.  It truly is a home away from home.  They have the nicest staff that work there that will make your stay a memorable one.  They truly made a difference for me and my family to the point that we didn't want to leave and it was emotional.  There was many staff members that made a difference for us but the following staff members are just amazing: Gabby, Caroline, Alyssa, Carlos, Emilio, Eliza, and the manager Paul.  Go stay there and say hi to them.  They will truly take care of you.  It was our second time to stay there and we will continue to stay there in the future.  Words cannot express the service from this hotel.  Just
Manager Response: Dear Sarah,  Guests don't always know the positive influence they have on us as staff at the hotel. Those of us who were on property last summer, myself included, were very excited to see your family on our arrivals list again this summer. We definitely have enjoyed the connection made between us all and it was like old friends coming back to visit. Thank you for all your kind words and sentiments; know they are full-heartedly recipcrocated! We at the Homewood Suites Irvine will look forward to being your Home Away From Home in summer 2019.   Until we visit again, all our best Gabby and the Homewood Suites team

Summary: We've stayed  at a lot of hotels this summer and this was by far the cleanest and friendliest hotel we've stayed. We would definitely choose to stay at this hotel again and refer friends to stay. One of the most comfortable stays this summer
Manager Response: Greeting Msarra! Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your stay! We are so happy that we were able to make you feel so comfortable. We hope to welcome you back to your home away from home again soon!  Best, Eliza Guest Service Agent

Summary: Hello, I am  Diamond member with the Hilton Hotel and I recently stayed here. It was a pleasant stay, from checking in to checking out. Staff was very friendly and welcoming. Hotel was clean and staff was helpful.
Manager Response: Good morning, Jorge M.!  As a Diamond member with Hilton, we know you must do your fair share of traveling! We appreciate your loyalty and choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine as your location during your recent trip to Orange County. We pride ourselves on our beautiful, new(er) property, inclusive amenities, and convenient location but feel it is our fabulous team that truly makes each guest experience a 5 star one. We appreciate your recognition of this! We hope to see you again on your next adventure to California.  Warmest regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Can't say enough about this Hotel and Staff!  They're AWESOME!  This was our second year staying here and they accommodated our Softball Team over and beyond our expectations.  Rooms and hotel facilities are very clean.  Rooms are spacious.  Breakfast is good.  Location is great.  Lots of stores close by.  Our Softball Team will be returning next year, that's for sure!
Manager Response: Good morning, C7051Mmichelleh  It was an absolute pleasure hosting the Titans again for another year. Thank you for making the Homewood Suites Irvine a part of your team's tradition. Your visits mean just as much to us as we are sure they do to you, and we are not just taking about all the lunches and dinners you shared with us! We look forward to seeing all your smiling faces next summer, even though it feels like such a long time from now!  Until next time, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Centrally located close to major highways.  Superior staff, hot breakfast and exemplary service, Homewood Suites is the BEST choice where there are many options for a multi-date stay.  Clean and environmentally-conscious as well, this property is a perfect fit for my family....and likely yours!
Manager Response: 888DeDe,  I am blown away by your generous review. We HOPE all families are like yours because we would love to host them all! Thank you for noticing the hotel location; in the quiet parts of Irvine but close to all the major local freeways. Irvine is a great jumping off point for visits to all the local attractions, even San Diego County and Los Angeles County. Southern California is right outside our front door. You and your family will always have a home when you come to Orange County. Please be sure to visit us again soon!  Warmest regards, Gabby and the entire Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Nine night stay with family of seven
Summary: GREAT LOCATION!  FREE PARKING! REALLY GREAT BREAKFASTS! AWESOME FRONT DESK FOLKS! LOTS OF PARKING SPACES! BEAUTIFUL LOBBY AND BREAKFAST AREA! REAL PLATES AND SILVERWARE FOR BREAKFAST! (Even when the closing time from breakfast rolled around and you ask for something that had ran out, they were very happy to go into the kitchen and get more for you. We stayed at another brand two years ago and when the breakfast time was up, the staff was almost jerking stuff out of your hands to put it up, and you did't ask for anything after the time for breakfast was up, they would growl at you.) VERY CLEAN POOL AND SPA! BIG AND CLEAN SUITES (We had the two bedroom suite, the largest suite on the floor, and it was like coming home everyday, always neat and clean.) DID I ALREADY SAY THAT OUR
Manager Response: Greetings, Egailc!  SHOUT IT FROM THE ROOFTOPS!!! We are blown away by your fantastic review; we cannot thank you enough for the time (and energy!) in writing this. Our goal with each guest stay is to make you feel like home and we are so pleased your stay did that for you. We hope we all became more like friends during the course of your stay. It sounds like your family made the most of your stay and were able to experience all the things that make the Homewood Suites Irvine G-R-E-A-T! Don't be strangers on your next visit; we would love to host you again!  Best wishes and until next time, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: This hotel is a good option in Irvine area. Staff always very friendly and helpful. The suite is very comfortable with full kitchen. The hot breakfast is very good and Monday to Thursday they offer a evening event very nice. Offering beer, wine and food complimentary.
Manager Response: Good morning, Costa Family!  It has been a pleasure being your Home Away From Home these past few weeks. We are glad that your family found the hotel and all its amenities beneficial to your extended stay.Thank you so much for taking the time to write this review and share your experience with the world! Please join us again whenever you find yourself in the Irvine area; we would love to see you again!  Until we meet again, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We had a large group of parents, players and coaches for a roller hockey tournament in June and it was unamious that we made a great choice as we experienced excellent service from beginning to end.  No one in the group had been to this particular hotel in the past, so we relied heavily on information provided on the website and from the hotel associate Chase, who was extremely helpful in answering questions and arranging our stay at a convenient location by John Wayne airport. The hotel staff were very friendly and responsive to our needs, from having large group breakfasts, to having immaculate pool side BBQs, to having top notch service at reception, to having very clean and comfortable rooms. The basketball court was a big plus for the players too. Thank you
Manager Response: Dan-van-fam,  First off, congratulations on the big win! We hope we helped the team out in some way; wher her that was providing you with a filling breakfast each day, comfortable beds for a great night sleep, or somewhere for the team to unwind and relax after a long day. Thank you for recognizing Chase and the whole staff for assisting and making your stay the best possible. We hope you all will join us again when you are ready to defend the title! We would love to be a part of that dynasty!  Join us again, no matter the reason you travel to Irvine, California.  Best regards, Gabby and the whole Homewood Suites team

Summary: Very nice hotel with a very polite staff! Breakfast and Parking included were the best things that we could find in the area! We really liked the room and the services that the hotel provided us! Thank you
Manager Response: Greetings, Justine P!  Thank you so much for your kind review on your recent stay; it was a pleasure hosting your family during your stay. We are so pleased you had everything you need during your visit at your finger tips. Please don't be a stranger and be sure to visit us on your next trip to the Orange County area!   Until next time, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Team

Summary: Upon arrival the staff was friendly and helpful. My room was large and very clean. The beds were so comfortable. It was nice to have a separate seating area. The full kitchen with microwave, dish washer and refrigerator were great too. The only problem with the room was the window coverings. It was bright in the morning.
Manager Response: Good morning, jmesummers!  Thank you for your generous review of your recent guest stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Sometimes we like guests to rise and shine to enjoy breakfast with us! We appreciate your feedback regarding the room configuration; we will certainly look in to ways to improving upon guest comfort. We hope you will join us again during your next visit to Orange County. Until next time!  Warmest regards, Gabby at the Front Desk & and the entire Homewood Suites Team

Summary: We (husband, wife and 16 year old son) stayed at the hotel with our Roller Hockey team.  Cannot say enough good things about the staff (helpful and considerate) and the hotel (clean and quiet).  Plus a very comfy bed! Will stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Greetings, Shuttered!  Here at Homewood Suites Irvine, we know how important it is for an athlete to get a good nights rest! It was a pleasure hosting your family and the rest of the team; congratulations on the big win! Whether your next visit is for another tournament or just to come suck up the sun in Orange County, we have you covered. Thank you again for your generous review and for choosing us as your Home Away From Home! We look forward to seeing you next time!  Warmest Regards, Gabby at the Front Desk and the whole Homewood Suites Team

Summary Heading: Extremely clean, Family friendly, Great location, Great Value!!
Summary: We loved this place immediately. After spending the entire day traveling and doing Knott's berry farm we arrived late in the evening where we were greeted wonderfully by the gentleman at the front desk. He made our check in easy and suggested a few restaurants in the area. My family and I felt very welcome from the start If you have kids, this place is clean, secure and even though we did not get a chance to go swimming the pool and hot tub looked very inviting..
Manager Response: Dear Martin T,  Thank you so much for the kind words about your stay and the staff here at Homewood Suites in Irvine.  I actually love Knotts Berry Farm and worked there for some time years back.  It was so nice to hear that the male front desk agent was nice and accommodating.
