Well, hopefully when we see you again next time... you will be able to take advantage of the pool, sports court and game room.  WE really appreciate that fact that you chose our hotel and hope to see you again in the near future.  Sincerely, Paul Frechette - General Manager

Summary: There is free, but inadequate parking onsite.  There are no nearby alternatives, as this is situated in a commercial area.  The staff are unable to assist you if you find all the spaces are full.  The area may be safe, but a long walk late at night in an unknown neighborhood is never ideal.  The actual suite is nice, with a comfortable bed, a clean kitchen and sitting area, and a relatively large bathroom.  The shower pressure is awful, but that seems to common.
Manager Response: Dear liteft6,  I am so sorry to hear that you had issues with the parking here at the hotel.  Although it is the start of our summer season, we usually have plenty of parking and there is free street parking right in front of the hotel.  Please accept my humble apology if no one informed you of that.  I will be sure to go back to the team and make sure we role play through this scenario as they all should know that.  We really appreciate any feedback guests give us.  Sincere apologies,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Love the place awsome room great services Wifi goes on and off But man I gotta thank  Joe and Zee at the front desk great employees  & customer  service would take them to PR to work for me they need a promotion
Manager Response: Good evening, KJ V!  Thank you so much for your time and effort in writing this guest review and your feedback. Sadly, you may not have our beloved staff members. They are an integral part of what makes the Homewood Suites Irvine experience so enjoyable for everyone! However, we will certainly be sure to pass your gracious compliment along to Joe and Zee. We are pleased you enjoyed all the aspects of your stay, other than our amazing team. We hope to be your Home Away From Home the next time you find yourself in the Irvine area!  Until next time... Gabby, Front Desk

Summary Heading: Outstanding Place to Stay in Orange County!
Summary: We stayed at Homewood Suites/Irvine John Wayne Airport for 8 nights in a 2 BR suite.  Our family loved our spacious, spotlessly clean suite.  It was wonderful to have a second bathroom, especially on our early morning get-to-Disneyland-for-rope-drop mornings!  The hotel is beautifully decorated and has an upscale, yet comfortable feel to it.  We felt quite at home over our stay. The staff is phenomenal.  Everyone that we encountered was friendly and helpful and clearly committed to guest service.  Housekeeping kept our room perfectly clean and fresh each day.  Great job! This hotel will be our first choice the next time we visit the area.
Manager Response: Hello, Lisa T!  We cannot thank you enough for your kind and generous review on your recent stay. Our two bedroom suites are a truly luxurious experience and great for all sorts of group set ups. We hope you made sure to stop and grab a bite to eat in the morning at our complimentary breakfast to fuel your Disney adventures (fyi - you can always bring your own snacks and drinks inside the park. Be sure to stop off at the Suite Shop on your way out!). Thank you for recognizing all of our fabulous staff members who embody the spirit of hospitality every day. We hope you visit Disneyland regularly because we are looking forward to your next stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Spent three nights here with my family and couldn't fault it in any way. The hotel is new and spotless. The location is excellent, very close to Newport Beach and also many restaurants. The staff were very friendly especially Hayley at the front desk, who was very knowledgeable about Irvine and the surrounding area. We had a two bedroom suite which was great. I highly recommend this hotel 5 star.
Manager Response: Good morning, Mark B!  But did you go over the hotel with a fine-toothed comb?! Thank you SO MUCH for the very generous review and more importantly, thank you for having a great stay! We hope the spacious two bedroom space was comfortable for the whole family; room for everyone to come together yet also have some privacy! You just can't beat having two bathrooms sometime! Thank you so much for recognizing Hayley and her efforts in making your guest stay a 5 star experience! We certainly look forward to hosting your family again soon.   Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: My recent stay at Homewoods by the Hilton was just GREAT! The amenities was wonderful and full breakfast was just Awesome! The front desk assistant, James, was so professional and helpful when I needed his help!Thank You so much for having such excellent staff!  Pam
Manager Response: Good evening, Pam!  We wish to thank you for your generous review on your recent stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. While we pride ourselves on our comfy beds, spacious guest suites, and delightful amenities including hot breakfast, it is our staff that truly makes a difference. Thank you for recognizing James' efforts to provide you with exceptional service and care. We will certainly make he knows he is appreciated. Don't be a stranger, please come and visit us again on your next visit to Orange County!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: The bed was very comfotable and the breakfast was great! Having the full suze fridge is nice as is the kitchen. Would defintely stay here again. Easy access to the freeway and an easy drive to the beach.
Manager Response: Hello there, Betty V!  We want to thank you for choosing our beautiful Irvine location for your family getaway weekend. When you are here, you are all part of the Homewood family! Our hot breakfast everyday and complimentary evening social (Monday through Thursday) are great ways to ensure your attention is spent spending quality time instead of cooking or worrying about dinner reservations. Let us take care of you! Next time, bring the entire family. There's space for everyone!  Until your next visit... Gabby, Front Desk

Summary Heading: Very comfortable and close to the airport
Summary: Hotel staff was great upon check in. I had a slight issue with my room which was resolved with housekeeping within an hour of checking in. Close to shops/airport/restaurants. The breakfast was hearty and a nice addition to the stay.
Manager Response: Greetings, KatieHer!  Thank you so much in writing this review and providing your feedback on your recent stay. We certainly apologize for the room oversight upon your arrival. Thank you for alerting the staff right away and giving us the opportunity to Make It Right! We are pleased that the hotel, amenities, and even the surrounding Irvine area catered to all your needs! We hope you'll join us again at the Homewood Suites Irvine on your next visit.  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: This was our first time at a Homewood Suites.  We were very impressed.  There was plenty of room in the suite and even a small kitchen.  The beds were comfy.  The service was top notch.  Normally, I choose a regular Hilton for my hotel stays but this was a step up.
Manager Response: Good morning, friend!  We are overjoyed that your stay made you a believer of Homewood Suites! Our guest suites are aimed to please and cover all your needs! Thank you for recognizing our entire staff who makes guest satisfaction their number one priority. We hope to see you again on your next visit to Irvine. Don't be a stranger!  Best regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Great hotel with super staff!  Thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  Gabby at the front desk makes everything so easy!  Food service & housekeeping were great, also.  Definitely recommend to anyone visiting Irvine
Manager Response: Good evening, Mary Anne T!  Did you even make it out of the hotel before writing this review?! I guess it is best to comment when the stay is still so fresh! Thank you so very much for commenting on your week long stay with us. It was an absolute pleasure getting to know you and Mr. T. Thank you so much for the personal shout out as I really enjoyed getting to assist you two with your stay. Of course thank you for recognizing all of our staff who each had different, yet all pleasant, impacts on your experience with us. We look forward to hosting you both on your next visit to Orange County!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Really impressed with my experience at Homewood Suites! The staff was extremely helpful and kind from checkin to checkout. They even called up to the room to ensure everything was to our liking. The room was very nice-clean and modern. There were many appliances available. Beds were very comfortable. Loved the view of the pool. Very private but spacious.
Manager Response: Good evening, mharvey736!  Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites for your recent stay in Irvine. It pleases us to no end how much you enjoyed our suites and property. Thank you for recognizing our team who gave your stay that little extra touch. Please be sure to join us again the next time you find yourself in the area.  We look forward to seeing you again soon! Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary Heading: If I could give a higher rating I would...
Summary: I don't know where to begin with this review.  I have so many amazing things to say about this hotel and the staff that makes your stay unforgettable.  First I have to say, look no further, you've found your hotel.  Whether you're staying for business, pleasure, or because you can't stay in your house due to an unfortunate event.  My family and I stayed at this hotel for most of the last 6 months due to a house fire.  Upon our first stay, we were greeted by the friendly front desk team.  We checked in 3 separate times over the time we were out of our house, and the process was extremely easy and quick.  The last 2 stays they had us stay in the same rooms!  The timing must've been perfect, but bless them for being so thoughtful and trying to make us feel "at home".  We had a
Manager Response: Selene,  Where do we even start?! You are without a doubt part of the Homewood Suites family and we couldn't be happier to have you all as members! It was simply a pleasure getting to know the kids and everyone else over the course of your extended stay. Thank you for celebrating and sharing your journey with us; seeing you all finally leave to go back home was very bittersweet. You and the family are always welcome, whether it be for a night, a week, or even just for dinner and a drink. Thank you for being our guest. Please know that you touched so many of our hearts and have left a life-long impression on us. So don't be a stranger!  With lots of warmth and love, Gabby and the entire Homewood Suites Irvine team

Summary: I have been staying at the Home wood Suites monthly for Business since 2017, the staff is always top notch "Shout out to IZZY and GABBY" but my best experience so far happened this past weekend when I dropped my car key through an opening on the elevator.  Tony the maintenance engineer was awesome.  He assured me he would retrieve the key and he did.  He was patient and although it took several attempts with Tony trying all types of contraption from magnets, wires etc. he was able to finally grab the keys through that narrow opening and save me a lot of money.  Tony exhibit the temperament that should make any employer proud.  He was kind and did not mind helping me get my keys.   I would give him 10 stars if i could.  He would not even take the tip i offered him.  Great Job
Manager Response: Good morning, Ms. Adean H!  As someone who truly lives the Home Away From Home life, we appreciate your insight and feedback as to your guest stays with us. Thank you for recognizing Tony's efforts in what must have been a really stressful situation. We strongly believe that our team members are what make Homewood Suites Irvine a special place to stay. Thank you for sharing your experience with us, especially since it had such a happy ending!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: My family and I decided we wanted to rent a room in a place that was centrally located since we're all scattered in different locations. Came across Homewood Suites. Honestly, it was the best hotel stay I've experienced and that's saying a lot. The room was beautiful and suited all our needs. The staff were amazing! One staff member, in particular, really made the stay special. Her name was Hayley, and she went out of her way to let us know we were appreciated. We were celebrating my father's birthday, and she provided complementary ice cream and well wishes. She even went as far as helping us take our last minute family photos in front of the hotel. She was awesome!! We are definitely going to be repeate customers! Great room, superb service, good location...Loved Homewood
Manager Response: Good morning, Ivanna W!  What a wonderful story; thank you so much for coming to the Homewod Suites Irvine to celebrate a special occasion with us. We love getting to know our guests and what special occasions bring them to our property. We are so thrilled to hear the special impact that our desk agent, Hayley, made upon our visit. We will certainly be sure to honor her efforts in making your visit a Home Away From Home experience.Experiences like these will certainly last a lifetime!  Thank you for making Homewood Suites Irvine a part of your family. We look forward to seeing you next time! Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: The service, amenities and location are wonderful. The price is worth it. Location wise it‚Äôs not far to the attractions. The rooms are very clean and the location is safe. Not in the busy location. The hotel cleanliness are great. And the service of the people who work there is commendable. They‚Äôre helpful, respectful and very pleasant. I truly recommend this place
Manager Response: Good morning, AuSid28  We cannot thank you enough for your amazing review of your recent stay at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Your opinion and time in writing this review are truly valued as we strive further to provide outstanding service and product to our guests. While our amenities and guest suites really shine, we feel it is our team member's commitment to service that truly make each guest stay a Home Away from Home experience. Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We hope to see you again on your next travels!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for about 6 weeks and the whole stay had exceptional service, spacious rooms, very nice pool and pool area, delicious breakfast and a fun game room! We stayed at another hotel (Residence Inn) for two weeks prior to coming to the Homewood. We made the switch to Homewood for the rest of our stay because the rooms were much bigger. But we were also pleasantly surprised how friendly and aiming to please the staff was at the Homewood. Every employee had a great attitude which was not the same at the other hotel. At the Homewood, we were especially pleased with Gabby from the front desk and her ongoing phenomenal attitude, friendliness and going out of her way to help us with whatever needs came up. Gabby went above and beyond at check in to help us with our
Manager Response: Good morning, Bryan-Julie S (and the girls!)  It means quite a bit to us to be your last home in Orange County before your home. It was a pleasure getting to know your family and be a part of your journey. Thank you for making the change to Homewood Suites; couldn't be more happy that everything worked out so well. The two queen bedroom suites are quite spacious and allow for a bit of privacy for everyone while our tasty breakfast every day helps save a bit of spending money. We strongly feel that our team members are what really set us apart. In being our guest's Home Away From Home, we also like to be a part of the family! Thank you so much for recognizing our staff who made an impact on your stay.  You will always have a home at the Homewood Suites Irvine! Warmest regards and best wishes, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Just finished a 5 night stay.  Front desk staff was friendly and helpful in reserving a cab for one day.             For a family  of 4 it was great having 2 Q beds in a separate room from the kitchen /living area.      We used the full kitchen to make healthy food on more than one occasion.  Free Breakfast was wonderful as was the light cocktail dinner.     We enjoyed the pool a few times and my son enjoyed the basketball hoop (ball checked out from the front desk.)    Parking was plentiful and free.        Airport traffic is loud while at the pool but we didn't mind as we enjoyed watching the landings.   The rooms were quiet; we felt like we were the only people on our floor  but we know we weren't.    We will definitely stay here again on our next visit to Irvine.
Manager Response: Hello, Momof2IN!  Thank you so much for sharing your recent stay experience with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine! We are so pleased that you enjoyed so many aspects of our hotel, from the complimentary breakfast and evening social to utilizing the fully-equipped kitchen in each and every one of our guest suites. There are configurations to suit any type of stay. We are glad you found the a set up with us that caters to your families needs. As the summer nights warm up, there will be plenty of time to shoot some hoops during your next stay in Orange County!  Until then, take best of care! Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Overall the week long trip to Homewood Suites in Irvine went perfectly.  One person in particular, Gabby at the front desk, did a fantastic job.  Not only did she remember my name each time returning to the property but also engaged in small talk.  All of this made the experience more than enjoyable and home like. Thanks to all of the staff at Homewood Suites (I'm looking at you Chase) for getting a rather complex set of rooms organized without difficulties.
Manager Response: Greetings and thank you, Snafu H!  Thank you so much for your time taken in writing this review. Guest reviews go a long way in helping us maintain the stellar property we have opened just a bit over a year ago. Thank you so much for recognizing a few members of our staff (including me, woop!). While our Homewood Suites is still new and shiny, with loads of great amenities, we certainly value our team members, from housekeeping to front desk to sales, who all embody our culture of hospitality and creating a Home Away From Home for our guests. We look forward to being your home again the next time you are in California.  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Great staff, great location, great Hotel! We have been coming to Irvine a few times a year and Homewood Suites has become our go-to place. We had stayed in different rooms like the one bedroom, 2 bedroom and studio suite and all of them have been great.
Manager Response: Greetings, When1nRome! Or should we say When1nIrvine?!  Variety is the spice of life, right?! We so very much appreciate your feedback as a seasoned visitor of our Homewood Suites property. We hope you will join us many more times for breakfast, a light dinner, play time at the pool, or just kicking back in any of the many spacious guest suites!  We certainly look forward to your next visit with us in Irvine.  Best regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary Heading: Conferences services and support staff are phenomenal!
Summary: I just finished up hosting a series of three week long workshops at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Chase was amazing to accomodate our every need (reconfigure trables as needed, come to answer questions throughout day, help us ensure all AV was ready each morning, etc). Chase and his team were a huge reason these workshops with 20-40 clients) were a huge success.   The main conference room can be broken into three smaller sections or used as one big room (we used every configuration based on the workshop and attendees).  There‚Äôs good wall space to hang poster and AV set up is super easy and really simple to switch between presenters. This was definitely a great space to use and amazing support group to facilitate these workshops with.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, Hillazoe!  Our property is great for a myriad of stays and occasions; our guest suites are equipped to keep guests comfortable for months at a time. In addition, we also have new meeting spaces to accommodate a variety of events. Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites Irvine to host your series of workshops. We are so pleased we could be a part of your success and our amazing team helped you get there! We hope to have you for the next session!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Room was neat, clean, and organized.   Even an extra blanket in the closet.  The bathroom was the cleanest I‚Äôve ever seen in a hotel.  Loved the fact that the shower head was at one end and the controls at another.  Breakfast was very good.  The coffee was excellent.  The desk clerk even made me a fresh pot one night.   Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Good morning, monicajernigan!  We were so close! Reviews like yours are incredibly important because we are constantly driving for that 100% satisfaction! We are so pleased that you found our property to be accommodating to all your needs and even the little things that might go unnoticed to some! We truly wish to be your Home Away From Home on your next visit to the Irvine/Orange County.  Until next time... Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: This was a very convenient location!  We were in the middle of what we wanted to do...40-50 min away from LA & SD and 10-15 minutes from Little Saigon.  Because of our location, we were usually going against traffic.
Manager Response: Good morning, Kattrankht!  Orange County is in a great location, smack dab in between Los Angeles County & San Diego County. However, Orange County is a quaint and quiet community; excellent for family travels! With many diverse neighborhoods including Little Saigon, there are surely attractions for anyone! We certainly hope you and your family will join us for your next visit to the Irvine area!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: I booked through my card for points. The staff, service, food, facilities, location, everything was excellent. If ever return, I‚Äôll be staying here (as long as nothing changes). Keep up the great work Homewood!!
Manager Response: Good morning, Lynita H!  Thank you so much for your recent guest stay and for taking the time to leave a review! Guest feedback means a great deal to us in maintaining our current level of guest service. We are so pleased your stay with us was a 5-star experience! We hope you will let us prove ourselves again with another great visit the next time you find yourself in Irvine!  Warmest regards, Gabby

Summary: I always wanted to know what it felt like to be a VIP, and I know the feeling now! From the first phone call to the Homewood suites with Haley, and checking in with Haley and Joe were awesome. They remember your name, your kids, things you may need!!! It was a very comfortable, clean environment. Tony in maintenance did everything we asked, housekeeping kept things right! If we ever need to stay in Orange County again, this is where my family will stay! Without a doubt!!! McDonald Clan üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª
Manager Response: Good morning, tiffygirl43!  Thank you so much for your RAVING review!! It was our pleasure getting to know your family and all the excitement coming up in your family's adventures; thank you for sharing that with us! We are so pleased that our hotel met all your needs during your stay with us. Extra special thank you for bringing attention to some of our amazing team members who had an impact in your stay! We will absolutely be sure to celebrate them. We hope to see you all again the next time you visit Orange County!  Until next time... Best regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: I‚Äôm so glad I stumbled onto this hotel just a couple of days before our trip.  For a family of 6, this can‚Äôt be beat.  We had the two bedroom suite with two bathrooms.  This had a full size fridge, lovely little dining table and the living area with couch.  Staff is super friendly and suite is very clean.  The complimentary breakfast makes this an amazing value to boot.  My nieces loved the make-your-own waffle bar!  The pool, jacuzzi, and fitness room are great, and they even have a basketball court.  The location is highly convenient.  Within less than 15 minutes, you can be in Costa Mesa, Tustin, Orange, etc.  If you‚Äôre traveling with family, definitely check this place out!!
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you so much for the amazing compliments! We couldn't be more pleased that your family enjoyed their stay so much. As summer approaches, we have guest suites that can meet many different family needs. Our two bedroom suites are fantastic set ups with separate bedrooms and a common living room space for everyone to come together. Plus, you can never have too many bathrooms in a hotel room! We hope you will join us again soon for your next family vacation.  Until next time... Gabby, Front desk

Summary: I love Homewood Suites by Hilton! The staff is amazing! My children were in the pool & hot tub everyday, breakfast & dinner was great.rooms are very clean & maintained Close to shopping, the beach & airport.
Manager Response: Greetings Mechelle!  We couldn't said it better ourselves! Thank you so very much for your review on your recent stay with us at the Homewood Suites! You got the full experience and we are glad you put all our great amenities to good use. Our property has plenty of great activities for families and children to enjoy including our game room and outdoor sports court as well! We hope to be your Home Away From Home during your next visit to the Irvine area!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary Heading: My favorite home away from home in California!
Summary: We stay at this hotel every time we visit California.  The staff is very attentive and friendly.  David is so upbeat every time we see him.  He and his staff are such a joy to be around.  This hotel has the best breakfast I have ever had from any hotel.  It's location is located just minutes away from Disney as well as the many beaches in the Los Angeles area.  My family feels at home and safe here.  The hotel is very kid friendly.  I am a single mother of two and one of the thing my kids enjoy about our visits here is that our room  has a kitchenette and is always clean.  There is also a basketball court, pool, hot tub and work out area.  This location is great for weddings, honeymoon stays, special occasions and parties.  The staff was so engaged with my family. They
Manager Response: Good morning, Markesha!  Thank you for choosing the Homewood Suites in Irvine as your go-to property for your visits to the Orange County area. We quite enjoy getting to hear the special stories and events that bring our guests to us; it's like we can share in the experience with you! Thank you for recognizing the efforts of our stellar staff who made such a wonderful impact on your stay. We certainly look forward to your next return visit!  Warmest Regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: The studios are excellent! Clean, large and well equipped. Personnel is kind and available to meet your request. I would only recommend to ask for a room 2nd floor and up for better privacy ( rooms on 1st are facing the parking ) and - from an Italian - the I was missing espresso.  An espresso machine in the breakfast area would complement the stay to top level!
Manager Response: Good morning, LupoMarianna!  We certainly appreciate your feedback and insight in to your most recent stay; we all enjoy learning about what pleases our international guests! I think we could all agree a little extra boost in the morning is a great thing! We hope you found your guest suite spacious and comfortable but our guest agents would always be happy to help you find an alternative layout. With 4 floors, we have some pretty good options! We certainly hope that you will join us again the next time you travel to the Orange County area!  Addio & warmest regards, Gabby & Alyssa, Front Desk

Summary: Amazing experience. One of the few places that does not charge for parking. Also offers free breakfast. The room and lounge area are clean, comfortable, and spacious. I felt like I was in my own apartment. The staff was so friendly and accommodating. Definitely staying here or at another homewood suites again!
Manager Response: Good morning, naddysoy!  What a compliment; we turned you into a Homewood Suites Homie! Our variety of complimentary amenities including parking, breakfast, and our evening weekday social. All this makes us a great choice for business travel, family vacationers, you name it! We truly appreciate your time in leaving your feedback and we hope to be your Home Away From Home during your next visit!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: This place is just amazing. This is the third time I‚Äôve stayed there in two months. Every single time it seems to get better. Not only is it a nice hotel, the employees that work there make it even better.
Manager Response: Good morning, Michael B!  As a return guest, we certainly appreciate your insight on our hotel. Our goal is to always strive for the very best guest experience! It is great to have a new facility with all the perks of our added amenities like breakfast, our evening social, complimentary parking, and wifi. Our team members are what truly make each guest stay an unforgettable experience. By taking care of our team members, they really take care of our guests! We are so glad that they take care of you during each of your stays. We really look forward to seeing you on your next visit!  Until next time, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Great breakfast and nice rooms. About 10 minutes away from Irvine Spectrum.nice heated pool and basketball court. Cool game room with pool table, shufffle board and TV. Loved staying at Homewood suites.
Manager Response: Greetings, Andre J!  Our lovely location is close to the District in Tustin, the Spectrum in Irvine, and just a jump to the major freeway systems but far enough away from noise disruptions to bother our guests. Besides having spacious and well-equipped guest rooms, we have plenty of fun amenities to entertain the family outside of the room. You just can't decide where to spend time at! We certainly hope to host your family once more when you travel to Irvine!  Until your next visit... Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: This hotel is new and it shows. Great quality, Everything looks and feels new. Very clean, helpful staff, nice pool area, basketball court. The no.1 hotel in the area to choose if you need a place to stay.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, Thomas C.!  We are so flattered by your compliment; we are pretty proud of being number 1 in Orange County! Thank you for enjoying all the great amenities our hotel has to offer. Our sincerest thank yous for your time in writing this review. Guest experience and feedback mean a great deal in our continuing effort to be the very best! We look forward to providing you with another phenomenal stay next visit!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Bad things: (I checked in on May 16 night. So, management team, you know who was at the reception) 1. I paid $220/night. But the singal room doesn't even provide water to drink?!! I asked front desk. He asked me to pay close to 8 dollars for two bottles of water, which are usually free for all hotels. When I checked out, I was told that they have water for their club members, but they can also offer it to other guests if asked. I did ask. But the front desk guy only gave me the high-price paid option. It doesn't make sense at all for customers. 2. No sleepers? Wrong info again. There will also be guests who need sleepers. I asked the front desk guy. He said "unfortunately, we don't have sleepers." That was not true! When I checked out, the lady told me that they do have if I
Manager Response: Dear Autumn Cool,   We appreciate the feedback regarding your stay with us.  I offer my sincere apologies regarding the slippers and water situation.  I understand that some hotels offer free water and I am sorry it was not offered when you asked,  I have already gone back through all the details of your review and an going to us this as an opportunity to train the desk staff on things that we do offer.    As for the room temperature issue, I hope you were able to find the thermostat and if that did not work, our engineering staff is available almost all day and night.  This should have been an easy fix.  I hope we were able to accommodate your needs after your initial check in.  Again, I sincerely apologize for the challenges you had during your stay and we really appreciate getting feedback from our guests to use as an opportunity to improve our staff's service delivery.  Sincere apologies,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: We have used the Homewood Suites for the last year or so for meetings. We are a local company and find it EXTREMELY convenient to host off-site meetings at this location and also have the ability for guests to stay overnight at the same location. Chase (Sales Manager) is super responsive to our needs and coordinates some really tasty catering options with local companies. We will definitely coming back again and again for more meetings here. One-stop-shop!
Manager Response: Good morning, Andrew G!  How convenient! It is quite a pleasure to have all your hosting needs nestled under one roof! Thank you for recognizing our superb team who can make all the difference, no matter what brings you to the Homewood Suites Irvine. We look forward to hosting many more prosperous events for your company and your employees.  Happy-almost-Friday! Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: My wife and I needed a weekend away. We stayed local just wanted to get out of your house to be alone and in a quiet place. This was a great Location! Everyone was super friendly! We will definitely be back
Manager Response: Good morning, R580TAJose!  Sometimes just a night away can make all the difference to refresh one's self! We are so happy our property was just the trick for you and your wife. With our spacious guest suites with full kitchens, you don't even need to leave the room! We hope you enjoyed a full, hot cooked breakfast (in bed) to cap off the getaway!  Please think of us the next time you need to visit your Home Away From Home!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: There‚Äôs only one word to describe the staff at Homewood Suites By John Wayne Airport; AWESOME!! On a day to day basis the staff consistently asked how was our room and if we slept well. Now I‚Äôve been to plenty of hotels because of working in the oilfield and never have the staff asked me how I slept or if the room was ok. I‚Äôd like to give a big thanks to David Arriola and Chase McCullough for their generosity.
Manager Response: Greetings, Fred H!  Our staff makes all the world of difference to our guest experience and we are quite proud of it; thank you for recognizing those amazing people. We hope you also enjoyed all the additional amenities that our property has to offer such as hot, tasty breakfast, our evening social, our beautiful outdoor pool area, and much more! We hope to see you again when you find yourself in the Irvine area!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Clean exterior, Clean lobby, clean common area, clean rooms. Very impressed by the staff at this location. Kitchen in my room with a dish washer and a full size refrigerator. All I needed to provide was the food. Nothing but 5 Stars from check-in to check-out.
Manager Response: Greetings, Mason A  Thank you kindly for your review on your recent stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. In an effort to always strive for success, we appreciate the feedback of all our guests. Fortunately we are conveniently located near plenty of local shopping like Target, Walmart, and Whole Foods for guests to stock up those full-size fridges! We look forward to hosting you again in the near future!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: I absolutely enjoyed my stay! All of the staff were so friendly!! I would like to give a special shoutout to David Arriola and Chase McCoullough! They were so helpful with everything! I will be returning for my next visit!
Manager Response: Hello, Swieseholmes!  Thank you so much for your feedback during your recent stay at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We are so pleased you had such an enjoyable stay. We are pleased that some of our outstanding team members maybe an impact during your stay; thank you for recognizing them! We look forward to hosting you the next time your travels bring you to Irvine.  Until next time, Gabby - Front Desk

Summary: We stayed here for a family wedding, and were very happy with everything the hotel had to offer (clean rooms, good food, and fun spaces for the kids from pool to gameroom). To have families from Guam, Texas and California staying in one place made the experience even better.  The staff was very friendly and helpful. I would highly recommend this place!
Manager Response: Greetings Aurora M!  It was an honor to be a part of your special, family event. We are so happy that our hotel catered to all your group's needs during this time. How nice it must have been to wake up and share a breakfast with family who are normally thousands of miles apart. Whatever reason brings you to Irvine again, we hope to be your Home Away From Home!  Best regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Clean, friendly staff, great amenities-bbq, pool, basketball. Great family hotel with ample room and loved a full kitchen and living area in the suite!! Our room comfortably slept 4 kids, my hubby and myself!!!
Manager Response: Greetings, kY7923SY!  We are thrilled that you had such an enjoyable family getaway and utilized so many of our great amenities! Our suites are perfect sizes for solo travelers, small groups, large families, and anyone else you may want to bring! Whether you choose to cook breakfast in the room or let us serve you eggs (and meat, and potatoes, and yogurt, and Belgian waffles!), our guest suites allow you to feel like you are at home on the road. We certainly hope you'll allow us to host you again the next time you find yourself in Irvine!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: I just stayed 7 weeks at this Homewood Suites and it was the most healing and best sojourn I've had anywhere in the world. The first time I walked into the hotel I immediately felt like I was coming home although I had never been there before--it is so bright, airy, spacious, and felt so welcoming and cozy. There is such a sweetness and peaceful energy about the place, and the smiling and friendly staff all looked so joyful to be there. The place is quietly tucked away on a small street (Reynolds), only 4 stories high, very family oriented with a billiard table inside, and a swimming pool and small basketball court outside. I stayed in a King bed studio suite which was very well appointed, spacious, restful, with a fully equipped kitchen (a large microwave,electric stove,large
Manager Response: Good morning to you, PaulineA!  We cannot thank you enough for your time in writing this thorough and comprehensive review of our property during your most recent stay. As an extended stay guest, we hope that you learned the ins and outs of our hotel as well as the local Irvine area. It sounds like you utilized every aspect of your guest suite to have a true Home Away from Home experience. Thank you calling special attention to some of our fabulous team members who made an impact during your long stay. While we offer numerous, stellar amenities, it is our cheerful and ever-helpful staff that truly make our guest stays great. We are fortunate to have a team that goes above and beyond  for all our guests! We certainly hope to see you again the next time you find yourself yearning for your Home Away From Home, Irvine! Until your next visit...

Summary: Spent two months during this stay and I am planning to stay at this hotel during my next visit. The staff is extremely friendly and are very polite. They are knowledgeable about the area and will provide recommendations and directions to local business.
Manager Response: Good morning, Mr. Frulla!  It was a pleasure hosting you during your recent business travels to Irvine. We appreciate your feedback regarding your experience since you really were Home Away From Home with us (we hope!). Since some of us are locals to the area, we love giving recommendations and sending guests to our favorite hang outs. Hopefully you also saved a bit of dough during your stay and enjoyed our complimentary breakfast every day and the Evening Social during the week days. It's a great way for our guests, particularly extended stays, to mingle and make new friends! We definitely look forward to seeing you again soon! Until then....

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel a few times and decided to use the events services to host a business gathering.  Chase, the events manager, did a fantastic job working with me even though my requests came just days before the event.  He went out of his way to work with me and my guests, going above and beyond with adjustments to our agreement and additional items needed in the room that were unforeseen at the time of booking.  The meeting space was super clean, new, had great A/V equipment and the beverage service was very reasonably priced.  I'd HIGHLY recommend this location for small to medium-sized business meetings, particularly with it being so new and close to the airport.  THANKS CHASE!!!
Manager Response: Greetings, vivaldison!  We sincerely appreciate your time in writing this review. We get a lot of praise for our lovely guest suites, delicious food services, and other money-saving amenities so not everyone may know that we have such fantastic meeting spaces. With almost 1400 square feet of meeting space, our meeting space is good for business events, family reunions, wedding receptions, whatever your gathering may be for! Thank you for the special recognition of our Sales Manager; we will be sure to praise his efforts in facilitating in your meeting. We certainly hope to host your next event, and overnight stay, at the Homewood Suites Irvine!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary Heading: Best Place To Stay in the Santa Ana/Irvine Area
Summary: I just completed a three-week business stay at this Homewood Suites and just about everything was totally top-notch: my room (a King bed suite) was nicely appointed, spacious, quiet (virtually NO airplane noise, despite the close proximity to the airport) and had a very comfortable bed; housekeeping did a wonderful job of always assuring that my room was clean (Lucinda and Lucrecia, you guys are the best!); breakfasts in the morning and "happy hour" in the evenings (M-Thurs) offered several tasty choices; and the front desk staff consistently went out of their way to ensure that I wanted for nothing. Whether it was restaurant suggestions, local traffic information, temporarily storing my luggage or simply asking about my day, Alyssa, Caroline, Gabby, Joe, Eliza and James were
Manager Response: FrequentTraveler1138,  This review is for the wall of honor; I don't think we've ever received so many shout outs! Thank you so much for everything. We will be sure to reward these team members that touched your stay in different ways. While we have a beautiful new hotel with spacious guest suites, tasty breakfast (and dinner), and lots of additional amenities, our accommodating and friendly staff is what really makes us stand out! It is a treat for us to get to know more about our guests and their own adventures. Thank you so very much for taking the time to write about your experience. Your comments truly mean the world to us.  Please come back and visit us again! Warmest regards, Gabby & Alyssa, Front Desk

Summary: This is the 4th time in a row that I have stayed at this hotel and it is one of the best ones I have ever stayed.  Gabby is always friendly and helpful.  I feel like the hotel has become my second home.
Manager Response: Greetings, Danny V!  We know that you have plenty of choices where to stay when you travel to Irvine but we are thrilled to be your Home Away From Home while you are here! Whether it is for work or play, we strive to make each guest experience one of the best. Thank you for taking notice of some of our helpful team members (yay me!). Happy and eager team members, in all our departments, are the core of what makes our Homewood Suites Irvine such an amazing property to stay, and work, at!  We look forward to seeing you again very soon! Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Best hotel in Irvine! Alyssa and Gabby at the front desk are always friendly and have the answers to any question I had. Caroline the manager is top notch as well. Everyone at this hotel is professional and they work very hard to make your longer stays pleasant. Breakfast every day of the week (different hot items). Up to this point I mostly stayed at Hampton Inn but I will be staying at Homewood for all my future trips!
Manager Response: Good morning, Ryan B.!  Wonderful news! We are so happy that your stay with us at Homewood Suites Irvine was so amazing, it changed your whole hotel perspective. Our main goal is to make every guest stay experience a Home Away From Home one! It can be tiring to travel for work and be away from home for so long (especially when you check out and have to come right back!). Thank you for the shout out to our superb staff (me included, woo!) so we will be certain to recognize them for their exceptional efforts. It certainly makes it more rewarding when we  have such awesome guests as well!  We are looking forward to your next visit! Gabby & Hayley, Front Desk

Summary Heading: This is what all Hilton properties should strive to emulate
Summary: Gabby and Haley were very helpful and professional. Once they heard of the sub-standard experience I received at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Santa Ana, they went into action to accommodate my needs and made me feel very welcome. The hotel is very family friendly and will make my Government business stay a success. They were well prepared with the Government forms needed to save the tax payers of America dollars. I will return again with my family to enjoy the amenities that they offer. This hotel is the perfect location when traveling for Business or in town for Leisure
Manager Response: Good morning, rcf3kat!  We know traveling to new areas for business can be difficult at times so we are so pleased we could turn your experience around on this trip. Thank you for your feedback on your stay thus far; we truly appreciate knowing about our guest's experience with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Additional gratitude for the special shout out for Hayley and I! Please, bring the whole family next time so they can also enjoy breakfast with you, time by the pool, and fun in the game room. Whether it is business or fun, we have your needs covered!  We look forward to your next visit!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary Heading: Great Hotel with kind Staff and great Service.
Summary: I spend some nights the very first time in this Homewood Suites and I have to admit, this is a nice one.  It seems to be around and opened just a couple of month ago, hence it is very clean and everything is new and nicely furnished.  The staff is attentive and kind and the rooms offer sufficient space to feel good and comfortably welcomed, some sort of being Home...  Actually my King Studio was really nice and offered everything you need while away from home.  They do have the usual equipment to entertain yourself, like a nice Gym, a pool and a Grill, which is something I prefer..  Will come back, ...the only backdraw I can think of, it is a bit in the outskirts, some sort of industrial area,  but still close to Tustin with some Restaurants and Shopping places.  A walmart and a
Manager Response: Greetings & Salutations, Hugo V.!  We happily celebrated our year anniversary back in January of this very year. We do our very best to keep the hotel clean and updated. We like to think that we are in an ideal location of Irvine; not quite in the thick of it so there's lots of traffic or noise but certainly not out in the middle of nowhere! Fortunately, if you are to find yourself car-less, one of our kind and attentive front desk team members will gladly shuttle you to local destinations including the District. Never fear, you are not stuck in your comfortable guest suite if you don't wish to be! We extend our gratitude for this review on your recent stay with us and hope you will allow us to be your Home Away From Home next time you find yourself in Irvine, California.  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: We were stuck in the area due to cancellation of our flight and called Homewood Suites for a one night stay. Gabby was extremely accommodating to our needs. Until a room was available, she stored our luggage, allowed us to enjoy the complimentary breakfast, and allowed us to hang out at the pool while we waited. When a room was ready for us, she gave us a complimentary bottle of wine for the inconvenience. I really didn't feel inconvenienced at all, because we showed up at 8:00 in the morning, knowing check-ins weren't until 3:00 pm; we had not other choice. She arranged our return transportation to the airport for the next day. They do have a shuttle service available, but our flight was before that service started for the day. However, it seems the Manager's policy is to cover
Manager Response: It's a pleasure hearing from you again, 206dawn!  We know it wasn't (necessarily) your first choice to stay with us at Homewood Suites Irvine but we definitely think it was a happy accident. It was a great pleasure to make your unexpected last day in SoCal a comfortable one. Thank you personally for commenting on my attention to you and your traveling companion. I was just doing what comes naturally to ensure you ladies were taken care of, especially considering how your morning started! It certainly makes me feel good to know that we were able to turn things around.  We would love to become your go-to hotel next time you are in Irvine. Just give us a call and we'll come pick you up!  Until next time, with the warmest regards Gabby, Front Desk

Summary Heading: I Felt Like I Was at Home
Summary: The hotel was modern, clean, warm and inviting. The double queen studio was spacious with an open floor plan complete with a sofa and chair. The desk is well positioned for those that want to cook, do work and relax all at the same time.  The beds were incredibly comfortable and the fitness center provided something for everyone's workout needs.
Manager Response: Good morning, DaveAnthold!  We let you do it all, don't we!? We are so pleased that our guestroom allowed you to do a whole range of activities during your stay. How did you manage to roll out of that comfy bed and go work out?! We're pretty impressed. Hopefully you grabbed a hearty breakfast following your gym session. We appreciate your feedback and certainly hope to be your Home Away From Home again!  Warmest regards, Gabby & Eliza, Front Desk

Summary: We arrived at the hotel late Friday (4/6/18, 10pm) and Joe at the Front Desk was very  kind and polite.  The following day at checkout, Hayley at the Front Desk was extremely energetic and friendly. The basketball court was awesome! The only thing that I would like to bring to your attention is that the water pressure in the shower was very weak however; the suite itself is perfect! It's very clean. My family and I will definitely be returning back to your property!
Manager Response: Good afternoon, SignatureatMGMGrand!  We wish to thank you for your review on your (very!) recent stay with us at the Homewood Suites Irvine. Thank you in particular for recognizing two of our team members who had an impact on your stay. We will be sure to recognize Joe and Hayley for their efforts! We are pleased that your guest suite was just what you needed for your stay. We appreciate your attention to the water pressure in your suite.  We are doing our best to work with the limitations that the city of Irvine places to conserve water, without effecting guest comfort. We will be looking further in to how we may improve that concern.  We look forward to hosting you and your family the next time you find yourself in Orange County! Till next time... Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: The staff, facility, and amenities at this Hilton location added to the enjoyment of our Spring Break Family Vacation to Disneyland. Our children loved the pool, complimentary breakfast, and comfortable beds. We loved the professionalism of the staff and cleanliness of the facilities. We‚Äôll definitely be staying here in the future if our plans bring us back to the LA/ Anaheim area.  When you stop by be sure to say hi to Emilio during breakfast.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, Dapson224!  Thank you so much for your generous feedback of your recent stay at the Homewood Suites Irvine! We understand how difficult it may be when selecting a hotel that suites the whole family's needs. Our complimentary breakfast (and evening social) help the parent's budget and our pool, sports court, and game room are great fun for the kids. Plus, we are within close proximity to major attractions like Disneyland without being in the thick of it. Thank you for recognizing a team member who made your stay extra special. We'll be sure to pass the sentiments on!  We look forward to being your Home Away From Home next time you are in the area!  Best regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: We stayed here for a college visit and I will say the hotel was better than expected. It is exceptionally clean! I am very picky when it comes to hotel stays and this one met my standards. The beds were very comfortable and the rooms were very clean. We had a great time and it's nice to be able to come back to your hotel room and not have to worry about cleanliness. The staff was very helpful and nice. The only thing I would recommend is that they improve the breakfast, it was my least favorite but I still would stay again!
Manager Response: Good afternoon, DeAun B!  We so very much appreciate your feedback on your recent stay at the Homewood Suites Irvine. We are so lucky to be near such great campuses as UC Irvine and other local colleges! We try to cater to all tastes with our breakfast and evening social but are also open to recommendations on ways to improve. We always strive to give our guests an A++ stay! We look forward to having you on your next trip to Irvine!  Best regards,  Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: My stay at the Homewood Suites Irvine was excellent. The staff was very friendly and helpful. They provided shuttle service to both the airport and destinations near the hotel. They also provided solid advice for places to eat and things to do. All the time, they kept a smile on their face and were genuinely friendly. Beyond that, the rooms were very comfortable with a full kitchen, seating area, bed and bathroom. The bed was very comfortable and any outside noise was minimal. Overall, I had a great stay and will use this property again in future visits to the area.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, Jonh K!  Thank you for the glowing review; I don't think we could have voiced it any better ourselves. We genuinely appreciate the mention of our superb staff. At Homewood Suite Irvine, we believe that a great guest experience begins with our happy and helpful staff members. We are so glad they made a delightful impact on your stay. We look forward to being your Home Away From Home again in the future!  Till next time... Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 2 weeks for a work business trip. The people there were very accommodating and welcoming, specifically James. He is a very warm and friendly guy and was always willing to drive me around the area whenever I was hungry (which was all the time). Gabby, Alyssa and Zee were also very nice. I would forget my room key and they were always happy to make me a new one.
Manager Response: Good morning, Samuel H!  As a seasoned traveler, I am sure you stay in a myriad of hotels so your input for our Homewood Suites property is greatly appreciated. An even bigger thanks to giving special shout outs to team members that gave your stay an added touch. We will be sure to celebrate them! We are glad you made the most of your time in Irvine, exploring the ins and outs. We hope you will call us home the next time work, or fun or a rumbling tummy, brings you to the area.  Warmest regards, Gabby & Hayley, Front Desk

Summary Heading: Small room, good location, quiet nights
Summary: Room was very small for 6 people (4 kids). Staff was generally pleasant. Pool was enjoyable and not crowded. Slept well and never heard the many planes that pass overhead during the night. Breakfast was extremely busy. I felt it was a little pricey for the size of the room.
Manager Response: Good morning, Alishia I!  Thank you for taking to write this review about your experience with us at Homewood Suites Irvine. We hope your family enjoyed the time outside utilizing the pool area and sports court. As the days in SoCal grow longer and warmer, it's nice to have a space for families to spend time outside away from the room. Being a newer built property, we have such a well insulated building that you may never realize you are under a busy flight path! We may suggest on your next visit opting for one of our spacious two bedroom suites.  We look forward to hosting you and your family once again when you find yourselves in the Irvine area!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel a few times, and each time I have been very satisfied with the service as well as the amenities.  The beds and pillows are very comfortable, and there is a ceiling fan over the bed.  I love the shower.  There are several restaurants and shopping areas within an easy drive.  The hotel is in a business district, so it is quiet.  There is a full-size refrigerator, stove and microwave, in case you want to stay in and eat.  The one drawback is that there is not a full length mirror.  There's a mirrorish tile in the kitchen, but that is not the same as a floor length mirror.  Ladies have to examine the whole picture, including shoes!
Manager Response: Good morning, TexasTravelette!  We are pleased you had such a comfortable stay with us and got plenty of beauty rest in our plushy beds! Thank you for the thorough review of not just our property but also the surrounding Irvine neighborhood. One of the great factors of our hotel is that it is close to local shopping but just far enough away that our guests do not encounter the traffic or noise associated with it! If you ever need an extra set of eyes or two, our stylish desk staff would gladly be of assistance in any way possible!  Till we see you again! Gabby & Alyssa, Front Desk Staff

Summary: We used this almost brand new hotel as home base for spring break visits to both Disneyland Parks, Balboa Fun Zone, Knotts Berry Farm and Carona Del Mar Beach. Everything is within 30 minutes by freeway and parking is free here.   The hotel is all suites with a great  free breakfast that changes every morning and an evening social on week days. It's almost new so everything is very clean and nice. They don't even have tourist brochures or bibles in the rooms yet.  Although the airport is only a couple of miles away, the hotel is so well insulated that we didn't notice any noise at all.   The housekeeping service is fantastic and even though we didn't leave the room until 4 pm one day, they had cleaned up and made the beds when we returned late that night!   If you are flying
Manager Response: Good morning, DONW11!  We appreciate this shining review you've taken the time to write regarding your recent stay with us here at the Homewood Suites. That "new hotel" smell is coming off a little bit but we are so pleased you could tell. While we host many business travelers, there is so much fun for families to experience all within a short drive of the Irvine area. Our breakfast every day and evening social during the week is a great way for travelers and families alike to save a little during their stay but also be pampered at the same time!  We hope to see you again the next time you find yourself exploring Southern California!  Warmest Regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Very nice hotel it was clean, quiet, nice laundry facility. Pool was lovely and included a bbq area and sport court. Close to shopping and nice selection of places to eat. Easy access to airport, freeways and fuel stations to fill up the rental car. Great experience!
Manager Response: Dear Kruggles468,  We appreciate the comments regarding your recent stay with us.  Sometimes people looking to book our hotel think we are far from things, but thank you for letting the consumers know that we are relatively close to everything, especially the airport.  Thank you for choosing us and hope to see you again in the near future.  Thanks a million,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Professional Staff + Amazing Facility = Homewood Suites Irvine
Summary: I travel to Tustin, CA monthly for business and felt compelled to give a review of my experience(s) of staying here. We used to stay at another hotel and my employer made the change to Homewood Suites by Hilton John Wayne Airport. The very first time I stayed, I was greeted by Gabby. Got checked into my room, 5 min later the phone rang, it was Gabby asking me if everything was meeting my expectations? That she wanted me to be happy with my room and my stay during the weekend. WHO DOES THAT !?!?!?! Well, Homewood Suites in Irvine and more specifically Gabby does. I‚Äôve stayed other months here and it has been an amazing experience every time. I‚Äôve had to call and had the fortune of speaking to a young lady (I‚Äôm going to butcher her name, so I‚Äôll identify her the way she identifies
Manager Response: Best of mornings to you, JG_EDH!  Change can be hard sometimes, especially when it is not your decision to make a change! We are so pleased that your team decided to make the switch and join us here at the Homewood Suites in Irvine. By the sounds of it, they made the right decision! While our suites are spacious, the breakfast is hot and tasty, and our location is quite convenient, our entire staff is really what sets us apart from other local hotels. Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize these individuals who made an extra special impression on your stay (including me, yay!). We set the bar high for service but receiving these glowing accolades is something that certainly help motivates us. We look forward to welcoming back to your Home Away From Home the next time you are in the area.  Warmest regards, Gabby, Alyssa, and the entire Homewood Suites Irvine team.

Summary: Stayed here with my family and had a wonderful experience. The staff was wonderful and took great care of us. The rooms were well appointed and the kitchen and living space made traveling with kids so much easier. The family loved the pool, hot tub and basketball area. And you can‚Äôt go wrong with a full hot breakfast and social hour in the evening. We loved it and will be back. Haley and Gabby were outstanding and went above and beyond. Thanks.
Manager Response: Dear Sarah S,  Just wanted to express our gratitude for sharing your experience with us here at Homewood Suites Irvine.  With kids myself, I totally get the advantage of having the kitchen and sports court.  It makes things so much easier.  I will be sure to publicly recognize Hayley and Gabby when I see them,  They are both fantastic team members and the recognition is well deserved.  When you do come back and I am going to hold you to it, make sure you come by and introduce yourselves.    Many Thanks,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: I don't say this often. I couldn't find anything wrong with this place. For its hotel level it was absolutely perfect. It was clean, modern, well located, and a joy to stay in. Happy hour consist of mainly business people mingling and enjoying salads, sliders, and a glass of merlot or a beer. What a great way to relax when you're on business. The rooms are huge and even have a kitchen. The neighborhood is a business district but very safe for a walk and many restaurants nearby. Joe at the front desk should be commended for his professionalism. All of the staff are friendly and polite. Breakfast was wonderful, accommodating healthy, vegan options. The hotel was priced just right, and sold out for the few days that I was there.
Manager Response: Dear Boobot1,  What a great compliment to my team.  Joe will be excited to hear what you said about him.  Just a sincere thank you for posting such a wonderful review of the hotel, the area and especially my team.  Social Hour is one of those amenities included in the room rate that guests doing reviews do not mention that often.  I will be sure to pass this on to the team and hopefully we will see you again in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Hotel is a year old.  Minutes away from John Wayne and THE DISTRICT shopping area in Tustin with tons of restaurants.  Hotel has new rooms with high ceilings and modern amenities.  We were lucky enough to get a room away from road, so nice quiet sleep.  Provided breakfast was standard hotel fare but good.  Weather did not cooperate but pool area looked very nice.  We thought this was a good value place. Stafffwas very friendly.
Manager Response: Good evening, Donald A!  You must have traveled to Orange County during that chilly two weeks that constituted as our winter. While the weather outside might have been a bit adverse, our pool is heat year round to a pleasant 80F. Our location is a great combination of near the local action but enough away to allow for a restful nights sleep. We love that you got to experience the best of both while staying with us at Homewood Suites Irvine. Hopefully next time the weather will be better; maybe we can have a pool party!  Warmest regards, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: I stayed recently for a 3-day weekend in the one-bedroom suite.  Since I was traveling with a friend, having a separate bedroom with pull-out sofabed in the living room was ideal.  We both had our own space.  The beds are very comfortable, and the hotel was quiet, even though it was pretty full.  Having the full kitchen was wonderful, and we made good use of it.  The full breakfast is great. It was crowded at times, but the kitchen servers did a good job of keeping up with everything.  They are working hard, and I would suggest adding a tip jar for them.  All the staff was friendly and helpful.   This is a beautiful, new hotel & is very clean; I would certainly return.  The only slight glitch was that the discounted rate I had rec'd did not show on the check-out billing.  This
Manager Response: Good Morning, USC-Gal!  Thank you so much for sharing the lovely stay you had with us here at the Homewood Suites Irvine! We appreciate the time you took out of your day to write it this and even more so, we appreciate all the fun you had! There's nothing wrong with a little space between friends, right? Our bedroom suites are great for all kinds of groups and the suite size leaves so much room for activities! While our rooms and breakfast (and evening social) are wonderful amenities to our property, our real asset is our hardworking team who strive to make each guest experience memorable. We are pleased you experienced this during your stay.  From our Homewood family to yours, we hope to see you again Gabby & James, Front Desk

Summary: Stayed here with my family for the recent President's weekend.  Great hotel, good service and convenient location.  We previously stayed here when they first opened in 2016 and though we liked it then there were some opening month kinks.  We decided to give the place another try and they management and staff seems to have fixed the issues.  The kids particularly liked the free breakfast.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, PBF23!  A year can make a difference sometimes, can't it! Thank you for giving the Homewood Suites Irvine another chance after we were able to smooth out the opening "kinks". Hopefully you were even greeted by some of the same, smiling faces! We certainly appreciate the time you took to write about your experience with us, especially seeing us again after a full year of operation. But please, don't be a stranger and wait another year to come back!  Warmest regards, Gabby & Zee, Front Desk

Summary: Carol and her team was beyond awesome, they have helped me when there are problem with my amex travel booking. They very professional and very patience with the entire process and because of them were not being ‚Äúhomeless‚Äù in Orange County. Thanks so much guys.
Manager Response: Good morning, Andrie L!  It was our pleasure to assist you with your booking at Homewood Suites Irvine, despite all the troubles you experienced with your Amex Booking. Orange County offers a lot of great outdoor camping but it was definitely a bit too chilly this past week for that! We certainly appreciate you taking the time to note the positives of your travels, especially with our property. Next time, please feel free to call the property directly so we and Hilton can double and trip check your bookings are set!  We hope you will allow us to be your Home Away from Home next time you are in Irvine, CA! Best regards, Gabby & the Homewood Suites Irvine Team

Summary Heading: Named correctly. Really did become our home.
Summary: My wife and I stayed at Homewood Suites for 3.5 months, due to a house fire. The people there made us very welcome and became like family to us. Mariela, our housekeeper was a particular treat. She and my wife developed a very nice relationship that I hope was beneficial for both.  We had lots of different neighbors, including families with kids, and never heard a peep. They build these places for quiet.  The only negatives that I can mention have to do with things that would never be a factor for parties only staying a few days. We did a lot of cooking and the utensils were more suitable for occasional use.  The front desk people always greeted us by name and bent over backwards to help us with everyday issues.  My wife liked the pool and even chatted with strangers at the
Manager Response: Greetings, lapsrus  It is with heavy hearts that we had to say good bye to some of our favorite families this weekend. The whole event is bittersweet because we are so pleased you get to return home but we will miss seeing you and your wife every day. Our main goal is to someone's Home Away From Home and in your situation, it was a privilege to become so during your time with us. You made it through quite the holiday season with us; the cookies you brought definitely helped!  We hope you and the Mrs. will drive by and say hello! You will always have a place with us here at the Homewood Suites Irvine.  With warmest wishes (and hugs!), Gabby & Zee, and the entire Homewood Suites family!

Summary: I was shocked by how good this hotel was. Staff was amazing and the complimentary breakfast and free evening socials were outstanding! Highly recommend. The room only had a fan, so it was a little warm, but not bad.
Manager Response: Good evening, kscott18!  Shocked, you say!? Hopefully you dramatically fainted on one of the comfy pull-out sofa beds in your guest room. We are glad you joined us for both of our meals during the weekday; it is definitely a perk of our Homewood Suites brand that we love having for our guests. We hope to see you again next time you find yourself staying in the Irvine area!  Warmest regards, Gabby & Zee, Front Desk

Summary: We highly recommend this place.  It's new, the design is terrific and a great value.  We brought food in for dinner and the kitchen had everything that we needed.  Our room overlooked the hotel entrance but we didn't hear any noise.  The blackout shades, comfortable bed, big screen TV that spins to either the bedroom or living room area were all excellent.  The breakfast was excellent in a bright, contemporary area with outlets for charging devices.  The staff were friendly and helpful.  The only negative is that the pool is tiny and right by the hotel rear driveway to the parking structure.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, Danwen888!  Thank you so kindly for taking the time in writing this review for our Homewood Suites Irvine property. Can you imagine that there were airliner planes taking off and landing overhead the hotel and you can't hear a peep?! We hope you and your family will join us again for another trip the next time you find yourself in the Southern California area! We'd love to have you again  Warm wishes from Irvine, Gabby & Alyssa, Front Desk

Summary: I stayed here with my two kids in january. The location was convienent for a volleyball tournament we attended. The facility is nice and new and free parking and wifi. We had a free light dinner and expanded hot breakfast. We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Good morning, CaliforniaMark!  We know how important it is for kids (and adultkids) to have a good breakfast and even better, a tasty dinner. We are pleased your family was able to join us for both during your stay. Hopefully it was nourishing for the big tournament. If you ever find yourself hungry and in Irvine again, you know where to stay!  Best regards and warm wishes, Gabby & Liz, Front Desk

Summary: Love everything about this property! From the always helpful and friendly staff to the amenities to the free breakfast/parking/WiFi - it‚Äôs worth every penny. I won‚Äôt stay anywhere else when I‚Äôm in the area.
Manager Response: Good evening, Michelle G  Your words speak volumes, more than anything we could ever say. It is a pleasure hosting you and your family during your travels and we are always delighted to see your name in anticipation of your next stay with us.  From our family to yours, a hui hou  Gabby & James, Front Desk

Summary: I was very pleased with my stay at this hotel. The room was great, very modern and lots of little "helpers" like additional electrical outlets, usb ports, hooks for towels, etc. The furnishings were nice, the room was comfortable, and you could not hear noise from other rooms so much, so it was quiet. It was conveniently located near highways. The free breakfast every day was excellent with lots of choices; free evening happy hour was also great. I'd definitely stay at this hotel again. Great experience.
Manager Response: Greetings, NicholasZientrarski  Great, great, great; that is all we are hearing! That makes us feel quite accomplished that we provided you with a peaceful, comfortable, and convenient. Perfection is a hard-fought goal and we certainly strive for it every day with our guests. Your generous review makes us feel we are on the right track. We hope you will allow us to be your Home Away From Home next time you find yourself in the Irvine area.  Warmest wishes, Gabby & James, Front Desk

Summary Heading: Great place to stay and close to the airport
Summary: Hotel was very clean, quiet and comfortable. Staff was always very friendly and helpful. Breakfast and evening social were great so we did not have to find other places to eat. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, Mary M!  It sounds like you had the Home Away From Home experience with us! We are so thrilled our Homewood Suites Irvine property catered to all your needs. Irvine and the surrounding communities have some wonderful sights and restaurants to explore so maybe next time we'll push you out of your comfort zone, if only a little bit!  We look forward to your next visit with us!  Warmest regards, Gabby & James, Front Desk

Summary: I stayed here for 20 days for a business trip.  The room had a very nice kitchen so it saved a ton of money instead of eating out all of the time.  the pool and jacuzzi are also a nice feature.  And the gym is excellent.  The Hotel is 5 minutes or less from the Airport so that is quite convenient.  The Hotel also includes a free breakfast which is outstanding, And the "main dish" changes every day.  I'll definitely stay here again when I return to S. Cal. in a few months.
Manager Response: Good evening, David L!  Thank you for taking the time to write this review following your extended stay with us. Hopefully it gave you plenty of to thoroughly investigate and enjoy our Homewood Suites Irvine and the surrounding area. We hope you sent evidence back home that you were enjoy the pool and jacuzzi in our "harsh" January weather. We look forward to being your Home Away From Home very soon!  Until next time,  Gabby & James, Front Desk

Summary: Close to airport and surrounding businesses. The driveway location is a little confusing as it is not off of Red Hill Avenue as the address suggests, but off of Reynolds Avenue. This caused my Uber drivers a small amount of consternation and delay.
Manager Response: Good evening, gordonr50!  We apologize for the ornery Uber driver upon your arrival to our Homewood Suites location but hopefully you were later shuttled to a nearby location by one of our cheery front desk agents in our complimentary shuttle (we wear many hats here). We are pleased to be able to operate a shuttle service for our guests during most hours of the day. It is a great way for us all to become better familiar with our backyard, Irvine! Please give us a call next time you are staying with us so we may skip out the middle man!  Until your travels bring you back to Irvine, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Three adults very much appreciated the extra space their suites provide to share one room very comfortably. Our first impression was that this was a nice hotel and we were never proven otherwise. Complimentary Breakfast was definitely better than most free breakfasts. Decent coffee was also appreciated. No coffee house run necessary.
Manager Response: Good evening, rhopper276!  Who says anyone is too old to have a slumber party? Did you all test out our fluffy pillows with a pillow fight? With tasty breakfast, good coffee, and lots of space, it sounds like we didn't give you much of a reason to leave! We certainly hope to see you all again soon at the Homewood Suites Irvine.  Best regards, until next time Gabby, Front Desk

Summary Heading: I won't stay anywhere other than Hilton brand hotels!
Summary: I have had nothing but great experiences with Hilton Hotels but the Homewood Suites in Irvine will be my hotel of choice during my monthly business trips to the area.  Everything was perfect and I appreciate the care and respect that everyone takes into making their guests feel welcome.  Excellent service all around!
Manager Response: Good evening, S1307AUkatieb  "Perfect" is some big shoes to fill and we are so pleased to have done so in your eyes! It can be quite tough to be traveling away from home so often so we strive to be guest's Home Away From Home. We hope you found your HAFH here with us at Homewood Suites Irvine. We look forward to seeing you again when your travels bring you back to us!  Warmest regards, Gabby & James, Front Desk
