Summary Heading: Don't hesitate, this place is perfect!
Summary: Though the hotel is situated near Irvine Airport, the rooms are quiet, very quiet. We didn't hear any plane while in our room, and especiallly while sleeping. Stayed here 3 nights. Our room was spacious, beautifully decorated and clean. Breakfast and evening social were a nice treat (had delicious local craft beer). The outside pool was well heated considering it was December! Guest laundry is 1.75$ per load for either use of washing machine or dryer. Staff is very friendly. We'll come back Thank you
Manager Response: Greetings Gaelle_60!  We so greatly appreciate the glowing review you have provided to everyone. We are pleased you had such an enjoyable and comfortable stay with us here at our Homewood Suites Irvine property. We have so much to offer that we truly are a Home Away From Home for our guests. It sounds like you folks got pretty comfortable during your stay! We hope you will let us host you again next time you are in the area!  Cheers! Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: I travel for work all the time. It is hard to find a nice hotel in this area that is not outrageously expensive and comfortable. This is the place. Great linens, great staff and a very accommodating atmosphere. If I have to be away from home, this type of service makes it easy.
Manager Response: Good morning RAHelgeson!  As a busy traveler, we certainly appreciate the time you set aside to write this review of our Homewood Suites Irvine property. It fills us with joy to hear that we could be your Home Away From Home during your recent business trip. Our property is a harmonious mixture of amenities and comforts for both business and leisure travels. Hopefully you got to experience a little bit of both as well!  Till your travels bring you back around again... Warm regards, Gabby & Liz , Front Desk

Summary Heading: The worst stay I've ever experienced on a business trip
Summary: This place is a nightmare. Service is non existent. On a business trip (3 times a year to Ervine, Ca.) First time experience with this stay service. Never again. No convenience what so ever.  Just a struggle to figure out coffee to getting on line.  My worst experience in traveling to LA in last 10 years ever!  Sorry, but man was this an unpleasant stay
Manager Response: Greetings mlptvinvinowine,  We want to thank you for your honest review of your recent stay with us at Homewood Suites Irvine. As a newer property who just recently celebrated the first full year of operation, we are always on the look out for how we may improve the comfort and service provided to our guests. If you would like to contact us directly on property, we would appreciate understanding how exactly you were dissatisfied with your stay and what we might be able to do to Make it Right. We hope we can provide you with a more enjoyable stay on your next visit to the Irvine area.  Gratefully yours, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary Heading: Nice facility, poor water pressure in shower
Summary: Facility is very nice and rooms are spacious. Good location for business in the area. Water pressure in the shower is weak. Breakfast was ok, but not as good as other Homewood properties. Parking spaces are not all convenient to an entrance.
Manager Response: Good morning, kevps133!  Thank you for taking the time to review and provide your experience with our blossoming Homewood Suites Irvine property. We would surely love to know what other menu items you've experienced in your Homewood Suites travels! Who doesn't love a taste test?? We are fortunate to be able to provide complimentary parking in our spacious lot with additional street parking conveniently located near the lobby entrance. We hope you will consider us as your Home Away from Home next time you are in the Irvine area.  Happy travels, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: We spend 14 nights at this hotel. We came from Finland and had chosen this hotel because of it‚Äôs great reviews. Hotel is new and so clean and beautiful. We had a room with one bedroom, it was big, clean and so beautiful and the beds were perfect. The breakfast was ok, but there should have been more people working in holiday season. Evening reception is nice, there is a different foodtheme every night (mon-thu) and it‚Äôs nice to sit down and take a glass of wine or beer. Staff was great, every one of them made us feel like home. Greetings from Finland to you all and thanks for a great experience! We will come back in our next trip to area!
Manager Response: Hyv√§√§ huomenta, 410sannap!  We are so thrilled you selected us as your home during your holiday. It can be a little worrisome traveling so far and being unsure of your surroundings. Luckily all our reviews are true!! How nice is it to be able to wake up each day and have hot breakfast or come back in the evening to a snack and drink when you are traveling for such an extended time? It sure does leave some extra pocket change for the fun stuff!   Maybe you can show us around Helsinki next time?  Till your travels bring you back our way... Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: We loved our stay. Everything was nice and clean, staff was very helpful, and we had a wonderful time during our week stay! It was easy to get to and from the theme parks and we had no issues during our entire trip!
Manager Response: Good morning, roryb2018!  Thank you kindly for your lovely review of our Homewood Suites Irvine. Your family came a long way to experience the fun and sun of Southern California and we are so pleased you chose us as your home during your stay. It's comforting to know you have quiet and relaxing place to lay your head at the end of a busy, but fun, day! We hope your family will think of us again the next time you make your way to the area. Maybe the beach next time?  Sending you sunshine and warm vibes, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary Heading: Very good‚Äîexcept for Fox News in breakfast area
Summary: Stayed here for 1 night recently.  Pros:  Large room, good location (safe, convenient by car to shopping/restaurants, lots of breakfast choices, modern rooms, basketball area if you're into that.  Cons:  Fox News in the breakfast area, blinking light on smoke detector, some plane noise from nearby John Wayne Airport.  IMHO hotels shouldn't subject their guests to political propaganda like Fox News at breakfast, even if other guests specifically request that channel.  Just put on something like the Weather channel.  Having to listen to Fox News would be a big reason for me not to stay in this hotel again if I were in the area‚Äîreally makes me wonder about Hilton Hotels, too.  What are they thinking?
Manager Response: Thank you for your time spent reviewing our property. We are very happy to hear that you were satisfied with your overall stay here at our Homewood Suites Irvine property. Here at Homewood, our main goal is to be a welcoming place for every guest to feel comfortable and at home. We take no position on the choices of our guests, who come from all backgrounds. We do apologize if there was any offensive content being broadcast on the television at the time of your request. We are understanding of all viewpoints, which is why we were prompt to change the channel to something more neutral. Perhaps next time we can all agree upon the Weather Channel instead!  Best regards, Gabby & Alyssa, Front Desk

Summary: We had 64 of us staying at the hotel for a family reunion.  It was fabulous!  We had a BBQ one night by the pool, used the conference room for a family game night and enjoyed the complimentary breakfast each morning.  The hotel staff was great working with such a big group and trying to get our rooms as close together as possible!  I would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Good morning, _sharlyncoleman!  It was a pleasure to host your family reunion and thank you all for choosing Homewood Suites Irvine as your base. We certainly enjoyed getting to know everyone during the stay. While our meeting spaces are usually utilized for business events, they also make for great activity rooms and New Years Eve countdown spots! We hope perhaps to become your go-to location the next time the family meets up again from around the country.  Warmest wishes from our family to yours! Gabby & Alyssa, Front Desk

Summary Heading: Great hotel with full size kitchen
Summary: This hotel is located close to the highway with easy access and yet no noise.  The rooms are nice and spacious, with full-size kitchen amenities, couch, desk, very nice size flat screen tv and comfortable mattresses.  We stayed at a nearby suite hotel as well down the street, but it was not as spacious.  On certain days, there is an evening meal and beer and wine as well.  The beer is on tap and was surprisingly great quality.  The morning breakfast offered eggs, two meat choices, breads, bagels, yogurts, cereal, waffle station, oatmeal and pastries.    This was a very pleasant hotel stay, with nice amenities (even a basketball court next to the pool), laundry facilities and a spacious lobby.  Would definitely stay here again.  Thank you very much Homewood Suites!
Manager Response: Good morning, MelroseSD  We should be thanking you for such a glowing review! We certainly value the time and energy you took in writing this review because your words speak volumes. We are so thrilled that you had such a pleasant stay after joining us here at Homewood Suites Irvine and were able to experience every little bit we have to offer. We hope you will allow us to be your Home Away from Home the next time you find yourself in the area!  Cheers! Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: The pros: (1) it‚Äôs located in a quiet business district; (2) the free daily breakfast included coffee (all day), waffles, 3 kinds of cereals, yogurt, fresh fruits, bagels and a revolving menu of eggs, sausages, potatoes, which were all great; (3) the Front Office staff were very accommodating, friendly and helpful; (4) the hotel is new so it‚Äôs in great shape; (5) it‚Äôs near a freeway entrance; (6) the hotel had adequate laundry and drying machines; the TV in the living room and the bedroom were large flat screens; and, (7) there was ample free parking.   The cons: (1) the free dinner from Monday to Thursday was so-so; (2) there are no restaurants near by walking distance; (3) the water pressure of the shower was weak/or inadequate; and, (4) the bath tub was shallow.  Overall,
Manager Response: Good afternoon, Leisure Farms A  You must be quite the vacationing expert with a username like that! With that being said, thank you for the detailed review of our property. As we enter into our first full year of operation, we appreciate all the pros and cons that you, as the guest, find and let us know about. We strive to satisfy all of our guest needs and expectations and will take what you have written in to consideration. It would definitely appear that our pros have outweighed any of the cons so we will be seeing you again when your travels may bring you back to the Irvine area!  We thank you for your stay as well as your insight, Best regards, Gabby & Alyssa, Front Desk

Summary: To start with the staff is very pleasant and knowledgeable. They made us feel very welcomed.  The room was comfortable, clean and well equiped. The bed was soft and comfortable.  Nice table in the kitchen area to do work on. Outlets for our cell phones. Well lit.  A very nice hotel. Breakfast was okay.  We would definitely recommend this hotel and we will stay there again.
Manager Response: Good afternoon, Doreen L!  Thank you for your generous review of our Homewood Suites property. Your words are much better than anything we could ever say! It sounds like our spacious suites offered everything to make your stay most comfortable. We hope we will see you again soon to host you at your Home Away From Home!  Warmest wishes, Gabby & Alyssa, Front Desk

Summary: We will definitely return to this hotel. We try and find something close to Disneyland but not so close that we have to pay hundreds for a one night stay. The hotel had friendly staff and the room was super clean and beds were very comfortable. Never slept this well in a hotel.  Two thumbs up!!
Manager Response: Good morning, Lorerin!  Who's got 2 thumbs (x9) and is happy you had a great stay with us at Homewood Suites Irvine?! We are pleased you had a recharging stay after your visit to the Happiest (and probably busiest) Place on Earth. You always have a place to rest your weary head here at Homewood whenever you visit the park or any other destination here in Southern California.  Till we see you again... Gabby & Alyssa, Front Desk

Summary: I stayed at the property for 5 nights and this is a gem property. New, clean, free parking, breakfast and light dinner, well located, close to airport and highways. There are restaurants about 5 minutes away by car. Breakfast included hot items, fruits, coffee, waffles,OJ etc. The pastry could be better but that is minimal compared with all the positives this property has.The happy hour included Cesar salad, soup, cheese crackers, beer, red and white wine. The staff was friendly , efficient and helpful. I would definitely book this property again !!
Manager Response: Good morning, qpasa!  Thank you kindly for writing this glowing review on our shiny, new property. I don't believe we could have said it any better ourselves! Maybe the weather was warm enough to even have taken a dip in the pool or played some basketball on the sports court? It sounds like you had a jam-packed stay with us here at Homewood Suites! We definitely look forward to hosting you once more when your travels bring you back to the Irvine area.  Until your next visit, Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: I stayed at this property for one night (which was a disservice to myself) and loved it! The hotel is fairly new and it is literally down the street from John Wayne Airport! The staff was very friendly and the rooms are beautiful! I did not get to experience the breakfast or the dinner but they serve breakfast everyday and a dinner Monday -Thursday. The rooms come with a full refrigerator, microwave, and stove top so it is ideal for long stays, they will even go out and do your grocery shopping!
Manager Response: Good afternoon Mr. Lawrence B!  We are terribly sorry you didn't have the time to stay longer but absence makes the heart grow fonder, right?! We will eagerly await your arrival for your next visit and make sure that you enjoy breakfast and our evening social next time! Whether you want to cook up a storm in your room or let us cook for you, we've got you covered!  Happiest of holidays, until we see you again  Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: I was late for the complimentary breakfast.  There was a wonderful employee there- Alice - who went out of her way to get meal!  She was so kind - such a wonderful asset to this property together w/the rest of the friendly staff!  I will be back
Manager Response: Good evening Mchael C!  Thank you so much for taking the time to write this review and we are so pleased with your stay! We are proud of not only our front desk staff but of all our employees! Your recognition means a great deal to us. Breakfast is the most important meal of the day (they say) and we are so glad that Anita helped you start your day off right! We can't wait to be your home away from home when you find yourself in the Irvine area once again!  Best regards, Gabby & Zee, Front Desk

Summary: I have stayed at several hotels in the SNA area and frankly, this is one of the better hotels to stay at in the area.  The room was very clean with a nice size walk in shower.  We loved the kitchen area in the room and a very comfy bed.
Manager Response: Good evening IndyMedic2006!  We certainly like to think we are one of the best so thank you for saying so! We are so pleased you had a comfortable stay and took the time to write this review. We hope you also enjoyed our the amenities outside of your big comfy room like breakfast, our evening social, as well as the pool and sport court. Perhaps it is safe to say that we'll see you the next time your frequent travels bring you to the Irvine area!  Warmest Wishes, Gabby & Zee, Front Desk

Summary: It was a very nice hotel, the night auditor Chavelly checked me in and she was really friendly. She knew we were there for my little sisters‚Äô birthday, so the the next day when we came back to the room the staff had left a birthday cake in the fridge with a card. I want to thank Chavelly, Eric, Liz, Caroline, and Gabby for going above and beyond. I really appreciated their hospitality.
Manager Response: Good morning, Keondra M!  Wow! We are so thrilled that so many of our Front Desk staff made a difference in your stay! Thank you so much for sharing your experience here at Homewood Suites Irvine with the rest of us. Hopefully the cake was just the icing on your trip! We certainly hope you will come celebrate again with us the next time you are in the SoCal area.  Warmest wishes, Gabby & Eric, Front Desk

Summary Heading: Awesome 2nd Stay With Homewood Suites by John Wayne Airport!
Summary: Beautiful hotel by John Wayne Airport in OC/Irvine area.  I stayed here for the first time April 2017 and came back in Dec 2017. Southcoast Plaza mall and Irvine Spectrum are near-by for shopping/entertainment/food.  Their staff is on-point; it's clear the take pride in their hotel. Rooms are well-kept. Their complimentary breakfast and free self-parking is hard to beat, too.  Definitely looking forward to staying here again in the near future!
Manager Response: Dear 416diannea,  We cannot thank you enough for taking the time to write us a positively glowing review! Sounds like we have become your go-to spot for the Orange County area. We are conveniently located to nearby local attractions but far enough a way to give our guests some rest and relaxation. We are quite glad that it's safe to say we will see you again!  Until next time, Gabby & Liz, Front Desk

Summary: Stayed in a 2 bedroom, 2 bath handicapped accessible suite. It was perfect for our family of 3 adults (1 handicapped). Breakfast was great. Staff was friendly. The hotel is close to the airport but a bit further from shopping and attractions so you do need a car.
Manager Response: Good afternoon Naptownleader,   We hope with a username like that that you took full advantage of our fluffy and comfortable beds! We are so glad we were able to accommodate your family's specific needs without sacrificing any comfort or ease. While we are close to a lot of local businesses and restaurants, we are far enough away to give our guests some peace and quiet while they are home here. We hope to host your family once more when your travels bring you down to sunny Southern California.  Warmest wishes, Gabby & Caroline, Front Desk

Summary: What a fantastic property. Staff have been amazing. Interior is really nice. Good size pool. Quarter court basketball set up. Entertainment room with a large TV and pool table. A very large selection on the breakfast room. Large room with a kitchen: refrigerator. Small stove and toaster. Microwave also. This would definitely be a place to check out when in the area. About ten minutes from the Disneyland parks.
Manager Response: Dear  Robert C,  I am assuming you took your family on a short trip to Disneyland??  WE really hope you had a great time.  Just wanted to take a minute to thank you for the kinds words in your review.  Because of the all inclusive price, location to the airport and the best thing ALL SUITES, this is the perfect place for people to stay and relax.  We really appreciate the business and hope you see you on your next venture to Southern California.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Lived up to its high TripAdvisor ratings
Summary: Excellent stay.  Rooms were very clean and very quiet on the back side, NE corner.  No air traffic or road traffic noise.  Very comfortable rest.  Staff was excellent in all aspects, and the breakfast above Homewood Suites norms. Able to conduct work meetings outside near the pool, which was well-maintained and peaceful.  Next trip to Irvine/John Wayne Airport a return stay is without question.
Manager Response: Good morning, dylanc493 We are glad you chose to stay with us at the Homewood suites in Irvine and are also happy to hear that you were able to take full advantage of some of the amenities we offer here such as the complimentary breakfast as well as pool and fitness area. We hope you truly enjoyed your stay and we cannot wait until our next meeting. Until next time my friend!  Sincerely,  Eric Saunders Front Desk Agent

Summary Heading: great hotel except there was no hot water for shower
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights. The facility, room and location of this hotel was excellent. However, it was shamed that the water was not warm enough for shower. I reported to front desk manager and she sent maintenance guy to my room. After inspection, the maintenance guy told to leave the water on till front desk called as he would need to turn up the temperature in boil room. But the call never happened and water was left on for more than 4 hours. What a shame!
Manager Response: Dear swt_cg,  We sincerely appreciate the time in taking the time to write this review to help us improve where needed. We apologize for the situation with the water temperature and the miscommunication between departments. We hope you will come to the Irvine area once again and give our Homewood Suites property the chance to make it right for you next time.   Warmest regards, Gabby & Zee, Front Desk

Summary: This was  the first time I stayed at this hotel. I chose it because I had stayed at another Homewood property in Virginia and was very satisfied with my stay there.  Boy, was I satisfied with my decision. The property is very clean and has a fresh feel to it. The room has all the amenities one needs; staff is friendly and responsive; price is acceptable.  I give this experience 5 stars and would definitely recommend it to my family and friends.
Manager Response: Dear 415saminn,  We are so glad the Homewood Suites brand holds strong, coast to coast. Thank you for staying with us during your trip here in Southern California and for taking the time to leave us a splendid review. We appreciate every effort you take in giving us feedback so we can continue to be the best! We hope to see you again the next time your ventures bring you out our way, and hopefully you can introduce your family to ours!  Warmest wishes, Gabby & Liz, Front Desk

Summary: Location is excellent to SNA airport . Hotel around great food and shopping . Parking lot was well lit for safety . Amenities for hot tub and pool were clean and well stocked . Basketball court was a nice change for fun
Manager Response: Dear 482geralda,  We are glad to hear you took full advantage of all of our outdoor amenities, even as the California weather is starting to turn a bit chilly (for our standards)! We hope you were also able to join us for breakfast during your stay although there is so many wonderful restaurant options to explore in the local area. Thank you taking the time to write about the Homewood Suites Irvine. We certainly hope to host you again when your travels bring you back to SoCal!  Happy Holidays! Gabby & Eliza, Front Desk

Summary: This is a GREAT place! Nothing critical to say about this place! Fresh and really clean! Great location near Orange County Airport. Local complementary shuttle for dinner. Comfortable bed with crisp, clean linens. Incredible, tasty, full spread, REAL breakfast included with stay! Staff is super helpful, focused 100% on great customer service. We were here only one night and I am thinking we‚Äôll have a hard time staying anywhere else given this new, high bar of expectations.
Manager Response: Dear NougatHeeler, Thank You! Thank you! Thank You! for not only choosing our hotel for your stay but also thank you so much your kind words and recognition! We are overwhelmed with joy by your positive review on our property! If its one thing I know personally our hotel staff as a whole is ALWAYS looking for new ways set the bar as well as maintain a status of expectation that we know our guest also have for us as well. once again thank you for choosing our property and we look forward to any reservations you choose to book with us in the future!   Sincerely, Eric Saunders Front Desk

Summary: Best customer service at this hotel was excellent.  The rooms were clean, the lobby is very nice.  This is a great place to stay.  I outdoors was well maintained.  I plan on going back to the location once my travel needs require a hotel stay.
Manager Response: Dear z4444Qanitas, Thank you for taking the time to notice the hard work of the hotel staff! We always strive to create an atmosphere that is suitable as well as desirable for each guest that walks through the door. When ever you wish to return to our property swing by the front desk and let us know how we can better improve your stay! weather it be extra shampoo in your room for you when you arrive, a wake up call or even blankets and pillows for you when you go to sleep at night just let us know!  Sincerely, Eric Saunders Front Desk

Summary: This new hotel is clean, quiet, free parking, great location and services.  The hotel has a great pool, a half basketball court, a game room with free billiards and shuffle board and a great free breakfast.  The room (suite) we had was awesome and had a nice kitchen, multiple flat screen tvs and comfortable beds.
Manager Response: Dear jasonvH3016NM, Thank you for choosing to stay at our property we love that you took full advantage of all the amenities that our hotel provides. Please let us know if we can do anything for you for any future reservations you may have even if its just for partnering up for some friendly competition at the basketball court or game room.  Sincerely Eric Saunders Front Desk

Summary: Nice hotel ! Amazing value love the free breakfast and the free parking. Also loved the pool area with basketball court and fire pit to make s‚Äômores at night ! Easy access off 55 fwy . Definitely would stay here again !
Manager Response: Good morning, Brittm1987!  Who says you can't make s'mores in November!? Isn't SoCal great?? It is wonderful to hear that you soaked up the rest of the summer warmth with all of our outdoor amenities.  We hope you will think of staying with us again next time you're driving down the 405 or the 5 or the 55 or even the 1 freeway! We would enjoy hosting you once again.  Till next time, Caroline & Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: We needed to stay overnight due to a mechanical issue at our home.   Room was spacious and comfortable for a family of 4.  Front desk was great, and morning breakfast staff was great, but the breakfast food was mediocre.   Overalls a very positive experience.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel I,  While your visit with us here at Homewood Suites in Irvine was a bit unplanned and a surprise to your family, we are pleased we were able to provide you with a good home for the evening. Hopefully you all got in to a vacation frame of mind by hanging out in the pool a bit or visiting our game room. We are glad our family could be there for yours when you needed it. We hope to see you again for a real vacation another time!  Warmest regards, Caroline & Gabby, Front Desk

Summary Heading: The Best All Around Hotel in Irvine
Summary: We stayed for 3 nights and the following is my observation; 1. I do not know when this hotel was constructed but I felt like it was a brand new hotel. Very clean wherever you are at the hotel.  2. I chose this hotel for free parking feature. I previously stayed at Irvine Hotel and Hilton Hotel across from John Wayne airport. I had felt like the total parking charge were more than my rental car cost.  3. The hotel staff ate very friendly. Whenever I walked into the lobby from the parking lot, the receptionist greet me with ‚ÄúHi‚Äù with smile.  4. The breakfast is served hot which is seldom at the hotel room rate. Even better is that there is an evening social hour. It was more like free dinner with wine.  5. The rooms are impeccably clean with lots of towels and hangers. The kitchen
Manager Response: Wow, D K!  I don't think we've ever received such a thorough and inclusive list of such good things about our Homewood Suites before! We sincerely appreciate your generous and well-thought out review of our property. By the sounds of it, we met many of the needs you could possibly have while traveling! We hope you will spend time with us once more when your travels bring you out to California where we can be your Home Away from Home!  Fond regards, Caroline & Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: Although I only stayed one night my experience here was memorable. I travel extensively for my job so I know has important it is that you are made to feel welcome. From check in with Cherie to checkout with Eric, the warmth and friendly professionalism, was fantastic. Cherie was not only friendly but very helpful with all my questions. I recommend this hotel highly. Well done to all management and staff.
Manager Response: Good morning Sweetamd!  Thank you for the personalized shout outs to some of the great members of our front desk team! We are so lucky to have such outstanding staff in all departments to assist our guests. With your frequent traveling, it is wonderful to hear that Homewood Suites in Irvine stood out so much to you. We certainly hope you will visit us again when you find yourself in the Southern California area.  Best regards, Caroline & Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: I stayed here with two very young children as my son was having a medical procedure. The staff at reception were so friendly and helpful. Nothing was ever too much trouble. The hotel is spotless and all the staff are very friendly. Location wise it is not really close to anything as it's the business district if there is a free shuttle within a 3 mile radius. I would definitely return here. The staff are a credit to this place.
Manager Response: Good Morning 351jessies,  We are so happy we could be there for your family during this trial; it is difficult to be so far from home and loved ones during times such as the one you all went through. We at the desk enjoyed hearing about all the different activities you and the family did each day. While the city Irvine is more a business center, there is so much in the surrounding areas to explore! We hope next time you visit California, your family will be able to enjoy all the beach time and visit us at Homewood again. Fun in the sun!  All of our best wishes from our family to yours, Gabby & Front Desk Team

Summary: Stayed for 10 days on a business trip and enjoyed the amenities, socials, service, and room. Very clean and spacious. Bedroom was very nice. Wished they had more lighting in bedroom but still was very nice. I would definitely return and plan on returning to this hotel.
Manager Response: Good morning, Newdaynewtrip, It sounds like you are on the road quite a bit, with a username like that! We are so pleased that the Homewood Suites in Irvine provided you with a pleasant and comfortable stay. We hope to see you again next time you come back around to Southern California.   Warm wishes, Caroline & Gabby, Front Desk

Summary: We recently moved to the US for work, we chose this hotel as a temporary stay for 2 weeks whilst looking for a home. In the end we were sad to move out. The staff were all exceptionally amazing. We were greeted like family and treated like VIP's. The hotel is right near the airport, so when standing outside it is as loud as airports can be. But the room's seem to be soundproofed. We enjoyed seeing how happy the child were at breakfast (which is a great way to start the day, and the buffet staff are very warm and helpful). The pool area is very comfortable. Nearby shopping and eating area's are very convenient and have everything.  Only con is the shower pressure (to save water) but you get used to it.
Manager Response: Good morning 724gerhardb,  We can only imagine how stressful it must be to move away from your home, let alone to a new country. While the Homewood Suites has all the features to be a home away from home, it still isn't always quite the same. It fills our hearts with joy that your family felt comfortable and became a part of ours during your stay here in Irvine. Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know how well your stay went. We certainly hope to see you around the neighborhood!  Best regards, Gabby & Zee, Front Desk

Summary: Their beds were wonderful, the rooms were very clean, the staff was helpful, and the free breakfast made it easy on the wallet. I highly recommend this hotel  next time we go back to visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Good morning Daniel O.!  Thanks for visiting the Happiest Hotel on Earth while you were visiting the Happiest Place on Earth. Thanks to our close proximity to the major freeway systems, we are a great stay for families seeking some quiet time between their Disneyland adventures. It sounds like we were a wonderful option for your family to recharge and relax. Christmas time at Disneyland is even more amazing than Halloween (although some of us here might disagree) so we hope to see you back in just a few short months!  Till next time! Gabby & Zee, Front Desk

Summary: You would not know you're under a flight path. Solid pained windows gave for a very quiet room. Beds were extremely comfortable. Room temp was nice and cool. Very clean as well. Slept great.  Great breakfast menu; the eggs were a little dry but still a nice meal.
Manager Response: Dear JohncH1723IH,  Wow, what didn't we do right?! We are thrilled to hear that our new Homewood Suites property met all your needs and expectations. Hopefully you were able to pry yourself away from your comfortable guestroom to also get out to our pool and gameroom.! We can't wait to have you again and share another meal together. Till your travels bring you to us again....  Warmest regards, Gabby & Zee, Front Desk

Summary: What a nice hotel.   Although close to Orange County airport landing pattern, I rarely heard noise.  The beds are to die for!  By LA standards, the nightly rate was reasonable .  Definitely will stay here again
Manager Response: Greetings Laurie C,  We are pleased you feel our property was a great deal with us at Homewood Suites; we are proud to be able to offer so many amenities under our nightly rate. You'd never imagine you could get such a good night's sleep being in a flight path but you've just iterated how comfortable and sound-proof our guest bedrooms are! We can't wait to see you again next time your travels bring you to the SoCal region.  Best regards, Gabby & Zee, Front Desk

Summary: Spent two nights here to visit a nearby Nephew as well as spend a day at Disney.  It is a fairly new hotel, and we loved our stay.  Friendly staff (extra kudos to Gabby and Zee) and of course the nightly drinks/reception and full breakfast in the morning.  The suite was immaculate, nice comfy bed and functional kitchen if needed. What was particularly nice for me, an aviation buff, was to sit by the nice pool and watch planes on their final approach into John Wayne airport.  Really up close and personal, but no issue at night, the hotel was very quiet. Laundry facilities were nice to have. In my opinion, the best Homewood Suites we have stayed at, would definitely book here again!
Manager Response: Dear Ed M,  We're soaring as high as the planes to hear what a great time you had during your stay with us! As a fellow aviation fan, I agree how breathtaking it is to sit and watch the planes making their final approach over the property. So amazing and majestic to see! And yes, our property is so well insulated, not even a whisper of an engine is heard from the inside. I'm so glad that you had a wonderful stay, and Gabby and Zee are overjoyed as well! Reviews like this really make our day and remind us of how much we love taking care of our guests. Thank you for taking the time to write such kind words, and we look forward to welcoming you home the next time that you are in the area!  Warmest regards, Cherie Brower Front Office Manager

Summary: Compared to other Hilton brand hotels in the area, this Homewood Suites is great! Newly renovated, free parking, free breakfast, large room with full kitchen. And the a/c was so quiet that I could hardly hear it! The only con is that there was some street noise in the morning even though our room is on the top floor (the room faces the busy street though.) I didn‚Äôt hear the planes despite the hotel‚Äôs proximity to the airport. Overall it was great and I would consider this hotel again if I‚Äôm in the area.
Manager Response: Dear dreamcatcher_chan,  We're so glad that you enjoyed your time with us while in Irvine! In such a busy and fast paced city, it's nice to have a place to call home while on the road. It is always so nice to hear how well our amenities work out for our guests as well; Our delicious breakfast is a great start to any day of the week! Thank you for taking the time to write us such kind words. We look forward to welcoming you back home the next time that you are in the Irvine area!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower Front Office Manager

Summary: We are currently here and have been here for 2 weeks. Staff is friendly and professional, working to make us feel at home. Great amenities including a pool, gym, game room, etc. The location works well for us as it has good access to several freeways.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. V,  You haven't even left the building yet and we are already such hearing wonderful things! That could very well be a first. Who knows, maybe you won't want to leave your new home! If you need anything at all during the remainder of your stay, you know where to find us :D  Warmest Regards, Caroline & Gabby Front Desk

Summary: Very clean hotel.  They have a basketball court and my kids got a chance to play before we checked out.  Friendly staff.  Room was great.  Even the pullout couch was comfy.  Oh, they even have a game room, too.
Manager Response: Dear ChristopherbY8129OD,  We don't always get to hear the positives about the room stay so we are thrilled to hear that your family was comfortable and had fun with us here at Homewood! We have lots to offer for families with the pool and sports court as well as the game room. We hope you will think of us as your Home Away From Home next time you are in the Orange County area.  Warm regards, Caroline & Gabby Front Desk

Summary: Homewood Suites provides comfortable suites in the business area of Irvine.  Breakfast and evening social (M-Th) as well as internet connectivity, a fitness center and a pool make this a nice place to stay.  Staff is friendly and efficient.  Only negative is that parking is a little scarce.
Manager Response: Dear 01102CWcarolt,  We couldn't have said it better ourselves! You touched on many of the amenities that we offer here at the Homewood Suites, along with our complimentary parking! Although it can get a little crowded out there on busy nights, there is usually always space for everyone.  We hope to see you again the next time you find yourself in Orange County, California.  Warmest Regards, Caroline & Gabby Front Desk

Summary: I stayed here for 1 week and the atmosphere, the staff and the amenities was absolutely fantastic. I definitely will be staying here in the future! One of the staff Cherie was brilliant she shuttled me a few times to pick food from restaurants. She also recommended great places which were near by for dining. They greeted me on the way in every evening and on the way out every morning. The pick up from the airport was very fast. When leaving they ensured that my shuttle ride was booked the night before and coordinated it so I was able to have some hot breakfast before heading to the airport. This was an amazing stay :)
Manager Response: Dear Mr. D,  Wow! It sounds like you had the total "Homewood" experience! We are thrilled to hear you received such fantastic care from all of our team; Cherie sets a great example! Thank you for choosing to spend your week with us while you were in town. We will see you again when your business travels bring you back to the Irvine area :)  Best regards, Caroline & Gabby Front Desk

Summary: great customer service.  nicest people ever. room food and just about everything was great.  I was there for a week and was always greeted with a smile.  breakfast was great  everyday it was different which surprised me.  the facilities were great too.  the room had its own full size kitchen with appliances.  great for families
Manager Response: Dear Q726NBcarolinag,  Nicest people EVER?! Those are some enormous shoes to fill and we are so flattered you think so! We are very pleased you felt welcomed and comfortable in our home while you were away from yours. It certainly is nice to have the option the make your own meals in the kitchen that all our suites feature or just have a home cooked breakfast made by us! It sounds like you were able to enjoy many of the great amenities that Homewood Suites has to offer. We certainly hope to see you and your family again when you find yourself back on the West Coast!  Warmest regards, Caroline & Gabby Front Desk

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our 5 night stay at this Homewood Suites while we were on a family vacation to Disney / Anaheim. The rooms are very spacious and comfortable. I love the ceiling fan in the room. Ample outlets and USB ports. The kitchen is very clean and room for everything. The walk-in showers give more room than a traditional shower and the exhaust system works well. The walls are nice and thick so it‚Äôs very quiet at bedtime. The only hallway sound we heard was doors closing. We enjoyed the heated pool, basketball court, and fire pit outside. There‚Äôs also two grills. The fitness room was bright and more than enough equipment for everyone. Breakfast area is large and ample seating. Breakfast and dinner choices were varied and delicious! The staff did a wonderful job of
Manager Response: Dear  sophiepilla,  You seem like you had a wonderful 5 days with us.  It was so nice to see that you took advantage of all the amenities we have here at the hotel.  Sometimes people think that Disney is so far away but it is only a 15 minute drive up the freeway as long as you avoid the rush hour.  I will be sure to post your comments for the team to see.  We all try so hard to provide a fun loving atmosphere to not only guests but each other.  Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us.  We know there are so many other options.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: I spent 3 nights at this lovely hotel last week. I had a good sized room, with a little kitchen and view of the pool. Wifi throughout the property, parking, breakfast and soup/salad in the afternoon were all included. The hotel is nicely located near many businesses in the area, and it is only a few minutes drive to the "District" mall for food and shopping. The staff members were great and very helpful, always smiling and asking to help. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear Sam S,  The staff here wanted to thank you for recognizing not only the hotel but the team at Homewood Irvine.  We really appreciate all the positive comments about your stay and hope you will return soon.  We will be sure to share this with the rest of the team.  Much gratitude from your hotel family.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: We had the best experience. The staff is professional and helpful. The room was very clean and quiet. The breakfast was yummy and the staff great. We will highly recommend to others to pick this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Penny L, First of all we would like to thank you for staying at our hotel. Our entire staff strives to make every guest experience a memorable one. We Appreciate your kind words and encouragement and we look forward to your next stay here at the Homewood sites in Irvine.  Sincerely, Eric Saunders Front Desk Agent

Summary: Was there in business for one night, close to perfection! Brand new, this place needs some adjustment at breakfast and lunch but overall very nice !  Perfect large room, kitchenette, large shower , nothing negative !
Manager Response: Dear RickBo84, First of all I would like to thank you for choosing our hotel here at the Homewood Suites in Irvine for your stay. We greatly appreciate the kind words and overall rating we have received from you. We are always looking for ways to improve to insure that each guest experience is a close to perfection as possible. We truly hope that we see you again soon. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you in the future to better improve your stay here at our hotel even if it is for something as simple as a one night stay or business meeting. Until next time!  Sincerely, Eric Saunders Front Desk Agent

Summary: We stay at this hotel for two nights. I like the location and the layout of this hotel. The guest room is very quiet. The fitness center is not big but enough. I also like the swimming pool of this hotel. It's heated and long.
Manager Response: Dear Shu W, Thank you for choosing our hotel here at the Homewood Suites in Irvine. We are so happy you found our hotel suitable for your needs. the gym is a great place to blow off some steam and get a quick workout. We are always welcoming to any feed back you may have regarding your stay or any tips you may have regarding our workout facility. We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely, Eric Saunders, Front Desk Agent

Summary: This is my first time staying at Homewood Suites and the hotel did not disappoint.  The staff is very helpful and room are clean.  Our family enjoyed the basketball court and pool table table in the game room.  The free breakfast was ok, nothing to write home about. Overall, I really like the hotel and would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Hueq, Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review. We are extremely pleased to hear your first stay went off with out a hitch. The Basketball court and Game room really are wonderful amenities to utilize while staying here at the Homewood Suites in Irvine. We are glad you enjoy them as much as we do. Please feel free to come back anytime and challenge us to a round of billiards or a game of horse in the basketball court. Until Next time. Take care.  Sincerely Eric Saunders Front Desk Agent

Summary: I just stayed at the Homewood.  Brand new, nice, quiet.  We arrived early and asked for the front desk to call if a room was ready.  No call but when we checked back they let us in the room an hour early at 3pm.  Usually check-in is at 4pm.
Manager Response: Dear Wavewarrior,  Good evening and thank you very much for your kind review of our property! We are absolutely thrilled to have taken care of you during your stay in Irvine, and I'm glad to hear that we were able to get you situated in a timely manner. There's nothing like kicking up your feet up and relaxing after a long day! We do hope that you come see us again when you are back in the area, and we look forward to checking you back in!  Best regards,  Cherie Brower Front Office Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary Heading: Homewood Suites by Hilton John Wayne airport
Summary: We stayed at Homewood Suites for a short weekend in LA, and this hotel is just perfect.  Staff is very friendly, great room, no charge for parking!  I think the hotel is pretty new, price is reasonable.  Will come back for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Young L,  Good evening! Our team is absolutely thrilled to hear about your great experience at our property, and we are so glad that you enjoyed your stay! These are the kinds of reviews that warm our hearts. Thank you for the kind words. We do hope that you come see us again when you are back in the area... We'll make sure to hold a parking spot just for you!  Best regards,  Cherie Brower Front Office Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: I had a great experience at this hotel overall. The (Premium) internet was very fast. Breakfast and evening social were excellent. New facilities were very nice. The room was very spacious. Great trip overall.
Manager Response: Dear 672gregoryt,  Good evening! Our entire team is absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and it sounds like our zippy internet was just the thing to fit the bill! I'm glad that the social hour was also a big hit for you, as it's always nice to grab a bite to eat and relax after a long day. We hope to be able to take car of you when you happen to be back in the area! Come back for one of our famous waffles, and rest assured, we will have the best WiFi surfing waves around!  Best regards,  Cherie Brower Front Office Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: My hubby had a business trip and decided to take this opportunity to take our kids to Disneyland which just happened to be first weekend the park put out their Halloween Decorations!  Kids were very excited to see the park all decked out for Halloween. The hotel is just about 15 minutes from the park; very easy to get to/from the hotel to the park.  The rooms were clean and spacious.  Free breakfast was great.  Even though the hotel is by the airport, it was very quiet, we did not hear a single airplane. Having a full kitchen with fridge was a plus.
Manager Response: Dear 863daisym,  Good evening! We are so happy to have been able to take care of you and your family during your trip through Irvine. We are also delighted hear to hear about your lovely and memorable weekend at the Happiest Place on Earth! You came right at the perfect time too, as Disney's Halloween decorations are truly something special. We are so glad to have been able to be a part of your wonderful family getaway, and we sure hope that the memories you made will last a lifetime! We look forward to welcoming you home during your next stay in Irvine, and our hot breakfast and clean rooms will be ready and waiting for you!  Warmest regards,  Cherie Brower Front Office Manager Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary Heading: Exceptional hotel, staff, service and food
Summary: I had a great stay at this hotel, they are very accommodating, friendly. The suites are cozy and absolutely the ibest! Love the breakfast and social! I highly recommend this hotel to everyone, great stay!
Manager Response: Dear denisesL8417OW,  I will be sure to share this review with my staff.  Thanks for taking the time out of your busy schedule to write a review of your experience with us.  Hope to see you again soon at your Home Away From Home.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: We went to Disneyland in June of this year and picked this hotel for a number of reasons. The hotels we used to stay at closer to Disney all implemented high cost of parking per night and they had gotten a bit long in the tooth. So we looked for other Hilton hotels (we were staying on points) and picked this based off it being new and other reviews.   We arrived around 4pm and had checked in for 3pm arrival. However when we arrived after driving from Phoenix the room wasn't ready so we had to wait. They also didn't have the room on the ground floor which we like so we had to wait. They did give us all a snack while we waited and the staff was as friendly as can be. They found us a room (on the ground floor thankfully after about 30 minutes).   The room is very nice and large. We
Manager Response: Dear Robertsonland,  Much gratitude for the detailed review of the hotel during your vacation to Disneyland.  I am sorry to hear that we fell short in a few areas and have taken these notes back to the managers to see what we can do about improving our services.  As for the internet, I am in charge of that and will be looking into what happen.  Currently all of our AP's are up and everything seems to be working fine, but that does not mean it worked on the day you were here, so I will look into further.  We really appreciate all the feedback, because it will only enable us to get better.  Thanks for choosing us and hope your kids had an awesome time too.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Fantastic stay, great room.  The staff was very accommodating, the place seemed brand new.  The kitchenette was very nice.  The bed was amazing, woke up so refreshed!!!  Wish we stayed here the entire trip!  I will next time.
Manager Response: Dear greencozmo,  Love your membership name.  Thanks for staying with us during at least part of your trip.  I agree that the rooms are amazing.  We really appreciate all the positive comments and hope that you will recommend us in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: My family stayed at the John Wayne Airport location for my sister's wedding. The accommodations were wonderful!!! The breakfast in the morning was excellent, the coffee remained fresh and the staff was great! The rooms were very clean, organized and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear  lakeachab,  We sure hope the wedding went well and was everything you wanted it to be.  Thanks for choosing us to stay and we really appreciate the feedback about the breakfast and the team.  Hope to see you again in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This has been by far the best of the best from all the places we have ever stayed at. Facilities are great, swimming pool, jacuzzi, barbecue grills, game room, basketball court. Staff is super friendly, suites are marvelous. We will definitely stay here again as it is conveniently located close to freeways, restaurants and gas stations.
Manager Response: Dear kmikzi17,  Wow! Best of the best???  I am sure we are not that great, but what an awesome compliment.  Thank you so much for the kind words about your stay.  I will be sure to pass this on to the rest of our team.  We really appreciate the business and hope to see you again in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Excellent accommodation in Orange County and very convenient to the airport and nearby attractions and shopping. Staff was very courteous and helpful. Breakfast was awesome. We stayed for a week and the only point I need to make is that the housekeeping service would not vacuum the floors daily. We had kids who ate in the rooms daily and needed the floors to be vacuumed daily.
Manager Response: Dear stillhouseln,  Much gratitude for first of all staying with us for a week and secondly for posting a review of your stay.  It was nice to here that our breakfast and our team did a tremendous job.  As for housekeeping, I am terribly sorry for the vacuuming issue. Please keep in mind that Homewood Suites typically does a limited service to the room and a full service twice a week.  That might be why the carpet was not vacuumed daily.  I am so sorry and next time, if you make the request at any Homewood for the daily service, I am sure they will make sure it gets done, I know we would.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This hotel was very clean and the staff was absolutely wonderful.  Free breakfast and free parking make the room price affordable.  We stayed 4 days with a family of 4 while we surfed at Newport, it was a wonderful trip. We had intermittent issues with the Wi-Fi but overall we were very pleased with the service and will stay at this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Dear davowilliams,  I used to surf in Newport all the time.  Did you guys go to the wedge or chose something a little nit easier?  Thank you for reviewing our hotel and making it your home for 4 days here in Southern California.  I know there are so many other hotels you could have chosen, so a huge thanks from our team.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: We stayed a week here; the staff were extremely helpful (especially Liz on reception when an issue arose!) and although they were having hot water issues on one of the days, they arranged access to a Marriott hotel nearby for a so we could shower and prepare for a meeting. The outdoor basketball court and swimming pool with grill facilities was good for evenings after work was done.  The cleaning staff could be a better job with vacuuming the carpets - not only in the halls but also in our room.However, the bathroom was spotless, the full kitchen was cleaned thoroughly each day, and the beds were comfortable; we were happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Athena G,  Much appreciation for posting a review of your stay here at Homewood Irvine.  I was so sorry to hear about the hot water issues.  I do know we shut the hot water down for some preventative maintenance issues during the day, but made sure to issue every guest room and arrival a letter letting everyone know.  But I was super happy to hear that Liz worked it out for you.  I wish I could say that hotels run proficiently 100% of the time, but unfortunately we have our challenges to, but it is all about how we resolve those challenges with our guests.  In your case, it seems like Liz did a great job.  I have already spoken to the Executive Housekeeper about the carpet comments, which I very much appreciate.    Thanks for communicating with us and hopefully we will see you in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Overall a very nice hotel with large rooms and lots of in room amenities. Water pressure is a little low and the wifi would occasionally drop a signal and have to be logged back in but nothing more than an average hotel.
Manager Response: Dear 759elleryc, 	First of all, thank you very much for taking the time to write a review. As a relatively new property in Irvine, we appreciate each and every review that our guests take the time to leave.  We do apologize that the water pressure was not up to expectations and our Engineering Department is working on a suitable solution. We  strive to be a greener property but do not intend for it to hinder guest comfort. We do hope that you will give us the opportunity to wow you with our services next time you are in the Orange County area. Best Regards, Liz & Gabby Front Desk Agents

Summary: Fairly new hotel.  Rooms are extremely large with a full kitchen, sitting room desk/work station.  Large pool with BBQ area and a large patio area.  Outdoor basketball court.  Nice size workout room offers water and towels.  Front desk staff very nice.  Parking in front of the hotel is sparse however to the rear or side there is additional parking. We came in late one night and had to circle around several times to find a spot.  Parking is free.    Breakfast is offered for a fee.  This would be my only complaint.  Eggs were cold not much variety in what they offered.  Fruit was limited to apples and oranges.  Food was not very appatizing.  We ended going else where for breakfast even though we paid the additional fee.  Overall I would recommend this hotel just not the breakfast
Manager Response: Dear Jane P, 	Thank you for coming from paradise to come visit us in California! We are glad that you were able to enjoy all of the various facets of our Homewood Suites; both inside and out. We are sorry to hear you received mixed information regarding our breakfast! It is complimentary along with our Evening Reception during the week days. As far as the variety of fruit offered, we will discuss possible additions with the breakfast crew and general manager. Thank you for your feedback and we hope you will stay with us again in the future so you can share both breakfast and dinner with us! Best Regards, Liz & Gabby Front Desk Agents

Summary: Very comfortable and modern hotel in a quiet neighborhood one hour drive from LA. Good choice for people who want explore LA and don't want to spend too much money for accommodation. Close to the beaches. Close to the airport but not noisy. Great staff. Good breakfast. Big and comfortable suite. Wifi works excellent. Nice pool.  Any disadvantage? It would be better if the sink was inside the bathroom not outside.
Manager Response: Dear Krzchm, 	Wow! We are humbled you came all the way from Warsaw and stayed with us while experiencing everything Southern California has to offer. Orange County is a wonderful oasis in between the major sites of Los Angeles and San Diego. We are thrilled you were able to enjoy traveling without breaking your budget. Thank you for your insight on the layout of our suites. We felt that this design allowed for maximum usage of both areas of the bathroom without comprising privacy. Warmest Regards, Liz & Gabby Front Desk Agents

Summary Heading: Nice clean hotel, Good location, free airport shuttle
Summary: Nice clean hotel, Good location, free airport shuttle. Stay here for 4 nights on business.  It is a newer hotel.  Most rooms have kitchen.  Friendly staffs, good WiFi.  Free parking.  Good breakfast with big dinning area.  Happy hours Monday-Thursday with beer, wind and food.
Manager Response: Dear Tom Y, 	Thank you for taking the time to write this generous review. It sounds like you were able to utilize many of our amenities so as to enjoy your evenings off after work! We certainly hope you will choose Homewood Suites next time as your Home Away From Home! Best Regards, Liz & Gabby Front Desk Agents

Summary Heading: ONE YEAR LATER - a review from the very FIRST reviewer of this hotel üòä
Summary: As a mom of a now 2nd year student at UC Irvine, I have stayed at this particular hotel numerous since it first opened and my son started his college adventure.  It is STILL the best hotel experience, professional and friendliest staff committed to excellent customer service.  Hotel is amazing and the grounds and amenities are impeccable.  Being the very first reviewer of this hotel and now, almost a year later, it really does feel like home away from home.  Best people, best hotel... hands down!  I LOVE the Homewood Suites in Irvine!!!  ‚ù§Ô∏è
Manager Response: Welcome Home LuckyLeo22!  You just put a huge smile on my face knowing that you have come back to visit us on several occasions.  Thank you for all the reviews of our property.  We try so hard to be "real" and "genuine" with all our  guests, so they do feel like they are staying in someones house.  Such a wonderful feeling when a guest comments like this and to know my staff is still just as warm as the day we opened.  We better see you again really soon and thanks again from the bottom of all our hearts.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This is our first time staying at Homewood Suites Irvine and we are very impressed with the cleanliness, the value, and the newness of everything. We usually stay at Marriott Springhill Suites and Courtyards Irvine but this Homewood is miles above the Springhill Suites.  Upon check in, front desk agent, Liz, assigned room 4430 to us overlooking the pool on the top floor and we loved this one bedroom suite. Thank you Liz for accommodating us with an early check in so we can rest up after an extremely early flight.  The room has 2 huge flat screens, it is so well insulated from  Lise so you can't hear any planes taking off or landing at all. The kitchen is spic and span with pot, pans, cutlery, toaster, coffee maker, and even dish detergent and a dishwasher.   We loved the bed and
Manager Response: Dear cliu,  What an awesome detailed review of the property.  Since these reviews only have user names, I think I might know who you are with all this detail...  There is so much detail and good information in the review, I actually read it twice to make sure I got all the notes.  Thank you so much for the detail and suggestions from your stay.  I really wish more people would do this because it only helps out hotel evolve.  Next time you come stay, please take the time to come say hi.  I will also make sure Liz gets a chance to see this, I am so proud of her doing such a great job.  Sincerely,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: I stayed at the hotel for a week while dropping my child off at nearby college. The hotel is excellent, clean and great staff. The complimentary breakfast was nice, wish it was open a little later during week. If your in the area for business I would highly recommend this hotel. However if your staying for vacation or leisure, I would stay somewhere else. The hotel is surrounded by businesses there are no restaurants or bars/lounges nearby. Also local restaurants close early like 9:00pm seemed like everything in area closed early. I guess I'm spoiled coming from N.Y where you can get anything at any hour. As for the hotel itself I have nothing bad to say about it. The beds are super comfy and although close to airport you don't hear the planes at all at night.
Manager Response: Dear Z8284WMmichaelf,  Coming from the city that never sleeps does being some expectations that maybe the city of Irvine can live up to, but we do our best.  We really appreciate the candid review of the hotel and the surrounding area.  I always mention in my comments to make sure and ask the front desk staff for area stuff.  I call them my Guest Service Professionals and they will do whatever they can to find a place for you in the area.  Thank you so much for posting a review and next time maybe we can find a place in the area that is open later for you New Yorkers!  Really appreciate the business.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Stay at a great hotel
Summary: Our family of 6 had a great stay in the 2 queen room with additional sofa bed.  Everything was clean, working, and comfortable.  The breakfast was great, and the evening social provided a dinner on a couple of nights.  Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Damian D,  So you got one of the "big" rooms?  I always try to describe to people how big our double queen suites and studios actually are, but no none gets it.  They are HUGE!  So glad your family was able to take advantage of the big room and all the amenities the hotel had to offer.  Thanks for the positive comments and hopefully you will recommend us to other people traveling our way.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: this is a nice hotel I will stay at this hotel again when in the area, hotel staff was very helpful and friendly. I enjoyed the evening reception all the wine and/or beer you want for the two hours allotted. Only downfall is the selection of breakfast items. They need to add a little more healthier options.
Manager Response: Dear T9364CYkathryns,  I see you mentioned the beer and wine???  It is always nice when you mention free alcohol when staying at a hotel.  Helps us and the guests in so many ways.  We also appreciate your comments about the breakfast, we are working with Homewood by Hilton Corporate on adding some options to our breakfast so we can remain consistent with the rest of the brand.  Thanks for the response.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: FANTASTIC crew and AWESOME property from front to back. The free amenities came in handy and made the stay that much more pleasant.  Breakfast was fresh and delicious everyday. Staff accommodating and friendly. Will definitely stay again when I visit Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Angie S,  Thank you so very much for the kind words regarding your stay with us here at Homewood Irvine.  When words like FANTASTIC and AWESOME are used to describe our team, it gives me chills.  So much gratitude for choosing to stay with us and hope to see you in Irvine again soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel and will definitely revisit next time.
Summary: The hotel is well maintained and staff are friendly and helpful. The pantry area providing coffee is a nice touch.  Rooms are very new, spacious and clean.  Coin laundry is convenient.  While I didn't use the pool or the basketball court, having it is a nice touch.  The surrounding area is quiet yet very close to freeway to get to other parts of LA.
Manager Response: Dear simontY1545BH,  Much gratitude for posting a review of your stay with us here at Homewood.  The team loves when they get mentioned and I always tell that the human element is the most important part of any guest's stay.  We really appreciate the kind comments and hope to see you again in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: We are just wrapping up an 8 night stay at this amazing property.  Very upscale, extremely clean, top notch service. Entire hotel is very well appointed.  Everything we wanted and more.  No complaints whatsoever.  No noise from anywhere, safe surroundings, convenient location.  An absolute winner.
Manager Response: Dear welltraveled2008,  Eight days with us?  Now that is a long stay.  Thank you for choosing us for your extended stay.  It is always nice to get feedback from our guests, especially the ones who stay so long and really get to know our hotel and the team.  Hopefully you will come back and see us on your next trip to Southern California.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: We will stay here again. Great Hotel :)
Summary: What can I say but this hotel is about 7 months new and it shows. It is a very clean and modern hotel that you will want to stay at. The staff and housekeeping was great while our 1 week stay here. The bed was very comfy and the living area is great too. I love the kitchen, full size fridge, and especially that it has a disposal (smart); most hotels that have a fully equipped kitchen doesn't have a disposal. The pool, basketball court, and game room are all great amenities to have especially when your stay is a week long; we made good use of them.   The hotel is centrally located to a variety food place and grocery stores (within 5-10 mins) that is very helpful. Breakfast was good and the staff presented and maintained a very clean area. Great Job! Happy Hour M-T was a bonus
Manager Response: Dear Lori L,  What amazing words for such an amazing stay you experienced with us.  Many thanks for the detailed review of your experience  with us.  Many people do not understand what a Homewood Suites by Hilton has to offer the customer, so thanks for mentioned all the cool amenities we have.   Thanks for spending a week with us and I sure you hope you were able to do everything you planned.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Everything and everyone's amazing that is untill you meet house keeping. They are very rude and god forbid you walk by them cleaning rooms. We had a few  incidents when we would hear them talk rudley about they're guests.
Manager Response: Dear Boop562,  I really appreciate you sharing your experience with us about your stay at Homewood Suites.  In case like this when you run into a situation regarding the behavior of team members, please immediately call a manager, or go to the front desk to report it.  I take every comment we get from our guests seriously, whether good or bad.  What you witnessed is a very serious thing and if you can call the hotel and ask for me, I would love to chat about what happen and what was said specifically.  We know what housekeepers are on what floors and the specific rooms they clean, so we can find out who you are claiming said rude things.  I truly want to get to the bottom of this, so please contact me if you have time.  Sincere apologies,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place for business or pleasure
Summary: Wonderful rooms and great service in a great central location.  Would go back anytime.  Nice to have both breakfast and dinner available and complimentary.  The only downside - if you travel for business, lot of families there while we were there.
Manager Response: Dear jamessO2998MM,  Just wanted to take a moment to thank you or not only staying with us but taking the time out of your busy schedule to give us a review.  Unfortunately, June and July are the summer months, so we do tend to have more leisure family travelers with us.  You are correct when saying that we are primarily a corporate business person hotel during the week.  Maybe next time, when you come to visit it will be a little quieter!  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Homewood Suites is located near SNA airport.  Check in was quick and easy.  Parking is free and the lobby is modern, big and clean.  Room was spacious with high comfy beds. I don't like the bathroom layout where the sink is outside the toilet/shower door. The shower water pressure is not as high.  Free breakfast buffet and nice sized 24hr gym.  Overall I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear  jnlv2trvl,  We appreciate the great review of your experience with us.  Nice to know everything went smoothly for you and thanks for mentioning the free parking.  A lot of hotels in the area charge for parking because we are so close to the airport. I am sorry to hear that the water pressure was not very good in the shower.  I will be sure to speak with my Chief Engineer to see if there is anything we can do about it.  Many thanks and hope to see you again really soon at another Homewood Suites by Hilton.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: My family and I stayed at Homewood suites for 1 night and were pleasantly surprised.  Check in was quick and easy, staff was very friendly, and the room was immaculate.  The decor was new and modern which is always a plus, the bed was comfortable also.  Parking was plentiful and free.  Overall a great stay and start to our vacation.
Manager Response: Dear branmuffin81,  Thank you so very much for reviewing our hotel.  Even though it was only 1 night, I was so happy to hear what a great impression we made on you.  Next time you will have to stay with us a little longer so you can enjoy everything we have to offer.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: The title says it all.  I would definitely stay here again. The staff was very welcoming.  The room was perfect, and we could not hear hallway noise, which is really important to us.  The beds were comfortable too.
Manager Response: Dear darryleowens,  Just wanted to send a quick shout out for taking the time to review your experience of our hotel.   Many thanks for the wonderful comments and hope to see you again in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Don't you just love nice surprises?
Summary: This hotel over delivered to a hotel snob...me.  From the moment Eric picked me up via the airport shuttle (with a beaming smile) until I checked out, this hotel did everything right.  Nice location and appearance, spotless rooms, and a very friendly staff. The GM, Paul Frecette, was there every time I turned around.  He pitches in, clearly sets a high standard and  leads by example.  Rooms are spacious with a lot of amenities.  The hotel is new and the entire facility is spotless. The social hour was a nice touch, and the friendliness of Paul and his entire staff made me feel so welcome that I actually chose to accept the invite...something that I normally would never do.  I highly recommend choosing this hotel, you won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear showmetexas,  Thank you so much!  I rarely get mentioned in reviews.  Eric and the rest of my team are just so amazing and make my job so easy.  Many thanks for taking to time out to recognize the hotel and our family.  We will treasure this one for sure.  From one hotel snob to another, the pleasure was all ours.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Exceeded Expectations! The hotel was very pleasant, great service, super friendly. Food was surprisingly good, rooms were immaculate. Enjoyed very much, would def stay there again. Stay in a room on the top floor overlooking the pool if possible. Great value.
Manager Response: Dear E2666DJemilyk,  Wow, thank you so much for the wonderful words about the hotel and the staff.  This is exactly what we strive for.  I will be sure to share this with the team.  Much gratitude from the team here at Homewood Irvine.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Excellent stay. Very professional and gracious staff. Hotel is only 6 months old so rooms are new and clean. Modern. Nice. Nice lobby and breakfast area. Close to Newport Beach where we were meeting family.
Manager Response: Dear fragrantlight,  Big shout out for taking the time after your family trip to give us a review.  We really appreciate the kind comments regarding the facility and team.   Hopefully the next time you come to visit family in Newport, you will try us again.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: From the guest service desk to the maintenance and housekeeping staff this hotel rocks friendliness and attention to detail. The hotel property is extremely clean. The gym was furnished with new equipment and there is actually room to move around so you are not bumping into other during a workout. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear michele42017,  Our fitness center is one of the coolest parts of the hotel, in my opinion. I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your experience with our staff members. We look forward to having you stay at our property again!  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This is a new hotel with and above average staff. The rooms are great for business or vacation. Close to the airport and many major attractions and businesses. Use the pool, hot tub, or basketball courts with plenty of room for everyone. Excellent value for the offering so wake up feeling well rested and well fed to start the day of meetings or pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear mlbski,  The outside areas of the hotel, including the pool, hot tub, and basketball court, are some of my favorite features of the property. It brings smile to my face knowing that you had an enjoyable stay. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future!  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This hotel provides top notch services with smiles on their faces. The hotel rooms are very nice and provide everything you need. The lobby area is a huge area that provides all kinds of meeting space. The breakfast each morning is top notch. The pool, basketball area, game room and grilling stations make this place unbeatable. Safe surroundings and close to many things in the area. The airport being close by does not bother the hotel. Will always book this hotel when we are in the area!
Manager Response: Dear James B,  Your review brings a smile to my face. The complimentary breakfast we offer is one of my favorite features, in particular, I absolutely LOVE the fresh waffles. Also, I too enjoy the grilling stations out by the pool. Thank you for your review and we look forward to you staying with us again!  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: The hotel was clean, well set up, in a convenient location and the staff were wonderful. The set up of the rooms were perfect for our large family. It's always wonderful to have a full size fridge and be able to do some basic meal prep rather than eating out all the time. My children commented on how lovely and kind all of the staff members were. We travel frequently and they have never said that before so I think it says a lot about the people working at this location.
Manager Response: Dear LauraBram33,  It's wonderful to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your kind words regarding our staff members. It's very rewarding to hear about your positive experience with our staff. We look forward to serving you again!  Paul Frechette General Manager
