Summary: Morgan at the Front Desk helped with me address problems with my reservations at the hotel. She was professional and owned the situation from beginning to end. Thank you!  Great hotel, close to many attractions in southern California.
Manager Response: Dear jasonhR6014IP,  We appreciate you reviewing your stay with us. Our staff takes pride in helping our guests with any and every problem/instance that comes up. It's wonderful to hear that Morgan was able to assist you during your stay. I will make sure to publicly recognize her for her service. Thank you and we hope to see you soon!  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel close to John Wayne Airport
Summary: Very clean and comfortable hotel. Breakfast daily and Dinner reception 4 nights a week was a pleasant surprise if you happen to be at hotel between 5-7pm. Definitely  recommend as it is close to everything.
Manager Response: Dear Donna W,  We appreciate you taking the time to review your stay with us. Our dinner reception, including free beer and wine, is a fantastic feature we offer here. We look forward to you staying with us again in the future!  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Home away from home in Homewood suites
Summary: Nicely designed rooms with fantastic bed and amenities such as free wifi and great hot breakfast. Best hotel staff in the business going the extra mile to make sure everyone is comfortable. We would come back in a heart beat. Thanks for a nice stay!
Manager Response: Dear ellent574,  I can't thank you enough for reviewing your stay with us! The free hot breakfast is one of my favorite features of our hotel, in particular, I LOVE the fresh waffles. Additionally, our staff is dedicated to making sure every guest's needs are fulfilled, hearing that you enjoyed the service our staff provided you with brings me a great deal of satisfaction. We look forward to you staying with us again soon at our property!  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Excellent bed, sheets, & comfort all in one! Everything is provided in the kitchen for your use. Bathroom/shower is very roomy! Overall excellent hotel for families! I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear gamin0s,  Thank you for reviewing our hotel. It's wonderful to hear that you had a great stay at our property. I also really enjoy the kitchen amenities and roomy bathroom/shower in the guest rooms, they make the rooms much more "home-y"! We look forward to see you again soon!  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Bad bedding issues - don't know if I will be back. Pillows were bad. Filled sheets were too small and had to be redone all through the night. Not sure if I would ever come back to this hotel or not. Internet connection was hard to establish, when I called the front desk about this, they seemed taken back that I couldnt get my ipad and iphone to connect so I went down to the front desk in order to get the problem solved.
Manager Response: Dear R6250GUrobertr,  We appreciate your review of the hotel and your stay.  Sorry for the delay in responding but I wanted to investigate all of your challenges before responding.  I am so sorry and a little embarrassed at what happen.  After speaking with the desk and housekeeping, I have ensured that if any of the issues mentioned about happen to one of our guests, to exercise Homewood's Suite Assurance policy and make sure you are taken care of.  Please accept my sincere apology for what happen and I sure hope you will try us out again.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Great location, close to freeways but away from noise.  Rooms are spacious.  Fire pit and outdoor patio wonderful spot after long day.  Highly recommend for families traveling or extended business trips.
Manager Response: Dear vegascruiser,  First of all.  I have to give you a shout out for the coolest user name so far this year.  I love Vegas and your user name makes me want to go back.  Thank you for the kind words about your stay.  We really appreciate everyone's time when they post.  Hope to see you and your family again really soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Having read the kind and thoughtful reviews of the hotel manager Paul on TripAdvisor, my family (including 4 young children) elected to stay at this hotel for 2 nights.  My son and I ran into Paul who greeted us both as he was picking up the lobby and engaged with other patrons. When management practices direct customer-centered care, it is notable throughout the hotel. The staff mirror Paul's positive energy and are equally helpful. Gabby, James, and Eric are a few of the friendly staff that went beyond our expectations to offer a warm greeting or extend a hand to make sure my family and I were well accommodated.  Rooms were clean, gym has filtered water and antibacterial wipes, breakfast was orderly and the variety was more than necessary, and just the attention to detail made
Manager Response: Dear gbarriosusc,  It was an absolute pleasure to meet you too.  In 24 years, this is the first time I have been recognized on Tripadvisor.com.  I am not one for recognition, but it sure does warm my heart a little.  You seem like an absolute joy when I met you and your son.    I will be sure to specially recognize all the team members mentioned in your comments.  Thank you so very much for choosing to stay with us and it is especially nice to know that someone actually reads my responses ;).   Hope to see you again same time next year.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: So far the best stay to play accommodations we have experienced. The room amenities helped with the varying schedules we had.  Being able to prepare meals kept expense manageable. Location is ideal with stores, restaurants and parks close by.
Manager Response: Dear Kennedy M,  Wow!  Best Experience??  Thank you so much from the bottom of my heart. It really means a lot and hopefully you will chose another Homewood Suites by Hilton in the next city you travel too.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Not only did this hotel met my expectation but the service went above and beyond to make both my family and I feel at home, the suite was great with 2 TV's one for my young kind and one that both my wife and I can watch, the living room and kitchen were perfect with a feeling of being at home, everything about this hotel was great..
Manager Response: Dear F318RMdavidn,  It was so nice to hear that my team went above and beyond for you.  The staff here works so hard every day to make our guests happy and they are under a clear understanding that every guest is important to us.  Thank you so much for reviewing your stay with us and hope to see you in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Arrived in Irvine for a 17 day business trip.  the location was very convenient to everything I needed during my stay.  There were a few hiccups with reservations, the hot tub and the internet but overall I highly recommend this facility.  the staff is excellent the rooms are beautiful and the hot tub is great to come back to after a long 12 hour day on your feet (when its working).  The pool area is a nice plus with multiple grills and beautiful surroundings.  Even tho the hotel is in the direct path of incoming flight traffic you don't even notice it.  Overall the hotel made me feel very relaxed.
Manager Response: Dear Angela T,  17 days with us?  Thank you so much for all that business.  We seem to be tailored to long term stay guests, plus it gives my staff to get to know you a little because your around so much.  I am sorry to hear you had a few hiccups, but I sure hope the team was able to take care of you.  By the sound of your review they certainly did.  Thanks again,  Paul Frechette

Summary: This hotel was amazing the evening social and daily breakfast was above the rest. I would recommend this hotel and as for the service and rooms I give them an A+. Will return for sure.The hotel was near the airport planes flying near , but you could not even hear them in the room at night like if they were not even there.
Manager Response: Dear B3137MMamandad,  Really appreciate the kind comments about our hotel and service.  Service is all about the people you hire and I love my team.  Many thanks and hope to see you again really soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: I would highly recommend this Hotel.  Extremely clean and friendly staff.  I would recommend this Hotel to family and friends.  The price was a very good value.  The separate kitchen and living room was nice.
Manager Response: Dear  laurawT5179KD,  Just wanted to send you a quick thank you message for reviewing your experience with us.  It really means a lot that you would recommend our little hotel to your friends and family.  Spread the word!  Thanks again.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This is an awesome hotel to stay at.  Amenities are great and staff is wonderful.  Hotel is very clean and can't beat their complimentary hot breakfast and dinner.  Would definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear C7051GMmichelleh,  We are going to hold you to what you said about returning J/K.  Much gratitude for taking the time to compliment us.  We really appreciate your business and hopefully will see at the same time next year.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: From the moment we walked in to check in to the time we checked out, the staff was super nice and friendly,they will ALWAYS greet you with a smile. The Breakfast does get crazy in the morning, the breakfast staff does it's best to keep up with the food and the messy people around breakfast area. My Kids had a great time at the pool. Husband and I loved out morning work outs at the gym. Rooms are cozy and so clean. We will sure go back to this location. This homewood suites location is sure home away from home. Thank You for a wonderful and warming stay.
Manager Response: Dear Ana B,  Seems like you had an all around great stay with us.  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay.  We really appreciate the mentioning of all our facilities because we are a "Focus" Service hotel, sometime people don't realize how much we actually have to offer and even better at one price.  Thanks again,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Stayed in a 2 Queen suite and the family loved it.  Beds were really comfortable & it was nice to be able to spread out in the amazingly clean and modernized room.  Used the stove to make spam musubis for our team and made use of the full size refrigerator/freezer to keep our fruits & ice cream.  Staff (front desk, housekeeping, and breakfast) was really friendly & professional in all of our interactions from early in the morning until late at night.  Laundry facilities were terrific.  By far the most machines and dryers of any hotels our teams have stayed in.  Our group made use of the game room on a nightly basis.  Highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area. Excellent value and location with Target, Walmart, & a bunch of great eating establishments within 5
Manager Response: Dear  Mapu S,  It was a pleasure having your team with us.  They were all a lot of fun and the best part for our other guests is that they were very respectful and behaved themselves, which we loved.  You are absolutely welcomed back next year.  Thanks for all the business, wonderful comments about the hotel and for singling out Brittany.  Our Sales Managers never get enough credit.  I will be sure to have her read this and recognize her or her efforts.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This was by far a perfect stay.  Couldn't ask for more. We booked a suite and it was more than we expected. Had a little trouble checking in because we had booked through a 3rd party 2 month prior. Our information wasn't found but the manager gave us a cheap rate when we booked it. If your thinking about getting breakfast, good luck. Impossible. Other than that. The hotel met their expectations.
Manager Response: Dear  jrod3031,  We really appreciate the candid feedback regarding your check in and breakfast.  We were so glad to hear that you had a great stay, but I am especially happy to hear that the lady at the front desk was able to check you in with no problem, even though we could find your information.  I tell my team all the time, everything is not going to go 100% smooth all the time, it is our ability to make it right immediately and please the guest that will set us apart from the rest. It seems like you your case we were able to do that.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: The only issue I had was that I had to wait 45mins passed the time of check in time bec our room wasnt ready.  This hotel seems to be very busy because it's always fully booked.  They might need to hire extra housekeeping staff to make it on time for check in time.
Manager Response: Dear 1Point,  Thanks for the recommendation and review regarding your stay with us.  I can tell you, that June and July are our busiest time of the year and although we guarantee a 3pm check in, when we have every guest check out right at noon, there are times it can be difficult getting all the rooms ready for the next wave of check ins.  We are working on a system to better report rooms to the front desk, so guest do not have to wait.  I am so sorry to here that you had to wait, but we appreciate your understanding so much.  Next time, we will get you in on time.  Thanks again.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: My kids enjoyed swimming and playing basketball wry nice fireplace and equipped with 24/7 laundry with gym and game room access and also a place do do work. The room is so neat and elegant looking.we would love to stay in this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear  Aileen B,  Kids seem to really like it here.  Between our board games at the desk, the game room, pool and sports court, it seems like there is always something to do when you are back relaxing at the hotel.  Family's also love it here because of the size of our rooms.  Sleeping 6 comfortably is a rarity at hotels now a days.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: We recently took a long vacation, staying in a number of hotels.  We stayed in two Homewood Suites, one on the East Coast and one on the West Coast.  Both were our favorite by far.  Super nice suites, beautiful facilities, great breakfast, most beloved by my boys was the basketball court.  Also affordable through Travelocity.  Accommodated our family of 6 in one room nicely.  The pull out beds were actually comfy.
Manager Response: Dear Mike Amiee S,  I see Homewood Suites represented!  Traveling cross the country?  That must have been a long trip?  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your experience with us.  Next time, remember, if you are a Hilton Honors Member, you can go directly to our website and book anywhere from 5-10% less than any other website.  Might help if you are on a budget.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Outstanding staff, incredible mattress & great suite
Summary: My first time staying at a Homewood Suites. This is a brand new property and the rooms are nicely appointed. The mattress is so incredibly comfortable. Slept like a baby! The entire staff were friendly and helpful. Highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Dear 214meredythj,  It was nice to hear that we were your first Homewood Suites stay and so glad you enjoyed it.  The one rate that includes everything i such a huge savings and big deal to our customers.  We really appreciate you business and hopefully you will choose another Homewood Suites where ever your next trip takes you.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: The hotel was the amazing.  We had a two bedroom suite.  It was so nice that we could have moved in.  The breakfast was the best breakfast we have ever had in an free breakfast included hotel (and better than many breakfasts that we have paid for).  They had fresh raspberries and blueberries and they were delicious.  They had eggs omelets out that my nephew did not want to eat, so we ask for scrambled eggs and they made it for him.   The pool area was very nice.  They had a fire pit.  All around it was a great hotel.
Manager Response: Dear supbear,  We so much appreciate you taking the time to post a review of your experience with us.  The breakfast is such a great amenity included in the room rate.  The request for the scrambled eggs was our pleasure.  Thank you for staying with us.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Great experience all around. Had everything we needed and the pool was a great place to relax. The breakfast offered several hot choices and the beds were very comfortable. Very clean inside and out. Will visit again if the opportunity arises. Easy access to highway.
Manager Response: Dear,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel.  Honestly, it is so hard for me not to eat the breakfast everyday I love it so much.  We really appreciate your busines and hope to see you again soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Excellent hotel with a great price. Rooms were large and kitchette had everything. Friendly and professional staff. Workout room is sufficient in size. Complimentary breakfast was awesome. Mahalo & Aloha!
Manager Response: Dear waynemJ732CK,  Aloha right back to you guys.  I would assume you were with one of the sports team with us last week.  Thank you so much for the wonderful review.  We hope the team did well and the team members here couldn't stop talking about how cool your uniforms were.  Hope to see you again same time next year.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This hotel is so great. Free dinner social, free breakfast, amazing rooms and lobby. We cancelled our hotel on pch and ended up here. From now on this will be our go to hotel. Super clean rooms and helpful staff.
Manager Response: Dear robynr750,  I heard how expensive hotels on Pacific Coast Highway can be, we were so happy to hear that you cancelled your reservation with them and stayed with us.  It drives our competitive spirit.  Next time you stay with us, please make sure you come by the desk so I can get a chance to meet you.  Thank you so much for the review and have a great 4th of July!  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Exceptionally clean rooms & overall establishment. Super friendly staff, very accommodating, great amenities. Convenient location  Close to the freeway and also shopping. We will definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Marti S,  These are adjectives my entire team loves to hear.  I will be sure to share you positive comments about your experience with the entire staff in tomorrow's morning meeting.  We really appreciate you taking the time to review the hotel and hope to see you again soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This was a very nice place to stay,rooms were clean and the staff was very nice.It was a really nice for my son which needed to workout daily,basketball court/fitness center was enough to keep him happy.This hotel is located in a business didstrict so there was not a lot of people just hanging around ,that was great!You will need a vehicle to be able to go out and eat..Overall it was a very nice place and was only 5-6 months old.This will be my spot when in CALI.
Manager Response: Dear Gerald J,  Love the comment, "This will be my spot when in CALI".  I like the ring of that.  By the way, next time you stay, have your son challenge me to a little one on one over at the sportscourt.   Many thanks from the team here at Homewood Suites for the wonderful words about your stay with us.   Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: You would think with a title like Broken Toilet, my review would be negative, but it's not...   My stay was for two nights at June...  we were mostly out of the hotel most of the day and we came back for sleeping...  1st night, toilet flushed slow, but didn't think much of it until morning after... it was not working properly... we've called and they unclog...  upon our return 2nd day it clogged again...  and this was around 8pm and hotel was full for the evening... With my two young kids at tow, I had to take them to 1st floor hallway bathroom every time and it was frustrating and starting to get angry...   But without my ask, they approached me and said they will just compensate the night...  I understand things break and it is what it is and making it somewhat easier to deal
Manager Response: Dear  kxp6751,  I am so sorry to here about the issue with your toilet.  As I have said in past reviews, there is no company that can run 100% efficient all the time, it is our ability to service recovery with our guests and make sure they are completely 100% satisfied is what separates the good hotels from the great ones.  I am so blessed with s team that understands that.  Thank you so much for the review and kind comments.  We hope to see you again really soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This hotel is a wonderful surprise. The rooms are spacious, extremely clean and comfortable and all the staff that I encountered were amazing. They put even the top rated luxury hotels to shame with their positive attitude and general helpfulness. Parking is free and breakfasts were varied and fresh.  While Zee, Eric and Sherry were particularly outstanding, so were the people who helped in the restaurant - which was VERY busy indeed. For a busy and tired traveller, while the facilities are important, it is the people that make the difference. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Pam B,  While we appreciate all the reviews we get, ones like this are extra special.  Thank you so much for the warm comments about the team here.  We know all hotels have about the same amenities and I constantly preach to them that they, the people in the hotels are the difference makers.  I will be sure the meet with Zee, Eric and Cherie individually and thank them for their efforts as well as the Food and Beverage Team.  Big thanks,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Was nice And clean,  Friendly staffs, was great experience, love the basketball court and pool area, was closed to shops and restaurants, would  definitely go back and stay there again   Plenty of parking
Manager Response: Dear 497geraldined,  Thanks for taking the time to share your experience with us. Next time your out here, we will have to play some one on one or horse out at the sport court.  Much gratitude,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: I stayed here for four nights and was very impressed.  As a newly anointed Hilton Honors member I had never stayed at a Homewood Suites before.  Boy I definitely will stay at one again if they are all like this. Loved my experience here Pros:  Tip top shape property - well maintained, lots of modern amenities  Pool was great, plenty of comfy chairs and towels Breakfast/happy hour was great!  I'm used to other branded hotels buffets with minimal food selections;  these were both with real food and multiple choices.  The free wine was a cherry on top - very nice touch  Rooms were amazingly spacious- huge kitchen and bathrooms with lovely amenities throughout from soap to coffee to bottle of water at check in Room temperature controls were all in working order and I love love the
Manager Response: Dear Brklynrider,  Thank you so much for the detailed review of your stay with us.  I really appreciate all the small details as that is exactly what we are looking for from our guests.  I will be checking into the reason why your room was not serviced and have a discussion with the Executive Housekeeper.  Thanks for the ideas about the Suite Shop, I will be having the front desk staff asking for more feedback from our guests about the wine "splits".    WE really appreciate your business and hope to see you again really soon.  Congratulations on your new Hilton Honors Membership too!  Welcome to the family!  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This property is nice. You can tell it's brand new but some things needed to be addressed. Toilet was broken and would not flush. When we arrived in our room after a 7 hr drive, there was bloody tissues on the floor. Breakfast on the weekends is a nightmare because the food was always low, no oatmeal and no silverware or plates. They serve pretty much the same thing everyday, there's really no variety. The pool and work out room we're great! Room was spacious and beds were comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Suzanne S,  Thank you for the review of your experience at the Homewood Suites Irvine John Wayne Airport.  By researched the comment card you submitted through our direct channels, we took into account your stay date.  We sincerely apologize for any challenges you had during your stay and we want to take them time to let you know that we looked into everyone of your allegations.  We take every review seriously and try to make the best of it and improve whatever feedback we get.  You stayed with us the first weekend of the "summer" season which means our busiest time of the year.  Irvine and the surrounding Orange County area has numerous sporting tournaments as well as leisure guests traveling to the surrounding attractions.  We did staff every weekend for the summer to try and avoid the breakfast getting so busy.  I myself was here that weekend and I will agree that the breakfast did get very busy at times.  As with any buffet, we try to control an prepare as best we can.  Hopefully if we did run low on something, it was replaced pretty quick with a smiling and eager team member.  AS for the claim of a "bloody" napkin in the room.  I immediately notify the Executive Housekeeper of your claim.  We are sincerely sorry for the napkin being left in the room, which is something we take seriously.  After investigating the substance on the napkin, it was not blood, thank goodness.  But there is still not excuse for the room not being 100% clean and we do sincerely apologize for that as well as the toilet running slowly just after you checked in.    Thank you so much for your feedback.  This is something we wish more guests would do.  Advice for any guest staying with us in the future, if you ever have any issues with your stay, please bring it up to any team member and allow us the time to fix it during your stay, so we can b sure you are 100% satisfied with your stay.  Much gratitude,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This new (at the time of this review) Homewood Suites in Irvine, CA offers restful, comfortable accommodations with clean, spacious common areas (lobby/meals/meeting rooms/business center/etc.) Staff of every dept. are professional, courteous, and consistent with their service. The room during our stay, along with its amenities, make any length of stay a relaxed and energized one. Bathrooms are clean, efficient, and contemporary. The kitchenette details, down to providing ample dishes, glassware, and silverware, were a nice touch compared to other Homewood Suites that we have stayed at. The location is prime, being close to all commercial areas, restaurants, and major freeways to get to where you need to be. The complimentary hotel shuttle is also convenient and much appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear spursfamily13,  Talk about a detailed thorough review!  It is so appreciated when someone takes the time to give a detailed review of our hotel.  We know how many people come to this site to read reviews and reading a review like this, makes me want to stay here.  A huge thanks to you and your family for choosing our hotel.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Very tasteful and cool looking decor, enormous well-appointed common area for dining, immaculate clean, and good coffee 24 hours.  My kind of place.  Love it. Not cheap but you get what you pay for. Would recommend without hesitation.
Manager Response: Dear George S,  Can you be one of our marketing and public relations people?  I could have not said it better myself.  Wow, thank you for the kind words, they really mean a lot.    Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: I stayed for business purposes. Very convenient location. Loved the rooms and all the amenities it provided. Would definitely consider staying here in the future for business or personal. Highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear Missy A,  Just a quick shout out for taking the time to recognize the hotel.  Traveling on business I would hope you choose us again in the near future???  Next time you stop by, please come by the desk and I would love to get a chance to meet you face to face.  Thanks for the business,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Excellent accommodations and staff! Everyone was very helpful and friendly. The rooms are spacious, clean and very contemporary. The bathroom is divided into 2 spaces which works very well. Big clothes closet. Great value for money.
Manager Response: Dear joandH9219UD,  Just wanted to drop a quick thanks to you for taking the time to review our hotel after your stay.  Having a new product is great , but the personality of the staff is what makes a Hotel come alive.  Appreciate your comments and feedback.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This stay was a very pleasant one! The staff was always around and willing to help anyway they could ! Great service for the money ... would highly recommend! The beds and pillows were awesome ! Walmart a short distance away made the day ! Liz
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth N,  I love the opening of your caption (Hard the Beat!).  It made me warm inside knowing how much you appreciate our hard work and customer service efforts.  So much gratitude for the hospitality you have shown us by posting this review.  I will be sure to share this with the entire team.  Thanks for choosing us.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This hotel hosted our softball league. Our league really injoyed our stay their. The rooms were really nice. It was great having a full kitchen. The pool area was nice with lots of seating and BBQ's to doi our own cooking. Also the basketbal courts were a nice addition. Gym looked really nice, even though I didnt get to use it.
Manager Response: Dear G6021NHjonc,  You are definitely a "recreational" family.  Thanks for pointing out all the different activities around the hotel.  I think the only one you did not forget is our "game room" with shuffle board and a billiard table.  So nice to hear that the softball team had a great stay.  Hope fully next year we will see you around the same time of year.  Take care!  Paul Frechette  General Manager

Summary: Hotel was new, modern, clean and well run. The only issue we had was the complimentary breakfast was under staffed ... ran out of food towards the end of each morning, especially on the weekends when the hotel was crowded with families. The food was good and there was a good selection and variety over our 11 day stay.
Manager Response: Dear 524wh,  11 nights with us?  That is awesome.  I am surprised our paths did not cross during your stay with us.  You were practically family.Thank you for the recommendation about breakfast.  During our summer season breakfast can get very busy on the weekends.  Currently we have an extra manager there every weekend through the end of summer to help the team out.  We really your business and feedback.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: The staff was very friendly, kind and attentive. The hotel was very clean with friendly atmosphere. It was in a good location for our needs. The room was also very clean, roomy and comfortable. The breakfasts were very good with a good variety of food choices.
Manager Response: Dear leonar315,  Thank you taking the time after your trip to review your experience with us.  The staff always amazes me with all the comments they get.  We really appreciate all the feedback our guests give us.  Hope to see you again in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This hotel is very accommodating and welcoming, especially during the business week ~ Monday through Thursday with the evening social reception. Good breakfast selection and very clean hotel. Even though it is close to the airport, we did not hear planes during the evening and nighttime hours.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra W,  Thank you so much for the quick review of our hotel and your experience with us.  It is always nice to know that people take advantage of our meal periods.  Guest love it because it is all included in the rate.  I will be sure to share the review with the team and we sure hope to see you in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Very comfortable hotel room with a fully functional kitchen. All facilities seemed brand new. Staff is super friendly! Complimentary evening reception and hot breakfast with so much variety were both delicious and the staff was always on their toes refilling stuff. Also, kids loved the basketball courts and the game room with the pool table and shuffleboard. Excellent value for money!  Would definitely come back!
Manager Response: Dear Sonali M,  It was so nice to hear that your kids took advantage of the recreational stuff around the hotel and the fact that you had a great stay.  It is nice as a hotel manager being able to have everything inclusive of the rate because the guest never feels like they are being "nickeled and dimed".  Thank you so much for taking the time after your family trip to review our hotel and the staff.  I will be sure to share your experience and thoughts with everyone on the team.  Paul Frechette Genereal Manager

Summary Heading: Not as good as other Homewood Suites
Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights at the second half of our vacation. At first we thought it was nice, similar to the Homewood in Anaheim which we enjoyed. But then we started to notice the differences. The fake eyelash in my fresh towels (I don't wear fake eyelashes). There is ZERO water pressure we asked to have the shower checked out and they said bad news for you this is normal for this hotel. So our 5 minute showers turned 20 minutes trying to wash shampoo out of our hair. Breakfast was not good and that's being kind. The weekdays there are not a lot of people here just some executives so it's easy to get your breakfast quickly, highlight was making waffles (but there is only two waffle machines which becomes a problem on the weekend). Breakfast is very salty and not tasty at
Manager Response: Dear Joanna M,  First and foremost,  I am so sorry and my deepest apologies for the challenges you faced during breakfast this past Saturday.  As I read your review, I made sure to come in early today to meet with the breakfast staff to find out what happen.  The said it was much busier that past weekends with a lot of families.  We take every review of our hotel seriously whether good or bad.  Every time we receive a critical review, I ensure that positive changes are made, so be sure that I will be re-evaluating out staffing on the weekends to make sure this doesn't happen again.  As for the water pressure, we have not heard too much about that since opening.  I will do my best to try and find out what room you were in, so I can have my maintenance team check the shower.  It really means a lot when a guest takes the time to review the hotel, so we appreciate your comments.  It guests did not let us know what is happening, sometimes there is no way of know what and how to correct something.  A sincere apology from the staff and I for what you experienced this past Saturday and rest assured we will be making some changes to help the staff.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Excellent newer facilities that were much better than most older Homewood Suites I have stayed in!  Staff was extremely helpful and food at evening social and breakfast was good quality.  Nice sized outdoor pool for swimming laps.
Manager Response: Dear 155edwardsl,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us here at Homewood Irvine.  We really appreciate you taking the time to review your experience with us.   I will be sure to mention to my team that you appreciate the staff's service.  Although we are anew hotel, we want to maintain our service levels for years to come.  We really appreciate your comments and hope to see you again really soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: It was a Friday night check in stay until Monday afternoon. Breakfast was ready as advertised on line. Fitness room was fresh and clean as if no one had every used it(lol)  The exstablishment was beautiful and warm welcoming.
Manager Response: Hi Chocolate d,  Thank you for the kind review!  Glad you had chance to check out our fitness center!  It still smells brand new but it's well utilized.   We hope to have you return in the future and I'll be sure to have some gym towels ready!   Have a great day!   Best Regards, David Arriola  Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: New Hotel all new top of the line fitness  equipment.    Very nice half court for a Basket Ball game. Breakfast and dinner/social included. New computers in the business center.You can't beat that.. -DAY ONE-just 15-20 min. To DISNEYLAND CALIFORNIA .This was a very fun day. -DAY TWO-15-20 min drive to CALIFORNIA ADVENTURE theme park. -DAY THREE-A 15 min drive to  NEW PORT BEACH /BALBOA FUN PARK.,toured the bay on a local tour boat. -DAY FOUR- visited SOUTH COAST PLAZA ,The largest Mnall in So. CAL, only a 10 min. drive.. WHALE WATCHING trip also only a 10 min. drive. This is just the right distance to every  thing and every where. Started with a good breakfast and ended a dinner and a social ,followed by the pool at night. My family and i are already planing next year. The best
Manager Response: Dear Louis N,  Seems like you had quite a great trip!  Thank you so much for mentioning how we are centrally located to all the Orange County Attractions.  So many people don't realize how big Orange County is and John Wayne Airport is so central to everything.    We are so glad you had such an awesome trip and we really hope you choose another Homewood the next time to take a trip with the family.  Sincere thanks,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Clean hotel.  Spacious rooms.  Comfortable beds.   Kitchen was nice.  Lots of cable channels.  Laundry facility was appropriate for the size of the hotel.  Easy access and in a good area.   Good luck getting to use the BBQ grill.  During our 3 day stay, the same group just camped out at the grill area for 6 hours each day with their obnoxious children and friend's children (about 40 people in all).  Kids hanging on the lifts for the disabled.  They also left their trash everywhere. Breakfast quality was good, but they stop stocking breakfast items about 30 minutes before breakfast ends, so make sure to go early.  We did not get hot food 2 of the 3 days we were there.  Caroline at the front desk was very helpful once I told her about the problems we had.
Manager Response: Dear 758janal,  First and foremost, a sincere apology for the leisure guests at the pool.  It was a Holiday weekend and guests like to lounge at the pool.  In this case it was a birthday celebration that lasted the entire weekend.  I was glad to hear that Caroline took good care of you and that the rest of your stay went well.  It means a lot for you to take the time to review our performance and specially recognize her for her efforts.  Thanks again,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: The building facade and grounds were clean and new.  Cherie at the front desk made us feel very welcome when we entered the lobby.  Our room was spacious and clean.  With free parking, a weight room, pool table area, swimming pool, plus free breakfast and dinner, we honestly couldn't have been happier with our stay.  I travel for business all the time, and I primarily stay at Hilton properties.  This is my second time staying at a Homewood Suites - both times were great.  Alone for business or with my family, Homewood Suites is now my hotel of choice.  Actually, it's more like a timeshare than a hotel, which is really cool.  Thanks Homewood Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Eric G,  Cherie is an awesome Front Office Manager and the fact that she was again mentioned this week in reviews just shows how good her customer service skills actually are.  Thank you for reviewing the hotel and the fact that you travel all the time and took the time to recognized Cherie and spell her name correct means a lot.  Sure hope to see you again soon so we are able to repeat your experience with us.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Over all stay was excellent! Hotel is still fairly new and it's got a great feel to it. Staff is very attentive, and the
Summary: Over all stay was excellent! Hotel is still fairly new and it's got a great feel to it. Staff is very attentive, and the Room is great home like feel to it. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area.
Manager Response: Dear luispW2604XR,  Our team really appreciates you taking the time out of your busy schedule to review our hotel.  I will be sure to share your comments with the team and hope to see you again i the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Will absolutely recommend this hotel to anyone! My experience was at this location was great. At check in Cheri was really helpful we need more people like her that enjoy what they do and makes you feel welcomed!!
Manager Response: Dear K8684IZmiguelm,  So many members of my team have been recognized over the last few weeks. Just shows how blessed I am to have such an awesome staff.  This hotel would not be what it is without the personalities working here.  We really appreciate the direct recognition and I will be sure to share with Cherie the next time she works.  Much gratitude!  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Amazing Front Desk Staff.  Morgan and Liz were my favorite.  They were both so kind and made me feel right at home.   Eric took me and my husband to the airport in the shuttle and was so cheerful and friendly.  We loved staying here and will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear morganqs,  Comments about our staff and service is what we hold near and dear to our hearts.  Ultimately, hospitality is all about the service you received and the warm and friendly vibe you get when you stay at a hotel.  I will be personally be sharing these comments with them.  Thank you so much for staying with us but even more for taking the time to review the hotel and our team.    Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: I'm very satisfied with the cleanliness of my suite. It almost seem like I'm alone on the 4th floor because it was so quiet.  Breakfast was good. I wish I had more time to use their amenities like the pool and the fitness room. I will definitely book here again when I return in this area.
Manager Response: Good Day Mae R,  Thank you for reviewing us on Tripadvisor!  We value your feedback and happy to hear that you had a great stay!  Aww to read about how quiet our floors are makes me extremely proud.   As a fellow traveler, I understand the importance of getting the rest and relaxation that we all deserve!   Stop by the pool and fitness next time you are in town!  You'll really enjoy it!     Till next time!   Best Regards, David Arriola Director of Sales & Marketing  Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine John Wayne Airport

Summary: This hotel was extremely beautiful, well-designed, and brand new! The staff was pleasant and helpful to accommodate our heeds, and make us feel at home. Great location near JW Airport, South Coast Plaza, and access to the 405 to head back up to LA. Completely recommended!
Manager Response: Good Day nnolaa!    Thank you for the review about our beautifully designed hotel!  We love it and I'm happy to hear you did as well.  What I love the most about your review is that you recognized our team members and their helpfulness!   We take that very seriously and ensure our team is trained and provided the tools to make your stay memorable.  Is it safe to say that we accomplished that?  I think so!  Please think of us next time you are in the area!  We would be privileged to have you back.    Wish you the best,  David Arriola Director of Sales & Marketing  Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine John Wayne Airport

Summary: Great location and value.  Very close to Irvine, Newport Beach business and social activities.  Very friendly, attentive staff that is always available.  Morning/Evening complimentary food, drink a plus.  Suites have full kitchen included and lots of room.
Manager Response: Good Day L6149XZjohnb,  Thank you for the kind review!  I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed our location and value!  Don't you just love the all-inclusive experience?   Top that off with a friendly team and BOOM!  You have the Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine John Wayne Airport!   We hope to welcome you back soon!    Best Regards,  David Arriola Director of Sales & Marketing Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine/John Wayne Airport

Summary: Wonderful experience!  Our suite was gorgeous and plush, the staff was friendly and engaging, the breakfast was a veritable feast with many options--both hot and cold.  They even serve a light dinner on weeknights.  The furnishings and bathroom were lovely and the bed was the best I've ever slept on.  In fact I looked under the sheets to see what type of bed it is because I want to replace my own bed and would love one like it.  I know this review sounds so hyperbolic but I honestly can think of anything bad to say about our experience.  I would have expected the cost to be twice as much as we paid for the quality we received.  The hotel is only 4 months old and everything sparkles.  We'd go there again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Dear Mayflower,   We were so happy to see how impressed you were with our hotel. We love being able to provide all of these extra amenities without having to charge more than the sticker price. And I know, who doesn't love a cloud like mattress? A good night's rest does wonders. If you would still like to purchase a mattress from Serta, the phone number is +1 (877) 468-3540. If you would like anymore information feel free to give us a call. We hope you have the chance to visit again.   Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: I always stay at Homewood Suites when I travel for business. This is the nicest one yet. The evening social was similar to any Homewood, but always appreciated at the end of a long day.  The hotel was beautiful. The bed was extremely comfortable, and the shower? Heavenly.
Manager Response: Dear F3355KUmitch,  Thank you for your loyalty to the Hilton brand! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and were able to catch some rest and unwind. Comforting beds and long showers can remedy almost anything you may encounter on a business trip. And yes, the complementary light dinners, beer, and wine can definitely make the day less stressful. We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Paul Frechette  General Manager

Summary: I was not dropped off at curb side check in at the airport and was left to haul, and carry all my luggage across the street, thru the downstairs baggage claim and up the airport all the way down to the other end of the airport to reach my airline to check my bags. I was told they didn't have the kind of 'permit' that allowed them to drop me off at check-in . I made my flight, but this left me very disappointed with my overall experience when I left.
Manager Response: Good Day A4039SMnicoleh,  Thank you for this review.   I'm so sorry to hear about the inconvenience you experiences toward the end of your trip.  Please allow me an opportunity to make this right by contact me directly at davida@dknhotels.com or by phone at 949-577-9206.  Best Regards,  David Arriola Director of Sales & Marketing  Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine John Wayne Airport

Summary: Hotel was new, clean and very nice. They have free dinner -M to T- (5 to 7 pm) with 3 choices of wines and one main dish that change by the day.  Free delicious breakfast with fresh fruits!  Suites come with sofa bed that can be useful, also full kitchen with dishwasher and fridge. They even buy the grocery for you if needed (free of charge, you pay for groceries of course).  Two big screen TVs  The only complaint we had was that we couldn't stay longer! :D  Check the AAA and ARPP discounts, they are worthy!
Manager Response: Dear Jorge L,   Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We were happy to see your appreciation of our hotel's cleanliness and home away from home feel. Yes, our sofa beds are life saviors for our big families. As a family person, I really love that all the rooms have a queen sofa bed as they allow you to fit another two people in the room free of charge. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope that we will see you again.   Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: I love the place..it's a mile away from Walmart and other fast food chains...staff are very helpful and accomodating. Room was clean..parking was never an issue for me..I can see the sunrise in my room.
Manager Response: Dear Rizza A,  Thank you so much for the comments regarding your stay with us.  Yes, Walmart is the number one place our long term guests love to shop at and "The District" is just a 5 minute drive with all sorts of shopping and restaurants.    We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Prompt Maintenance and front Desk service
Summary: - I made a call to maintenance about my shower not draining and with out hesitation! also had an issue with the shower door which was also fixed in a timely manner. i just wanted to thank Eric And Carlos for the Hard work and positive enthusiasm. I stayed in room 2235. Robert Fresques
Manager Response: Dear rmfresques,  What a response time!!!  I am happy to hear that your shower issue was addressed promptly, but even better wit great customer service too.  Thank you for recognizing Eric and Carlos, they will be so excited.  I might even have a little incentive for them because of the name mention.  Thanks for your loyalty and hope to see you again soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: They hotel is brand new it's small but very nice the evening social was a treat a nice way to wind down convenient location to the airport. Staff was super friendly rooms were big enough for a family of four! Even the sofa bed was comfortable to sleep on!
Manager Response: Dear K1159ZIashleys,  Thank you for staying with us and for the wonderful comments about your stay.  We appreciate the support and comments regarding the staff. Hope to see you again.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: We had an excellent week in Orange County.  This hotel was centrally located to everything we wanted to do and Itwas quiet, clean and new.  We couldn't have been happier with our choice in Homewood Suites for accommodations.
Manager Response: Dear L1403GPlisah,  So glad to hear that you were happy with your stay with us here at Homewood Irvine.  Thank you for sharing your review and we appreciate the positive support.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: They have Excellent service it's a g reat hotel the breakfast was surprisingly very good unlike most hotels the only bad thing is the location it's kind of hidden away but other than that everything else is great
Manager Response: Dear 20arnelah,  I agree, the breakfast here is pretty abundant compared to any other hotel that does not charge for a buffet breakfast.  Again, people who stay here appreciate the fact that we do not charge for breakfast or social hour.  Thank you so much for the positive comments.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This is a new hotel and the staff are very eager to please.  I found them quite helpful.  The location is wonderful if you have business in area, eating and things to do.  Very easy to get in and out of for business meetings as close to highway.  Shopping and lots of restaurants are less than 7 minutes away.  If you want Disney it is an easy 20 minute drive.  We went to Newport and Laguna Beach which was less than 20 minutes and worth every minute.  Strongly recommend the hikes in Newport Beach!  Shopping in Laguna is amazing for little arts and niche stores.
Manager Response: Dear barbaramJ277KC,  Thank you so much for staying with us, but also for sharing your experience with others.  We spend so much time trying to market the fact that we are centrally located to everything in Orange County and people thing that because we are by the airport and in the middle of a business park, that we are not accessible to all the Southern CA attractions.  Nice to have a live account that we are.  Thank you so much for the review and hopefully you will choose us again.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: My parents and I stayed here to be close the airport. It was very easy to get to and we were very pleased with how helpful and friendly the staff was. They helped with directions, food, and made check out a breeze.
Manager Response: Dear 331summerb,  Just wanted to send a quick note to say thank you for review the hotel.  Nice you hear that you and your parents had plenty of room and a great time with us.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Fast, friendly, courteous staff.  Convenient to the airport.  Modern rooms with modern amenities.  Homewood suites is always a great home-away-from-home, and the team at this particular branch made the experience even better.
Manager Response: Dear dylanm740,  I will be sure to tell the team that you appreciated their "Home Away from Home" efforts.  Thank you so much for the kind words.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Good Hotel, but very weak, tasteless, coffee, no "bold" options
Summary: Good hotel, but has some kinks to work out as with all new hotels.  Bed was comfortable, our room was mostly clean, but the top of our fridge was extremely dusty and someone else's old room key was sitting on top of the fridge caked in the dust too.  Requested that the top of the fridge be cleaned at the front desk to no avail.  Wrote the maid a note the next day and she cleaned it.   Breakfast offered a good, tasty, variety.  Bagels, muffins, bread, four kinds of cereal, hot oatmeal, yogurt, fresh fruit, waffles.  Sausage, eggs, potatoes, etc., with variations each day which was appreciated.  Veronica was a sweetheart coming around to the tables clearing off your dirty dishes, friendly and polite.  Best service!  That gal deserves a raise. Couldn't say that about the Manager's
Manager Response: Dear travels_frequently,  Wanted to reach out to you and thank you for the detailed review of our hotel and your stay.  Wish more guests would leave us this much detail as it gives us clues about how to improve our services.  Thank you for the comments about the room, the breakfast and Veronica.  I will be sure to give her some special recognition because you mentioned her specifically by name.  What we really appreciate, is your attention to detail about the social hour, the room cleanliness and the coffee in the rooms.  It enables me to go back with the team and review what you saw and critique the staffs services and behaviors based on a guest's feedback.  Also, a chance to review and train our housekeeping staff on what to clean and look for in the guest rooms.  Lastly, I am sincerely sorry that you did not enjoy the coffee in the rooms.  This review has been sent over to our ownership group for review.  While I cannot guarantee the coffee will be changed, I can guarantee that our owners love guest feedback and seriously consider recommendations.  We will be taking a good look into this as we know coffee is the morning fuel for so many people.  Thanks again so much for your candid feedback and know that it will not go unnoticed.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: We had to find a place to stay because of some repairs at our home.  We stayed at a competitor's hotel for about 10 days and it was AWFUL.  We moved to this hotel for almost 2 weeks, and it was a WONDERFUL experience.  The place was clean, bright, comfortable and filled with a staff of kind, caring and compassionate people.  The breakfast option was terrific.  The gym was complete and clean.  Everything about our stay at this hotel was excellent.  On some levels, we were almost sad to leave...it was so convenient!
Manager Response: Dear pjg0506,  I am so sad to hear that you had a bad experience at another hotel, but at the same time I am so glad you chose our hotel to stay at.  It especially means a lot when you say things like you did about our staff.  It means so much to us when the staff is recognized in a special way.  We would love to see you again in the near future.  Thanks for choosing us.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Currently on my last night of a five night stay and I don't want to leave. I am so glad I booked this hotel, for a number of reasons: the free breakfast every morning is great, the employees are super nice, check in was a breeze, the pool area is peaceful, very close to the airport, close to shopping and restaurants, the room is new and spacious, beds are comfortable, hotel is quiet even with the number of planes, ample parking and it's free.  I'm already sad about having to leave in the morning.  A note for Homewood Suites - please keep the parking complimentary, this was a major selling point for me and not common for the area...it is very much appreciated!!
Manager Response: Dear kga1978,  You had quite the great stay with us.  I am so glad and we are all jumping for joy in celebration that you had such an awesome stay.  Thank you so much for all the wonderful comments about the hotel and staff.  We love to hear that our guests had such a great time with us.  Hope to see you again in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Stayed here due to the room sizes(all suite) and price(unbeatable). Great value! Brand new hotel. It is pretty bare bone, no restaurant or bar and nowhere really delivers out in this area but it's still worth it. Nice little pool and hot tub. Rooms are modern and large. Extremely close to the airport and good access to all the highways to get to wherever you need to be in SoCal. Friendly staff. Free breakfast in the morning which is better tha what most hotels gives you. Free parking. Free and fast wifi as well. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear SKYEG91,  Much gratitude for posting a review of your stay with us.  The one thing that Homewood's all over the country do that no other hotel chain does, is to not "nickel and dime" our guests.  The price you see is the price you get.  WE get a lot of comments about ho guests appreciate it.  You are correct mentioning that we are in the middle of a large business complex, but the front desk does have some suggestions for delivery and The District, which a huge shopping and restaurant complex is just 1 mile from us.  If you come to visit us again, please keep that in mind.  Thanks for visiting.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Good place to stay, clean and comfortable
Summary: I was here for business stop, first time in this hotel. Staff was very nice and kind. Room was very quiet, clean and comfortable. Pretty worth to the price Easy to park, but need to improve the breakfast, there was not much choices in breakfast and fruits nit fresh. I reflected to the staff, but it doesn't help.
Manager Response: Dear menghsuenc,  Thanks for posting a review of your stay with us here at Homewood Suites Irvine.  We appreciate every guests comments, especially the ones that give us clues as to how to improve our services.  I noticed you mentioned at the end of your review that you told the staff about the breakfast issues and it didn't help.  I am here to assure you that every comments helps.  In fact, just this week we took steps and spent a bunch of money based on our guest's feedback to improve the quality and efficiency of our breakfast.  Since we are a new hotel, there are always small growing pains and I always research all of our guest comments to determine what we need to service you better.  Sincere apologies that you felt like we din't listen, but I am here to assure you that we are.  Without people like you, who support the hotel, we would all have no jobs.  You are all special to us.    We really appreciate your comments and hope to see you again soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: We were staying at this hotel for four days over the Easter holiday recently. It is virtually brand-new with suite style rooms containing a kitchenette, a separate dining and family room and the bedroom. It is practically brand-new spanking new and the decor is very simple, modern, clean and functional.  While I was going for interviews at nearby hospitals, my wife and daughter were enjoying the pool area and getting free shuttle service to the nearby malls in Irvine. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. Since my son is a college student UCI, we will be staying at this place every time in Southern California.  The free parking was super convenient since we had a car rental for four days. The morning breakfast is very good and more than adequate. They have unlimited free
Manager Response: Dear John I,  So your son is an Anteater? Go UC Irvine!!!  Thanks for choosing to stay with us.  So glad your wife and daughter were able to enjoy the pool.  We sure can't wait or you to visit us again.  We sure appreciate the comments and support.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: The staff is fabulous! The rooms are clean and cozy. You will love it! The planes are loud but you are near the airport....it's not bad. Restaurants and grocery stores are nearby off of Alton (which is up the street).
Manager Response: Dear wyntressm,  We appreciate you taking the time to post a comment about our hotel.  We love being called "Fabulous" and your fabulous for giving us support and acknowledgement.  Hope to see you in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Brand new hotel. Great service. The staff was very personable and able to assist. The property is in pristine condition. Plenty of outlets available. Breakfast was great too. Will be back! Plenty of parking available as well.
Manager Response: Dear h g,  Just wanted to take the time to say thank you for the quick note about the hotel.  We really appreciate the support and for you to take the time to write the review.  We would love to see you again in the future, so please don't hesitate to call us the next time you are in Orange County.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Throw away all of your other choices for hotels in Orange County.  The Homewood Suites in Irvine is the place to go!  It just opened a little over 3 months ago and it is fantastic.  The free breakfast in the morning is great.  The social hour on Monday-Thursday nights is an added plus.  They serve beer; wine; and other beverages in addition to a different type of dinner each night.  I am not a salad eater by any means but last night they had one of the best salad bars I have seen.  The best part... it's free!  Along with a bowl of hot soup and bread it was great!  The staff from the reception desk; maid service; and the restaurant group are absolutely fantastic.  This place is great for a business trip or with the family.  At 10-Star rating!!!
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Carter,  It was an absolute pleasure getting a chance to meet you, your wife and here all about your ventures for the next 2 years.  I am so excited for you.  Again, thank you so much for the great comments about the hotel, staff and especially for recognizing Cherie and Eric.  These are the kind of reviews we love to post and "brag" about.  Hope to see you again during our breakfast or social hour soon.  Don't be a stranger and we will talk soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: I just stayed in this hotel. Is brand new so everything is in great condition. The personal is very nice. The pool and the gym is great. It also have a firepit area and also a barbeque area.  Is surely recommend this hotel. Is nearby southcoasta plaza.
Manager Response: Dear xanda26,  Just wanted to reach out and let you know how much we appreciate the review of the hotel.  Thank you for the kind words and I will be sure to let the staff know.  Many thanks and hope to see you again in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, great place for families.
Summary: Great place. Clean rooms with an equipped kitchen.  Even had basketball court with balls available for kids to play.  I think they are still working out the kinks in their breakfast scheduling but staff was wonderful from check in to check out.  We had an issue in the evening and the morning person knew and acknowledged.  Would definately stay there again. I didn't walk around much outside but didn't seem like too much within walking distance but plenty of places to drive to nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Hariet B,  Thank you for the recent review you posted about your stay at the hotel.  We really appreciate the kind words regarding the breakfast staff and I will be sure to let them know.  I am guessing your were here during the weekend due to the commits regarding the breakfast.  We are well aware of the recent struggles during our breakfast and guest have been so gracious to offer recommendations.  I can assure you that we listen to our guests and this will be addressed immediately.  Plans are already in place to make things better and more accessible for our guests.  Many thanks for the wonderful comments and hope to see you again really soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: On a business trip, stayed in this hotel. Staff was friendly, make your stay feel easy and comfort. It still smells newly renovated and every is so clean. Breakfast selection limited but hot breakfast is still the best thing to get early in the morning. My favorite is the regular coffee with strong aroma. Looking forward to further stay
Manager Response: Dear yaozongtrip,  Wanted to send you a quick note to thank you for taking the time out of your busy business schedule to review our hotel.  We really appreciate the positive comments and certainly hope you choose us again if you are in the area.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Very nice Homewood Suites.  It's new and minutes from John Wayne Airport.  I used hotel provided Taxi to get to early AM (0600) Flight.  After years of nights in Homewood Suites, this hotel is as good as it gets!
Manager Response: Dear Joseph W,  As a frequent Homewood guest this comment really means a lot.  Our ownership put a lot of planning and designing into this particular Homewood.  I will be sure to share with my ownership team.  Really appreciate the kind words and don't hesitate to come visit us on business in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Had a wonderful stay. Hotel staff was pleasant and rooms were clean. Stay was comfortable overall. Would definitely recommend this if you are staying with family or for pleasure . Location is also easily accessible to major freeways and destinations.
Manager Response: Dear E7564WYclaudiaf,  Thanks for mentioning the location of the hotel.  Many people think because we are in a corporate area that we are far away from things. Even though we are 10-15 minutes from Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm and only 1 mile from John Wayne Airport.  Much appreciation for the review and hope to see you again really soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: This Place is Going to Book Fast!
Summary: Toured all the different room styles, they're all beautifully done and roomy, would definitely recommend this place for families, groups, and couples alike.  Solidly built, the walls/doors are thick and the floors quiet.  We stayed in a King Suite on the 4th floor.  Digital Key worked like a charm.  When you open the door, you see the very nice kitchen, but your eyes are drawn to the expanse of the room by the two large windows that are almost floor length, and they give the room an even more spacious feel.  Nice seating area with a low couch and coffee table/ottoman.  There's also a  small table in the kitchenette that can serve as a desk.  You don't see the bathroom until you walk to the bed, because the bathroom is hidden from view and tucked away in a separate room-- w/ the
Manager Response: Dear rosettey184,  The next time we need a marketing person to write about our rooms, I am going to reach out to you ;).  What a great description of the rooms!  Thank you so very much for the wonderful review and next time we will have to take you up on your offer to stay longer.  Have a great Spring and hope to see you again.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This hotel just opened a couple of months ago, so it's very clean, modern and in excellent condition. We needed a ride to the airport for a very early morning flight before the hotel shuttle service started. They arranged for a taxi to pick us up and they picked up the tab. They went over and beyond when it came to meeting our expectations.
Manager Response: Dear L2201GYmichaelc,  So awesome that you remembered us.  Thank you so much for the wonderful words about the hotel and staff.  I will be sure to share it with the team this week.  The shuttle to the airport is nice so people doing business in the area don't have to rent a car or find a shuttle.  Much gratitude for the comments and hope to see you again really soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This beautiful new hotel was so comfortable, I did not want to leave. The suite is set up perfectly and I love the kitchen.  Breakfast was really good.   Very bright and cheery lobby.  Staff was very accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear maw1972,  Thank you for your review of the hotel over Spring Break.  You didn't want to leave? That says everything.  I will say the size of our rooms, the free meals and the friendliness of the staff is enough to keep me around.  We really appreciate the kind thoughts and hope to see you again very soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: While in Irvine for a business meeting, I stayed at the Homewood Suites on Red Hill Rd. in Irvine.  It is a new hotel, so everything is new.  The rooms were very nice and comfortable.  There were a few things that concerned me.  The first is that they have very limited parking.  Many guest have to park on the street.   The address is Red Hill Rd, but the entrance is actually on a side street, off Red Hill Rd.    Even with that, I'd certainly recommend it!!
Manager Response: Good Day mlowder!   Thank you for the review.  We're always appreciative of constructive feedback and we  are addressing how to manage our parking lot when we are sold out.   You're 100% correct regarding the entrance of the hotel as our entrance is on Reynolds Ave. I'm happy to hear that you think our rooms are nice and that you were comfortable throughout your stay.   We hope to have you back soon and again, we appreciate the feedback.   Best Regards, David Arriola Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: I wanted to give the huge shout out to the hiring manager at this hotel.  I have never seen an entire team with exceptional customer engagement as this one.  The moment we arrived, we were greeted at the front desk by warm friendly smiles.   Just our luck, the staff surprised us with an early check in.  The next day, we were welcomed by the crew at the breakfast section of the hotel.  They were so engaged, talking to guests as they were passing by to replenish the food items.  I appreciated their kindness and humor.  One of them even remembered our Canadian bacon conversation and the other offered to house us in the laundry room for an extended stay.  Finally our car ride to the airport with Eric was a blast as he shared with us how fast their Mercedes shuttle can go.    Their
Manager Response: Good Day christiansI5563PB,  Thank you for the kind review!  We take pride in our team as we KNOW we have the most engaging and friendly staff out of all the Irvine hotels!  I'm glad you had the opportunity to engage with the breakfast team and had a laugh.  We shared this with Eric and gave a huge pat on the back!   We all love him!     I'm glad you had one of the most memorable experiences and we look forward to welcoming you back.  Best Regards, David Arriola Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: this hotel is brand new, really well done rooms, we had 4 boys in the room with us, the breakfast was good both days.  the sport court was really a plus along with the pool and the outdoor grills.  the lobby is nice and well maintained, the game room is really good for teenage kids.
Manager Response: Good Day Jeffrey M,  Thank you for the review!  Don't you love the new smell of a new hotel?   I'm glad you had the opportunity to utilize all aspects of our hotel.  My favorite area is the game room!  Shooting a game of pool and watching your favorite show all at the same time?  Who wouldn't enjoy that!   Look forward to you staying in the future!   Best Regards, David Arriola Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: Our church attends a confrence in Irvine every year. We stayed at the Ayers hotel many times. However, they kept raising prices every year so we have been looking for a nice place with a decent breakfast. Well, we found it it this hotel. It was fantastic. My wife and I had a king suite which was brand new and gigantic. 2 rooms with a kiitchen!!  Are you freaking kidding me? And the staff!!  O MY Lanta!!  This crew crushed it. If there was one knock, and I always find something to critique and it was the breakfast. They had waffles and some basics. But I felt it could have been a little better. I still call 5 stars!!  Pool, jacuzzi, gym, snacks and feee happy hour (although I couldn't attend). Homewood suites by Hilton at the John Wayne Airport, this customer tips his cap to your
Manager Response: Good Day Tim N!   Thank you for staying with us and the kind review!   I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay to say the least!  Yes, our suites are gigantic!  We're very happy with our product and even more happy with our team members! Thank you for the constructive feedback on the breakfast.  We try our best to offer an array of items to our guests on a daily basis but I will share your review with our Food & Beverage Team.   THANK YOU FOR THE 5 STARS!  WHOO HOO!    Best Regards, David Arriola

Summary: The name says it all. It truly makes you feel at home. Full kitchen, amazing amenities and complimentary breakfast and evening lounge. It's extremely clean and the staff is friendly. If you have pets, it's pet friendly!!
Manager Response: Welcome to your home away from home jessicfG8324JT!    It does say it in our brand name!  We ARE THE HOMEWOOD SUITES BY HILTON and we take pride in providing a home away from home experience for all our guests.  I'm glad we were able to fulfill that commitment to you!  We appreciate the kind review and look forward to your returning.  Best Regards, David Arriola Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: My stay was very good and staff was very friendly and helpful. The accomidations, complimentry breakfast, and social hour was great. The only issue was the ants all over the room, which was 1114.  Other than that all was good.
Manager Response: Good Day brismag2017,  Thank you for the review!   We take pride in having the most accommodating staff and I'm glad you had the opportunity to experience that.   I apologize for the tiny creatures that invaded your space.  I addressed it with my maintenance department and took care of the issue.  Thank you for bringing it to our attention.    We hope to have you back in the near future.    Best Regards, David Arriola  Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: Nice new property, clean and attentive staff. No restaurant or bar other than happy hour. No restaurants in walking distance and mini mart gas station a walk of a couple of blocks. I suggested more frozen selections in shop.
Manager Response: Good Day D788JSmatthewc!   Thank you for the review.   We take pride in providing attentive customer service and a clean environment for all guests to enjoy.   Our daily complimentary breakfast and our social hour (Monday - Thursday) featuring beer, wine, soft drinks and dinner is a great value added amenity however I understand your need for a restaurant!   We're 3 miles from The District at Tustin Legacy featuring a variety of eateries and our shuttle service can transport you there.   Thank you for the recommendation for more frozen selections! I'll be sure to share that with our staff.  I hope to have you return in the future!    Best Regards, David Arriola Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: Everything you expect from a Homewood and more.  Nice, clean room.  Free social and breakfast were great.  Parking is convenient and there's a basketball court too.  Didn't use the pool but it was open and clean.   No issues for me at all!
Manager Response: Good Day Jordan A!   How's your day going?   Thank you for the kind review.   We're happy that you enjoyed your stay and I'm happy to hear that you had zero issues!    We look forward to your return and please spread the word!  Homewood Suites by Hilton ROCKS!   Best Regards, David Arriola Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: Very clean.  Rooms are very nice and large.  The staff is friendly and the food was good - both the complimentary breakfast and the happy hour appetizers.  Our group used the fitness room which was nice.  It was a little difficult figuring out the complimentary internet but we figured it out.
Manager Response: Good Day G8833STtimp!    It's so great to hear that you had an excellent experience!  Providing a memorable experience is what we specialize in!   We have some of the friendliest staff in the hotel industry and we value them as team members.   I'm glad you enjoyed everything from our breakfast & social hour to the fitness center!     I apologize for any hiccups with the internet but happy to hear you were able to figure it out.    We look forward to you returning and wishing you a fantastic week!    Best Regards, David Arriola Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: This hotel is great. Everything is brand new and so clean. Cindy at check-in was an absolute gem, she is a valuable asset to your team. Rooms were large with huge flat screen TVs and a full kitchen. They also have pull-out sofabeds. Pool area was well-kept and includes bbqs, a fire pit, and a basketball court. The fitness center was fully equipped with all new machines. Definitely stay here if you need a room in the area, you will not be disappointed!
Manager Response: Good Day honeysunrise!     I'm glad to see that your stay went well.   Cindy is a GEM!   We value her so much and appreciate you mentioning her on Tripadvisor.com!   I will definitely share this with her to ensure she reads the review in it's entirety.    Again, I'm so happy you enjoyed your stay.  We are all very proud of the Homewood Suites Irvine and look forward to you returning!    Best Regards, David Arriola Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary Heading: A Beautiful and Relaxing Place To Stay For Business and Relaxation
Summary: Recently we had the chance to stay at the Homewood Suites in beautiful Irvine California. The new property is part of the Hilton family of hotels and is located not far from John Wayne Airport and has easy access to Disneyland and several other area attractions.
