The spacious lobby was very inviting and had a gas fireplace, plenty of dining space, lounges and areas to rest as well as a complimentary 24 hour coffee service. There is also a store for guests who need a snack or various sundries.   Our check in was very pleasant and we were on our way to our suite in no time at all thanks to two elevators which were on either side of the fitness room and pool area entrances.  With all of the travel we do it is hard to be surprised at times but we were blown away by our room the
Manager Response: Good Day Garethmb,  Thank you for the amazing review!  I'm glad you enjoyed every aspect of your stay.  It looks like you had time to explore all the areas that we have to offer.  We're very proud to have a hotel that can entertain all travelers and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.     Best Regards, David Arriola Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: My company attended a conference and chose this hotel from the list of hotels that had our convention rate. It was a little out of the way from our conference location, but we had stayed at closer hotels in years past and decided we'd rather drive a little to stay at a nicer place.. I'm so glad we did!  The Homewood Suites staff is probably one of the friendliest and most accomodating hotel staffs I have ever encountered. I spent 15 years as a travel agent and have stayed in a plethora of hotels, so that's saying something.  Check in was a breeze.  We felt welcome and valued. I thought I had packed everything I needed, but I had forgotten to pack several toiletry items.  I called the front desk to ask if they sold them, and the kind person at the desk said he would run right up
Manager Response: Dear Tamilu40,  What can I say?  This review is not only very informative for me to follow up with my staff, but it says a lot about the integrity and helpfulness of the team.  Although I am not sure the exact dates of your stay, I can tell you that March was a very busy month with sports tournaments and a few conventions in Anaheim, where we did experience some compression.  Even though we were busy, that is no excuse for us running out of items during the breakfast.  I am a firm believer in coaching and learning from our experiences, so I will be sure to go back and work with the food and beverage team to see what we could have done differently.  We really appreciate details reviews because it enables us to review, praise and investigate with the team.  Thank you so much for the kind words and the staff will definitely be getting a copy of this review.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Greg at the front desk is awesome
Summary: Greg is  fantastic all around. Greg provided excellent customer service from the moment we checked in until we checked out. Greg ensured our stay was as comfortable as can be. Greg's customer service is top notch and because of him we will continue to be loyal customers. You should clone him.
Manager Response: Dear B6770CSpeterc,  Wow!  You really really liked Greg, but I don't blame you.  He is an amazing customer service agent and we are proud to have him on our team.  Thanks for the great comments and I will be sure to share this with him.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Love staying in Irvine, close to everything, beaches, Disneyland and lots of restaurants and shopping! Free breakfast, parking and evening reception! Nice pool with sunshine all day! In the flight path, but the rooms are quiet. The staff is very nice. We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear jnelson98,  Seems like you guys did it all when you were staying with us.  Sometimes people don't realize that we are centrally located to all these places.  About a 10-15 minute drive to each, so thank you for mentioning that.    Sincerely,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: The hotel and staff were great! They accommodated our late arrival and greeted us each time we passed through the lobby during our 7 night stay. We made plenty of use out of the heated pool and spa, as well as the fire pit and bbq grill. Rooms were spacious, clean and had all the comforts of home. Breakfast was average, but ran out of food on the busier mornings. They also have a welcoming reception in the evenings with dinner and drinks/cocktails, which we didn't have the chance to experience. Short 10-15 minute drive to Disneyland. Safe location, and although the airport was nearby and planes were constantly flying very low overhead, there was virtually no noise disturbance in our room. Overall, great stay!
Manager Response: Dear M1871YYlisaa,  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.  Getting comments about people feeling like they were at "home" makes us feel so warm.  Thank you so much for the wonderful comments.  The team here prides themselves on providing a genuine, real experience for all our guests.  I will be sure to share this with the entire team.    Thank you so much for your comments.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Neighborhood is typically business complex for this area, but very accessible for work, shopping, Disney, and restaurants. New hotel, so everything is clean and bright. Manager's reception is ok.... soup and sliders tonight, and breakfast is plentiful-- and all included in room price. NO FEE for parking which is very typical in SoCal. Extremely courteous check-in and wait staff at receptions.
Manager Response: Dear Jef I,  Thank you for commenting about your stay with us.  We try so hard to make every guest feel as if they are at a home away from home with our service.  Hopefully in your case we succeeded.    Hope to see you again in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Omg! Greg from Homewood in Irvine, on Red Hill,  is absolutely amazing! We were displaced from our house for fumigation and had to leave with so much "stuff", more then must travelers.... lol.... he saw us and how much we had.... he generously upgraded us to a bigger room. He helped wheel our things to the new room and kept asking if there was anything else he could do.... wow.... never had service like this.... he said their tag line is "home away from home" and he certainly lived up to that!   Thank you GREG! Best hotel service ever!
Manager Response: Dear JulianChung,  I am so sorry you had to leave your home for fumigation reasons, but I am so very happy that Greg took extra special care of you.  I know having to relocate for a short time from your home with a family can be crazy.  Greg is one of our best.  This is not the first time Greg has taken extra special care of one of our house guests. I will be sure to give him a little something extra for his efforts.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine John Wayne Airport
Summary: Awesome queen/king suites with 50 inch TV's in each room.  FREE breakfast, wi-fi, evening reception, and parking.  Staff is friendly and courteous. Kids loved the basketball court and pool.  Fitness center was clean.
Manager Response: Dear W7295DDdawnb,  Next time you are here, we want to challenge the kids to a little pick up basketball.    Thanks for the kind words about our property.  Having all suites with full kitchens makes easy for the guests and there is always plenty of space.  I will be sure to share the review with my entire team.  Much gratitude and hope to see you again really soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: The hotel was awesome!! Super clean, friendly staff, and the amenities were great. Great breakfast and small dinner too. They also were super welcoming to our pets!! I would definitely stay here again!!
Manager Response: Dear N6554VXamys,  We love dogs.  We even have a special area of the hotel we like to put them in, so pets have pets for neighbors.  So nice to hear you enjoyed everything about the hotel including the breakfast and social hour.  I am going to hold you to your promise of staying here again....  Thanks for staying with us and I will be sure to share your review with my team.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Really enjoyed my stay. Staff was so courteous and welcoming. Clean. Wonderful visit. I would highly recommend staying here. Staff went out of their way to ensure that I was happy and satisfied. They went the extra mile for me.
Manager Response: Dear taniazg2017,  Thank you for the short and very sweet review of our hotel online.  Always nice to hear how the staff goes above and beyond to make our guests happy. We sure appreciate the positive comments and hope to see you again with us really soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Everything was great during our stay. Read reviews about plane noise on plane side but we heard nothing. The suites worked perfect for our family of 4. Pool area was perfect!! They even have basketballs to use on the court. Will definitely stay next time we are in the area!
Manager Response: Dear X2742WPpaul,  I have to first say, Paul is a great name ;) Thank you for the comments about the suites and the pool area.  I myself love the BBQ's right next to the pool.  If I was staying here I would use them all the time.  Sure hope to see you again soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: The suites are very grande and spacious.  Well organized and very clean!  The staff is very friendly, outgoing and love what they do.  Their every action and encounter shows their pride, enthusiasm and love for their chosen profession.  Which makes your stay very pleasant and enjoyable!  I highly recommend this home away from home!  Although near the LAX airport,  the airplane sounds can not be heard in the rooms!
Manager Response: Dear W4046LAlisaf,  Wanted to take a minute to thank you for posting such a nice review of our hotel.  The team and myself appreciate the comments and hope to see you again in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Best new spot for John Wayne Airport
Summary: Awesome new hotel near John Wayne Airport ! Clean, quiet, and restful hotel. The staff was amazing, helpful and proficient ! High end appliances with modern comfortable rooms. Do yourself a favor and stay here when your in the area and you will be Happy! I'm a business traveler and I thought this was a fantastic place to stay, and I will be returning in the future.  Than you, Jeffrey William Hurst
Manager Response: Dear Jeffrey H,  What a nice response to your stay with us.  Thank you so much for the wonderful words about our hotel. I will be sure to share this with the staff as we take great pride in reading these reviews.  We hope to see you again in the near future Mr. Hurst.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Very clean, new hotel and friendly staff! Quiet rooms and good breakfast and evening appetizers.  Relaxing atmosphere.  I will stay here again if in the Irvine area.  Will try the pool and large fitness center next time.
Manager Response: Dear bethbH7954JK,  Thank you for the kind words about out hotel and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Great hotel! Quiet and clean! Although catching an Uber or Lyft can be tricky due to the hotel being in a business center with other buildings. We also got to check in really early since it was a slow Monday. I however wish it was closer to stores to pick up snacks, ect, but it's close to the airport. I'm a HHonors member so I got a cheaper rate which also helped lol!
Manager Response: Dear 919tammy,  We appreciate the review of your stay with us.  Keep in mind that our hotel has a complimentary shuttle to John Wayne Airport, so that will help with the transportation issues.  During the week, we are primarily a corporate hotel, which frees us up on the weekends.  The location is great because we are 1 mile from the airport and only minutes away from Disneyland and the beach.  Thanks for the positive feedback and hope to see you again really soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Homewood Suites treats you like you're home
Summary: I absolutely love it. I checked in when it was 3weeks newly opened. Still smelled of new construction. I'm ok with that. First one to use fresh bright towels. There's a dishwasher!!! I could go on... the staff is wonderful and professional!
Manager Response: Dear Wfmradio,  Welcome Home! We absolutely love to hear when a guest feels like they are home when they are with us! The Front Desk team and entire staff are so thrilled to have made your stay with us so great, we really aim to please! The kitchen amenities are incredibly handy when traveling... Dishwashers come in use when you are on the road!  Thank you so much for taking the time to write out such a kind review, and we'll keep that new hotel sparkle up for you the next time you are back in the area!  Kindest regards,  Cherie Brower Front Office Manager

Summary: Brand new, super clean and spacious hotel. The front desk agents were friendly and informative. The room was huge! There's a full sized fridge, a kitchen, and a living room area. The wifi was great - super fast, was able to stream movies. The only downside I had was the evening social hour. It was listed as being from 6PM-8PM on the calendar they had on the fridge so I went down at 7PM. It turned out that it ENDED at 7PM because the times were actually 5PM-7PM. This bugged me because they should communicate that to their guests, so for that miscommunication, I took it down a level. All in all, I would return again because it is located near John Wayne and I like that they have a kitchen.  Free: Parking, wifi, breakfast, evening social hour.
Manager Response: Dear Sakina I,  Thank you for staying at our property! We are so excited to hear that about your awesome stay at our property, and the whole front desk team were absolutely thrilled to be at your service! The rooms are incredibly spacious, and we are so glad that the room and WiFi fit your needs during your stay! I am so sorry about the miscommunication about the evening reception hours and the misprint on our calendars. Our evening reception is 5pm-7pm, and apologize about the misinformation.  We have corrected the calendar error, and as always, we are incredibly open to any concerns or suggestions that will help us to better serve you in the future! Thank you again for staying at our property, and thank you for taking the time to write out such a kind review. We greatly look forward to having you stay with us in the future!  Kindest regards,  Cherie Brower Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: We had a anniversary that was the best experience ever had withe our new suit
Summary: The best sperience ever went we opened the suit. Great view and location the tv was amazing we ordered pizza and we enjoyed our anniversary at 100% satisfied we definitely going to book this hotel again.
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary from the Homewood Suites!   It brings a tear to my eye to hear that we contributed to your special day.   Is it safe to say that we can expect you back to celebrate birthdays, holidays and future anniversaries?   I think it is!   We look forward to you returning and celebrating your special moments.     Best Regards, David Arriola

Summary Heading: The best hotel in Orange County
Summary: This is my first review on trip advisor and I want share my experience first of all The manager and hotel staff are very attentive and friendly. The food and service were awesome. The beds were comfortable will be a repeat customer.
Manager Response: Good Day Chance23,  WOW!  Welcome to TripAdvisor.com!   It's always a joy to hear that our everyone from our team members to our managers are attentive and friendly!  We take pride in that and I will share this with my team.   I'm a huge fan of our food as well!  I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed it!   In regards to our beds, it's like floating on a cloud from what people say.   Please stop by and say hello next time you stay with us!   Best Regards, David Arriola

Summary: Great hotel with great staff this facility is new studio rooms are well designed aminities are excellent great breakfast and evening social with great hospitality from staff all the way from top to lower level
Manager Response: Good Day vafak2017,  Thank you for the kind review.  We take pride in providing excellent service and I'm glad you had the opportunity to experience that first hand.    I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and social hour.  So many options and what a great value added amenity!     Again, I appreciate the kind review and please come back to visit us!     Best Regards, David Arriola

Summary: This is my first stay in this hotel (its also just opened).   Its very nicely done inside, the staff is friendly and caring.  Complimentary breakfast is good, the complimentary snack at dinner has been hit or miss but nothing awful.  The rooms are very nice, with a kitchenette, two tvs, the beds are very comfortable.  The only downside I really have is wifi.  Its not the greatest system in place.   Spotty at times.
Manager Response: Dear sjspisak,  Thank you for posting a review of your experience with us.  I am taking your notes back to the staff and my IT director for the company regarding the social hour and wifi connection.  I wish I knew specifically what the issue was with the connection because most of the time the connect is great.  I am so sorry for the issues with the wifi.  If you ever stay with us and it happens again, please reach out to me personally so we can diagnose the problem.  Sincere apologies,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Brand new property! Every thing was clean, service is excellent,  friendly staff :) rooms very spacious, complimentary breakfast was delicious! Even though the close to the airport, didn't hear any airplane noise! Will be back again!
Manager Response: Dear Sick_As_It_Gets,  One of the coolest screen names EVER!  Thanks for the review and we really appreciate the positive rating.  Hopefully we will see you back really soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: My daughter and I were originally planning on visiting Disneyland, but the weather was cool and raining.  We decided to go to shopping in Palm Springs instead. After the drive and lunch we were ready to relax at the hotel.  The hotel was in a great location with lots of restaurants nearby in the District.  The room was one of the cleanest I have ever stayed at.  The hotel was bright and with modern interior.  The beds were very comfortable, you literally sank into the bed with the crisp bedding and feather pillows surrounding you.  The height of the bed was great and taller that hotel room beds.  Great breakfast, pleasant interactions with all the hotel staff.  Definitely will stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Gay S,  I am so sorry to hear that you missed out on Disneyland.  Next time remember that Disney is best to go to when it rains because there is way less people.  Brave the weather next time and try it out.  Thank you for the review of your experience with us.  We really hope you use us again when you head back to Disney since we are only a 10 minute drive (without traffic).  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: amazing hotel for any size family, but especially a family our size (6).  Everything was clean and all staff was attentive and outstanding!!!!  Rooms were very spacious and very clean!!  Cannot wait to return!
Manager Response: Dear Brett P,  For anyone traveling with a good size family, we have the room type for you.  We really appreciate the positive comments about the hotel and staff.  Sometimes, people don't realize the size of the rooms at Homewood Suites.  When ever I go anywhere with my family this brand is the first I look for because of the huge rooms and the free breakfast.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: New and clean property.  No hot water in the shower and no shampoo.  Not a good impression.  It could be a nice place if the management and staff pay closer attention to the finer details.  It's very close to John Wayne airport and easy to get to.
Manager Response: Dear U3531ZQwilliamh,  Thank you for the review of your experience with us here at Homewood.  From the correspondence you left me, you informed me that you had a late night flight and early departure from the hotel and understandably did not inform anyone of your issues until you had reached out to me after your stay.  After receiving your initial communication about the issues, we were quick to check the room and fix any issues.  I also immediately offered you a free future night since you mentioned that your travel to the area 2 to 3 times a year.  I am terribly sorry for the challenges you faced hear at the hotel and hopefully we solved the issues to your satisfaction.  I am eager to make it up to you, so hopefully we will see you in the near future.  Sincere apologies,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Hopefully, I have an opportunity to visit again in the near future. The suite was very clean, spacious and well equipped. The entire staff was friendly and helpful.  The common areas are spacious and accommodating when working outside of your room.  The conference room was configured to meet our group's needs. In addition to the pool and fitness center, they have a billiard lounge to relax in.
Manager Response: Dear RC000111,  Thanks for attending a group meeting here with us.  On behalf of the entire team, we thank you for the wonderful review.  By the way, thanks for mentioning the "game room" most guests might not know about it and the act that they can check in at the front desk and use it for free.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: I selected this hotel based upon a passed positive experience with the brand, and convenient location based upon my plans.  I was so happy with my choice!  The hotel is brand new, and is in sparkling condition.  The bed provided one of the most restful nights in a hotel ever, so very comfortable.  The room size was just right, and everything was in working order.  The staff at the front desk was very helpful and friendly.  The only issue we encountered was that they seemed to be severely understaffed in the breakfast room, but that did not hinder my experience, I just felt badly that the one person working seemed to be working so hard.  I loved this hotel and would definitely recommend it, and would return again.
Manager Response: Dear JulieBaylor,  Thank you for the recent review of your experience with us here at the Homewood Irvine.  I was so glad to hear how much your enjoyed the property condition, the beds and especially the staff.  Thank you for mentioning the staffing of the breakfast area.  The servicing of our guests is priority number one, but we also don't want our staff to be over worked.  I will be evaluating the staffing and hopefully come up with a solution very soon.  Hope to see you again soon,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Our stay here started out a little rough. We had 3 adults and 4 children so we booked one of their larger suites to fit us all. Th day before we got a call informing us that there was a problem with our room so they were moving us to two connecting rooms with 2 Queen beds in each. No problem, however,  when we arrived we were told that those two rooms were not available so they were moving us to 2 connecting rooms but they only had 1 King bed in each, plus the pull out couch. I was not pleased but honestly it turned out OK. We all slept comfortably and the hotel made it right by knocking off a decent amount off our bill. The hotel itself is very clean and modern! The breakfast was good and the staff were all great... I mean everyone from the front desk to the maintenance crew!
Manager Response: Dear SloTown R,  Oh no!  I am so sorry about the room changes at the last minute.  I was well aware of the situation and I hope the desk was proactive enough for you to resolve the problem.  In your particular case we had 2 different guests had to extend they stay for emergency purposes.  I am so sorry this happen but was glad to hear the staff deeply discounted your rate and was able to make things right.  Their response to the problem seems like it was sufficient.    Please, the next time you come out, please contact me directly as I wil make sure to do something special for you and your family.  Sincere apologies,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Brand new and very well designed hotel. We liked everything about this hotel except that the bed frames/boxsprings were very noisy and probably poorly assembled. Since this is a brand new hotel we hope that they can quickly fix this problem.
Manager Response: Dear kalilj2017,  We appreciate the notification about the beds.  We are definitely quick to fix and respond to any problems our guest's may have.  In your case, I hope you are the same guest who responded through Hilton because we don't have a last name or room number.  But that is OK, at least we are aware of that issue and can start checking rooms one by one.  Thank you for the comments and hope you have an awesome day!  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: I Recommend this hotel to everyone. New Hotel, Very Clean, Staff extremely Helpful, caring and kind. hotel Clerks were always attentive to my family and my needs. on day of our departure surprised my son with a Children's book signed by all the staff for his 1 year old birthday. This was truly unexpected and the nicest gift ever. I will keep this book forever as a memory. I thank them all.
Manager Response: Dear Kenneth M,  Happy 1st Birthday to your son.  I was there when we all signed the card.  We love doing things like this for not only our guests but our team members too.  Isn't that what hospitality is all about.  Thank you for the kind words about the staff.  We had so much fun with your family.  Hope to see you again and don't be afraid to reach out.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Typical Hilton but brand new! Staff was beyond belief in the attention and genuine care given! Food was excellent and service spot on! Bed was brand new and made us want to stay there all day! We have found OUR HOTEL!
Manager Response: Dear RichardandCindyH,  Welcome to the Homewood Suites Irvine Family!  You are welcome to make this your home anytime.    Thank you for the kind words about the hotel and staff.  We really appreciate the positive reinforcement.  Hope to see you again really soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Great thanks.  Loved the evening social. Would come back again!  Great breakfast.  Staff was beyond sweet.   Brand new so totally clean !    Was fairly close to Disneyland, that is what we did on our stay! Thanks
Manager Response: Dear Misstracymc1978,  Hope you and your family enjoyed your trip to Disneyland.  People sometimes don't realize that without traffic we are only 10 minutes away and just about a mile from John Wayne Airport.  Your review was much appreciated and we hope to see you again next year.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: This is a residence-style suite hotel, with fully equipped kitchens.  No valet or bellhops here; this is a do-it-yourself facility, a plus in my book.  Breakfast is free and the food is a distinct cut above most other similar hotels, served in a beautiful and spacious atrium-style dining room.  On weekday afternoons they also offer complimentary hors d'eourves, which I unfortunately did not get the chance to try.  The hotel is only a month old; Google still shows it as an empty lot!  The staff is extremely friendly.  The hotel is very convenient to John Wayne Airport, UCI, beaches, etc.   Some negatives: 1) This hotel is in a business park area, with no restaurants or stores close by.  This isn't some place you would want to spend any time without a car.  With that in mind, the
Manager Response: Dear Erik L,  What a detailed review?  Thank you.  It enables me to go back and review things in detail with the team.  Thank you so much for your post.  It is always nice to hear about the staff and amenities being to your expectations.    Thank you for the list of improvements also.  I have taken the liberty of calling out the elevator maintenance company to look at them and see what can be done.  As for the opening of the room at 1030pm, we were able to run a key report straight from your door and in fact it was a team member who was delivering some items to another guest room and mistaken the room number.  I am so so sorry for that.  We have met with the team member and this definitely will not happen again.  Please accept my apology for that and reach out to me if you need any other clarification or questions.  This is certainly an embarrassing situation.   If you ever decide to come back because your daughter does go the UCI, please reach out to me personally and I will make sure you are specially taken care of.  Sincere apologies,  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: Hilton knocked it out of the park with this new Homewood Suites.  It is a beautiful, spacious property tucked in an industrial park area but it is extremely quiet despite being in the flight path of SNA.  Still really close to shopping and restaurants should you want to venture out.  This hotel has FREE parking and if you have stayed anywhere in the OC you don't see this. Service staff are super friendly and helpful.  I was assigned a studio suite which I thought might be small but no, it was rather large.  It had a full kitchen, coach and desk area, very comfy bed with reading lights, summer nice shower area.  The TV and channel selections were awesome.  Breakfast was ok, similar to Hampton Inn so not up to par with Embassy Suites but suitable.  Cut off time for breakfast is
Manager Response: Dear TJanzen,  Just wanted to give you a "shout out" for the wonderful review of your experience with us.  We appreciate details and are very competitive by nature.  Your comment about the breakfast not being as good as "another" hotel near us, got my staff fire up and they are determined to be better.  So, I thank you for that.  We do our best to please each and every guest, so much gratitude for the comments about the staff.  We hope to see you really soon.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing stay , Great staff , Great Location
Summary: Great location close to SNA john Wayne airport and all local attraction . This hotel is truly beautiful the staff here go above and beyond to make sure every aspect of your stay is taken care of .    Close to amazing restaurants and shopping . Will definitely stay again in the future
Manager Response: Dear MattSuper,  Love your screen name.  Thank you so much for posting a review of your experiene with us here at Homewood Suites Irvine.  The staff was so excited to hear once again a great comment regarding their "Can Do" attitude.  Your support is much appreciated and hope to see you again in the near future.  Paul Frechette General Manager

Summary: New and well done! What a great new hotel by John Wayne airport! Love the decor, rooms are perfect size! Love the location! Staff was extremely helpful and friendly at checkin and check out. Thrilled to have this option when I travel. Beautiful and comfortable! I will be back! Thanks
Manager Response: Dear Gina1131,  Couldn't have said it better myself. We are blessed to have an owner who builds such nice hotels.  It makes out job as a staff so much easier when the product is as nice as this one.  Being just 3 minutes from John Wayne helps our cause too.  Thank you so much for the wonderful comments about the hotel and the team, wereally appreciate the support.  Have and awesome week.  Paul Frechette General Manager
